english_page_header: Hymn 1 - Holy, Holy, Holy
english_full_lyrics:
Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty!
Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee;
Holy, holy, holy, merciful and mighty!
God over all who rules eternity.

Holy, holy, holy! All the saints adore Thee,
Casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea;
Cherubim and seraphim falling down before Thee,
Who wert, and art, and evermore shalt be.

Holy, holy, holy! Though the darkness hide Thee,
Though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see;
Only Thou art holy; there is none beside Thee,
Perfect in power, in love, and purity.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 1 首 - 頌讚獨一真神
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聖哉，聖哉，聖哉，全能大主宰！
天上、地下、海中萬物，頌主高名；
聖善、恩慈、誠實，自古永無更改，
獨一的真神，應當受讚美。

聖哉，聖哉，聖哉，群聖皆跪拜！
各以華麗冠冕，捧在寶座面前；
權柄、尊貴、榮耀，都歸被殺羔羊，
昔在而今在，永在萬萬年。

聖哉，聖哉，聖哉，鴻恩遍宇內！
蒙贖信徒，得瞻救主 威赫榮光；
公義、真理、審判，誰與聖靈堪比？
智、仁、勇全備，大哉，保惠師！

english_page_header: Hymn 2 - Hallelujah, Praise the Father
english_full_lyrics:
Hallelujah, Praise the Father! Amen, Amen, Hallelujah!
Lift your voice, praise the merciful Father, O sing: “Hallelujah!”

Hallelujah, Praise to Jesus! Amen, Amen, Hallelujah!
Lift your voice, praise our Saviour Jesus, O sing: “Hallelujah!”

Hallelujah, Praise the Spirit! Amen, Amen, Hallelujah!
Lift your voice, praise the Holy Spirit, O sing: “Hallelujah!”

Glory, glory, Hallelujah! Glory, glory, Hallelujah!
Lift your voice, and sing His praises, “Glory, endless glory!”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 2 首 - 讚美聖父
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
哈利路亞，讚美聖父！
阿們，阿們，哈利路亞！
高聲讚美，慈悲聖父，
歌曰：「哈利路亞！」

哈利路亞，讚美耶穌！
阿們，阿們，哈利路亞！
高聲讚美，救主耶穌，
歌曰：「哈利路亞！」

哈利路亞，讚美聖靈！
阿們，阿們，哈利路亞！
高聲讚美，全能聖靈，
歌曰：「哈利路亞！」

榮耀，榮耀，哈利路亞！
榮耀，榮耀，哈利路亞！
高聲讚美，欣欣 
歌曰：「讚美，不勝讚美！」。

english_page_header: Hymn 3 - The God of Abraham Praise
english_full_lyrics:
The God of Abraham praise, All praised be His name,
Who was, and is, and is to be, For aye the same!
The one eternal God, Ere aught that now appears;
The First, the Last: beyond all thought His timeless years!

His spirit floweth free, High surging where it will;
In prophet’s word He spoke of old, He speaketh still.
Established is His law, And changeless it shall stand,
Deep writ upon the human heart, On sea or land.

He hath eternal life, Implanted in the soul;
His love shall be our strength and stay While ages roll.
Praise to the living God! All praised be His name,
Who was, and is, and is to be, For aye the same!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 3 首 - 亞伯拉罕的神
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
亞伯拉罕的神，萬有稱頌祢名，
昔在今在以後永在，永不變更。
永恆獨一真神，天上地下同尊，
是初是終，莫測高深，永世長存。

聖靈活水江河，按神旨意運行，
昔日神藉先知預言，今仍引領。
親自建立真道，祂法度永留存，
主道遍滿海洋、陸地，深印我心。

祂有永遠生命，白白賞賜世人，
主愛是我力量、幫助，永遠長存。
眾聖徒齊頌揚，讚美永活真神，
全能、全智、全德上主，萬世頌吟。

english_page_header: Hymn 4 - I Love Thy Kingdom, Lord
english_full_lyrics:
I love Thy kingdom, Lord, The house of Thine abode,
The church our blest Redeemer saved With His own precious blood.

I love Thy church, O God! Her walls before Thee stand,
Dear as the apple of Thine eye, And graven on Thy hand.

For her my tears shall fall; For her my prayers ascend;
To her my cares and toils be giv’n, Till toils and cares shall end.

Beyond my highest joy I prize her heav’nly ways,
Her sweet communion, solemn vows, Her hymns of love and praise.

Sure as Thy truth shall last, To Zion shall be giv’n
The brightest glories earth can yield, And brighter bliss of heav’n.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 4 首 - 讚美天父
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我心讚美天父，救贖之恩顯明；
盡心、盡意、盡性、盡力，讚衪極美聖名！

我心讚美天父，永遠萬福之根；
不可忘記主大慈愛，不可忘記主恩。

天父已發慈憐，寬容我攏總罪；
為我醫治一切疾病，使我得福百倍。

患難、困苦臨身，世間有誰照顧？
主憐憫我，伸出右手，能救我脫苦楚。

像父母愛兒女，從小常常保護；
天父如此慈悲、憐憫，常賜恩典眷顧。

天上聖使千萬，地下人民無數；
一同敬拜，一同稱讚，榮耀歸於天父。

english_page_header: Hymn 5 - This Is My Father’s World
english_full_lyrics:
This is my Father’s world,
And to my listening ears,
All nature sings, and round me rings
The music of the spheres.

This is my Father’s world,
I rest me in the thought
Of rocks and trees, of skies and seas;
His hand the wonders wrought.

This is my Father’s world,
The birds their carols raise,
The morning light, the lily white,
Declare their Maker’s praise.

This is my Father’s world,
He shines in all that’s fair;
In the rustling grass I hear Him pass;
He speaks to me everywhere.

This is my Father’s world,
O let me ne’er forget
That though the wrong seems oft so strong,
God is the ruler yet.

This is my Father’s world,
The battle is not done;
Jesus who died shall be satisfied,
And earth and heaven be one.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 5 首 - 萬有讚美天父
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
萬有讚美天父，永在、全能之神，
天地萬物互相應聲，讚美祂大尊名；
花、草、樹木、水泉、穹蒼、海洋、山嶺，
述說祂大權能榮耀，顯明信實、慈仁。

萬有讚美天父，永在、全智之神，
天地萬物齊聲唱詩，讚美祂大聖名；
走獸、飛鳥、昆蟲、水族、牲畜、家禽，
都是天父創造、養活，各從其類滋生。

我心讚美天父，人類本為一家，
雖然始祖犯罪墮落，神恩格外增加；
差遣救主降世，寶血洗淨無瑕，
成聖、稱義，出死入生，得享天國榮華。

english_page_header: Hymn 6 - The Spacious Firmament On High
english_full_lyrics:
The spacious firmament on high, With all the blue ethereal sky,
And spangled heav’ns, a shining frame, Their great Original proclaim.
Th’unwearied sun from day to day, Does his Creator’s power display,
And publishes to ev’ry land The work of an almighty hand.

Soon as the evening shades prevail, The moon takes up the wondrous tale;
And nightly to the list’ning earth Repeats the story of her birth;
Whilst all the stars that round her burn, And all the planets in their turn,
Confirm the tidings as they roll, And spread the truth from pole to pole.

What though in solemn silence all Move round this dark terrestrial ball?
What though no real voice nor sound Amid their radiant orbs be found?
In reason’s ear they all rejoice, And utter forth a glorious voice,
Forever singing, as they shine, “The hand that made us is divine.”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 6 首 - 頌主造化大功
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
大哉，穹蒼，冥冥無疆！極目天象，舖張八方；
萬星羅列，燦爛爭光；紅日昇落，晝來夜往。
真神造化之功顯揚，托住萬有，權能昭彰；
深哉，神智、神能無量！我們應當讚美頌揚。

太陽西墜，明月東昇，二光照耀輪轉不停；
眾星無數，閃爍運行，各依軌道，秩序不更。
都由主宰管理週詳，偌大宇宙，保持安寧；
諸天萬象，述主榮耀，我們更當讚美主名。

一切生物佈滿寰瀛，各從其類，皆主造成，
賜福繁殖，養育群生，自古以來，主恩昌盛。
上主在天，雖不能見，藉著萬物，可以証明；
萬物有所本，萬有所靠，萬有所歸，獨一真神。

english_page_header: Hymn 7 - Joyful, Joyful, We Adore Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Joyful, joyful, we adore Thee, God of glory, Lord of love,
Hearts unfold like flow’rs before Thee, Opening to the sun above.
Melt the clouds of sin and sadness, Drive the dark of doubt away;
Giver of immortal gladness; Fill us with the light of day.

All Thy works with joy surround Thee, Earth and heav’n reflect Thy rays,
Stars and angels sing around Thee, Center of unbroken praise.
Field and forest, vale and mountain, Flow’ry meadow, flashing sea,
Chanting bird and flowing fountain, Call us to rejoice in Thee.

Thou art giving and forgiving, Ever blessing, ever blest,
Wellspring of the joy of living, Ocean depth of happy rest!
Thou our everlasting Father, All who live in love are Thine;
Teach us how to love each other, Lift us to the joy divine.

Mortals, join the happy chorus Which the morning stars began;
Father love is reigning o’er us, Brother love binds man to man.
Ever singing, march we onward, Victors in the midst of strife,
Joyful music leads us sunward In the triumph song of life.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 7 首 - 萬有齊頌主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
歡樂，歡樂，屬主之人，讚美至尊獨一神；
心花開放，靈命更新，齊向朝陽吐清馨。
罪瘴、惡氛，求主掃盡，愁霧、疑雲俱廓清！
我們當以頌讚為祭，結出美果在嘴唇。

宇宙萬有，太空無際，一同顯映主榮光；
千萬天使，燦爛群星，排列環繞齊頌揚。
高山、茂林、清風、明月，好鳥吟叫，百花香；
鳴泉漱石，海浪拍岸，都在頌主而歡唱。

永存憐憫，廣行赦免，萬恩萬福出天宮；
平安泉源，歡樂江河，一切福氣永充豐。
慈愛天父！養育群生，活命存留祢愛中；
我等聖民蒙主救贖，屬靈福氣更無窮。

天父大愛，自天顯明，陽光、雨、露常照臨；
諸天歡樂，萬有稱頌，榮耀歸與主聖名！
受造之物服在虛空，一同嘆息到如今；
切望神子顯現出來，脫離轄制慶復興。

english_page_header: Hymn 8 - O Come and Sing Unto the Lord
english_full_lyrics:
O come and sing unto the Lord,
To Him our voices raise;
Let us in our most joyful songs
The Lord, our Saviour, praise.

Before His presence let us come
With praise and thankful voice;
Let us sing psalms to Him with grace,
With grateful hearts rejoice.

The Lord our God is King of Kings,
Above all gods His throne;
The depths of earth are in His hand,
The mountains are His own.

To Him the spacious sea belongs,
He made its waves and tides;
And by His hand the rising land
Was formed, and still abides.

O come, and bowing down to Him
Our worship let us bring;
Yea, let us kneel before the Lord,
Our Maker and our King.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 8 首 - 當向神歌頌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我們當向萬王之王，齊聲歌唱、頌揚；
同心讚美宇宙主宰，恩惠廣被萬方！

我們來到真神面前，心靈誠實、敬虔；
當用頌詞、靈歌、詩章，讚祂恩愛無邊！

english_page_header: Hymn 9 - All People That on Earth Do Dwell
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 9 首 - 向主歡呼
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
普世萬族向主歡呼，
懷恩、感德，慶幸鼓舞！
齊來主前放聲歌頌，
以靈以誠，敬拜天父。

應當稱謝進主恩門，
在主聖堂，讚主榮尊；
聚精會神恭聽聖言，
心悅誠服，謝主鴻恩。

天父真神至善完全，
慈愛、憐憫，古今皆然；
應許信實堅定不變，
全能、公義，永遠綿延。

english_page_header: Hymn 10 - Glory to Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Glory to His Name, The Almighty God!
Glory to our Lord, Praise His Name!

Glory to our God, He will never change.
Glory to our Lord, Praise His Name!

Glory be to God! Jesus comes again,
Glory to our Lord, Praise His Name!

REFRAIN
Hallelujah, Hallelujah! Glory to Jesus, Praise His Name!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 10 首 - 榮耀歸耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
榮耀歸耶穌，大權能的主，
榮耀歸耶穌，我的主；
哈利路亞，哈利路亞！
榮耀歸耶穌，我的主！

榮耀歸耶穌，永不改的主，
榮耀歸耶穌，我的主；
哈利路亞，哈利路亞！
榮耀歸耶穌，我的主！

榮耀歸耶穌，快要來的主，
榮耀歸耶穌，我的主；
哈利路亞，哈利路亞！
榮耀歸耶穌，我的主！

english_page_header: Hymn 11 - I Rejoice, for Jesus Walketh by My Side
english_full_lyrics:
I rejoice, for Jesus walketh by my side,
In His presence peace and happiness abide,
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
In His presence peace and happiness abide.

To the fount of living waters He will guide,
For His bounteous blessings leave me satisfied,
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
For His bounteous blessings leave me satisfied.

May I praise Him all the passing of my days,
And forever strive to follow in His ways,
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
And forever strive to follow in His ways.

He has promised He will lead me all the way,
From God’s holy house I’ll never go astray,
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
From God’s holy house I’ll never go astray.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 11 首 - 在主內頂快樂
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我在耶穌身邊，快樂，頂快樂！
我和衪一同走，心裡頂知足！
哈利路亞，哈利路亞！
我和衪一同走，心裡頂知足！

我在生命河邊，可喝生命水，
常蒙耶穌賜福，心裡好滿足！
哈利路亞，哈利路亞！
常蒙耶穌賜福，心裡好滿足！

我心要讚美主，醫好我疾病，
我也要感謝主，和我靈相通；
哈利路亞，哈利路亞！
我也要感謝主，和我靈相通。

我已得主應許，要領攏總路，
盼望將來能到天國好地方；
哈利路亞，哈利路亞！
盼望將來能到天國好地方。

english_page_header: Hymn 12 - When I Can Read My Title Clear
english_full_lyrics:
When I can read my title clear, To mansions in the skies,
I’ll bid farewell to ev’ry fear, And wipe my weeping eyes;
And wipe my weeping eyes, And wipe my weeping eyes,
I’ll bid farewell to ev’ry fear, And wipe my weeping eyes.

Should earth against my soul engage, And fiery darts be hurled,
Then I can smile at Satan’s rage, And face a frowning world;
And face a frowning world, And face a frowning world,
Then I can smile at Satan’s rage, And face a frowning world.

Let cares, like a wild deluge come, And storms of sorrow fall!
May I but safely reach my home, My God, my heav’n, my all;
My God, my heav’n, my all, My God, my heav’n, my all,
May I but safely reach my home, My God, my heav’n, my all.

There shall I bathe my weary soul, In seas of heav’nly rest,
And not a wave of trouble roll, Across my peaceful breast;
Across my peaceful breast, Across my peaceful breast,
And not a wave of trouble roll, Across my peaceful breast.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 12 首 - 耶穌尊名
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌尊名入我耳中，好像和諧美妙樂聲；
願傳此名，音大聲洪，天上、地下都聽。

耶穌尊名至高、至榮，超乎世間古今萬名；
醫我疾病，使我得福，權能永遠常新。

耶穌尊名至寶、至美，世間珠寶黃金難比；
赦我罪愆，使我得生，萬民所望、所倚。

耶穌尊名至善、至聖，好比園中蘭桂清香；
能解世間苦楚、愁悶，使我免去心傷。

副歌
美哉，大哉，耶穌我主﹗
創造、救贖，權能無比；
離去天上，降生世間，捨身替我受死。

english_page_header: Hymn 13 - No, Not One
english_full_lyrics:
There’s not a friend like the lowly Jesus, No, not one! No, not one!
None else could heal all our souls’ diseases, No, not one! No, not one!

No friend like Him is so high and holy, No, not one! No, not one!
And yet no friend is so meek and lowly, No, not one! No, not one!

There’s not an hour that He is not near us, No, not one! No, not one!
No night so dark but His love can cheer us, No, not one! No, not one!

Was e’er a gift like the Savior given? No, not one! No, not one!
Will He refuse us a home in heaven? No, not one! No, not one!

REFRAIN
Jesus knows all about our struggles, He will guide till the day is done;
There’s not a friend like the lowly Jesus, No, not one! No, not one!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 13 首 - 無人能比耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
沒有人能比全能的耶穌，
沒有人，沒有人；
沒有人能醫我靈魂疾病，
沒有人，沒有人。

沒有人能比我主的聖潔，
沒有人，沒有人；
沒有人能比主柔和、謙卑，
沒有人，沒有人。

沒有人能比我主的慈愛，
沒有人，沒有人；
有何罪人信主不蒙赦免？
沒有人，沒有人。

沒有人能比我主的犧牲，
沒有人，沒有人；
有何罪人信主不得永生？
沒有人，沒有人。

副歌
主耶穌全能、全智、全愛，
祂終日肯與我相親；
沒有人能比完全的耶穌，
沒有人，沒有人。

english_page_header: Hymn 14 - Welcome, Delightful Morn
english_full_lyrics:
Welcome, delightful morn, Thou day of sacred rest!
I hail thy kind return; Lord, make these moments blest:
From the low plane of mortal toys,
I soar to reach immortal joys, I soar to reach immortal joys.

Now may the King descend, And fill His throne with grace;
Thy scepter, Lord, extends, While saints address Thy face;
Let sinners feel Thy quick’ning word, 
And learn to know and fear the Lord, And learn to know and fear the Lord.

Descend, celestial Dove, With all Thy quick’ning powers;
Disclose a Saviour’s love, And bless the sacred hours:
Then shall my soul new life obtain,
Nor Sabbaths be enjoyed in vain, Nor Sabbaths be enjoyed in vain.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 14 首 - 萬王之王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
基督萬王之王，為人苦味先嘗；
現在登上寶座，應受讚美頌揚。

基督萬王之王，為我復活盼望；
因祂直活永遠，勝過陰間死亡。

基督萬王之王，照亮世界真光；
聖靈已經降臨，真道必快傳揚。

基督萬王之王，揭開七印秘藏；
榮耀、尊貴、智慧，歸與被殺羔羊。

副歌
禧年已到，聖靈大降，
禧年已到，聖靈大降；
復活之人，福樂無疆。

english_page_header: Hymn 15 - Ye Servants of God
english_full_lyrics:
Ye servants of God, your Master proclaim,
And publish abroad His wonderful name;
The name all victorious of Jesus extol;
His kingdom is glorious, He rules over all.

God ruleth on high, almighty to save,
And still He is nigh, His presence we have;
The great congregation His triumph shall sing,
Ascribing salvation to Jesus our King.

“Salvation to God, who sits on the throne,”
Let all cry aloud, and honor the Son;
The praises of Jesus the angels proclaim,
Fall down on their faces, and worship the Lamb.

Then let us adore, and give Him His right,
All glory and power, all wisdom and might,
All honor and blessing, with angels above,
And thanks never ceasing, for infinite love.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 15 首 - 頌讚耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
真神的子民，當頌主權能，
各處大傳揚，使真道通行；
頌讚主耶穌，主尊名常得勝，
主國極榮耀，主威權管萬姓。

耶穌自天上，有力能救人，
常在萬民中，顯出其慈仁；
會眾都歡喜，大聲稱主至高，
一概將尊貴，歸與寶座聖羔。

靠主的救恩，使我得重生，
稱頌主耶穌，永遠大尊榮；
在上諸天使，頌耶穌真慈愛，
他們皆俯伏，向聖羔常跪拜。

我們也叩首，崇敬主聖名，
全能與全智，全德及全仁；
有威又有權，與天使齊讚美；
主恩真無窮，我感謝永無已。

english_page_header: Hymn 16 - All Hail the Power of Jesus’ Name
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 16 首 - 敬拜天地主宰
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌聖名，普天崇敬，天使一同跪拜，
奉獻冠冕，大家行禮，尊祂天地主宰，
奉獻冠冕，大家行禮，尊祂天地主宰。

吾人蒙恩，免墜永火，顯明主心慈愛，
頌揚耶穌世人救主，稱祂天地主宰，
頌揚耶穌世人救主，稱祂天地主宰。

世人都是主所創造，一本生出萬代，
都當崇拜耶穌基督，敬祂天地主宰，
都當崇拜耶穌基督，敬祂天地主宰。

現在聖徒早晚聚集，齊向耶穌下拜，
同聲唱詩，同心歡樂，讚祂天地主宰，
同聲唱詩，同心歡樂，讚祂天地主宰。

english_page_header: Hymn 17 - The Half Has Never Been Told
english_full_lyrics:
I know I love Thee better, Lord, Than any earthly joy;
For Thou hast given me the peace Which nothing can destroy.

I know that Thou art nearer still Than any earthly throng;
And sweeter is the thought of Thee Than any lovely song.

Thou hast put gladness in my heart; Then may I well be glad!
Without the secret of Thy love I could not but be sad.

O Saviour, precious Saviour mine! What will Thy presence be,
If such a life of joy can crown Our walk on earth with Thee?

REFRAIN
The half has never yet been told, Of love so full and free!
The half has never yet been told, The blood, it cleanseth me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 17 首 - 頌讚主慈愛
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我深知道耶穌慈愛，勝過世上一切；
因衪捨命救我靈魂，平安永遠不絕。

我深知道耶穌慈愛，足解我心憂悶；
主既使我時常安樂，我當感謝頌讚。

我深知道寄居世間，雖有試驗、艱難；
一想主愛永不隔絕，何等快樂、平安。

副歌
耶穌慈愛，我難計算，永遠繼續不斷；
耶穌慈愛，我難計算，只有常常頌讚。

english_page_header: Hymn 18 - When We All Get to Heaven
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 18 首 - 歌頌主恩
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
歌頌耶穌權能、仁愛，天國恩門為我開；
在那光明榮耀福地，主備安宅要再來。

我們在世如同客旅，滿天黑雲遮前途；
等歸天家榮華美地，就無歎息和憂苦。

我們應當堅心忍耐，日日殷勤做主工；
儆醒預備，等主再臨，一同被接於空中。

副歌
我們都要回天家，今思想那日樂無涯；
我們要與主同住，頌主恩，永遠享榮華。

english_page_header: Hymn 19 - Thine Is the Glory
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 19 首 - 和散那
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
大家同歡喜，高聲齊讚美，跟從主的百姓，錫安眾子女；
天上至大君王，和平的救主，此時騎著驢駒，來臨極威儀。
大家同歡喜，高聲齊讚美，跟從主的百姓，錫安眾子女。

天父眾子民，有極大福氣，和散那，和散那，歸大衛後裔！
昔日主所應許，榮耀快樂地，現在已經臨到，普世永不移。
天父眾子民，有極大福氣，和散那，和散那，歸大衛後裔！

萬眾同歡迎，榮耀的仁君，和散那，和散那，歸大衛子孫！
天上威嚴寶座，永遠得榮尊，地上平安、恩典，歸主愛的人。
萬眾同歡迎，榮耀的仁君，和散那，和散那，歸大衛子孫！

english_page_header: Hymn 20 - All Hail the Power of Jesus’ Name
english_full_lyrics:
All hail the power of Jesus’ name! 
Let angels prostrate fall, 
Let angels prostrate fall;
Bring forth the royal diadem, 
And crown Him, 
crown Him, crown Him, crown Him, 
And crown Him Lord of all.

Ye chosen seed of Israel’s race, 
Ye ransomed from the fall, 
Ye ransomed from the fall;
Hail Him who saves you by His grace, 
And crown Him, 
crown Him, crown Him, crown Him, 
And crown Him Lord of all.

Let ev’ry kindred, ev’ry tribe,
On this terrestrial ball,
On this terrestrial ball,
To Him all majesty ascribe,
And crown Him,
crown Him, crown Him, crown Him,
And crown Him Lord of all.

O that with yonder sacred throng
We at His feet may fall,
We at His feet may fall!
We’ll join the everlasting song,
And crown Him,
crown Him, crown Him, crown Him,
And crown Him Lord of all.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 20 首 - 尊主為王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
大哉，聖哉，耶穌聖名！天上萬軍頌揚，
天上萬軍頌揚；奉獻冠冕，極其榮光；歌頌衪，
歌頌！歌頌！歌頌衪，歌頌衪為君王！

天上、地下，主名至上，應該敬畏、頌揚，
應該敬畏頌揚；萬膝跪拜，萬口歌唱；歌頌衪，
歌頌！歌頌！歌頌衪，歌頌衪為君王！

尊貴、榮耀、智慧、力量，都歸被殺羔羊，
都歸被殺羔羊；聖徒、天使，讚美無疆；歌頌衪，
歌頌！歌頌！歌頌衪，歌頌衪永為王！

english_page_header: Hymn 21 - Fairest Lord Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Fairest Lord Jesus,
Ruler of all nature,
O Thou of God and man the Son;
Thee will I cherish,
Thee will I honor,
Thou, my soul’s glory, joy, and crown.

Fair are the meadows,
Fairer still the woodlands,
Robed in the blooming garb of spring;
Jesus is fairer,
Jesus is purer,
Who makes the woeful heart to sing.

Fair is the sunshine,
Fairer still the moonlight
And all the twinkling, starry host;
Jesus shines brighter,
Jesus shines purer
Than all the angels heav’n can boast.

Beautiful Saviour,
Lord of all nations,
Son of God and Son of man!
Glory and honor,
Praise, adoration,
Now and forevermore be Thine!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 21 首 - 美哉，主耶穌!
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
美哉，主耶穌！統治萬有群生！
主宰真神，道成肉身，
謙卑為人子，捨命救萬民。
我當如何思念主恩？

美哉，主耶穌！勝春花沾露美！
悅我心靈，時常歡喜；
美哉，中秋月！明亮又清妍！
耶穌榮光更皎在天！

美哉，主耶穌！勝夏夜涼風爽！
透我心靈，時常歡暢；
美哉，冬季雪！遍地白皚皚！
主更聖潔，感我心懷！

美哉，主耶穌！統治萬有群生！
主宰真神，道成肉身；
主，我所景仰！主，我所尊崇！
是我榮耀冠冕、歡欣！

english_page_header: Hymn 22 - There Is a Fountain Dear
english_full_lyrics:
There is a fountain dear,
With water sweet and clear.
Each day at morn I’m surely bless’d,
as by God’s stream I rest.
There, far from all life’s troubling ills,
with peaceful balm my soul He fills.

Jesus, the noblest friend,
Lovingly clasps my hands,
Each day with Him, so kind and sweet,
in earnest prayer I seek.
His words mean all the world to me,
like precious gold they’ll treasured be.

Armed with the Word of God,
Strong shall I ever be.
From evil’s might I’ll take no fright,
Thy Spirit strengthens me.
Thy Word is like a banner free,
that leads me on to heav’n and Thee.

Then face to face with Thee,
I see clear all my sins.
No secret thought lies unrevealed,
nor hidden sin concealed.
Refreshed and free I come to Thee,
Thou gentle man of Galilee.

Bless’d Jesus, may Thy Word
Fill me with life anew,
With prayerful heart I’ll worship Thee
and learn Thy ways to do.
And so through all my earthly days,
I’ll work for Thee and sing Thy praise.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 22 首 - 讚美經訓
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我有寶貴泉源，其水最清、最甘，
清晨必喝，日日無間，
安坐活泉之旁，心未攙入俗事、貪婪，
傾聽泉水緩流潺潺。

我有高貴益友，日日相親携手，
清晨約會，同此善偶，
得祂諄諄善誘，惟願從祂金玉良言，
使我凡事謹慎、自守。

我有屬靈兵庫，仁義兵器無數，
每日在此練習靈戰，
攻克惡慾、俗務，終日佩戴雙刃寶劍，
打退惡魔，安行天路。

我有光華寶鏡，映照面目分明，
每日用此察看自己，必能顯露隱情，
映照之後，終日不忘，
除去污點，心靈清新。

如今祈求真神，使我充滿聖靈，
勤讀聖經，晨昏不停，更覺滋味津津，
靈性進步，欣欣向榮，
努力跟主，直到天庭。

english_page_header: Hymn 23 - Oh, that the Lord Would Guide My Ways
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 23 首 - 聖經寶貴
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
青年之人，何以持正？所行何以免罪？
惟主聖言，如玉如金，可使內心無愧。

救主之言，一入心中，即有感力無窮；
我雖不才，也可學通，靠著聖靈啟蒙。

聖經如日，高懸穹蒼，發出莫大亮光；
如燈在夜，照我輝煌，免遇危險、凶亡。

主訓使我真有聰明，恨惡犯罪言行；
攻克自己私慾、邪情，助我去惡歸正。

聖經寶貴，永久留存，篇篇都要敬尊；
男女、老少，終身遵守，必能保全靈魂。

english_page_header: Hymn 24 - Wonderful Words of Life
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 24 首 - 生命之道
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聖經乃是神言寶庫，證明耶穌基督，
道成肉身，釘於十架，流血洗我罪污。

真神應許盡在聖經，備及今世、來生；
是我產業，是我詩歌，是我暗處明燈。

真神言語滿有恩典，應許必都成全；
比金更寶，比蜜更甜，永遠安定在天。

我願天天查考聖經晝夜思想、遵行；
倚靠聖靈開導我心，使我識主更深。

副歌
生命之道極奇，我今篤信不疑，美哉，主道！
奇哉，真理！永世為我根基，美哉，主道！
奇哉，真理！永世為我根基。

english_page_header: Hymn 25 - God’s Law Is Perfect and Gives Life
english_full_lyrics:
God’s law is perfect and gives life, Revives the weary soul,
God’s testimonies are all sure, Wisdom for all to hold.
The statutes of God are just, And give to the heart delight,
God’s precepts are direct and pure, And give the eyes clear sight.

The fear of God is always clear, Enduring as the sun,
The judgments of the Lord are true, And righteous ev’ry one.
And even more to be desired, Than gold, than the finest gold,
And sweeter than the honeycomb, The words God spoke of old.

Your servant finds enlightenment, By means of them, O Lord,
And in the keeping of Your law, There is a great reward.
Let all my words and my thoughts, My Lord, my Redeemer, Might,
Find favor now and always win Acceptance in Your sight.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 25 首 - 神言純潔真誠
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶和華的律法全備，能甦醒人的心；
耶和華的法度確定，能使愚人有智慧。

耶和華的訓詞正直，能快活人的心；
耶和華的命令清潔，能明亮人的眼目。

耶和華的道理潔淨，存到永永遠遠；
耶和華的典章真實，全然公義又真誠。

副歌
都比金子可羨慕，且比精金可羨慕；
比蜜甘甜，且比蜂房下滴的蜜甘甜。

english_page_header: Hymn 26 - The Quiet Hour
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 26 首 - 求主向我發言
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
求主向我發言，我在此期待；
我心肅然恭聽，主言我所愛。

求主賜下訓誨，僕人願受教；
我靈虔敬仰望，活潑生命道。

願主使我靈命，靠你日滋長；
常蒙主恩澆灌，播散主芬芳。

english_page_header: Hymn 27 - Jesus Loves Even Me
english_full_lyrics:
I am so glad that our Father in heav’n,
Tells of His love in the Book He has giv’n,
Wonderful things in the Bible I see;
This is the dearest, that Jesus loves me.

Tho’ I forget Him and wander away,
Kindly He follows wherever I stray;
Back to His dear loving arms would I flee
When I remember that Jesus loves me.

Jesus loves me and I know I love Him,
Love brought Him down my poor soul to redeem;
Yes, it was love made Him die on the tree,
Oh, I am certain that Jesus loves me.

Oh, if there’s only one song I can sing,
When in His beauty I see the great King,
This shall my song in eternity be: 
“Oh, what a wonder that Jesus loves me.”

REFRAIN
I am so glad that Jesus loves me,
Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me,
I am so glad that Jesus loves me,
Jesus loves even me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 27 首 - 耶穌愛我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今我甚喜樂，耶穌已降生，祂是救贖主，最愛普世人；
希奇的愛中，最希奇的愛，就是主耶穌捨身來救我。

世上有何人 能比主耶穌，撇棄大榮耀，來釋放罪奴；
受人的凌辱，把生命甘捨？當時刻紀念，我主是愛我。

雖然遠離開，迷路如亡羊，主還是尋找，衪愛心最長；
見衪伸慈手接回又撫慰，更抱於懷中，誠然是愛我。

時候快臨到，得見主榮顏，眾聖徒一同被接到雲間；
如今當讚美，獻頌莫遲延，天上仍歌唱，耶穌是愛我。

副歌
我真喜樂，因耶穌愛我，耶穌愛我，耶穌愛我；
我真喜樂，因耶穌愛我，奇哉，耶穌愛我！

english_page_header: Hymn 28 - Through the Love of God Our Saviour
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 28 首 - 耶穌仁愛
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主比眾親，愛我更深，哈利路亞！
賞賜聖靈永住內心，哈利路亞！
朋友情誼冷暖無常，今日親近，明日棄嫌，
唯獨救主恩慈綿綿，哈利路亞！

凡人信主，可得永生，哈利路亞！
思想深恩實在難報，哈利路亞！
主用寶血，永遠救贖，曠野迷路，主來尋找，
引入羊欄眷顧、養育，哈利路亞！

耶穌是我最好朋友，哈利路亞！
所賜恩典豐富長久，哈利路亞！
聽主聲音，我就喜悅，有主同在，不受苛虐，
加我信心，扶我軟弱，哈利路亞！

靠主聖手領我一生，哈利路亞！
主的慈愛不離我身，哈利路亞！
到處領導，平安無礙，隨時隨地，都蒙恩待，
引導我們榮光所在，哈利路亞！

english_page_header: Hymn 29 - The Ninety and Nine
english_full_lyrics:
There were ninety and nine that safely lay In the shelter of the fold,
But one was out on the hills away, Far off from the gates of gold.
Away on the mountains wild and bare, 
Away from the tender Shepherd’s care,
Away from the tender Shepherd’s care.

“Lord, Thou hast here Thy ninety and nine; Are they not enough for Thee?”
But the Shepherd made answer: “This of Mine Has wandered away from Me,
And although the road be rough and steep,
I go to the desert to find My sheep,
I go to the desert to find My sheep.”

But none of the ransomed ever knew How deep were the waters crossed;
Nor how dark was the night that the Lord passed thro’ Ere He found His sheep that was lost.
Out in the desert He heard its cry,
Sick and helpless and ready to die;
Sick and helpless, and ready to die.

“Lord, whence are those blood drops all the way That mark out the mountain’s track?” 
“They were shed for one who had gone astray Ere the Shepherd could bring him back.”
“Lord, whence are Thy hands so rent and torn?” 
“They’re pierced tonight by many a thorn;
They’re pierced tonight by many a thorn.”

And all thro’ the mountains thunder-riv’n, And up from the rocky steep,
There arose a glad cry to the gate of heav’n, “Rejoice! I have found My sheep!”
And the angels echoed around the throne, 
“Rejoice, for the Lord brings back His own!
Rejoice, for the Lord brings back His own!”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 29 首 - 主尋亡羊
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
一百隻羊有九十九，在主欄中安眠，但有一隻遠離真門，迷路諸山之間；
遠在荒山、深谷徘徊，遠離良牧照顧慈懷，遠離良牧照顧慈懷。

良牧已有九十九隻，難道還嫌不夠？良牧回答：「那隻迷羊，本來是我所有。
路徑雖然高低不平，曠野雖遠，我必去尋；曠野雖遠，我必去尋。」

得救之羊從未知道，路中山高、水深，不知長夜何等黑暗？尋羊何等艱辛？
曠野之中，良牧遙聞，迷羊失望垂死哀鳴，迷羊失望垂死哀鳴。

問主：「山徑沿途血跡，到底從何而來？」主說：「牧人必須流血，迷羊才得救回。」
問主：「雙手，為何傷裂？」主說：「因為路多荊棘。」主說：「因為路多荊棘。」

歷經雷霆霹靂之山，穿過危崖絕壁，良牧呼聲直達天門：「樂哉亡羊已得！」
圍繞寶座天使和唱：「樂哉！主已尋得亡羊！樂哉！主已尋得亡羊！」

english_page_header: Hymn 30 - In Tenderness He Sought Me
english_full_lyrics:
In tenderness He sought me, 
Weary and sick with sin,
And on His shoulders brought me 
Back to His fold again,
While angels in His presence sang 
Until the courts of heaven rang.

He washed the bleeding sin wounds
And poured in oil and wine;
He whispered to assure me, 
“I’ve found thee, thou art Mine.”
I never heard a sweeter voice;
It made my aching heart rejoice!

He pointed to the nail prints,
For me His blood was shed;
A mocking crown so thorny
Was placed upon His head:
I wondered what He saw in me
To suffer such deep agony.

I’m sitting in His presence,
The sunshine of His face,
While with adoring wonder
His blessings I retrace.
It seems as if eternal days
Are far too short to sound His praise.

So while the hours are passing,
All now is perfect rest;
I’m waiting for the morning,
The brightest and the best,
When He will call us to His side
To be with Him, His spotless Bride.

REFRAIN
O the love that sought me!
O the blood that bought me!
O the grace that brought me to the fold,
Wondrous grace that brought me to the fold!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 30 首 - 妙愛找我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主大慈愛尋找我，前曾沉罪惡間；
且顯大力懷抱我，安放羊圈裡面；
激動天使歡欣歌唱，頌讚歌聲充滿天上。

主看見我受損傷，用油和酒包裹，
又以恩言安慰我，並說：「你永屬我」；
我未曾聽如此佳音，能叫我心滿足、歡欣。

主的兩手有釘痕，寶血為我流出，
人用荊棘做冠冕，戲弄加上凌辱；
主愛極大，憐我罪人，甘願為我受苦、捨身。

我雖在世為客旅，心裡卻無憂慮，
忍耐行完主旨意，到主降臨日子；
那時接我到祂身邊，與祂同在，聖潔無愆。

副歌
愛何大，尋找我！血何寶，洗淨我！
恩何多，領我與神復和！
主愛我，我不懼怕風波。

english_page_header: Hymn 31 - Seeking for Me
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus, my Saviour, to Bethlehem came,
Born in a manger to sorrow and shame;
O it was wonderful, blest be His name!
Seeking for me, for me!
Seeking for me, for me!
Seeking for me, for me!
O it was wonderful, blest be His name!
Seeking for me, for me!

Jesus, my Saviour, on Calvary’s tree,
Paid the great debt and my soul He set free;
O it was wonderful, how could it be?
Dying for me, for me!
Dying for me, for me!
Dying for me, for me!
O it was wonderful, how could it be?
Dying for me, for me!

Jesus, my Saviour, the same as of old,
While I did wander afar from the fold,
Gently and long He hath pled with my soul,
Calling for me, for me!
Calling for me, for me!
Calling for me, for me!
Gently and long He hath pled with my soul,
Calling for me, for me!

Jesus, my Saviour, will come from on high,
Sweet is the promise as weary years fly;
O I shall see Him descend from the sky,
Coming for me, for me!
Coming for me, for me!
Coming for me, for me!
O I shall see Him descend from the sky,
Coming for me, for me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 31 首 - 主全為我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
昔日主耶穌降生於世界，捨棄大榮耀，救贖施慈愛；
奇哉，祂來臨感動我心懷！主來找我，找我；
主來找我，找我；主來找我，找我。
奇哉，祂來臨感動我心懷！主來找我，找我。

耶穌我恩主受害釘十架，救贖我靈魂，還清我罪價；
耶穌被釘死，天地都驚怕。主死為我，為我；
主死為我，為我；主死為我，為我。
耶穌被釘死，天地都驚怕；主死為我，為我。

我曾經流蕩，遠離主牧場，耶穌來尋找我這隻亡羊；
呼叫我名字，慈聲入心腸。我主叫我，叫我；
我主叫我，叫我；我主叫我，叫我。
呼叫我名字，慈聲入心腸；我主叫我，叫我。

耶穌曾應許末日必再臨，聖徒聞主聲，喜樂充滿心；
耶穌再來臨，是極大佳音。祂來接我，接我；
祂來接我，接我；祂來接我，接我。
耶穌再來臨，是極大佳音；祂來接我，接我。

english_page_header: Hymn 32 - Christ Receiveth Sinful Men
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 32 首 - 耶穌肯收納罪人
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
「耶穌肯收納罪人！」將此恩言傳遠近；
雖離正路，主尋找；縱入迷途，主憐憫。
要不斷高聲宣告：「耶穌肯收納罪人！」
讓眾人清楚知道：耶穌肯收納罪人！

前來就主得安寧！主之應許可信憑；
雖然惡重、罪孽深，耶穌肯，收納罪人。
要不斷高聲宣告：「耶穌肯收納罪人！」
讓眾人清楚知道：耶穌肯收納罪人！

今我內心無責譴，坦然立在律法前；
耶穌除我眾愆尤，使我盡符神所求。
要不斷高聲宣告：「耶穌肯收納罪人！」
讓眾人清楚知道：耶穌肯收納罪人！

「耶穌肯收納罪人！」我罪雖重也蒙恩；
蒙主洗去，眾污痕，得隨救主進天門。
要不斷高聲宣告：「耶穌肯收納罪人！」
讓眾人清楚知道：耶穌肯收納罪人！

english_page_header: Hymn 33 - Washed in the Blood of the Lamb
english_full_lyrics:
Who, who are these beside the chilly wave,
Just on the borders of the silent grave,
Shouting Jesus’ pow’r to save, “Washed in the blood of the Lamb?”

These, these are they who, in their youthful days,
Found Jesus early and in wisdom’s ways
Proved the fulness of His grace, “Washed in the blood of the Lamb.”

These, these are they who, in affliction’s woes,
Ever have found in Jesus calm repose,
Such as from a pure heart flows, “Washed in the blood of the Lamb.”

These, these are they who, in the conflict dire,
Boldly have stood amid the hottest fire;
Jesus now says, “Come up high’r,” “Washed in the blood of the Lamb.”

Safe, safe upon the ever-shining shore,
Sin, pain, and death, and sorrow all are o’er;
Happy now and evermore, “Washed in the blood of the Lamb.”

REFRAIN
Sweeping through the gates of the New Jerusalem, “Washed in the blood of the Lamb,”
Sweeping through the gates of the New Jerusalem, “Washed in the blood of the Lamb.”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 33 首 - 到新耶路撒冷
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
這等是何人，處處傳福音？祈禱並歌頌，日日親近神？
他是耶穌的子民，凡他所行靠主名。
耶穌召我等前往新耶路撒冷，蒙主引導進天城，
耶穌召我等前往新耶路撒冷，蒙主引導進天城。

這人有何功，盼望到高天？豈能無罪過，已成聖完全？
他靠主血洗罪愆，得成聖潔到主前。
耶穌召我等前往新耶路撒冷，我靠其功福無邊，
耶穌召我等前往新耶路撒冷，我靠其功福無邊。

這人的德行，究竟是如何？他焉有能力，得勝眾鬼魔？
他受聖靈的恩膏，心性、行為改變多。
耶穌召我等前往新耶路撒冷，我靠其力唱凱歌，
耶穌召我等前往新耶路撒冷，我靠其力唱凱歌。

這人到危時，為何不畏難？豈能無懼怕，臨死仍平安？
他得永生滿心歡，能進天國戴華冠。
耶穌召我等前往新耶路撒冷，頌主奇恩永歡顏，
耶穌召我等前往新耶路撒冷，頌主奇恩永歡顏。

english_page_header: Hymn 34 - Jesus Is Tenderly Calling
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 34 首 - 耶穌恩召
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌之溫柔聲召你回家，今日召你，今日召你；
為何離主遊蕩，貪愛虛邪？越久越遠，越走差？

有罪之人！主召你得救恩，今日召你，今日召你；
將你罪擔交託主得赦免，主必拯救你靈魂。

勞苦之人！主召你得安寧，今日召你，今日召你；
將你重擔交託主便身輕，主必解除你苦情。

迷路之人！主召你走正路，今日召你，今日召你；
倚靠主能力，引導你腳步，一生一世蒙眷顧。

副歌
今日召你，今日召你；
耶穌今召你，衪溫柔聲今日召你。

english_page_header: Hymn 35 - Joy Cometh in the Morning
english_full_lyrics:
Oh, weary pilgrim, lift your head:
For joy cometh in the morning!
For God in His own Word hath said
That joy cometh in the morning!

Ye trembling saints, dismiss your fears:
For joy cometh in the morning!
Oh, weeping mourner, dry your tears:
For Joy cometh in the morning!

Let ev’ry burdened soul look up:
For joy cometh in the morning!
And ev’ry trembling sinner hope:
For joy cometh in the morning!

REFRAIN
Joy cometh in the morning!
Joy cometh in the morning!
Weeping may endure for a night;
But joy cometh in the morning!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 35 首 - 雨夜過後見光明
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
迷路的人！你當靜聽，仰望上面慈愛呼聲；
是你救主施大恩惠，聽衪福音必得安慰。

世路黑暗，行人憂戚，萬般勞苦、愁煩、嘆息；
只賴救主聖手扶持，一切憂苦就得消逝。

人生盼望全在真神，無窮恩惠普賜萬民；
跟隨恩主日日相親，在光明中稱頌真神。

副歌
憂悶夜雨必放晴，轉眼之間顯光明；
晨曦一照，遍地輝煌，頌讚、歡樂，永遠不停。

english_page_header: Hymn 36 - Whispering Hope
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 36 首 - 微聲盼望
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在這忙碌生活當中，疲倦、寂寞多感喟，
你心靈飢渴與虛空，卻無方法得安慰；
聽！這聲音何等美妙，是溫柔、真實言詞！
聽！慈愛聲向你呼召，帶來好信息與你！

世界一切浮華、宴樂，只是欺騙與束縛，
真實與不變的珍寶，在這世間找不到；
來！你要向高山舉目，你心靈必得滿足！
來！飲於生命活水泉，必享平安在主前！

副歌
微聲盼望，我喜聽；主慈愛聲，使我心靈痛苦中得安寧。

english_page_header: Hymn 37 - Though Your Sins Be as Scarlet
english_full_lyrics:
“Though your sins be as scarlet, They shall be as white as snow;
Though your sins be as scarlet, They shall be as white as snow;
Though they be red like crimson, They shall be as wool!
“Though your sins be as scarlet, 
Though your sins be as scarlet,
They shall be as white as snow, 
They shall be as white as snow.”

Hear the voice that entreats you, Oh, return ye unto God!
Hear the voice that entreats you, Oh, return ye unto God!
He is of great compassion, And of wondrous love;
Hear the voice that entreats you, 
Hear the voice that entreats you,
Oh, return ye unto God! 
Oh, return ye unto God!

He’ll forgive your transgressions, And remember them no more!
He’ll forgive your transgressions, And remember them no more! 
“Look unto Me ye people,” Saith the Lord your God;
He’ll forgive your transgressions,
He’ll forgive your transgressions,
And remember them no more,
And remember them no more.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 37 首 - 硃紅罪變如雪
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你的罪雖像硃紅，主必使它白如雪，
你的罪雖像硃紅，主必使它白如雪，
你罪雖紅如丹顏，必白如羊毛。
你的罪雖像硃紅，你的罪雖像硃紅，
主必使它白如雪，主必使它白如雪。

請聽主慈愛呼聲，快回轉，歸向真神！
請聽主慈愛呼聲，快回轉，歸向真神！
主有偉大的憐憫，與奇妙的愛。
請聽主慈愛呼聲，請聽主慈愛呼聲，
快回轉，歸向真神！快回轉，歸向真神！

你的罪，祂肯赦免，從今後永不記念，
你的罪，祂肯赦免，從今後永不記念，
主你的神已曉諭：「當仰望救主。」
你的罪，祂肯赦免，你的罪，祂肯赦免，
從今後永不記念，從今後永不記念。

english_page_header: Hymn 38 - I Heard the Voice of Jesus Say
english_full_lyrics:
I heard the voice of Jesus say, 
“Come unto Me and rest;
Lay down, thou weary one, lay down 
Thy head upon My breast.”

I came to Jesus as I was,
Weary, and worn, and sad,
I found in Him a resting place,
And He has made me glad.

I heard the voice of Jesus say, 
“Behold, I freely give
The living water; thirsty one,
Stoop down, and drink, and live.”

I came to Jesus, and I drank
Of that life-giving stream;
My thirst was quenched, my soul revived,
And now I live in Him.

I heard the voice of Jesus say, 
“I am this dark world’s light;
Look unto Me, thy morn shall rise,
And all thy day be bright.”

I looked to Jesus, and I found
In Him my Star, my Sun;
And in that light of life I’ll walk
Till trav’ling days are done.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 38 首 - 我聞耶穌呼聲
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我聞耶穌柔聲說道：「就我來得平安！息你勞苦，卸你重擔，怡然靠我懷間！」
我本憔悴、憂傷、困倦，聞此即有歡顏；在主懷中，果得安樂，主使我靈騰歡。

我聞耶穌高聲說道：「口渴的人要來！我賜活水，人人可喝，藉我得救免災！」
我聞此言，即刻前來，暢飲生命之杯；我靈重生，我心喜樂，主恩大哉，奇哉！

我聞耶穌慈聲說道：「我是暗世之光！在我裡面，便有光明，見我如見朝陽！」
我聞此言，即來跟主，果如晨曦輝煌；我要在主光中行走，從今直到天堂。

english_page_header: Hymn 39 - Nothing but the Blood
english_full_lyrics:
What can wash away my sin?
Nothing but the blood of Jesus;
What can make me whole again?
Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

For my pardon this I see,
Nothing but the blood of Jesus;
For my cleansing, this my plea,
Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

Nothing can for sin atone,
Nothing but the blood of Jesus;
Naught of good that I have done,
Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

This is all my hope and peace,
Nothing but the blood of Jesus;
This is all my righteousness,
Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

REFRAIN
Oh! precious is the flow
That makes me white as snow;
No other fount I know,
Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 39 首 - 惟獨主血有效
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
心中污穢怎能洗？惟獨耶穌血有功效；
再無方法指示你，惟獨耶穌血有功效。

靠己修行全無用，惟獨耶穌血有功效；
更莫倚靠拜偶像，惟獨耶穌血有功效。

人要逃出魔鬼網，惟獨耶穌血有功效；
要從罪惡得釋放，惟獨耶穌血有功效。

倘若你要免永死，惟獨耶穌血有功效；
要進天國得永生，惟獨耶穌血有功效。

副歌
美泉無價之寶，污穢必能洗掉；
此泉永世無雙，惟獨耶穌血有功效。

english_page_header: Hymn 40 - I Will Praise Him
english_full_lyrics:
When I saw the cleansing fountain
Open wide for all my sin,
I obeyed the Spirit’s wooing,
When He said, “Wilt thou be clean?”

Tho’ the way seemed straight and narrow,
All I claimed was swept away;
My ambitions, plans, and wishes,
At my feet in ashes lay.

Then God’s fire upon the altar
Of my heart was set aflame;
I shall never cease to praise Him,
Glory, glory to His name!

Blessed be the name of Jesus!
I’m so glad He took me in;
He’s forgiven my transgressions,
He has cleansed my heart from sin.

REFRAIN
I will praise Him! I will praise Him!
Praise the Lamb for sinners slain;
Give Him glory, all ye people,
For His blood can wash away each stain.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 40 首 - 主之寶血
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我現在得寶血潔淨，已離棄攏總罪孽；
我聽救主慈聲叫我，要我跟隨衪腳跡。

主之寶血洗我罪愆，跟從救主直向前；
一切虛華，我願丟棄，看它像過眼雲煙。

頂有權能，我主耶穌，喜歡拯救眾子民；
我要永遠讚美耶穌，榮耀，榮耀歸主名！

我現在得寶血潔淨，已離棄攏總罪孽；
我聽救主慈聲叫我，要我跟隨衪腳跡。

副歌
讚美耶穌，讚美耶穌，榮耀主代罪人死！
榮耀，榮耀歸給耶穌！主寶血洗除一切罪辜！

english_page_header: Hymn 41 - There Is Power in the Blood
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 41 首 - 主血有權能
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
問你是否願意除淨罪污？主血有權能，血有權能；
洗淨良心必得勝諸惡行，主血有希奇之權能。

問你是否願意比雪皎潔？主血有權能，血有權能；
在髑髏地血泉內洗得清，主血有希奇之權能。

問你是否願意棄卸罪擔？主血有權能，血有權能；
身體、靈魂都成聖進神前，主血有希奇之權能。

問你是否願意見主真體？主血有權能，血有權能；
在末日必改變像主形狀，主血有希奇之權能。

副歌
有權能，能！希奇之權能，聖羔血必得勝！
有權能，能！希奇之權能，聖羔羊寶血必得勝！

english_page_header: Hymn 42 - Blessed Be the Fountain
english_full_lyrics:
Blessed be the fountain of blood,
To a world of sinners revealed;
Blessed be the dear Son of God;
Only by His stripes we are healed.
Tho’ I’ve wandered far from His fold,
Bringing to my heart pain and woe,
Wash me in the blood of the Lamb,
And I shall be whiter than snow.

Thorny was the crown that He wore,
And the cross His body o’ercame;
Grievous were the sorrows He bore,
But He suffered thus not in vain.
May I to that fountain be led,
Made to cleanse my sins here below;
Wash me in the blood that He shed,
And I shall be whiter than snow.

Father, I have wandered from Thee,
Often has my heart gone astray;
Crimson do my sins seem to me-
Water cannot wash them away.
Jesus, to that fountain of Thine,
Leaning on Thy promise, I go;
Cleanse me by Thy washing divine,
And I shall be whiter than snow.

REFRAIN
Whiter than the snow, Whiter than the snow;
Wash me in the blood of the Lamb,
And I shall be whiter than snow.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 42 首 - 羔羊寶血
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
美哉，大哉，寶血泉源！向全世界罪人顯明，
可讚、可頌神獨生子，釘十架上，救功完成；
雖我久已離主遠遊，自尋禍患，當受重刑，
用羔羊寶血洗滌我，我便較比雪更潔白。

荊棘冠冕，甘載不辭，十架苦痛，我主忍受，
因主受傷，我得醫治，奇妙救恩，何等深厚！
我今奔向洗罪泉源，願得寶血洗盡罪垢，
求主洗淨我諸罪惡，我便較比雪更潔白。

可憐我久在外飄蕩，偏行己路，喜邪厭正，
我眾罪孽正如硃紅，用世上水不能洗淨；
我只依靠洗罪泉源，就是耶穌寶血盈盈，
懇求施恩將我洗淨，我便較比雪更潔白。

副歌
比雪更潔白，比雪更潔白；
用羔羊寶血洗滌我，我便較比雪更潔白。

english_page_header: Hymn 43 - Are You Washed in the Blood?
english_full_lyrics:
Have you been to Jesus for the cleansing pow’r?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?
Are you fully trusting in His grace this hour?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

Are you walking daily by the Saviour’s side?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?
Do you rest each moment in the Crucified?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?

When the Bridegroom cometh will your robes be white?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?
Will your soul be ready for the mansions bright,
And be washed in the blood of the Lamb?

Lay aside the garments that are stained with sin,
And be washed in the blood of the Lamb;
There’s a fountain flowing for the soul unclean,
O be washed in the blood of the Lamb!

REFRAIN
Are you washed in the blood,
In the soul-cleansing blood of the Lamb?
Are your garments spotless?
Are they white as snow?
Are you washed in the blood of the Lamb?
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 43 首 - 寶血洗淨
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
請問：「可曾信靠主寶血洗淨？
可曾倚羔羊血洗得淨？
可曾倚靠救主得著新生命？
可曾倚羔羊血洗得淨？」

你願順從救主行此艱難路，
可曾倚羔羊血洗得淨？
可曾蒙主引導，靠著主保護？
可曾倚羔羊血洗得淨？

耶穌來時，白衣是否仍清潔？
總要倚羔羊血洗得淨；
信徒被接那時，你能否相携？
總要倚羔羊血洗得淨。

往日污穢衣服，今須全然丟，
總要倚羔羊血洗得淨；
曾有十架寶血為你白白流，
總要倚羔羊血洗得淨。

副歌
你總要倚寶血，倚寶血始可能脫罪孽；
衣服毫無玷污，必潔白如雪，你總要倚寶血洗得淨。

english_page_header: Hymn 44 - Weeping Will Not Save Me!
english_full_lyrics:
Weeping will not save me!
Though my face were bathed in tears,
That could not allay my fears,
Could not wash the sins of years!
Weeping will not save me.

Working will not save me!
Purest deeds that I can do,
Holiest thoughts and feelings too,
Cannot form my soul anew!
Working will not save me.

Waiting will not save me!
Helpless, guilty, lost, I lie;
In my ear is Mercy’s cry;
If I wait I can but die:
Waiting will not save me.

Faith in Christ will save me!
Let me trust Thy weeping Son,
Trust the work that He has done;
To His arms, Lord, help me run:
Faith in Christ will save me.

REFRAIN
Jesus wept and died for me;
Jesus suffered on the tree:
Jesus waits to make me free;
He alone can save me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 44 首 - 惟有主能救我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
哀哭豈能救我？
我雖然不住流淚，
心仍未能得安慰，
又不能洗我罪累。
哀哭豈能救我？

自恃豈能救我？
一切善功與善行，
雖能使我得好名，
總不能得真生命。
自恃豈能救我？

迷信豈能救我？
敬拜偶像全虛妄，
旁門左道更危險，
最後都必至滅亡。
迷信豈能救我？

惟有主能救我，
只要我靠主救恩，
衪必為我開天門，
我因此向衪直奔。
惟有主能救我。

副歌
幸耶穌憐我苦況，為我釘死十架上；
耶穌今把我釋放，惟有主能救我。

english_page_header: Hymn 45 - Come, Ye Sinners, Poor and Needy
english_full_lyrics:
Come, ye sinners, poor and needy,
Weak and wounded, sick and sore;
Jesus ready stands to save you,
Full of pity, love, and power;
He is able, He is able,
He is willing- doubt no more.

Let not conscience make you linger,
Nor of fitness fondly dream;
All the fitness He requireth
Is to feel your need of Him;
This He gives you, this He gives you, 
’Tis the Saviour’s rising beam.

Agonizing in the garden,
Lo, your Saviour prostrate lies!
On the bloody tree behold Him!
Hear Him cry before He dies: 
“It is finished, it is finished!”
Sinners, will not this suffice?

Saints and angels, joined in concert,
Sing the praises of the Lamb,
While the blissful seats of heaven
Sweetly echo with His name;
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
Sinners here may sing the same.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 45 首 - 搭救罪人
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
苦惱罪人！請你前來，現在信主有恩典，
耶穌救主歡迎你來，滿心慈悲和愛憐；
衪有能力，衪有能力，勸你信服莫遲延。

不要空想將功補過，自滿、自恃不回頭，
只要覺悟一身罪惡，切實悔改必得救；
如此覺悟，如此覺悟，救主赦罪恩豊厚。

勞苦損傷，背負重擔，只管走來，主肯救，
若是你要等候好久，直等死了，恨長留；
良機勿失，良機勿失，今日信主便無愁。

莫懷疑慮，放心前來，接受主的大慈愛，
專心信服，誠心求告，耶穌必然肯厚待；
不用金錢，不用金錢，白白得恩，請快來。

english_page_header: Hymn 46 - Jesus Christ Healed My Sight
english_full_lyrics:
O long I’ve walked the road of sin
With blindness in my eyes;
But when the Lord my heart came in,
He did show me the light.

Since Jesus Christ has given me sight,
I now can see His face;
And with Him there’s no dark of night,
In that eternal place.

The Lord’s true light turns night to day.
What joy shines in my face;
With Him I’ll walk the heavenly way,
To witness all His grace.

REFRAIN
Jesus Christ healed my sight.
I was blind, but, Hallelujah, now I see!
Jesus Christ healed my sight.
I was blind, but now I see!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 46 首 - 主開心眼
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我前行走，罪孽道路，被魔弄瞎心眼；
耶穌基督一入我心，即有光明無限。

自主耶穌，開我心眼，可以見衪聖面；
知主恩召何等指望，基業永不改變。

耶穌真光，照我心眼，平安喜樂即顯；
我要跟主行走天路，見証主大恩典。

副歌
主耶穌醫治我，前雖瞎眼，哈利路亞今看見！
主耶穌醫治我，前雖瞎眼，今看見。

english_page_header: Hymn 47 - Jesus, I Come
english_full_lyrics:
Out of my bondage, sorrow, and night,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;
Into Thy freedom, gladness, and light,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of my sickness into Thy health,
Out of my want and into Thy wealth,
Out of my sin and into Thyself,
Jesus, I come to Thee.

Out of my shameful failure and loss,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;
Into the glorious gain of Thy cross,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of earth’s sorrows into Thy balm,
Out of life’s storms and into Thy calm,
Out of distress to jubilant psalm,
Jesus, I come to Thee.

Out of unrest and arrogant pride,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;
Into Thy blessed will to abide,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of myself to dwell in Thy love,
Out of despair into raptures above,
Upward for aye on wings like a dove,
Jesus, I come to Thee.

Out of the fear and dread of the tomb,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;
Into the joy and light of Thy throne,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of the depths of ruin untold,
Into the peace of Thy sheltering fold,
Ever Thy glorious face to behold,
Jesus, I come to Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 47 首 - 耶穌救我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
離去患難、黑暗等苦情，耶穌救我，耶穌救我；
入主所賜安寧與光明，耶穌已經救我。
離去束縛，入主之自由；離去缺乏，入主之豐盈；
離去罪惡，與主日相親；耶穌已經救我。

離去羞恥、驕傲與妒忌，耶穌救我，耶穌救我；
背十字架順從主旨意，耶穌已經救我。
離去怨嘆，讚美主恩深；離去絕望，得主之聖靈；
如鳥生翼，永遠能奮興；耶穌已經救我。

離去墳墓幽冥之驚慌，耶穌救我，耶穌救我；
入主所住榮光之天堂，耶穌已經救我。
離去火湖永刑之苦難，入主所賜無限之平安；
永遠見主燦爛戴華冠；耶穌已經救我。

english_page_header: Hymn 48 - Near the Cross
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus keep me near the cross,
There a precious fountain,
Free to all, a healing stream,
Flows from Calv’ry’s mountain.

Near the cross, a trembling soul,
Love and mercy found me;
There the Bright and Morning Star
Shed its beams around me.

Near the cross! O Lamb of God,
Bring its scenes before me;
Help me walk from day to day
With its shadows o’er me.

Near the cross I’ll watch and wait,
Hoping, trusting ever,
Till I reach the golden strand,
Just beyond the river.

REFRAIN
In the cross, in the cross,
Be my glory ever;
Till my raptured soul shall find
Rest beyond the river.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 48 首 - 救恩成在十架
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救恩成在十字架，此有寶血活泉；
從髑髏山長流出，洗去萬民罪愆。

我自己沒有力量，諸義如同污衣；
惟你十字架救恩，使我成聖、稱義。

耶穌釘在十字架，頂難受的苦刑；
使信徒免下地獄，拯救至寶魂、靈。

耶穌現今在天上，坐在天父右邊；
仍為信徒代祈求，救恩永遠成全。

副歌
十字架，十字架，就是我的倚靠；
我的罪孽全洗淨，靠著耶穌功勞。

english_page_header: Hymn 49 - All the Way to Calvary
english_full_lyrics:
Oh, how dark the night that wrapt my spirit round! 
Oh, how deep the woe my Saviour found
When His blessed sunshine flooded all my soul,
Bade the darkness vanish: made me whole!

Tremblingly a sinner bowed before His face,
Naught I knew of pardon nor His grace,
Heard a voice so tender: “Cease thy wild regret-
I have bought thy pardon, paid thy debt.”

Oh, ’twas wondrous love the Saviour showed for me, 
When He left His throne for Calvary,
When He trod the winepress, trod it all alone:
Praise His name forever- make it known.

REFRAIN
All the way to Calvary He went for me,
He went for me, He went for me;
All the way to Calvary He went for me,
He died to set me free.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 49 首 - 主拯救我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
深夜何其幽暗！我心何失望！禍患頻來逼我，正驚惶；
當主榮耀光輝照入我心內，黑暗、憂苦、煩悶，都消亡。

戰競、憂懼罪人！當來主面前，不知赦罪恩典，真堪憐；
忽聞慈愛聲音：「你心可暢快，我已為你還債，赦你愆。」

何等奇異慈愛，主向我顯明！離天降世救我，甘捨生；
為使我蒙拯救，主飲盡苦杯，讚美我主聖名，救功成。

副歌
主去各各他山，特為拯救我，為拯救我，為拯救我；
主去各各他山，特為拯救我，主死，使我免禍。

english_page_header: Hymn 50 - Jesus Only Is Our Message
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus only is our Message,
Jesus all our theme shall be;
We will lift up Jesus ever,
Jesus only will we see.

Jesus only is our Saviour,
All our guilt He bore away,
All our righteousness He gives us,
All our strength from day to day.

Jesus is our Sanctifier,
Cleansing us from self and sin,
And with all His Spirit’s fullness,
Filling all our hearts within.

Jesus only is our Healer,
All our sicknesses He bare,
And His risen life and fullness,
All His members still may share.

REFRAIN
Jesus only, Jesus ever,
Jesus all in all we sing,
Our Saviour, Sanctifier, Healer,
Glorious Lord and coming King.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 50 首 - 惟獨耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
惟獨耶穌是我信息，我所講論就是耶穌；
永遠舉起耶穌基督，我所仰望惟有耶穌。

惟獨耶穌是我救主，釘十字架為我捨身；
流出寶血贖我罪愆，救我靈魂出死入生。

惟獨耶穌使我成聖，一切污穢，寶血洗清；
降下聖靈改變我心，使我德行日日更新。

惟獨耶穌醫我疾病，扶我軟弱保我靈命；
我屬耶穌，為祂肢體，全能耶穌救我到底。

副歌
惟獨耶穌是我救主，我心讚美，我口揚傳；
救我、醫我，使我成聖，全能之主，榮耀之王。

english_page_header: Hymn 51A - Rock of Ages
english_full_lyrics:
Rock of Ages, cleft for me,
Let me hide myself in Thee;
Let the water and the blood,
From Thy wounded side which flowed,
Be of sin the double cure,
Save from wrath and make me pure.
Be of sin the double cure,
Save from wrath and make me pure.

Could my tears for ever flow,
Could my zeal no languor know–
These for sin could not atone,
Thou must save, and Thou alone;
In my hand no price I bring,
Simply to Thy cross I cling.
In my hand no price I bring,
Simply to Thy cross I cling.

While I draw this fleeting breath,
When mine eyes shall close in death,
When I soar to worlds unknown,
See Thee on Thy judgment throne.
Rock of Ages, cleft for me,
Let me hide myself in Thee.
Rock of Ages, cleft for me,
Let me hide myself in Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 51 (甲) 首 - 萬古靈磐
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
萬古靈磐為我開，容我藏於主心懷；
主受槍刺肋下傷，水、血和流恩綿長。
如此受苦救我靈，洗我罪污免我刑。
如此受苦救我靈，洗我罪污免我刑。

縱然靠己立善功，或行律法皆落空；
雖是殷勤無罷休，不能稱義心多憂！
惟靠主血贖罪愆，成聖、稱義到神前。
惟靠主血贖罪愆，成聖、稱義到神前。

我今在世度此生，或在主裡暫安眠；
必在末日離土塵，復活見主審萬民。
萬古靈磐為我開，容我藏於主心懷。
萬古靈磐為我開，容我藏於主心懷。

english_page_header: Hymn 51B - Rock of Ages
english_full_lyrics:
Rock of Ages, cleft for me,
Let me hide myself in Thee;
Let the water and the blood,
From Thy wounded side which flowed,
Be of sin the double cure,
Save from wrath and make me pure.

Could my tears for ever flow,
Could my zeal no languor know–
These for sin could not atone,
Thou must save, and Thou alone;
In my hand no price I bring,
Simply to Thy cross I cling.

While I draw this fleeting breath,
When mine eyes shall close in death,
When I soar to worlds unknown,
See Thee on Thy judgment throne.
Rock of Ages, cleft for me,
Let me hide myself in Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 51 (乙) 首 - 萬古靈磐
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
萬古靈磐為我開，容我藏於主心懷；
主受槍刺肋下傷，水、血和流恩綿長。
如此受苦救我靈，洗我罪污免我刑。

縱然靠己立善功，或行律法皆落空；
雖是殷勤無罷休，不能稱義心多憂！
惟靠主血贖罪愆，成聖、稱義到神前。

我今在世度此生，或在主裡暫安眠；
必在末日離土塵，復活見主審萬民。
萬古靈磐為我開，容我藏於主心懷。

english_page_header: Hymn 52 - Jesus Paid It All
english_full_lyrics:
I hear the Saviour say, 
“Thy strength indeed is small,
Child of weakness, watch and pray,
Find in me thine all in all.”

Lord, now indeed I find
Thy power, and Thine alone,
Can change the leper’s spots,
And melt the heart of stone.

For nothing good have I
Whereby Thy grace to claim –
I’ll wash my garments white
In the blood of Calvary’s Lamb.

When from my dying bed
My ransomed soul shall rise, 
“Jesus died my soul to save,”
Shall rend the vaulted skies.

And when before the throne
I stand in Him complete,
I’ll lay my trophies down,
All down at Jesus’ feet.

REFRAIN
Jesus paid it all,
All to Him I owe;
Sin had left a crimson stain,
He washed it white as snow.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 52 首 - 主恩浩大
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我聽主慈聲說：「你力量實微小，
應當儆醒祈禱，恩惠必不缺少」。

主啊！我今確知；惟主權能浩大，
污穢罪行能除，鐵石心腸能化。

我本沒有功德，不敢向主求恩；
凡我所得、所望，皆以主愛為根。

在我離世之時，必然不致戰競；
因我所欠諸債，主早代我還清。

副歌
我所欠罪債，主已還清結；
罪孽雖顯如硃紅，主使變白如雪。

english_page_header: Hymn 53 - God Is Love
english_full_lyrics:
For God so loved the men of earth,
He gave His only son,
To save, redeem, reveal His grace
And love to ev’ry one.

His love, so great, erased my sin,
Though it was inky black;
And I’d rebelled against His will,
His love has drawn me back.

The Son of God was crucified,
Hung on the cross for me,
O what a price He paid for men,
What love, what agony!

God’s mercy is so wide, so deep!
O sinner, hear His call!
Believe in Him without delay.
You owe to Him your all.

REFRAIN
I know that God is truly love;
He pardoned even me,
Prepares my soul for life above;
I know that God is love.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 53 首 - 天父慈仁
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天父愛憐世界眾人，差遣愛子降臨，
捨命救我脫罪、免死，神愛由此顯明。

雖然我身罪惡貫盈，污辱天父聖名，
做主仇敵不認真神，尚能出死入生。

天父慈愛至大、至深，又差聖靈降臨，
賞賜信徒得救憑據，必復活得永生。

副歌
天父慈愛無窮無盡，普及天下萬民；
洗我污穢，免我罪害，天父真是慈仁。

english_page_header: Hymn 54 - From Darkness into the Light
english_full_lyrics:
Hallelujah, Praise the Lord!
Hallelujah, Praise the Lord!
He delivers me,
From darkness into light,
Come ye to the True Church, come:
O rejoice! O rejoice!
Canaan’s blessings He bestows,
Oh, how He loves me, though I am nothing,
With His Holy Spirit here, He filleth me.

Hallelujah, Praise the Lord!
Hallelujah, Praise the Lord!
He leadeth me,
Out of Babylon we’ll flee,
Gave the precious Comforter,
O great love! O great love!
What a precious gift for me,
Thro’ His dear grace He calls me to serve Him,
So I’ll spread His word afar, Unto all men.

Hallelujah, Praise the Lord! 
Hallelujah, Praise the Lord!
He guides my way,
Clearly shows the path to take,
Lift your eyes to heav’n above,
O prepare! O prepare!
Bring your vessels filled with oil,
Trim all your lamps and keep yourself ready,
For the Bridegroom will return, For you and me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 54 首 - 離暗就光
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
哈利路亞，讚美神！哈利路亞，讚美神！
因主拯救我，使我離暗就光明，得入真耶穌教會，大欣喜，大欣喜；
使我享福進迦南，主這樣愛我，我實在不配，更賜真理保惠師，充滿我心！

哈利路亞，讚美神！哈利路亞，讚美神！
因主引導我，使我脫離巴比倫，又得應許保惠師，大安慰，大安慰；
使我得著這寶貝，主施恩召我，我應當捨命，廣傳真道於各方，選召萬民！

哈利路亞，讚美神！哈利路亞，讚美神！
因主指示我，使我預兆看分明，應當翹首而盼望，快預備，快預備；
添滿我器皿的油，我速速預備，儆醒挑明燈，迎接新郎主耶穌，在於空中！

english_page_header: Hymn 55 - Jesus Frees Me
english_full_lyrics:
I once was a sinner with turmoil within,
Condemned, trapped and powerless, living in sin;
But then my Lord came down and died on the tree,
Oh glory! I’m happy and free.

I tried on my own to fight Satan’s attacks,
With ev’ry step forward I fell three steps back;
But now I have God’s spirit living in me,
Oh glory! I’m fearless and free.

So now as I go on life’s difficult way,
God’s spirit abides with me day after day;
A son of God now and forever I’ll be,
Oh glory to Jesus, I’m free!

REFRAIN
Now I am free! Forever free!
Thus will my proclamation be;
I’m no longer bound by the shackles of sin!
Oh glory to Jesus! I’m free!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 55 首 - 蒙主釋放
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我居於耶穌，心裡實在平安，耶穌我救主，管我萬般事情；
得聖靈歡喜，但願常住我心，啊，榮耀歸耶穌聖名！

耶穌來釋放，快樂實難言喻，從罪惡出來，不再犯罪、死亡；
當實行捨己，得福真是無窮，啊，榮耀歸耶穌聖名！

於今主愛我，沒有罪惡纏身，美妙的真光，常照亮我內心；
唱新詩得勝，同歡呼共一聲，啊，榮耀歸耶穌聖名！

副歌
釋放，釋放，永遠釋放，我不再被罪惡做王；
寶血能洗滌，使我心裡潔淨，在耶穌裡得著釋放。

english_page_header: Hymn 56 - Blow Ye the Trumpet, Blow
english_full_lyrics:
Blow ye the trumpet, blow!
The gladly solemn sound
Let all the nations know,
To earth’s remotest bound:

Jesus, our great High Priest,
Hath full atonement made;
Ye weary spirits, rest;
Ye mournful souls, be glad:

Extol the Lamb of God,
The sin atoning Lamb;
Redemption by His blood
Throughout the lands proclaim:

Ye slaves of sin and hell,
Your liberty receive,
And safe in Jesus dwell,
And blest in Jesus live:

Ye who have sold for naught
Your heritage above,
Shall have it back unbought,
The gift of Jesus’ love:

The gospel trumpet hear,
The news of heav’nly grace;
And saved from earth, appear
Before your Saviour’s face:

REFRAIN
The year of jubilee is come!
The year of jubilee is come!
Return, ye ransomed sinners, home.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 56 首 - 禧年已到
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
吹起禧年號筒，福音大喜之聲；
天下南、北、西、東，男、女、老、幼齊聽。

神的羔羊基督，獨一贖罪祭物；
流血捨命救贖，使萬國人得福。

前做撒但奴僕，脫離毫無指望；
今蒙主賜自由，罪中綑綁釋放。

天國門路大開，天父大擺筵席；
請眾選民齊來，和主同坐飲食。

副歌
禧年已到，大赦日期，
禧年已到，大赦日期；
被贖之民，歸家大喜。

天門大開，恩惠無涯，
天門大開，恩惠無涯；
被贖之民，歸家大喜。

english_page_header: Hymn 57 - Just as I Am, Without One Plea
english_full_lyrics:
Just as I am, without one plea,
But that Thy blood was shed for me,
And that Thou bidst me come to Thee,
O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

Just as I am, and waiting not
To rid my soul of one dark blot,
To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot,
O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

Just as I am, though tossed about
With many a conflict, many a doubt,
Fightings and fears within, without,
O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind;
Sight, riches, healing of the mind,
Yea, all I need in Thee to find,
O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

Just as I am, Thou wilt receive,
Wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieve,
Because Thy promise I believe,
O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

Just as I am, Thy love unknown
Hath broken ev’ry barrier down;
Now to be Thine, yea, Thine alone,
O Lamb of God, I come! I come!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 57 首 - 我罪極重
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我罪極重，應該沈淪，
救主替死，大開恩門；
蒙主選召，來得救恩。
耶穌！我今就祢、就祢！

我罪極重，污穢可憎，
己欲洗淨，至今不能；
惟主寶血，一洗便清。
耶穌！我今就祢、就祢！

我罪極重，被魔捆拘，
大受苦難，成為罪奴；
主賜自由，免我罪辜。
耶穌！我今就祢、就祢！

我罪極重，尚可蒙恩，
潔我內心，救我靈魂；
謹守主言，必入天門。
耶穌！我今就祢、就祢！

english_page_header: Hymn 58 - He Leadeth Me!
english_full_lyrics:
He leadeth me! O blessed tho’t!
O words with heav’nly comfort fraught!
Whate’er I do, where’er I be,
Still ’tis God’s hand that leadeth me!

Sometimes mid scenes of deepest gloom,
Sometimes where Eden’s bowers bloom,
By waters still, o’er troubled sea,
Still ’tis His hand that leadeth me!

Lord, I would place my hand in Thine,
Nor ever murmur nor repine,
Content, whatever lot I see,
Since ’tis my God that leadeth me!

And when my task on earth is done,
When by Thy grace the vict’ry’s won,
E’en death’s cold wave I will not flee,
Since God thro’ Jordan leadeth me!

REFRAIN
He leadeth me, He leadeth me,
By His own hand He leadeth me;
His faithful foll’wer I would be,
For by His hand He leadeth me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 58 首 - 耶穌領我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌領我，我不孤單，
蒙主引導，心中平安；
無論日夜、起居、工作，
有主耶穌時常領我。

有時遭遇困苦、憂傷，
有時大得快樂歡暢；
似海翻騰，如山穩妥，
或危，或安，耶穌領我。

願拉主手同走一生，
從這地步直到天城；
遇苦、見福，兩般皆可，
因主耶穌聖手領我。

到時行完一世路程，
內惡、外敵，我全得贏；
公義冠冕為我存留，
獨賴耶穌至終領我。

副歌
耶穌領我，日日領我，
耶穌恩主親手領我；
我願忠心做主門徒，
因主施恩親手領我。

english_page_header: Hymn 59 - Guide Me, O Thou Great Redeemer
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 59 首 - 求主引導
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
慈悲救主！求你領我，走過今世曠野路，
我無力量，主有權能，領我一直走過去。
天上嗎哪，天上嗎哪，求主時常賜給我，
天上嗎哪，天上嗎哪，求主時常賜給我。

求主賜給生命活水，使我路中不乾渴，
求主降下雲柱、火柱，引導前程不差誤。
全能救主，全能救主，做我盾牌保護我，
全能救主，全能救主，做我盾牌保護我。

等我走到約但河邊，令我心裡得安寧，
死的權柄，耶穌勝過，靠著主，我也打嬴。
到了迦南，到了迦南，我要永遠讚美主，
到了迦南，到了迦南，我要永遠讚美主。

english_page_header: Hymn 60 - Let Him Lead
english_full_lyrics:
Walk with joy the heavenly road; let Him lead;
Brightly lit is heaven’s road,
Toward its gleaming pathway strive,
Never falter, never sigh; let Him lead.

Walk with might the heavenly road; let Him lead;
Seek His grace on heaven’s road,
Though in life temptations come,
Follow Him and from them run; let Him lead.

Walk with calm the heavenly road; let Him lead;
Hard and long is heaven’s road,
Pray and trust His guiding light,
Keep it always in your sight; let Him lead.

Walk with peace the heavenly road; let Him lead;
In your sight is heaven’s road,
Walk by faith until the end, 
’Til in heaven we may stand; let Him lead.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 60 首 - 行走天路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天國路要喜歡走，主引領，光而明即天國路；
不論遇平坦險阻，莫搶前，也莫落後，主引領。

天國路要努力走，主引領，窄而小即天國路；
眾仇敵百般引誘，靠救主，得勝有餘，主引領。

天國路要忍耐走，主引領，艱而難即天國路；
將信心堅持到底，金在爐，大匠看守，主引領。

天國路要從容走，主引領，中而庸即天國路；
祈禱靠聖靈幫助，莫偏左，也莫偏右，主引領。

english_page_header: Hymn 61 - Lead, Kindly Light
english_full_lyrics:
Lead, kindly Light, amid th’encircling gloom,
Lead Thou me on!
The night is dark, and I am far from home,
Lead Thou me on!
Keep Thou my feet; I do not ask to see
The distant scene; one step enough for me.

I was not ever thus, nor prayed that Thou
Shouldst lead me on;
I loved to choose and see my path; but now
Lead Thou me on!
I loved the garish day, and spite of fears,
Pride ruled my will; Remember not past years.

So long Thy pow’r has bless’d, sure it still
Will lead me on.
O’er moor and fen, o’er crag and torrent, till
The night is gone;
And with the morn those angel faces smile
Which I have loved long since, and lost awhile!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 61 首 - 求主引路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
昔日未求我主指引道路，我行我素，
今深痛悔過去墮落糊塗，求主引路；
前貪浮樂，滿心罪過無數，
今求我主，不按愆尤震怒。

求主恩光照入幽暗之中，為我引路，
黑夜已深，用光領我腳步，求主引路；
穩步前行，不再躊躇、後顧，
求主施恩，一步一步關注。

蒙主恩待，不使今生虛度，求引前路，
隨時、隨處，無論平坦、險阻，求主引路；
夜盡天曉，望天思我恩主，
喜登彼岸，與我恩主同住。

english_page_header: Hymn 62 - The Saviour with Me
english_full_lyrics:
I would have the Saviour with me,
For I dare not walk alone;
I would feel His presence near me,
And His arm around me thrown.

I would have the Saviour with me,
For my faith, at best, is weak;
He can whisper words of comfort
That no other voice can speak.

I would have the Saviour with me
In the onward march of life,
Thro’ the tempest and the sunshine,
Thro’ the battle and the strife.

I would have the Saviour with me,
That His eye the way may guide,
Till I reach the vale of Jordan,
Till I cross the rolling tide.

REFRAIN
Then my soul shall fear no ill,
While He leads me where He will;
I will go without a murmur,
And His footsteps follow still.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 62 首 - 願主偕行
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我深願救主常偕我，我不敢獨自前行；
我深願主時刻同在，祂慈手領我前程。

我深願救主常偕我，我信心軟弱不堅；
主向我發安慰聲音，此聲內充滿慈憐。

我深願救主常偕我度此生，總不相離；
或遭風波，或處順境，歷戰陣履險若夷。

我深願救主常偕我，祂慈目日夜看顧；
直到行近約但河邊暴風濤，助我穩渡。

副歌
任憑祂隨意引導，我心中毫無畏驚；
無論何往，不出怨言，隨主腳蹤一路行。

english_page_header: Hymn 63 - Tarry with Me
english_full_lyrics:
Tarry with me, O my Saviour,
For the day is passing by;
See! the shades of evening gather,
And the night is drawing nigh.

Deeper, deeper grow the shadows,
Paler now the glowing west,
Swift the night of death advances;
Shall it be the night of rest?

Let me hear Thy voice behind me,
Calming all these wild alarms;
Let me, underneath my weakness,
Feel the everlasting arms.

Feeble, trembling, fainting, dying,
Lord, I cast myself on Thee;
Tarry with me through the darkness;
While I sleep, still watch by me.

REFRAIN
Tarry with me, O my Saviour,
Lay my head upon Thy breast
Till the morning; then awake me –
Morning of eternal rest.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 63 首 - 願主領路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
日落西山，前途遙遠，要前行寂寞、愁煩；
只靠救主時刻扶攙，領導我勇往直前。

黑暗世界，憂苦、悲哀，身體、生命易受害；
依靠天父權能、慈愛，得保守，身心安泰。

遵主旨意，順命而行，得安然渡過此生；
雖有困難，靠主得勝，必歡然，進入天城。

日落西山，前途遙遠，要前行寂寞、愁煩；
只靠救主時刻扶攙，領導我勇往直前。

副歌
懇求救主永不離去，使我心安不憂慮；
慈愛聖手引我前行，過黑夜達到光明。

english_page_header: Hymn 64 - Heavenly Sunlight
english_full_lyrics:
Walking in sunlight, all of my journey;
Over the mountains, through the deep vale;
Jesus has said “I’ll never forsake thee,”
Promise divine that never can fail.

Shadows around me, shadows above me,
Never conceal my Saviour and Guide;
He is the Light, in Him is no darkness;
Ever I’m walking close to His side.

In the bright sunlight ever rejoicing,
Pressing my way to mansions above;
Singing His praises gladly I’m walking,
Walking in sunlight, sunlight of love.

REFRAIN
Heavenly sunlight, heavenly sunlight,
Flooding my soul with glory divine:
Hallelujah, I am rejoicing,
Singing His praises, Jesus is mine.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 64 首 - 真光領導
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在光明中行一切的路程，經過諸山野，或幽谷中；
耶穌已叫我跟著祂腳踪，仰望我救主 創始成終。

黑影雖環繞，暗雲雖籠罩，決不能隱蔽主示目標；
基督真光照，陰翳必立消，有主常同在，不怕寂寥。

心中有真光，始有大盼望，努力向前進，信心剛強；
決不回頭看，一路只歌唱，有真光領導，直到天鄉。

副歌
天上的真光，美妙的真光，充滿我心裡，快樂無疆；
哈利路亞，不住高聲唱！讚美我救主，榮耀的王。

english_page_header: Hymn 65 - Close to Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Thou, my everlasting portion,
More than friend or life to me;
All along my pilgrim journey,
Saviour, let me walk with Thee.
Close to Thee, close to Thee,
Close to Thee, close to Thee;
All along my pilgrim journey,
Saviour, let me walk with Thee.

Not for ease or worldly pleasure,
Nor for fame my prayer shall be;
Gladly will I toil and suffer,
Only let me walk with Thee.
Close to Thee, close to Thee,
Close to Thee, close to Thee;
Gladly will I toil and suffer,
Only let me walk with Thee.

Lead me through the vale of shadows,
Bear me o’er life’s fitful sea;
Then the gate of life eternal
May I enter, Lord, with Thee.
Close to Thee, close to Thee,
Close to Thee, close to Thee;
Then the gate of life eternal
May I enter, Lord, with Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 65 首 - 靠近主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主是我永遠的福分，勝過財寶與生命；
在人生孤單旅程中，懇求主與我同行。

我不求世界的虛榮，也不爭人間美名；
我不辭為主而犧牲，只求主與我同行。

主領我經黑暗幽谷，安然渡苦海危程；
當天上永生門大開，願主帶我進天城。

副歌
靠近主，靠近主，靠近主，靠近主；
在人生孤單旅程中，懇求主與我同行。

english_page_header: Hymn 66 - Lord, My Soul Will Wait For Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Lord, my soul will wait for Thee,
Fearless, blameless, here I’ll stay;
Lord, I’m trusting only Thee,
Lead me in Thy heav’nly way.

Lord, I pray, Thy Truth reveal,
Guide me to the path above;
Thou my Saviour and my God,
Show Thy mercy and Thy love.

Lord, my life was filled with sin,
Now at last I seek Thy grace;
Oh, remember not my past,
And this sinner ne’er forsake.

Lord, most gracious, most divine,
Teach me now Thy righteousness;
That this lost sheep wilt Thou guide,
And with meekness wilt Thou bless.

REFRAIN
He will guide me and care for me,
Lead me onward to His sweet peace;
Lord, I’ll watch and wait for Thee,
In my sorrow, comfort me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 66 首 - 主，我等候祢!
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主，我的內心仰望祢！主，我是素來倚靠祢！
仇敵不能向我誇勝，凡等候祢必不羞愧。

主，求祢將道指示我！主，求祢將路教訓我！
因為祢是救我的神，我要終日等候著祢。

主，求祢紀念祢憐憫！是亙古以來所常有；
求祢不要紀念我罪，只按祢恩惠憐恤我。

主，祢是良善而正直！所以必引人走正路，
必按公平領謙卑人，教訓他們遵祢法度。

副歌
主必看顧我，引導我，必指示罪人走正路；
主，我仰望祢，等候祢，救我脫離一切愁苦！

english_page_header: Hymn 67 - Teach Me Thy Way, O Lord
english_full_lyrics:
Teach me Thy way, O Lord,
Teach me Thy way!
Thy guiding grace afford –
Teach me Thy way!
Help me to walk aright,
More by faith, less by sight;
Lead me with heav’nly light,
Teach me Thy way!

When I am sad at heart,
Teach me Thy way!
When earthly joys depart,
Teach me Thy way!
In hours of loneliness,
In times of dire distress;
In failure or success,
Teach me Thy way!

When doubts and fears arise,
Teach me Thy way!
When storms o’er spread the skies,
Teach me Thy way!
Shine through the cloud and rain,
Through sorrow, toil and pain;
Make Thou my pathway plain,
Teach me Thy way!

Long as my life shall last,
Teach me Thy way!
Where’er my lot be cast,
Teach me Thy way!
Until the race is run,
Until the journey’s done,
Until the crown is won,
Teach me Thy way!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 67 首 - 求主指引我路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主啊！求祢指引，指引我路！
求祢施恩幫助，指引我路！
使我行道不偏，憑信不憑眼見，
降下雲柱、火柱，指引我路！

當有疑雲愁霧，指引我路！
當有狂風、暴雨，指引我路！
不分晝夜、陰晴，無論清晨、薄暮，
使我前途光明，指引我路！

當我寄居在世，指引我路！
不論遇何事故，指引我路！
直到打勝美仗，直到跑盡我路，
直到領受冠冕，指引我路！

english_page_header: Hymn 68 - Hold Thou My Hand
english_full_lyrics:
Hold Thou my hand, so weak I am, and helpless,
I dare not take one step without Thy aid;
Hold Thou my hand; for then, O loving Saviour,
No dread of ill shall make my soul afraid.

Hold Thou my hand, and closer, closer draw me
To Thy dear self – my hope, my joy, my all;
Hold Thou my hand, lest haply I should wander,
And, missing Thee, my trembling feet should fall.

Hold Thou my hand; the way is dark before me
Without the sunlight of Thy face divine;
But when by faith I catch its radiant glory,
What heights of joy, what rapturous songs are mine!

Hold Thou my hand, that when I reach the margin
Of that lone river Thou didst cross for me,
A heav’nly light may flash along its waters,
And ev’ry wave like crystal bright shall be.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 68 首 - 求主攜我手
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
求攜我手，因我軟弱難行走，
若無主扶持，一步也難移；
求攜我手，引我學步像小兒，
行在光明中，步步不差池。

求攜我手，領我緊緊跟主走，
主是我標竿，我眼時時看；
求攜我手，莫容我跑出羊欄，
恐與主相離，迷路遭苦難。

求攜我手，求以恩臂常保守，
主不在我旁，前路黑茫茫；
我若憑信，望見主面上榮光，
便歡喜若狂，更放聲高唱。

求攜我手，直到那冷河渡口，
我主為救我，曾由此經過；
遙望對岸，我父家輝煌光波，
隨主手引領，渡河樂高歌。

english_page_header: Hymn 69 - Jesus, Saviour, Pilot Me
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus, Saviour, pilot me
Over life’s tempestuous sea;
Unknown waves before me roll,
Hiding rock and treach’rous shoal;
Chart and compass come from Thee:
Jesus, Saviour, pilot me.

As a mother stills her child,
Thou canst hush the ocean wild;
Boist’rous waves obey Thy will
When Thou say’st to them, “Be still!”
Wondrous Sov’reign of the sea,
Jesus, Saviour, pilot me.

When at last I near the shore,
And the fearful breakers roar 
’Twixt me and the peaceful rest,
Then, while leaning on Thy breast,
May I hear Thee say to me, 
“Fear not, I will pilot thee.”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 69 首 - 求主操我舵
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
求主耶穌掌我舵，世海波濤安渡過，
前面滾滾風浪作，暗礁隱隱險且惡；
南針、海圖，主掌握，求主耶穌掌我舵。

宛如慈母撫幼嬰，主命海洋默無聲，
聞主一言即安靜，喧騰海面立平定；
宇宙主宰妙無窮，求主耶穌導我行。

當我航近福樂港，岸邊巨浪猶猖狂，
容我在主懷中藏，渡過險境入安康；
聞主慰言在耳旁：「有我同在莫驚慌！」

english_page_header: Hymn 70 - None but Christ Can Satisfy
english_full_lyrics:
O Christ, in Thee, my soul hath found,
And found in Thee alone,
The peace, the joy I sought so long,
The bliss till now unknown.

I sighed for rest and happiness,
I yearned for them, not Thee;
But while I passed my Saviour by,
His love laid hold on me.

I tried the broken cisterns, Lord,
But ah! the waters failed!
E’en as I stooped to drink they fled,
And mocked me as I wailed.

The pleasures lost I sadly mourned,
But never wept for Thee,
Till grace my sightless eyes received,
Thy loveliness to see.

REFRAIN
Now none but Christ can satisfy,
None other name for me,
There’s love, and life, and lasting joy,
Lord Jesus, found in Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 70 首 - 主有萬福
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
以前我心苦楚、悲傷，所望福氣無常；
惟獨基督今做我主，平安、喜樂無量。

以前切望世間福氣，與主耶穌遠離；
惟獨天恩出人意想，使我永享不移。

以前我嘗許多好味，飢渴仍然極深；
惟獨主賜天糧、活水，永遠滿足我心。

以前看重世間百物，未曾看重基督；
惟獨救主開我心目，始知主有萬福。

副歌
今主基督充滿我心，並無別人似之；
永遠生命、平安、喜樂，都由耶穌賞賜。

english_page_header: Hymn 71 - Jesus, Thy Name I Love
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus, Thy name I love,
All other names above,
Jesus, my Lord!
Oh, Thou art all to me;
Nothing to please I see,
Nothing apart from Thee,
Jesus, my Lord!

Thou, blessed Son of God,
Hast bought me with Thy blood,
Jesus, my Lord!
Oh, how great is Thy love,
All other loves above,
Love that I daily prove,
Jesus, my Lord!

When unto Thee I flee,
Thou wilt my refuge be,
Jesus, my Lord!
What need I now to fear?
What earthly grief or care
Since Thou art ever near?
Jesus, my Lord!

Soon Thou wilt come again,
I shall be happy then,
Jesus, my Lord!
Then Thine own face I’ll see,
Then I shall like Thee be,
Then ever more with Thee,
Jesus, my Lord!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 71 首 - 耶穌我主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我愛耶穌尊名，比愛別名更深，耶穌我主；
主是萬福之源，有主我無缺乏，無主我真可憐，耶穌我主。

耶穌愛我極深，流血贖我罪身，耶穌我主；
主愛永無改變，勝過父母眷念，日日得新體驗，耶穌我主。

我要向主奔跑，靠主極大功勞，耶穌我主；
危險何須驚懼？世事不必憂慮，主永與我同居，耶穌我主。

不久主必降臨，那時福滿我心，耶穌我主；
我將親見主面，成就我心所願，享福直到永遠，耶穌我主。

english_page_header: Hymn 72 - The Great Physician
english_full_lyrics:
The great Physician now is near,
The sympathizing Jesus;
He speaks the drooping heart to cheer,
Oh! hear the voice of Jesus.

Your many sins are all forgiv’n,
Oh! hear the voice of Jesus;
Go on your way in peace to heav’n,
And wear a crown with Jesus.

All glory to the dying Lamb!
I now believe in Jesus;
I love the blessed Saviour’s name,
I love the name of Jesus.

His name despels my guilt and fear,
No other name but Jesus;
Oh! how my soul delights to hear
The charming name of Jesus.

REFRAIN
Sweetest note in seraph song,
Sweetest name on mortal tongue;
Sweetest carol ever sung,
Jesus, blessed Jesus.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 72 首 - 萬福之主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
最大醫生與我親近，就是愛人之耶穌；
救主權能使人痊癒，應當信靠主耶穌。

救主慈愛赦免罪愆，就是捨命之耶穌；
所有罪人一齊進前，應當悔改信耶穌。

救主賜人永遠生命，就是復活之耶穌；
使人得著不朽福氣，應當跟從主耶穌。

救主預備天國住處，就是升天之耶穌；
祂必再來迎接信徒，應當仰望主耶穌。

副歌
頂甘美主愛廣佈，頂甘甜主恩無數，
頂甘香主名至上，是萬福主耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 73 - Saviour, Like a Shepherd Lead US
english_full_lyrics:
Saviour, like a shepherd lead us,
Much we need Thy tender care;
In Thy pleasant pastures feed us,
For our use Thy folds prepare.
Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus!
Thou hast bought us, Thine we are;
Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus!
Thou hast bought us, Thine we are.

We are Thine, Thou dost befriend us,
Be the guardian of our way;
Keep Thy flock from sin, defend us,
Seek us when we go astray.
Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus!
Hear, O hear us when we pray;
Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus!
Hear, O hear us when we pray.

Thou hast promised to receive us,
Poor and sinful though we be;
Thou hast mercy to relieve us,
Grace to cleanse, and pow’r to free.
Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus!
We will early turn to Thee;
Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus!
We will early turn to Thee.

Early let us seek Thy favor,
Early let us do Thy will;
Blessed Lord and only Saviour,
With Thy love our bosoms fill.
Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus!
Thou hast loved us, love us still;
Blessed Jesus, blessed Jesus!
Thou hast loved us, love us still.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 73 首 - 賜福救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
懇求大牧領我前行，我真願與主相親；
懇求引到快樂草場，預備羊欄安我身。
賜福救主，賜福救主，我們蒙救做主民；
賜福救主，賜福救主，我們蒙救做主民。

雖然我們多罪、困貧，主已應許救我靈；
甘願捨命為我流血，洗滌我罪得更新。
賜福救主，賜福救主，我願早日歸天庭；
賜福救主，賜福救主，我願早日歸天庭。

我願遵照救主命令，日日努力跟主行；
敬求救主體恤軟弱，隨時眷顧、施愛憐。
賜福救主，賜福救主，榮耀永遠歸主名；
賜福救主，賜福救主，榮耀永遠歸主名。

english_page_header: Hymn 74 - Hark! the Herald Angels Sing
english_full_lyrics:
Hark! the herald angels sing, “Glory to the newborn King;
Peace on earth, and mercy mild; God and sinners reconciled.”
Joyful, all ye nations rise, Join the triumph of the skies;
With th’angelic host proclaim, “Christ is born in Bethlehem!”

Christ, by highest heav’n adored, Christ, the everlasting Lord:
Late in time, behold Him come, Offspring of a virgin’s womb.
Veiled in flesh the Godhead see, Hail th’incarnate Deity!
Pleased as man with men to dwell, Jesus our Immanuel.

Hail the heav’n-born Prince of Peace! Hail the Sun of Righteousness!
Light and life to all He brings, Ris’n with healing in His wings.
Mild He lays His glory by, Born that man no more may die,
Born to raise the sons of earth, Born to give them second birth.

REFRAIN
Hark! the herald angels sing, “Glory to the newborn King!”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 74 首 - 救主降生
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聽啊！天使唱高聲，報知救主已降生！
當與天使同歌唱，竭力頌讚新生王，
世界各處遠近邦，皆當興起同頌揚。
天唱地和喜不勝，基督生於伯利恆，
天唱地和喜不勝，基督生於伯利恆。

基督本為永生主，居於至高榮耀處，
時期滿足由天降，賜與萬世大盼望，
至尊真神成肉身，住在人間傳救恩。
恩惠、平安降於地，救世主以馬內利，
恩惠、平安降於地，救世主以馬內利。

美哉，救主和平王！大哉，主為世上光！
普遍照臨億萬人，賜以永生引歸真，
謙卑離棄天榮尊，救人脫罪免沉淪。
天上榮耀歸真神，地上平安歸於人，
天上榮耀歸真神，地上平安歸於人。

english_page_header: Hymn 75 - In Israel, the Angel Did Say
english_full_lyrics:
In Israel, the angel did say,
Was to certain poor shepherds in fields as they lay;
In fields where they lay keeping their sheep,
On a dark, starry night that was so deep.

They looked up and saw a star
Shining in the east, beyond them far,
And to the earth it gave great light,
And so it continued both day and night.

And by the light of that same star
The wise men came from country far;
To seek for a king was their intent,
And to follow the star wherever it went.

Then let us all with one accord
Sing praises to our heavenly Lord
Who hath made heav’n and earth of naught,
And with His blood mankind hath bought.

REFRAIN
Rejoice, rejoice, Rejoice, rejoice,
Born is the King of Israel.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 75 首 - 基督降生
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
請聽天使大喜信息，基督降生大衛之城；
祂是真神獨生愛子，應當讚美耶穌尊名。

天使傳講：「不要心驚，我報關乎萬民佳音；
槽內嬰兒布包為記，要使世人認識歡迎。」

一隊天兵同心讚美：「榮耀歸神，平安歸人！」
基督被神立為救主，要使萬民得救歸神。

副歌
歡喜，歡喜，歡喜，歡喜，
天國君王已經降生。

english_page_header: Hymn 76 - At the Cross
english_full_lyrics:
Alas, and did my Saviour bleed
And did my Sov’reign die?
Would He devote that sacred head
For sinners such as I?

Was it for crimes that I have done
He groaned upon the tree?
Amazing pity, grace unknown,
And love beyond degree!

Well might the sun in darkness hide,
And shut his glories in,
When Christ the mighty Maker died
For man the creature’s sin.

But drops of grief can ne’er repay
The debt of love I owe;
Here, Lord, I give myself away, 
’Tis all that I can do.

REFRAIN
At the cross, at the cross where I first saw the light,
And the burden of my heart rolled away,
It was there by faith I received my sight,
And now I am happy all the day!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 76 首 - 耶穌受死
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我主聖體被釘血流，掛在髑髏山頭；
情願捨命贖我靈魂，赦我一切愆尤。

榮耀救主，因我罪深，甘受咒詛、蒙羞；
莫大恩典，莫大慈愛，為我滅了冤仇。

真神愛子，釘在十架，頭戴荊棘冕旒；
太陽暗避如不忍睹，大地驚怕、動搖。

主恩、主愛如此深重，流淚何足報酬？
惟將身心獻與主前，一生事主不休。

副歌
在我主十字架，我看見主寶血，罪重擔從我心皆脫落；
在十架，我因信眼明亮、心平安，到如今我無時不歡樂。

english_page_header: Hymn 77 - The Old Rugged Cross
english_full_lyrics:
On a hill far away stood an old rugged cross,
The emblem of suff’ring and shame;
And I love that old cross
where the dearest and best
For a world of lost sinners was slain.

Oh, that old rugged cross so despised by the world,
Has a wondrous attraction for me;
For the dear Lamb of God
left His glory above,
To bear it to dark Calvary.

In the old rugged cross,
stained with blood so divine,
A wondrous beauty I see;
For ’twas on that old cross
Jesus suffered and died,
To pardon and sanctify me.

To the old rugged cross I will ever be true,
Its shame and reproach gladly bear;
Then He’ll call me some day
to my home far away,
Where His glory forever I’ll share.

REFRAIN
So I’ll cherish the old rugged cross,
Till my trophies at last I lay down;
I will cling to the old rugged cross,
And exchange it some day for a crown.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 77 首 - 高舉十架
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在各各他山上，主被釘十字架，
似是羞辱，卻極榮耀；
神愛子主耶穌，為世人捨祂命，
這十架為我最愛、最寶。

主寶貴十字架，乃世人所輕視，
於我卻是真神仁慈；
神愛子主耶穌，離天堂，棄榮華，
甘願為世人釘死十架。

在各各他山上，主被釘十字架，
似是羞辱，卻極榮耀；
神愛子主耶穌，為世人捨祂命，
這十架為我最愛、最寶。

主寶貴十字架，乃世人所輕視，
於我卻是真神仁慈；
神愛子主耶穌，離天堂，棄榮華，
甘願為世人釘死十架。

副歌
故我最愛高舉十字架，
直到在主台前見主面；
我一生要背負十字架，
將來可換得公義冠冕。

english_page_header: Hymn 78 - Low in the Grave He Lay
english_full_lyrics:
Low in the grave He lay, Jesus my Savior!
Waiting the coming day, Jesus my Lord!

Vainly they watch His bed, Jesus my Savior!
Vainly they seal the dead, Jesus my Lord!

Death cannot keep its prey, Jesus my Savior!
He tore the bars away, Jesus my Lord!

REFRAIN
Up from the grave He arose,
With a mighty triumph o’er His foes;
He arose a victor from the dark domain,
And He lives forever with His saints to reign.
He arose! He arose!
Hallelujah! Christ arose!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 78 首 - 樂主復活
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
為罪人被釘死，我救主耶穌；
磐石鑿，新墓裡，我主耶穌。

眾兵丁空看守，我救主耶穌；
死期過，甦醒起，我主耶穌。

勝死權，滅冤仇，我救主耶穌；
墓不能再拘禁，我主耶穌。

副歌
墓口忽開，主復活！
主向世人恩門開極闊！
主復活，那陰間眾鬼魔戰驚！
主復活，眾門徒賴其死得生！
主復活！主復活！
哈利路亞，主復活！

english_page_header: Hymn 79 - Christ the Lord Is Risen Today
english_full_lyrics:
Christ the Lord is ris’n today, Alleluia!
Sons of men and angels say, Alleluia!
Raise your joys and triumphs high, Alleluia!
Sing, ye heav’ns, and earth, reply, Alleluia!

Lives again our glorious King, Alleluia!
Where, O death, is now thy sting? Alleluia!
Once He died our souls to save, Alleluia!
Where thy victory, O grave? Alleluia!

Love’s redeeming work is done, Alleluia!
Fought the fight, the battle won, Alleluia!
Death in vain forbids His rise, Alleluia!
Christ hath opened paradise, Alleluia!

Soar we now where Christ hath led, Alleluia!
Following our exalted Head, Alleluia!
Made like Him, like Him we rise, Alleluia!
Ours the cross, the grave, the skies, Alleluia!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 79 首 - 耶穌復活頌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
基督耶穌已復活，哈利路亞！
天使、世人齊傳說，哈利路亞！
快樂凱歌高聲揚，哈利路亞！
天上、地下一同唱：「哈利路亞！」

榮耀君王墓中起，哈利路亞！
死的毒鈎除無遺，哈利路亞！
主獻身體滅冤仇，哈利路亞！
魔鬼權勢難存留，哈利路亞！

贖罪恩功今已成，哈利路亞！
攻魔擊敵全得贏，哈利路亞！
死亡權勢今何在？哈利路亞！
基督已將天門開，哈利路亞！

今日我們齊頌揚，哈利路亞！
基督永為天上王，哈利路亞！
被造新人主形狀，哈利路亞！
末日復活同為王，哈利路亞！

english_page_header: Hymn 80 - The Strife Is O’er
english_full_lyrics:
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!
The strife is o’er the battle done;
The victory of life is won;
The song of triumph has begun:
Alleluia!

The powers of death have done their worst,
But Christ their legions hath dispersed;
Let shouts of holy joy outburst:
Alleluia!

The three sad days have quickly sped,
He rises glorious from the dead;
All glory to our risen Head:
Alleluia!

Lord, by the stripes which wounded Thee,
From death’s dread sting Thy servants free,
That we may live and sing to Thee:
Alleluia!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 80 首 - 主已戰勝死亡
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！哈利路亞！

戰爭完畢，奮鬥功成，生命之主終於得勝；
凱歌初奏，響徹天庭，哈利路亞！

死亡權勢，久已猖狂，主振神威銷其鋒芒；
眾聖歡騰，萬口同唱：「哈利路亞！」

三日淒涼，轉眼即過，主已從死榮耀復活；
教會元首，尊貴顯赫，哈利路亞！

光華天堂，主已開啟，陰森地獄，為我關閉；
喜得永生，稱頌不息，哈利路亞！

english_page_header: Hymn 81 - On the Mountain’s Top Appearing
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 81 首 - 耶穌再臨
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主再臨，光滿宇宙，端坐雲中降下來，
世間萬民，分列左右，天使、天軍隊隊排；
真該讚美，主要坐在審判臺，
真該讚美，主要坐在審判臺。

天下眾民，都必看主，威嚴容貌真可怕，
這些以前欺慢救主，把祂釘在十字架；
現在大哭，都必認得彌賽亞，
現在大哭，都必認得彌賽亞。

號筒聲響，震動天地，海洋、山嶺都遷移，
眾星墜落，日月無光，救主仇敵無處藏；
來受審判，聚集白色寶座前，
來受審判，聚集白色寶座前。

得救聖徒，主今接去，蒙主鴻恩受美報，
從前雖被世人憎惡，如今同主得榮耀；
哈利路亞，榮耀日期今日到！
哈利路亞，榮耀日期今日到！

english_page_header: Hymn 82 - I Am Praying for You
english_full_lyrics:
I have a Saviour, He’s pleading in glory,
A dear loving Saviour, though earth friends be few;
And now He is watching in tenderness o’er me,
And, oh, that my Saviour were your Saviour, too.

I have a Father; to me He has given
A hope for eternity, blessed and true;
And soon He will call me to meet Him in heaven,
But, oh, that He’d let me bring you with me, too!

I have a robe; ’tis resplendent in whiteness,
Awaiting in glory my wondering view;
Oh, when I receive it all shining in brightness,
Dear friend, could I see you receiving one, too!

When Christ has found you, tell others the story,
That my loving Saviour is your Saviour, too;
Then pray that your Saviour may bring them to glory,
And prayer will be answered – ’twas answered for you!

REFRAIN
For you I am praying,
For you I am praying,
For you I am praying,
I’m praying for you
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 82 首 - 儆醒預備
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
眾聖徒得重生，經訓當遵行，
到末日見耶穌，被提而上升；
將身心獻於主，束腰常儆醒，
如童女等新郎，夜半或雞鳴。
預備油在器皿，預備油在器皿；
像那些聰明女，預備油在器皿。

在今生快預備，來世大福氣，
靠聖靈結善果，德行要全備；
主來遲，要忍耐，等候不歇息，
常儆醒預備油，免被主丟棄。
預備油在器皿，預備油在器皿；
像那些聰明女，預備油在器皿。

主門徒受聖靈，要作世上光，
當學那聰明女，燈焰常輝煌；
號筒響，都變化，復活到主前，
在天上同歡樂，共赴大喜筵。
預備油在器皿，預備油在器皿；
像那些聰明女，預備油在器皿。

english_page_header: Hymn 83 - There’ll Be No Dark Valley
english_full_lyrics:
There’ll be no dark valley when Jesus comes,
There’ll be no dark valley when Jesus comes;
There’ll be no dark valley when Jesus comes
To gather His loved ones home.

There’ll be no more sorrow when Jesus comes,
There’ll be no more sorrow when Jesus comes;
But a glorious morrow when Jesus comes
To gather His loved ones home.

There’ll be no more weeping when Jesus comes,
There’ll be no more weeping when Jesus comes;
But a blessed reaping when Jesus comes
To gather His loved ones home.

There’ll be songs of greeting when Jesus comes,
There’ll be songs of greeting when Jesus comes;
And a joyful meeting when Jesus comes
To gather His loved ones home.

REFRAIN
To gather His loved ones home,
To gather His loved ones home;
There’ll be no dark valley when Jesus comes
To gather His loved ones home.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 83 首 - 耶穌來時
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌來時，再無幽暗、困苦，
耶穌來時，再無幽暗困苦；
耶穌來時，必有光明、幸福，
因主來接我回家。

耶穌來時，我心不再悲傷，
耶穌來時，我心不再悲傷；
耶穌來時，必進快樂天堂，
因主來接我回家。

耶穌來時，永不再有死亡，
耶穌來時，永不再有死亡；
耶穌來時，賜我永生華冠，
因主來接我回家。

耶穌來時，必有高聲頌讚，
耶穌來時，必有高聲頌讚；
耶穌來時，大家相會不散，
因主來接我回家。

副歌
因主來接我回家，
因主來接我回家；
耶穌來時，可唱得勝詩歌，
因主來接我回家。

english_page_header: Hymn 84 - Rejoice! Rejoice! Our King Is Coming
english_full_lyrics:
Rejoice! Rejoice! our King is coming!
And the time will not be long,
Until we hail the radiant dawning,
And lift up the glad new song.
