Firm on the Rock of Ages Ever my trust shall be.
Here let me wait with patience, Wait till the night is o’er;
Wait till I see the morning Break on the golden shore.

REFRAIN
Safe in the arms of Jesus, 
Safe on His gentle breast,
There by His love o’ershaded,
Sweetly my soul shall rest.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 165 首 - 耶穌懷抱我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌恩臂懷抱我，在主胸前安穩，主有恩惠常照顧，我心不必憂苦；
聽眾天使歌頌聲，使我鼓舞、歡騰，天涯海角傳主愛，萬邦同沐主恩。

耶穌恩臂懷抱我，憂戚變為歡暢，罪惡試探全贏過，我心不必彷徨；
愁苦不能再擾我，疑惑、懼怕消散，在世雖有大靈戰，得勝必戴華冠。

耶穌恩臂懷抱我，大得安全保障，世界環境雖動亂，我心不必驚慌；
因主是堅固盤石，投靠衪不失望，等到衪從天再來，接我進入天堂。

副歌
耶穌恩臂懷抱我，我心安靜平穩；主有恩惠常照顧，從今直到永遠。

english_page_header: Hymn 166 - He Will Hide Me
english_full_lyrics:
When the storms of life are raging,
Tempests wild on sea and land,
I will seek a place of refuge
In the shadow of God’s hand.

Tho’ He may send some affliction, 
’Twill but make me long for home;
For in love and not in anger,
All His chastenings will come.

Enemies may strive to injure,
Satan all his arts employ;
God will turn what seems to harm me
Into everlasting joy.

So, while here the cross I’m bearing,
Meeting storms and billows wild,
Jesus for my soul is caring,
Naught can harm His Father’s child.

REFRAIN
He will hide me, He will hide me,
Where no harm can e’er betide me;
He will hide me, safely hide me,
In the shadow of His hand.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 166 首 - 在主蔭庇之下
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
苦海洪濤洶湧、澎湃，暴風雨到處打擊；
我要尋找避難處所，在我主蔭庇之下。

憂愁、苦惱，貧病交加，更助我渴想天家；
一切患難對我有益，主要我忍耐到底。

仇敵竭力要傷害我，常用詭計誘惑我；
主幫助我轉危為安，成為我永遠福祉。

我今在此，背十字架，迎風濤勇敢前進；
耶穌看顧我的靈魂，在祂愛中不損傷。

副歌
主要將我隱藏起來，我就安全不受傷害；
將我隱藏祂蔭庇下，我就安全不受害。

english_page_header: Hymn 167 - Am I a Soldier of the Cross?
english_full_lyrics:
Am I a soldier of the cross,
A follow’r of the Lamb,
And shall I fear to own His cause,
Or blush to speak His name?

Must I be carried to the skies
On flow’ry beds of ease,
While others fought to win the prize,
And sailed thro’ bloody seas?

Are there no foes for me to face?
Must I not stem the flood?
Is this vile world a friend to grace,
To help me on to God?

REFRAIN
Sure I must fight if I would reign;
Increase my courage, Lord;
I’ll bear the toil, endure the pain,
Supported by Thy word.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 167 首 - 十架精兵
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我是耶穌十架精兵，跟隨元帥出征，不怕羞恥，認主名字，傳揚末世福音；
彼此努力，遍行各地，打破魔鬼詭計，歷盡艱難，受盡毀謗，福氣方能全備。

穿戴軍裝，聽主號令，向敵衝鋒陷陣，奮勇前進，不顧身命，必見真道通行；
勝了又勝，一直向前，靠主爭戰不停，堅持到底，時常忍耐，至終直上天庭。

主帶精兵出陣交戰，滅盡魔鬼火箭，全勝之日，同唱凱歌，因信就如眼見；
在主降臨榮耀日子，千萬精兵聚集，天上、地下，同心、同意，一齊崇拜、讚美。

english_page_header: Hymn 168 - Onward, Christian Soldiers
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 168 首 - 精兵前進
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
基督精兵前進，與魔鬼交戰，全營仰望耶穌，信心都剛健；
基督萬軍之主，領兵追仇敵，看祂旌旗高舉，靈劍齊攻擊。

基督精兵前進，撒但軍遁匿，倚靠聖靈權能，彰顯大神蹟；
為著所信福音，齊心又努力，打破魔鬼營壘，真教遍設立。

基督精兵前進，團結為一體，服從基督號令，步伐要一致；
魔鬼雖然抵擋，真道總無敵，最後齊唱凱歌，讚美主不息。

副歌
前進，前進，前進！號令常靜聽；哈利路亞，阿們！勝了又要勝！

english_page_header: Hymn 169 - Hold the Fort
english_full_lyrics:
Ho, my comrades! see the signal
Waving in the sky!
Reinforcements now appearing,
Victory is nigh.

See the mighty host advancing,
Satan leading on;
Mighty men around us falling,
Courage almost gone!

See the glorious banner waving!
Hear the trumpet blow!
In our Leader’s name we triumph
Over ev’ry foe.

Fierce and long the battle rages,
But our help is near,
Onward comes our great Commander,
Cheer, my comrades, cheer!

REFRAIN
“Hold the fort, for I am coming,” Jesus signals still;
Wave the answer back to heaven, “By Thy grace we will.”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 169 首 - 善惡對敵
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
世間原是兩軍對敵，即是惡與善；
我必定意屬於一邊，不能中間站。

我必日日與敵爭戰，總不敢懈怠；
私慾迷惑，惡俗引誘，魔鬼常相害。

仁義、誠實是我盔甲，聖道是寶劍；
信德是我堅固籐牌，能禦魔鬼箭。

從前主耶穌已得勝，主勝，我必勝；
爭戰完畢，得立主前，榮冕主親贈。

副歌
我是耶穌基督精兵，必跟隨主帥；
敵雖兇惡，靠主權能，百戰必百勝。

english_page_header: Hymn 170 - Stand Up, Stand Up for Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Stand up, stand up for Jesus,
Ye soldiers of the cross;
Lift high His royal banner,
It must not suffer loss:
From vict’ry unto vict’ry
His army shall He lead,
Til ev’ry foe is vanquished,
And Christ is Lord indeed.

Stand up, stand up for Jesus,
The trumpet call obey;
Forth to the mighty conflict
In this His glorious day:
Ye that are brave now serve Him
Against unnumbered foes;
Let courage rise with danger,
And strength to strength oppose.

Stand up, stand up for Jesus!
Stand in His strength alone;
The arm of flesh will fail you,
Ye dare not trust your own:
Put on the gospel armor,
Each piece put on with prayer;
Where duty calls, or danger,
Be never wanting there.

Stand up, stand up for Jesus,
The strife will not be long;
This day the noise of battle,
The next the victor’s song:
To Him that overcometh
A crown of life shall be;
He with the King of glory,
Shall reign eternally!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 170 首 - 為主勇往
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
跑去，跑去，為耶穌，做主十架精兵，
高舉主旗極尊貴，不可使它傷傾；
交戰得勝又常勝，因主統領全軍，
必至仇敵都戰敗，基督萬王之宗。

跑去，跑去，為耶穌，喜聽讚美之聲，
現在主顯大榮耀，萬眾上陣奮興；
仇敵又多又兇猛，主兵更當勇忠，
經過艱難與危險，大膽奮力直衝。

跑去，跑去，為耶穌，專心賴主能力，
血氣之勇不足恃，何敢靠己勝敵？
當穿福音之盔甲，儆醒祈求不休，
凡遇勞苦或患難，直前勇往無憂。

跑去，跑去，為耶穌，戰場不至久爭，
今日交戰之喊叫，不久奏凱歡聲；
至終凡是得勝者，必戴生命華冠，
榮耀之王大賞賜，與主同掌王權。

english_page_header: Hymn 171 - The Church Has One Foundation
english_full_lyrics:
The Church has one foundation, 
’Tis Jesus Christ her Lord;
She is His new creation,
With water by the word;
From heav’n He came and sought her
To be His holy bride;
With His own blood He bought her,
And for her life He died.

Elect from ev’ry nation,
Yet one o’er all the earth,
Her charter of salvation,
One Lord, one faith, one birth;
One holy name she blesses,
Partakes one holy food,
And to one hope she presses,
With ev’ry grace endued.

Though with a scornful wonder,
Men see her sore oppressed,
Though foes would rend asunder
The Rock where she doth rest,
Yet saints their faith are keeping;
Their cry goes up, “How long?”
And soon the night of weeping
Shall be the morn of song.

’Mid toil and tribulation,
And tumult of her war,
She waits the consummation
Of peace forevermore;
Till with the vision glorious
Her longing eyes are blest,
And the great Church victorious
Shall be the Church at rest.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 171 首 - 教會惟一根基
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
教會惟有一根基，是主耶穌基督，
一主、一信、一洗禮、一體、一靈、一父；
我主肋旁血、水流，造此貞潔新婦，
屬靈妝飾要整齊，等主迎接得福。

蒙主選召由各國，靠聖靈合一體，
得救門徑不差錯，遵照聖經指示；
同心頌讚一聖名，享受靈糧無異，
都是仰望進天城，永得福樂全備。

會雖在世心在天，日與真神相親，
得救信徒千千萬，愛主共表同心；
美哉，靈胞真相愛！得主恩惠更深，
人人勝任為忠僕，努力傳揚福音。

教會爭戰在世界，必受一番勞苦，
雖然仇敵多抵擋，靠主永不退步；
各處信徒當醒悟，至死效忠基督，
暫時患難不足論，至終凱旋天府。

english_page_header: Hymn 172 - Ye Shall Be Victorious
english_full_lyrics:
Ye shall be victorious over sin and strife,
Christ thy potent shield in the storms of life,
By His precious blood in mercy shed for thee,
Do not fear nor from the battle flee.

Ye shall be victorious, take and raise thy sword,
Shielded with the full armour of the Lord.
Be strong to battle, strive with all thy might,
By His love, conquer and win the fight.

Ye shall be victorious all the march of days,
For thy God is with thee, O sing His praise!
He shall never leave thee, and by His strong hand,
He shall lead thee unto the promised land.

REFRAIN
Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord! 
“Ye shall be victorious so never flee,”
For the Lord thy God, He sustaineth thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 172 首 - 你該得勝
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你該為得勝者，勿膽怯、張惶，
勇敢禦仇敵於戰場之上；
救主流出寶血所贖的子民，
不當懼怕，亦不當離戰場。

你該為得勝者，為真理奮鬥，
要穿戴全副軍裝制仇敵；
向前勇往，進迫掃蕩，莫遲疑，
仇敵敗退，仍儆醒常防備。

你該為得勝者，主與你同在，
祂是不改變全能大主宰；
每逢與敵交戰，你必得全勝，
直到在天上領受獎賞時。

副歌
勝仇敵，勝仇敵，仇敵全敗退；
因主有能力，你可戴永生冠冕在末日。

english_page_header: Hymn 173 - The Banner of the Cross
english_full_lyrics:
There’s a royal banner given for display
To the soldiers of the King;
As an ensign fair we lift it up today,
While as ransomed ones we sing.

Though the foe may rage and gather as the flood,
Let the standard be displayed;
And beneath its folds, as soldiers of the Lord,
For the truth be not dismayed!

Over land and sea, wherever man may dwell,
Make the glorious tidings known;
Of the crimson banner now the story tell,
While the Lord shall claim His own!

When the glory dawns— ’tis drawing very near,
It is hast’ning day by day;
Then before our King the foe shall disappear,
And the cross the world shall sway!

REFRAIN
Marching on, Marching on,
For Christ, count ev’rything but loss!
And to crown Him King, 
toil and sing ’Neath the banner of the cross!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 173 首 - 十架旌旗
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
基督眾軍兵，一齊昂首仰望，主旌旗今日高舉；
蒙救贖之人，皆當高聲歡唱，為真理整我師旅。

仇敵雖兇猛，似洪水齊衝至，主大旗仍當高擎；
主忠勇軍兵，齊奮勇勿餒志，為真理奮勇前行。

主兵速興起，去做工莫遲疑，遍地傳報主佳音；
告各處居民，主寶血勝仇敵，主救恩今已普臨。

榮耀日已近，主國快要臨世，黑暗權世將逃避；
當主顯現時，眾仇敵盡消滅，和平君統治全地。

副歌
向前行，向前行，為救世福音齊出征；
尊基督為王，齊歡唱，十架旗下頌主名。

english_page_header: Hymn 174 - The True Church Is Established
english_full_lyrics:
The True Church is established,
God is in His holy place;
Sing glory to Lord Jesus
Who forever reigns in grace.
The True Church is now raised up,
This the promise of the Lord;
Glory to His holy name,
Praise the Lord, Hallelujah!

The True Church is established
By the Holy Spirit’s power,
Sing glory to Lord Jesus
During this most blessed hour.
The True Church is now raised up,
Truth be her foundation firm;
Hallelujah, Praise His name,
Glory, sing Hallelujah!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 174 首 - 真教會必興起
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
真教會必然興起，因為是神的旨意；
歸榮耀給主耶穌，讚美主，哈利路亞！
真教會必然興起，因為是主的應許；
歸榮耀給主耶穌，讚美主，哈利路亞！

真教會必然興起，因有聖靈的能力；
歸榮耀給主耶穌，讚美主，哈利路亞！
真教會必然興起，因有真理的根基；
歸榮耀給主耶穌，讚美主，哈利路亞！

english_page_header: Hymn 175 - It Came upon the Midnight Clear
english_full_lyrics:
It came upon the midnight clear,
That glorious song of old,
From angels bending near the earth,
To touch their harps of gold:
“Peace on the earth, good will to men,”
From heav’n’s all-gracious King.
The world in solemn stillness lay,
To hear the angels sing.

Still thro’ the cloven skies they come,
With peaceful wings unfurled,
And still their heavenly music floats
O’er all the weary world:
Above its sad and lowly plains
They bend on hovering wing,
And ever o’er its Babel sounds
The blessed angels sing.

And ye, beneath life’s crushing load,
Whose forms are bending low,
Who toil along the climbing way
With painful steps and slow,
Look now! for glad and golden hours
Come swiftly on the wing:
O rest beside the weary road,
And hear the angels sing!

For lo! the days are hast’ning on,
By prophet-bards foretold,
When with the ever-circling years
Comes round the age of gold;
When peace shall over all the earth
Its ancient splendors fling,
And the whole world give back the song
Which now the angels sing.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 175 首 - 百折不回
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
忠誠愛人，更正教會，必遇許多艱險；
雖然仇敵圍攻四面，我仍奮勇進前。

遵從主命，傳道四方，如入狼群之羊；
如蛇靈巧，如鴿馴良，奔跑各地城鄉。

為道爭戰，站穩立場，愛人要具熱腸；
力行真道忘記背後，功成必得獎賞。

副歌
主賜聖靈大有能力，不怕千萬仇敵；
靠主領導，百折不回，真道傳到地極。

english_page_header: Hymn 176 - God Will Always Give Us the Victory
english_full_lyrics:
Fear ye not to fight for Him;
He will help us all to win,
God will always give us the vict’ry; 
’Gainst the might of Satan’s hand,
He will help us to withstand,
God will always give us the victory.

Vanquish ev’ry doubt and fear,
For the Saviour’s always near,
God will always give us the vict’ry;
Pray and read the Word each day, That
His will may with us stay,
God will always give us the victory.

Though the road be rough and long,
Let us raise our marching song,
God will always give us the vict’ry;
When the victory we win,
We will rest in heav’n with Him,
God will always give us the victory.

REFRAIN
God will always give us the victory, victory;
He will always give us the vict’ry.
Watching over us today, He is there to guide our way,
God will always give us the victory.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 176 首 - 常常有勝利
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
信徒軟弱易受害，與惡交戰多失敗，我倚靠主常常有勝利；
魔鬼火箭如下雨，有時暗射真困苦，我倚靠主常常有勝利。

雖然迷亂和懷疑，如同雲霧在交纏，我倚靠主常常有勝利；
時時祈禱讀聖經，我主旨意就認明，我倚靠主常常有勝利。

天路崎嶇真難行，為道爭辯如勇兵，我倚靠主常常有勝利；
等到得勝回天府，與主耶穌同居住，我倚靠主常常有勝利。

副歌
我倚靠主常常有勝利，勝利，我倚靠主常常有勝利；
得勝恩主常看顧，時刻伸手在扶助，我倚靠主常常有勝利。

english_page_header: Hymn 177 - Yield Not to Temptation
english_full_lyrics:
Yield not to temptation, For yielding is sin;
Each vict’ry will help you Some other to win;
Fight manfully onward, Dark passions subdue,
Look ever to Jesus, He will carry you through.

Shun evil companions, Bad language disdain,
God’s name hold in rev’rence, Nor take it in vain;
Be thoughtful and earnest, Kindhearted and true,
Look ever to Jesus, He will carry you through.

To him that o’ercometh God giveth a crown,
Thro’ faith we shall conquer, Tho’ often cast down;
He, Who is our Saviour, Our strength will renew,
Look ever to Jesus, He will carry you through.

REFRAIN
Ask the Saviour to help you,
Comfort, strengthen, and keep you;
He is willing to aid you,
He will carry you through.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 177 首 - 切莫順從誘惑
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
切莫順從誘惑，免得陷罪阱；遇惑奮勇戰勝，惡者計難行。
故當堅定信心，克惡慾邪情；時刻倚靠聖靈，祂能助你打贏。

遠避不良同伴，謹慎勿濫交；時刻親近救主，順從祂管教。
你若順服真神，魔鬼便逃跑；倚靠聖靈能力，不良嗜好全拋。

只要信心堅定，終必克艱難；創始成終救主，隨時賜平安。
神賜得勝能力，直跑向標竿；時刻倚靠聖靈，必得勝戴華冠。

副歌
懇求恩主常幫助、安慰、引導並保護；祂必樂意扶持你，使你腳步穩固。

english_page_header: Hymn 178 - Almost Persuaded
english_full_lyrics:
“Almost persuaded” now to believe; 
“Almost persuaded” Christ to receive;
Seems now some soul to say, "Go, Spirit, go Thy way,
Some more convenient day On Thee I’ll call."

“Almost persuaded,” come, come today, 
“Almost persuaded,” turn not away;
Jesus invites you here, Angels are ling’ring near,
Prayers rise from hearts so dear; O wand’rer, come!

“Almost persuaded,” harvest is past! 
“Almost persuaded,” doom comes at last! 
"Almost" cannot avail; "Almost" is but to fail!
Sad, sad that bitter wail - "Almost," but lost!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 178 首 - 趁還有今天
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
趁還有今天，棄絕罪途；趁還有今天，相信耶穌。
切莫自以為是，切莫輕忽主恩；趁著還有今天，求告救主。

趁還有今天，接受救主；趁還有今天，跟隨耶穌。
耶穌願你回來，同靈為你代求；趁著還有今天，接受主愛。

切莫再耽延，喪失救贖；切莫再耽延，快信耶穌。
主恩門將關閉，切莫錯失良機；趁著還有今天，歸向耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 179 - Precious Name
english_full_lyrics:
Take the name of Jesus with you,
Child of sorrow and of woe;
It will joy and comfort give you,
Take it then, where’er you go.

Take the name of Jesus ever
As a shield from ev’ry snare;
If temptations round you gather,
Breathe that holy name in prayer.

O the precious name of Jesus!
How it thrills our souls with joy,
When His loving arms receive us,
And his songs our tongues employ.

At the name of Jesus bowing,
Falling prostrate at His feet,
King of kings in heav’n we’ll crown Him,
When our journey is complete.

REFRAIN
Precious name, O how sweet!
Hope of earth and joy of heav’n;
Precious name, O how sweet!
Hope of earth and joy of heav’n.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 179 首 - 預備進天國
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
慕道朋友！容我勸你，應當悔改信耶穌；
信而受洗必然得救，從前罪惡主赦免。

主內弟兄！容我勸你，應當完全成聖潔；
倚靠聖靈治死情慾，儆醒禱告快預備。

世界諸君！容我勸你，應當回頭歸天鄉；
在這世界只為客旅，紅塵曠野不久長。

副歌
主耶穌快再來，地之望而天之樂；
新天國快實現，我要進去，快預備。

english_page_header: Hymn 180 - “Whosoever Will”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 180 首 - 永生門路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
凡人聽見福音，須當相信，天上來的喜信，關係天下人；
引到永生天國，只有此窄門，凡欲得救者當進。

凡人領受真理，須當遵行，放下一切重擔，越走越光明；
引到永生天國，只有此小路，凡欲得勝者當行。

耶穌警戒的話，切不可忘，許多寬門大路，引人到滅亡；
應當恆心忍耐，進入真門路，必能享福在天堂。

副歌
無論何人來，可以進天門，此乃真神賜給世人的大恩；
信而悔改受洗，聖靈必引領，凡欲得救者快進。

english_page_header: Hymn 181 - Onward I’ll Go
english_full_lyrics:
O Lord, keep me with Thee, Thy brightness to know,
And keep, Lord, Thy true light within me aglow.
O Lord, lead me onward, worldly cares I forsake,
To Thee, O my Saviour, this promise I’ll make.

Onward I’ll go, Yes, onward I’ll go!
Come doubts and fears, Lord, onward will I go;
Jesus, my Lord, blessed Saviour, with me stay;
Walk with me, Lord, Onward, Yes, I will go.

How steep is the pathway to heaven above,
I’ll leave sin behind me and walk in Thy love.
O Lord, help me follow, Thy disciple to be,
For I will but falter if Thou leavest me.

Many are the willing, who started the journey,
Without Thee, Lord Jesus, their footsteps to lead.
Others run the distance in the glow of God’s grace,
To them goes the vict’ry, the crown and the race.

REFRAIN
Onward I’ll go, Yes, onward I’ll go!
Come doubts and fears, Lord, onward will I go;
Jesus, my Lord, blessed Saviour, with me stay;
Walk with me, Lord, Onward, Yes, I will go.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 181 首 - 我必前進
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主啊！我已起程，在光明中行，白天大放光亮，照耀在我心；
我已經把世事邪情，全都撇清，我與主已起程，我必須前進。

我們都跟耶穌，同行此天路，除去不潔之物，得蒙主愛護；
捨棄我們所有，才配做主門徒，免得退縮不前，躊躇於半路。

有許多人起步，奔跑此天路，但不肯憑真光，領導他腳步；
有人向標竿跑，極努力不後顧，他們必得獎賞，永遠享天福。

副歌
我必前進，我必須前進；無論何攔阻，我必須前進。
我必和耶穌同行，行完路程；我必前進，耶穌！我必前進。

english_page_header: Hymn 182 - Onward Go!
english_full_lyrics:
Trusting in the Lord thy God,
Onward go! onward go!
Holding fast His promised word,
Onward go!
Ne’er deny His worthy Name,
Though it brings reproach and shame;
Spreading still His wondrous fame,
Onward go!

Has He called thee to the plough?
Onward go! onward go!
Night is coming, serve Him now;
Onward go!
Faith and love in service blend;
On His mighty arm depend;
Standing fast until the end,
Onward go!

Has He giv’n thee golden grain?
Onward go! onward go!
Sow, and thou shalt reap again;
Onward go!
To thy Master’s gate repair,
Watching be and waiting there;
He will hear and answer prayers;
Onward go!

Has He said the end is near?
Onward go! onward go!
Serving Him with holy fear,
Onward go!
Christ thy portion, Christ thy stay,
Heav’nly bread upon the way,
Leading on to glorious day;
Onward go!

In this little moment then,
Onward go! onward go!
In thy ways acknowledge Him;
Onward go!
Let His mind be found in thee:
Let His will thy pleasure be;
Thus in life and liberty,
Onward go!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 182 首 - 往前走
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
一心信靠我恩主，往前走，往前走，放下一切重擔負，往前走；
為主傳道要忠誠，引人信主得永生，發願為主做精兵，往前走。

一心信靠我恩主，往前走，往前走，往前走，不敢退步，往前走；
讀經、學道要勤苦，靈飲靈食皆充足，信心、盼望都堅固，往前走。

一心信靠我恩主，往前走，往前走，主在前邊引導路，往前走；
言語、行為效法主，殷勤勝過諸攔阻，努力奔跑多勞苦，往前走。

一心信靠我恩主，往前走，往前走，為主爭戰常鼓舞，往前走；
美滿工程未完畢，不達目的不止息，要進天國享福氣，往前走。

english_page_header: Hymn 183 - Come, Let us Anew Our Journey Purse
english_full_lyrics:
Come, let us anew our journey pursue,
Roll round with the year,
And never stand still till the Master appears.
His adorable will let us gladly fulfill,
And our talents improve,
By the patience of hope, and the labor of love,
By the patience of hope, and the labor of love.

Our life is a dream; our time, as a stream,
Glides swiftly away,
And the fugitive moment refuses to stay.
The arrow is flown, the moment is gone;
The millennial year
Rushes on to our view, and eternity’s here,
Rushes on to our view, and eternity’s here.

O that each in the day of His coming may say, 
“I have fought my way thro’;
I have finished the work Thou didst give me to do!”
O that each from his Lord may receive the glad word, 
“Well and faithfully done!
Enter into my joy, and sit down on my throne!
Enter into my joy, and sit down on my throne!”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 183 首 - 勇往直前
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
眾弟兄！都儆醒，起身走你路程，
服事主要盡忠，總不要暫停工，到救主臨空中；
主聖名要尊敬，主旨意要遵行，望各人守本分。
存敬畏事奉神，以和平親愛人，
存敬畏事奉神，以和平親愛人。

這世界不長久，一切事如水流，
雖一刻不止住，如梭穿，如電閃，一轉眼就過去；
晝既來，往後退，夜又起，向前追，真容易又一年！
這世代如轉輪，新天地已近邊，
這世代如轉輪，新天地已近邊。

願大家在那日，能向前對主說：
「我一路打勝仗，你託我那些事，都成功，都停當。」
願各人從救主，能聽見這言語：「真善哉我良僕！
你所為忠且義，可進來享我福！」
你所為忠且義，可進來享我福！

english_page_header: Hymn 184 - Grace! ’Tis a Charming Sound
english_full_lyrics:
Grace! ’tis a charming sound,
Harmonious to mine ear;
Heav’n with the echo shall resound,
And all the earth shall hear.

Grace first contrived the way
To save rebellious man;
And all the steps that grace display
Which drew the wondrous plan.

Grace led my roving feet
To tread the heav’nly road;
And new supplies each hour I meet,
While pressing on to God.

Grace all the work shall crown,
Thro’ everlasting days;
It lays in heav’n the topmost stone,
And well deserves the praise.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 184 首 - 奔跑天路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
走過深谷、高山，但我並不孤單；
倚靠天父同在、眷顧，我心滿有平安。

世上多有苦難，魔鬼時時試探；
倚靠救主施恩、幫助，我必得勝、騰歡。

天路本非康莊，高低不平、漫長；
倚靠聖靈時刻帶領，我必能到天堂。

english_page_header: Hymn 185 - Think and Reflect
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 185 首 - 思慕天家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
想，我思想，真神預備好地方；
認罪悔改，去舊更新，盼望到天堂。
為何寡慾？為何清心？想，仔細想；
天堂聖潔，天堂明亮，福氣無疆！
我今日努力，要歸我家鄉。

想，我思想，耶穌救到好地方；
信心堅固，討主喜悅，盼望到天堂。
為何克己？為何從主？想，仔細想；
天堂高大，天堂寬闊，快樂無疆！
我今日奮勇，要歸我家鄉。

想，我思想，聖靈領到好地方；
謹守命令，蒙主寵愛，盼望到天堂。
為何讀經？為何祈禱？想，仔細想；
天堂華麗，天堂輝煌，榮耀無疆！
我今日直奔，要歸我家鄉。

english_page_header: Hymn 186 - Heaven Is My Home
english_full_lyrics:
Once a lost soul was I, Caught in earthly toils and cares,
Felt such joy in this world, Slave to sin’s dread sway;
Then the Lord Jesus came, Freed me with His loving grace,
Promised me He would lead me to blessed heav’n.

Jesus Christ rescued me, In His mercy I am bless’d, 
Sent His Spirit to earth, Comforter and Guide;
In His Word I’m made whole, On His promise I will stand,
He’ll guide me to my home, up in blessed heav’n.

Once a lost soul was I On the pathway rough and steep,
But through God’s mighty hand, He showed me the way;
Look not back, onward strive, Ever working in His strength 
’Til we reach, safe at last, home in blessed heav’n.

REFRAIN
Heaven is my home, Heaven is my home,
My home’s not of this world,
Heaven is my home.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 186 首 - 我家乃在天
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我昔日心貪愛，屬世千百福，甘行入迷途中，做罪惡奴僕；
幸耶穌來釋放，美哉，恩無邊！引導我回家鄉，我家乃在天。

蒙耶穌拯救我，賞賜大恩惠，差聖靈感化我，幫助又安慰；
主教訓最純全，應許也確堅，帶領我回家鄉，我家乃在天。

雖暫在這曠野，路途很難行，但靠主大能手，歡然奔天城；
忘背後，望標竿，努力直向前，今快到我家鄉，我家乃在天。

副歌
我家乃在天，我家乃在天，暫居此為客旅，我家乃在天。

english_page_header: Hymn 187 - In the Sweet By and By
english_full_lyrics:
There’s a land that is fairer than day,
And by faith we can see it afar;
For the Father waits over the way
To prepare us a dwelling place there.

We shall sing on that beautiful shore
The melodious songs of the blest,
And our spirits shall sorrow no more,
Not a sigh for the blessing of rest.

To our bountiful Father above,
We will offer the tribute of praise
For the glorious gift of His love
And the blessings that hallow our days.

REFRAIN
In the sweet by and by,
We shall meet on that beautiful shore;
In the sweet by and by,
We shall meet on that beautiful shore.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 187 首 - 來到美地
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
有一地比日中更光彩，雖遙遠，我因信望得見；
我天父在那地常等待，早為我備安宅於裡面。

到美地，我必隨眾聖徒唱新歌，聲和諧，頌讚主；
心快樂，得永遠之生命，再無懼，也無憂，而無苦。

我聖父在高天，極慈愛，將至尊獨生子遣於世；
開福源，一直流到萬代，我終身要讚美主恩惠。

副歌
到日期，我樂意，同聖徒來聚會，在美地；
到日期，我樂意，同聖徒來聚會，在美地。

english_page_header: Hymn 188 - Just As I Am, Thine Own to Be
english_full_lyrics:
Just as I am, Thine own to be,
Friend of the young, who lovest me,
To consecrate myself to Thee,
O Jesus Christ, I come.

In the glad morning of my day,
My life to give, my vows to pay,
With no reserve and no delay,
With all my heart I come.

I would live ever in the light,
I would work ever for the right,
I would serve Thee with all my might,
Therefore, to Thee I come.

Just as I am, young, strong, and free,
To be the best that I can be
For truth, and righteousness, and Thee,
Lord of my life, I come.

REFRAIN
Just as I am, Thine own to be,
Friend of the young, who lovest me,
To consecrate myself to Thee,
O Jesus Christ, I come.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 188 首 - 榮歸天家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
古有三人心最堅剛，扔在火中沒有損傷；
至終三人歸在何方？必歸應許天鄉。

但以理因祈禱如常，扔於獅洞命不喪亡；
主的先知今在何方？等歸應許天鄉。

以利亞遇危險、飢荒，危時、飢時仍得平康；
乘著旋風升上何方？將歸應許天鄉。

耶穌恩主贖罪羔羊，死裡復活，榮耀顯揚；
駕著雲彩升入高天，為我預備天鄉。

副歌
等不多時復活見祂，等不多時變化見祂；
相見快樂，永不離別，同住榮美天鄉。

english_page_header: Hymn 189 - Beulah Land
english_full_lyrics:
I’ve reached the land of corn and wine,
And all its riches freely mine;
Here shines undimmed one blissful day,
For all my night has passed away.

My Saviour comes and walks with me,
And sweet communion here have we;
He gently leads me by His hand,
For this is heaven’s borderland.

A sweet perfume upon the breeze,
Is borne from ever vernal trees;
And flow’rs that never fading grow
Where streams of life forever flow.

The zephyrs seem to float to me,
Sweet sounds of heaven’s melody;
As angels with the white-robed throng,
Join in the sweet redemption song.

REFRAIN
O Beulah Land, sweet Beulah Land,
As on thy highest mount I stand;
I look away across the sea,
Where mansions are prepared for me,
And view the shining glory shore,
My heav’n, my home forevermore!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 189 首 - 天城美景
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
樂哉，我至得救福地！五穀、百果一齊全備；
真神榮光普照四處，黑暗消滅，苦楚除去。

救主永遠與我為伴，勝過良朋相親不斷；
大家攜手，親愛無間，永遠聚首，歡樂無限。

樹木不枯，花卉不殘，百鳥歌唱，活水潺潺；
歌唱聲音，此落彼起，天使、聖徒合唱不已。

副歌
天堂樂地，真神城邑，我得進去，歡樂無比；
生命樹上，滿結果子，永遠住處，主所預備；
華美天城，榮耀天國，主賜給我享真福氣。

english_page_header: Hymn 190 - There Is a Happy Land
english_full_lyrics:
There is a happy land,
Far, far away,
Where saints in glory stand,
Bright, bright as day;
O how they sweetly sing, 
“Worthy is our Saviour King!”
Loud let His praises ring,
Praise, praise for aye!

Those with our Lord so dear,
Live evermore,
Peace find, no ill to fear,
No worries sore;
No sin, no never there,
Free from Satan’s evil snare,
Joined with the angels fair,
Safe in the fold.

Come to that happy land,
Come, come away;
Why will you doubting stand?
Why still delay?
Oh, we shall happy be,
When from sin and sorrow free,
Lord, we shall dwell with Thee,
Blest evermore.

Bright in that happy land,
Beams ev’ry eye;
Kept by a Father’s hand,
Love cannot die.
On, then to glory run;
Be a crown and kingdom won;
And, bright above the sun,
Reign evermore.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 190 首 - 天國的人
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天國的人不困，永遠康強，靈體榮耀、活潑，如星發光；
世人勞力出汗，挑著重擔苦流浪，天國人不困倦，永遠康強。

天國的人不哭，永遠歡顏，眼淚蒙神擦去，轉悲為歡；
世人常遇苦難，誰不哀哭淚潸潸？天國人樂無量，永遠歡顏。

天國的人不病，永遠健壯，永不需用醫藥，平安無盡；
世上許多疾患，危害幸福與生命，天國人無病痛，永遠健壯。

天國的人不死，長生不老，生命永遠存活，無限歲數；
世人必走死路，老少都必歸墳墓，天國人永青春，長生不老。

english_page_header: Hymn 191 - I’m But a Stranger Here
english_full_lyrics:
I’m but a stranger here,
Heav’n is my home;
Earth is a desert drear,
Heav’n is my home.
Danger and sorrow stand
Round me on ev’ry hand;
Heav’n is my Fatherland,
Heav’n is my home.

What though the tempest rage,
Heav’n is my home;
Short is my pilgrimage,
Heav’n is my home.
Time’s cold and wint’ry blast
Soon shall be overpast,
I shall reach home at last,
Heav’n is my home.

There at my Saviour’s side,
Heav’n is my home;
I shall be glorified,
Heav’n is my home.
There are the good and blest,
Those I love most and best,
There, too, I soon shall rest,
Heav’n is my home.

Therefore I murmur not,
Heav’n is my home;
Whate’er my earthly lot,
Heav’n is my home.
And I shall surely stand
There at my Lord’s right hand,
Heav’n is my Fatherland,
Heav’n is my home.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 191 首 - 我家在天
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我今暫為客旅，我家在天，
此世無處安居，我家在天；
飄流過海、登山，東、西、南、北循環，
福氣不在世間，福氣在天。

世上多有苦難，我家在天，
萬般憂慮、困苦，我家在天；
冷熱、危險、勞碌，心裡悲傷無已，
世上沒有好處，好處在天。

經過路程遙遠，我家在天，
世情常覺冷淡，我家在天；
打算將有好處，又遇煎熬地步，
朋友不能相助，相助在天。

年邁手握空拳，我家在天，
時刻想念回鄉，我家在天；
世事不堪回想，只有向前瞻望，
現在將近家鄉，家鄉在天。

english_page_header: Hymn 192 - The Way of the Cross Leads Home
english_full_lyrics:
I must needs go home by the way of the cross,
There’s no other way but this;
I shall ne’er get sight of the gates of light,
If the way of the cross I miss.

I must needs go on in the blood sprinkled way,
The path that the Saviour trod,
If I ever climb to the heights sublime,
Where the soul is at home with God.

The way of the cross leads home,
The way of the cross leads home;
It is sweet to know as I onward go,
The way of the cross leads home.

Then I bid farewell to the way of the world,
To walk in it nevermore;
For my Lord says “Come,” and I seek my home,
Where He waits at the open door.

The way of the cross leads home,
The way of the cross leads home;
It is sweet to know as I onward go,
The way of the cross leads home.

REFRAIN
The way of the cross leads home,
The way of the cross leads home;
It is sweet to know as I onward go,
The way of the cross leads home.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 192 首 - 十架領路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我要回天家，十字架領天路，此外方法皆錯誤；
倘若失此路，向左道而奔，必不能看見榮光門。

我要回天家，灑血處是路徑，此路耶穌已先行；
竭盡我心力，登到至高處，我靈魂永與主同住。

我要回天家，棄世上諸虛華，今後永不再走差；
耶穌施憐憫，命我到祂前，已等候天家門外邊。

副歌
十架領導我回家，十架領導我回家；
常存大盼望，歡然奔天家，十架領導我回家。

english_page_header: Hymn 193 - We’re Bound for the Land of the Pure
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 193 首 - 榮耀天國
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我現在要奔，那個永生的福地，是真神的城邑，是義人家宅；
走錯路的人，請問：「你們可願意與我們同去，到那榮耀天國？」

在那個福地，永無憂愁，無歎息，無傷心的事情，也沒有驚慌；
凡負重擔者，你們要快定主意，與我們同去，到那榮耀天國。

在天國住處，乃是救主所預備，用精金、寶石造，牆垣也寶貴；
等耶穌降臨，惟聖徒得居城內，你實在當去，到那榮耀天國。

副歌
「去不去？去不去？去不去？去不去？」
請問：「去不去？到那榮耀天國？」

english_page_header: Hymn 194 - We’ll Work Till Jesus Comes
english_full_lyrics:
O land of rest, for thee I sigh!
When will the moment come
When I shall lay my armor by
And dwell in peace at home?

To Jesus Christ I fled for rest;
He bade me cease to roam,
And lean for comfort on His breast
Till He conducts me home.

I sought at once my Saviour’s side,
No more my steps to roam:
With Him I’ll brave death’s chilling tide,
And reach my heav’nly home.

REFRAIN
We’ll work till Jesus comes,
We’ll work till Jesus comes,
We’ll work till Jesus comes,
And we’ll be gathered home.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 194 首 - 安息在天家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主安息地，我願進入，那美地樂無涯；
幾時卸下所挑之擔，得歇息在天家？

末日將近，世界危險，苦難到處增加；
在世寄居無法安身，天堂才是我家。

我今已蒙耶穌恩召，跟主走總不差；
主已應許永遠安息，竭力進入天家。

副歌
安息，在我天家安息；在我天家安息，在我天家享受安息無涯。

english_page_header: Hymn 195 - A Place in His Kingdom
english_full_lyrics:
Up to God’s kingdom may He take me
To see His glorious promised land,
Those who dwell there are ever happy,
They rejoice and pass the day in song;
Hark, the song of the saints in His kingdom,
Praising God for His triumph o’er sin,
Golden harps before Him they are playing
As they into His peace enter in.

Saints gazed upon that Holy City,
Hoping for the eternal rest,
If I my all will give in service,
I may enter in that peace so bless’d;
Oh, the joyful ones saved thro’ His mercy,
O the city of God shining bright,
Soon that city I’ll see brightly gleaming,
And the saints in the grace of the Lord.

Onward I march, and will not tarry,
Fearless in triumph over death;
Jesus my Lord is ever with me,
In His peace He ever doth me bless;
Soon I’ll stand on the bright, glorious shoreline,
Hear melodious songs of delight,
In that heavenly place of rejoicing,
I will live in God’s glorious light.

REFRAIN
If you hope for a place in His kingdom,
Hope to sing, with His saints, songs of praise;
Keep His Word, ever loyal and fearless,
And your footsteps will lead to His grace.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 195 首 - 羨慕福地
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
升起我心遊覽於天國，看主所應許佳美地，
榮耀之地其民最安樂，聽其樂音知其人歡喜；
留心聽聖徒唱詩在樂園，讚美主，因勝過諸困難，
彈金琴立在主寶座台前，得享永福長久的平安。

基督聖徒舉目望天城，想主所預備大福氣，
盡忠事主到死不變更，後必進去，與主同歇息；
美哉，城，真神光照的地方！樂哉，民，耶穌救贖的人！
不久我也必見主的榮光，在那邊與聖徒永相親。

努力向前一路不耽擱，死之冷河不足我慮，
耶穌我主日夜看顧我，主賜平安，誰能叫我懼？
快要到那邊光明的岸上，見天使和同靈在唱詩，
永在那榮耀快樂的地方，從樂園至永世不分離。

副歌
你若要到那永生的地方，同眾聖常讚美主耶穌，
在世上必聽從主的話語，一步一步跟主走天路。

english_page_header: Hymn 196 - Dwelling in Beulah Land
english_full_lyrics:
Far away the noise of strife
upon my ear is falling,
Then I know the sins of earth
beset on ev’ry hand.
Doubt and fear and things of earth
in vain to me are calling,
None of these shall move me
from Beulah Land.

Far below the storm of doubt
upon the world is beating,
Sons of men in battle long
the enemy withstand.
Safe am I within the castle
of God’s Word retreating,
Nothing then can reach me — 
’tis Beulah Land.

Let the stormy breezes blow,
their cry cannot alarm me;
I am safely sheltered here,
protected by God’s hand.
Here the sun is always shining,
here there’s naught can harm me,
I am safe forever in Beulah Land.

Viewing here the works of God,
I sink in contemplation,
Hearing now His blessed voice,
I see the way He planned.
Dwelling in the Spirit,
here I learn of full salvation,
Gladly will I tarry in Beulah Land.

REFRAIN
I’m living on the mountain,
underneath a cloudless sky,
I’m drinking at the fountain
that never shall run dry;
O yes, I’m feasting on the manna
from a bountiful supply,
For I am dwelling in Beulah Land.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 196 首 - 榮美福地
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
前在埃及為罪奴僕，備嘗罪中苦味，
鐵爐火熱，重軛難擔，魔力殊可畏！
時常歎息，欲脫不能，黑暗權勢轄制，
可憐從來未知榮美福地。

賴羔羊血得出埃及，前面紅海分開，
茫茫曠野，迷我眼目，環境可怕哉！
信心軟弱，時發怨言，內外仇敵攻來，
飄流無定，未進榮美福地。

約但河邊迦南美地，我心羨慕已久，
因信渡河，謹遵主命，河水竟倒流！
欣登彼岸，美妙樂土，時常流奶與蜜，
哈利路亞，樂居榮美福地！

副歌
今我居錫安高山，有真神榮光燦爛，
我飲於滾滾活泉，此泉長流不息；
有隱藏嗎哪為我筵席，取之無窮，用不竭。
樂哉，今我居榮美福地！

english_page_header: Hymn 197 - Nor Silver Nor Gold
english_full_lyrics:
Nor silver nor gold hath obtained my redemption,
Nor riches of earth could have saved my poor soul;
The blood of the cross is my only foundation,
The death of my Savior now maketh me whole.

Nor silver nor gold hath obtained my redemption,
The guilt of my conscience too heavy had grown;
The blood of the cross is my only foundation,
The death of my Savior could only atone.

Nor silver nor gold hath obtained my redemption,
The holy commandment forbade me draw near;
The blood of the cross is my only foundation,
The death of my Savior removeth my fear.

Nor silver nor gold hath obtained my redemption,
The way into heaven could not thus be bought;
The blood of the cross is my only foundation,
The death of my Savior redemption hath wrought.

REFRAIN
I am redeemed, but not with silver;
I am bought, but not with gold;
Bought with a price— the blood of Jesus,
Precious price of love untold.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 197 首 - 非金也非銀
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
非金也非銀能使我得蒙救贖，
非靠世上財寶能救我靈魂，
十架主寶血是得救唯一根源，
因我救主捨身，使我得救恩。

非金也非銀能使我得蒙救贖，
我罪惡極深重，良心不安穩，
十架主寶血是得救唯一根源，
因我救主捨身，我罪得潔淨。

非金也非銀能使我得蒙救贖，
非因遵行律法能稱義、蒙恩，
十架主寶血是得救唯一根源，
因我救主捨身，使我得成聖。

非金也非銀能使我得蒙救贖，
進天國的道路，靠耶穌基督，
十架主寶血是得救唯一根源，
因我救主捨身，救贖已成真。

副歌
我蒙救贖並不靠金銀。
我蒙贖不靠金銀，乃靠耶穌，
祂大能寶血，奇妙大愛難述盡。

english_page_header: Hymn 198 - Lead Me, Saviour
english_full_lyrics:
Saviour, lead me, lest I stray,
Gently lead me all the way;
I am safe when by Thy side,
I would in Thy love abide.

Thou, the Refuge of my soul
When life’s stormy billows roll,
I am safe when Thou art nigh,
On Thy mercy I rely.

Saviour, lead me, till at last,
When the storm of life is past,
I shall reach the land of day,
Where all tears are wiped away.

REFRAIN
Lead me, lead me,
Saviour, lead me, lest I stray;
Gently down the stream of time,
Lead me, Saviour, all the way.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 198 首 - 靠主領回天家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我心倚靠主耶穌，渡過浮生航海路；
無論日夜都平安，施恩帶往光明岸。

風浪澎湃多險阻，滿天黑雲遮前途；
我願前進不止步，一路求主來看顧

神光普照榮美地，春光明媚景華麗；
願主耶穌賜我力，走進福地享安息。

副歌
主啊！主啊！世上風浪真可怕！
求祢領我不走差，平安直到我天家。

english_page_header: Hymn 199 - O They Tell Me of a Home
english_full_lyrics:
O they tell me of a home far beyond the skies,
O they tell me of a home far away;
O they tell me of a home where no storm clouds rise,
O they tell me of an unclouded day.

O they tell me of a home where my friends have gone,
O they tell me of a home far away;
Where the tree of life in eternal bloom
Sheds its fragrance thro’ the unclouded day.

O they tell me that He smiles on His children there,
And His smile drives their sorrows all away;
And they tell me that no tears ever come again
In that lovely land of unclouded day.

REFRAIN
O the land of cloudless day,
O the land of an unclouded day;
O they tell me of a home where no storm clouds rise,
O they tell me of an unclouded day.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 199 首 - 天上快樂家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天上那邊的家鄉，我心最喜愛，就是救主所預備快樂宅；
在那福地無死亡，也沒有驚慌，永遠生活在神前，享平康。

天上那邊的家鄉，景緻最美麗，花卉、百果都全備，樂無比；
蒙主救贖眾聖徒所住的天城，充滿讚美主歌聲，永不停。

天上那邊的家鄉，耶穌為君王，坐在寶座穿白衣，永輝煌；
天使、聖徒齊敬拜，頌讚主尊榮，蒙恩與主同做王，在天堂。

副歌
永遠快樂的國度，是我天家，我心羨慕；
那裡有神光照耀，不用日月照；
並無黑夜與幽冥，全白晝。

english_page_header: Hymn 200 - One Sweetly Solemn Thought
english_full_lyrics:
One sweetly solemn thought
Comes to me o’er and o’er;
I’m nearer home today, today,
Than I have been before.

Nearer my Father’s house,
Where many mansions be;
Nearer the great white throne today,
Nearer the crystal sea.

Nearer the bound of life,
Where burdens are laid down;
Nearer to leave the cross today,
And nearer to the crown.

Be near me when my feet
Are slipping o’er the brink;
For I am nearer home today,
Perhaps, than now I think.

REFRAIN
Nearer my home,
Nearer my home,
Nearer my home today, today,
Than I have been before.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 200 首 - 思慕天鄉
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
時刻切慕、思想，天上更美家鄉；
許多住處，天父預備，何等華美、輝煌！

跟主背負十架，不久就能放下；
公義冠冕，主必親贈，歡唱：「哈利路亞！」

宛如朝露人生，陽光照下消形；
塵世雖有危險風波，轉眼即得安寧。

經過幽谷昏冥，即見福地光明；
願父施恩保護、引領，帶我直到天城。

副歌
天上家鄉，天上家鄉，心所戀慕，
不停盼望；現在將近家鄉。

english_page_header: Hymn 201 - O That Will Be Glory
english_full_lyrics:
When all my labors and trials are o’er,
And I am safe on that beautiful shore,
Just to be near the dear Lord I adore,
Will thro’ the ages be glory for me.

When, by the gift of His infinite grace,
I am accorded in heaven a place,
Just to be there and to look on His face,
Will thro’ the ages be glory for me.

Friends will be there I have loved long ago;
Joy like a river around me will flow;
Yet just a smile from my Saviour, I know,
Will thro’ the ages be glory for me.

REFRAIN
O that will be glory for me,
Glory for me, glory for me,
When by His grace I shall look on His face,
That will be glory, be glory for me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 201 首 - 永遠的榮耀
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
從前許多勞碌、苦楚不見，我必能進天堂，福氣齊全；
我住在敬愛的救主身邊，永遠為我榮耀，因主垂憐。

我今在世界為主道發光，將來必得賞賜進入天堂；
每日看見恩主面貌慈祥，這就是我榮耀，永久盼望。

在那裡與敬愛親友會面，各人都戴主賜冠冕輝煌；
常在主寶座周圍齊歡唱，感頌主賜榮耀，永遠無疆。

副歌
永遠榮耀，永遠榮耀，恩主賞賜永遠榮耀；
蒙主愛憐憫我，聖靈引導，賜給我永遠極重的榮耀。

english_page_header: Hymn 202 - O So Bright
english_full_lyrics:
Above the sky there is a sphere,
O so bright, O so bright.
No sin or sorrow lurks up there,
O so bright, O so bright.
There angels clothed in glory throng,
In heav’nly halls make sound and song,
And sweetest music echoes long,
O so bright, O so bright.

The air of heav’n is purest light,
O what joy, O what joy.
No sobs are heard, no more laments,
O what joy, O what joy.
Water of life for all is poured,
What joy to gather with the Lord,
In Zion He’s by all adored, O what joy,
O what joy.

Although we all have sinned and strayed,
He can save, He can save.
Though peace is lost and prize mislaid,
He can save, He can save.
We can recover purity,
Our crown and our felicity,
In Paradise regained fore’er,
He can save, He can save.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 202 首 - 天上安樂處
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天上有一安樂所在，福無比，福無比，
那裡無罪，那裡無害，福無比，福無比；
香風吹來各樣美音，榮耀天使笑語欣欣，
天堂滿有金瑟、玉琴，福無比，福無比。

絕無愁雲遮蔽穹蒼，快樂地，快樂地，
並無流淚哭泣、悲傷，快樂地，快樂地；
蒙主鴻恩永不改變，聖徒得見恩主聖面，
普照天界榮光顯現，快樂地，快樂地。

父母、兄弟、親戚、朋友！來信主，來信主，
奔走天路應當努力，來信主，來信主；
天堂樂音和諧、快樂，天使、天軍吹彈合奏，
天國子民永遠享福，來信主，來信主。

english_page_header: Hymn 203 - O Lovely Lily
english_full_lyrics:
Flow’r of the valley, lily so white,
Tended by God as His own delight;
Though thorns encircle, and night draws near,
Shine on forever, blossom without fear.

Wild in the valley, sown ’cross the fields,
Never to toil under His shield;
Solomon’s treasures can not compare
To your white splendor, glorious and fair.

Lovely the springtime, precious the view,
White lilied hilltops, blooming anew;
In time we’ll follow, our Lord so true,
Ascend in glory, with our lives renewed.

REFRAIN
O lovely lily, pure and divine!
Symbol of life, the promise of Thine.
How deep the Saviour’s love to us ever;
Through His Word, glory and honor we’ll find.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 203 首 - 百合花
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
谷中百合花鮮艷、芬芳，被荊棘包圍，毫無損傷；
昔日，主耶穌復活榮光，照耀至永遠，勝過死亡。

野地百合花，神使長大，它也不勞苦，也不紡紗；
昔日，所羅門雖極榮華，他所穿、所戴，不如這花。

春到、百合花山野遍開，無限之生命，顯明出來；
時到，眾聖徒都要復活、改變而上升，與主同在。

副歌
可愛百合花，聖潔無瑕，信徒當體會救主的話；
藉主之大能，復活回天家，得尊貴、榮耀，快樂無涯。

english_page_header: Hymn 204 - Through the Night of Doubt and Sorrow
english_full_lyrics:
Thro’ the night of doubt and sorrow
Onward goes the pilgrim band,
Singing songs of expectation,
Marching to the promised land;
Clear before us thro’ the darkness,
Gleams and burns the guiding light,
Brother clasps the hand of brother,
Stepping fearless thro’ the night.

One the light of God’s own presence
O’er His ransomed people shed,
Chasing far the gloom and terror,
Bright’ning all the path we tread;
One the object of our journey,
One the faith which never tires,
One the earnest looking forward,
One the hope our God inspires.

One the strain that lips of thousands
Lift as from the heart of one!
One the conflict, one the peril,
One the march in God begun;
One the gladness of rejoicing,
On the far eternal shore,
Where the one almighty Father,
Reigns in love forevermore.

Onward, therefore, pilgrim brothers,
Onward, with the cross our aid,
Bear its shame and fight its battle,
Till we rest beneath its shade;
Soon shall come the great awaking,
Soon the rending of the tomb,
Then the scatt’ring of all shadows,
And the end of toil and gloom.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 204 首 - 因信有盼望
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
基督徒因信有盼望，是榮耀、活潑、堅強，
因主已從死裡復活，使我重生福無量；
等候末日身體得贖，復活改變有榮光，
靠主大能力滅死亡，像主榮體進天堂。

基督徒因信有盼望，不只在今生現場，
在世為客旅原不長，窮通苦樂本無常；
最大盼望等主再來，迎接我們回天鄉，
基業存天上不朽壞，我必享受福無疆。

基督徒因信有盼望，新天、新地神所創，
在世諸多勞苦、嘆息，又有病患與災荒；
滿心盼望見我恩主，擦去我眼淚汪汪，
主的應許信實不變，我所願望必得償。

english_page_header: Hymn 205 - Glorious Things of Thee Are Spoken
english_full_lyrics:
Glorious things of thee are spoken,
Zion, city of our God;
He, whose word cannot be broken,
Formed thee for His own abode: 
On the Rock of Ages founded,
What can shake thy sure repose?
With salvation’s walls surrounded,
Thou may’st smile at all thy foes.

See, the streams of living waters,
Springing from eternal love,
Well supply thy sons and daughters,
And all fear of want remove:
Who can faint, while such a river
Ever flows their thirst assuage?
Grace which, like the Lord, the giver,
Never fails from age to age.

Round each habitation hov’ring,
See the cloud and fire appear
For a glory and a cov’ring,
Showing that the Lord is near;
Blest inhabitants of Zion,
Washed in the Redeemer’s blood;
Jesus, whom their souls rely on,
Makes them kings and priests to God.

Saviour, if of Zion’s city,
I, through grace, a member am,
Let the world deride or pity,
I will glory in Thy Name;
Fading is the worldling’s pleasure,
All his boasted pomp and show;
Solid joys and lasting treasure
None but Zion’s children know.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 205 首 - 在基督裡必復活
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主為我們罪人代死，身體埋葬墳墓裡，
三天清晨復活、改變，做我們初熟果子；
奇妙救主活活顯現，給使徒手摸、目視，
四十天講論神國事，到被接升天為止。

死裡復活，權能無比，偉大救恩傳遐邇，
信主之人都在主裡，靈魂重生永不死；
身體雖死，離世歸土，末日復活墓中起，
立刻改變，成為靈體，被提見主大歡喜。

末次號筒大聲貫耳，我主發令死人起，
信徒復活按著次序，在主台前承恩旨；
必朽之身變成不朽，必死之體竟不死，
榮耀、強壯、光輝、聖潔，堪與天使相媲美。

信徒在世，身為活祭，聖潔獻上主所喜，
寶血所洗，聖靈所住，身上帶著主印記；
主必救贖，不棄我身，化賤為榮似主體，
使徒所傳、聖經所示，我們深信而不疑。

english_page_header: Hymn 206 - Saved by Grace
english_full_lyrics:
Some day the silver cord will break,
And I no more as now shall sing;
But, oh, the joy when I shall wake
Within the palace of the King!

Some day my earthly house will fall,
I cannot tell how soon ’twill be;
But this I know— my All in All
Has now a place in heav’n for me.

Some day, when fades the golden sun
Beneath the rosy-tinted west,
My blessed Lord will say, “Well done!”
And I shall enter into rest.

Some day: till then I’ll watch and wait,
My lamp all trimmed and burning bright,
That when my Saviour opes the gate,
My soul to Him may take its flight.

REFRAIN
And I shall see Him face to face,
And tell the story— Saved by grace;
And I shall see Him face to face,
And tell the story— Saved by grace.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 206 首 - 我必親見主面
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
靠主救我脫離羅網，前時苦味永不再嘗；
靈魂安息，永無憂懼，在父家中歡喜頌揚。

地上帳棚將要破殘，不知何時就臨眼前；
永遠住處，救主預備，乃在天家享福完全。

世上物質終必敗壞，美好光景轉眼就過；
主已應許忠心眾僕，與衪同享永遠安樂。

我今務要儆醒等待，添油、剔燈望主快來；
那時蒙主擦去眼淚，在衪足前感謝、跪拜。

副歌
我必在天親見主面，永遠歌唱救我恩典；
我必在天親見主面，永遠歌唱救我恩典。

english_page_header: Hymn 207 - I Know Not the Hour
english_full_lyrics:
I know not the hour when my Lord will come
To take me away to His own dear home;
But I know that His presence will lighten the gloom,
And that will be glory for me.

I know not the song that the angels sing,
I know not the sound of the harps’ glad ring;
But I know there’ll be mention of Jesus our King,
And that will be music for me.

I know not the form of my mansion fair,
I know not the name that I then shall bear;
But I know that my Saviour will welcome me there,
And that will be heaven for me.

REFRAIN
And that will be glory for me,
And that will be glory for me;
But I know that His presence will lighten the gloom,
And that will be glory for me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 207 首 - 思念主來
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
未知我恩主幾時將來臨，要帶我回去至好的天庭？
但知道主來時穿上榮耀身體，那福樂實在夠滿意。

未知眾天使唱哪首詩篇？他們所彈奏是哪首妙弦？
但知道基督是他們頌讚主題，那歌聲實在夠滿意。

未知天上家型式多堂皇？未知那新名意義多深長？
但知道主在那邊為我備安宅，那地方實在夠滿意。

副歌
那福樂實在夠滿意，那福樂實在夠滿意；
但知道主在那裡有榮光照耀，那福樂實在夠滿意。

english_page_header: Hymn 208 - When the Roll Is Called Up Yonder
english_full_lyrics:
When the trumpet of the Lord shall sound,
and time shall be no more,
And the morning breaks, eternal, bright and fair;
When the saved of earth shall gather over
on the other shore,
And the roll is called up yonder I’ll be there.

On that bright and cloudless morning
when the dead in Christ shall rise,
And the glory of His resurrection share;
When His chosen ones shall gather to their
home beyond the skies,
And the roll is called up yonder I’ll be there.

Let us labor for the Master from the
dawn till setting sun,
Let us talk of all His wondrous love and care;
Then when all of life is over and our
work on earth is done,
And the roll is called up yonder I’ll be there.

REFRAIN
When the roll is called up yonder,
When the roll is called up yonder,
When the roll is called up yonder,
When the roll is called up yonder I’ll be there.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 208 首 - 聖徒被提
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在耶穌再臨之日，天使必大聲吹號筒，那時主極榮耀顯現在天空；
凡世上得救的人，必從四方聚集相會。在那邊點名，我亦必在其中。

凡在主內睡了的人，身體都必先復甦，活著還存留的信徒也改變；
一同被提到雲裡，在空中與主齊相逢。在那邊點名，我亦必在其中。

我們應當為主從早到晚，殷勤做聖工，到處傳揚耶穌奇妙的恩功；
多多引人得救；那時得大賞賜，樂無窮。在那邊點名，我亦必在其中。

副歌
在那邊點名的時候，在那邊點名的時候，
在那邊點名的時候；在那邊點名，我亦必在其中。

english_page_header: Hymn 209 - Face to Face with Christ, My Saviour
english_full_lyrics:
Face to face with Christ, my Saviour,
Face to face— what will it be,
When with rapture I behold Him,
Jesus Christ who died for me.

Only faintly now I see Him,
With the darkened veil between,
But a blessed day is coming,
When his glory shall be seen.

What rejoicing in His presence,
When are banish’d grief and pain;
When the crooked ways are straighten’d,
And the dark things shall be plain.

Face to face— oh, blissful moment!
Face to face— to see and know;
Face to face with my Redeemer,
Jesus Christ who loves me so.

REFRAIN
Face to face I shall behold Him,
Far beyond the starry sky;
Face to face in all His glory,
I shall see Him by and by!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 209 首 - 我必當面見主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主為我罪過受死，復活四旬升高天；
將來我必親眼見衪，已成聖潔心安然。

如今恩主遠在天庭，我看衪模糊不清；
那時能與主面對面，見衪榮耀的真形。

那時見主真體榮光，好像太陽照四方；
世上勞苦、黑雲、暗霧，全都消失，永輝煌。

我心切望主來勿延，見主快樂難言宣；
迎接我到榮耀天堂，赴衪福樂大婚筵。

副歌
聖徒被主迎接升天，到榮耀之主身邊；
在寶座前跪拜、尊崇，萬王之王掌全權。

english_page_header: Hymn 210 - My Saviour First of All
english_full_lyrics:
When my lifework is ended,
and I cross the swelling tide,
When the bright and glorious morning I shall see;
I shall know my Redeemer when I
reach the other side,
And His smile will be the first to welcome me.

Oh, the soul-thrilling rapture
when I view His blessed face,
And the luster of His kindly beaming eye;
How my full heart will praise Him for the
mercy, love, and grace
That prepared for me a mansion in the sky.

Oh, the dear ones in glory,
how they beckon me to come,
And our parting at the river I recall;
To the sweet vales of Eden they will
sing my welcome home,
But I long to meet my Saviour first of all.

Thro’ the gates to the city
in a robe of spotless white,
He will lead me where no tears will ever fall;
In the glad song of ages I shall
mingle with delight,
But I long to meet my Saviour first of all.

REFRAIN
I shall know Him, I shall know Him,
And redeemed by His side I shall stand,
I shall know Him, I shall know Him
By the print of the nails in His hand.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 210 首 - 當我行完今生路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
當我行完今生路，必被接第三層天，得見那榮耀樂園美麗、新鮮；
在那裡，救主藹然笑迎，向我顯殷情；慶幸回到救主慈懷得安寧。

在昔日，許多親友離世，靈魂先升天，今日向我熱烈招呼來團圓；
齊歡唱，迎我歸家，歌聲盈盈滿樂園；我要先與久慕恩主相晤言。

到那日，主要引我經過珠門入聖城，身穿白衣，升上至美的天庭；
無愁苦，不再哀哭，喜氣洋洋齊享福；哈利路亞，榮耀、權能歸基督！

副歌
當我見主，我心歡喜，歡喜在我主慈懷安息；
當我見主，我心歡喜，在那裡與我主永安息。

english_page_header: Hymn 211 - My Faith Looks Up to Thee
english_full_lyrics:
My faith looks up to Thee,
Thou Lamb of Calvary,
Saviour divine!
Now hear me while I pray,
Take all my guilt away,
O let me from this day
Be wholly Thine!

May Thy rich grace impart
Strength to my fainting heart,
My zeal inspire;
As Thou hast died for me,
O may my love to Thee
Pure, warm, and changeless be
A living fire!

While life’s dark maze I tread,
And griefs around me spread,
Be Thou my guide;
Bid darkness turn to day,
Wipe sorrow’s tears away,
Nor let me ever stray
From Thee aside.

When ends life’s transient dream,
When death’s cold, sullen stream
Shall o’er me roll,
Blest Saviour, then, in love,
Fear and distrust remove;
O bear me safe above,
A ransomed soul!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 211 首 - 天父監察
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天父聖眼監察，一切不能隱藏，隨處常看；
我在眾人眼前，或在荒野中間，無論在家、在外，遠近都看。

白日工作勤勞，黑夜歇息睡覺，晝夜常看；
看我謹守命令，看我恭敬主名，看我犯罪錯行，善惡都看。

有祂看我哀哭，看我歌唱、喜樂，隨事常看；
有祂看我認罪，看我心裡懊悔，看我改變行為，內外通看。

天父叫我謹慎，在上有祂聖眼，向我常看；
叫我隨祂行走，愛祂過於親友，靠祂持守所有，永遠常看。

english_page_header: Hymn 212 - Jesus Bids Us Shine
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus bids us shine,
With a clear, pure light,
Like a little candle
Burning in the night;
In this world of darkness
We must shine,
You in your small corner,
And I in mine.

Jesus bids us shine,
First of all for Him;
Well He sees and knows it
If our light is dim;
He looks down from heaven,
Sees us shine,
You in your small corner,
And I in mine.

Jesus bids us shine,
Then, for all around
Many kinds of darkness
In this world abound—
Sin, and want, and sorrow;
We must shine,
You in your small corner,
And I in mine.

Jesus bids us shine,
As we work for Him,
Bringing those that wander
From the paths of sin;
He will ever help us,
If we shine,
You in your small corner,
And I in mine.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 212 首 - 為主發光
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主叫我發光，清白而輝煌，像燈放在台上，照亮夜漫長；
在這黑暗世界當發光，努力顯出善行，在各地方。

主叫我發光，把祂名傳揚，或亮或是不亮，誰都難隱藏；
祂從天上監察甚昭彰，努力榮耀主名，在各地方。

主叫我發光，射到各城鄉，把主榮耀福音，到處去播揚；
救人脫離罪惡並憂傷，努力做好見證，在各地方。

english_page_header: Hymn 213 - Little Drops of Water
english_full_lyrics:
Little drops of water,
Little grains of sand,
Make the mighty ocean
And the beaut’ous land,
And the beaut’ous land.

And the little moments,
Humble though they be,
Make the mighty ages
Of eternity,
Of eternity.

So our little errors
Lead the soul away,
From the paths of virtue,
Into sin to stray,
Into sin to stray.

Little seeds of mercy,
Sown by youthful hands,
Grow to bless the nations,
Far in heathen lands,
Far in heathen lands.

Little deeds of kindness,
Little words of love,
Make our earth an Eden,
Like the heaven above,
Like the heaven above.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 213 首 - 積少成多
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
滴水雖然微細，聚集成江河；
粒沙本是最小，堆積為山坡。
積少成多。

光陰真是易過，日月快如梭；
片刻積成萬代，年數無量多。
積少成多。

不可輕犯小罪，積重墜網羅；
稍偏即離正路，錯誤罪難逃。
積少成多。

日日常行小善，勸勉效微勞；
能使屬靈教會，相愛樂陶陶。
積少成多。

english_page_header: Hymn 214 - O Jesus, I Have Promised
english_full_lyrics:
O Jesus, I have promised
To serve Thee to the end;
Be Thou forever near me,
My Master and my Friend;
I shall not fear the battle
If Thou art by my side,
Nor wander from the pathway
If Thou wilt be my Guide.

O Jesus, Thou hast promised
To all who follow Thee,
That where Thou art in glory
There shall Thy servant be;
And, Jesus, I have promised
To serve Thee to the end;
O give me grace to follow
My Master and my Friend.

O let me feel Thee near me!
The world is ever near;
I see the sights that dazzle,
The tempting sounds I hear;
My foes are ever near me,
Around me and within;
But, Jesus, draw Thou nearer
And shield my soul from sin.

O let me hear Thee speaking
In accents clear and still,
Above the storms of passion,
The murmurs of self-will.
O speak to reassure me,
To hasten or control!
O speak, and make me listen,
Thou Guardian of my soul!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 214 首 - 八福頌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
自知理短，謙卑認過，虛心之人有福；
蒙主恩惠，榮光廣佈，天國為他歸宿。
自怨罪愆，竭力悔改，哀慟之人有福；
得主安慰，擦去眼淚，天國永無痛哭。

忍受毀謗、辱罵、逼迫，溫柔之人有福；
真神賜他不朽基業，永遠居住樂土。
追求真理，如飢如渴，慕義之人有福；
真神必賜富有、飽足，天糧、活水果腹。

濟急、扶危，愛人如己，憐憫之人有福；
真神必賜恩寵無已，永世扶持、矜恤。
不隨惡俗，莫起邪念，清心之人有福；
得見真神，榮光顯現，長久親近基督。

解寃釋結，不與人爭，和平之人有福；
稱做神子，承受天國，尊榮永遠延續。
為義被害，為道受難，忠貞之人有福；
在天賞賜，何等浩大，華冠為他所屬。

english_page_header: Hymn 215 - Come, Thou Almighty King
english_full_lyrics:
Come, Thou almighty King,
Help us Thy name to sing,
Help us to praise:
Father all glorious,
O’er all victorious,
Come and reign over us,
Ancient of Days.

Come, Thou incarnate Word,
Gird on Thy mighty sword,
Our prayer attend!
Come, and Thy people bless,
And give Thy word success;
Spirit of holiness,
On us descend.

Come, holy Comforter,
Thy sacred witness bear
In this glad hour!
Thou, who almighty art,
Now rule in ev’ry heart,
And ne’er from us depart,
Spirit of power!

Thou art the mighty One,
On earth Thy will be done,
From shore to shore,
Thy sov’reign majesty
May we in glory see,
And to eternity
Love and adore.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 215 首 - 真教會美德
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
真教會主身體，基督寶血所贖，貴哉，教會！
立於萬古磐石，根基堅定不移，勝過陰間權勢，末世方舟。

真教會全屬靈，完全遵照聖經，美哉，教會！
重生由於聖靈，靈恩、靈工興盛，遵主旨意而行，大放光明。

真教會全聖潔，具有新婦貞德，聖哉，教會！
不容邪道擾惑，不讓世俗纏累，毫無玷污、皺紋，榮美超群。

真教會日進步，信德、能力充足，奇哉，教會！
不靠金銀、勢力，只靠聖靈成事，神蹟、異能相隨，證實真理。

english_page_header: Hymn 216 - Hark! Ten Thousand Harps and Voices
english_full_lyrics:
Hark, ten thousand harps and voices
Sound the note of praise above;
Jesus reigns and heav’n rejoices,
Jesus reigns, the God of love;
See, He sits on yonder throne,
Jesus rules the world alone:
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia! Amen.

Jesus, hail! Whose glory brightens
All above, and gives it worth;
Lord of life, Thy smile enlightens,
Cheers and charms Thy saints on earth;
When we think of love like Thine,
Lord, we own it love divine:
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia! Amen.

King of glory, reign forever;
Thine an everlasting crown:
Nothing from Thy love shall sever
Those whom Thou hast made Thine own;
Happy objects of Thy grace,
Destined to behold Thy face,
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia! Amen.

Saviour, hasten Thine appearing;
Bring, O bring the glorious day,
When, the awful summons hearing,
Heav’n and earth shall pass away;
Then with golden harps we’ll sing, 
“Glory, glory to our King!”
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia! Amen.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 216 首 - 聖徒美德
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
真教會的真理條規，我當遵守，永遠不違；
不停聚會、祈禱、查經，必到神國美地。

我的家庭當作教會，父慈、子孝、夫唱、婦隨、
主仁、僕忠、兄友、弟恭，必到神國美地。

教會捐項，我當踴躍，紀念耶穌為我流血；
廣傳福音、幫補聖徒，必到神國美地。

敬畏真神、親愛靈胞，盡心、盡性、盡意、盡力；
靠主剷斷名利、惡慾，必到神國美地。

副歌
哈利路亞，讚美救主！順從聖靈，立志效主；
遵主吩咐，討主喜悅，永在神國享福。

english_page_header: Hymn 217 - Come, Thou Fount of Every Blessing
english_full_lyrics:
Come, Thou Fount of ev’ry blessing,
Tune my heart to sing Thy grace;
Streams of mercy, never ceasing,
Call for songs of loudest praise.
Teach me some melodious sonnet,
Sung by flaming tongues above;
Praise the mount— I’m fixed upon it—
Mount of Thy redeeming love.

Here I raise mine Ebenezer;
Hither by Thy help I’m come;
And I hope, by Thy good pleasure,
Safely to arrive at home.
Jesus sought me when a stranger,
Wand’ring from the fold of God;
He, to rescue me from danger,
Bought me with His precious blood.

O to grace how great a debtor,
Daily I’m constrained to be!
Let Thy goodness, as a fetter,
Bind my wand’ring heart to Thee;
Prone to wander, Lord, I feel it,
Prone to leave the God I love;
Here’s my heart, O take and seal it—
Seal it for Thy courts above.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 217 首 - 力行主道
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
妻子順夫原是相宜；丈夫不可苦待妻。
兒女應當孝順父母；父母不惹兒女氣。
僕人事主應當忠誠；主人愛僕不凌欺。
少年應當尊敬長上；老者端莊又仁慈。

少婦殷勤治理家務；老婦無讒少錯誤。
女人沉靜不可越份；男人聖潔無忿怒。
婆媳相愛如同母女；妯娌相愛不嫉妒。
寡婦靠神熱心祈禱；守素安常行天路。

教會同工彼此相愛；地位平等做主僕。
長執、傳道忠勤工作；不可專權、不貪瀆。
靈胞一體苦樂相關；若有患難相幫助。
屬靈教會就是神家；同心合意神賜福。

english_page_header: Hymn 218 - Love Divine, All Loves Excelling
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 218 首 - 聖靈佳果
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
何等美麗，聖靈佳果！仁愛、喜樂與和平、
忍耐、恩慈、良善、信實、溫柔、節制都要緊。
我要順從主的真理，真理使我得自由；
我要盡意、盡心、盡性、盡力結果永存留。

我要一生一世順服，順服真理做靈修，
得著聖靈住我裡面，好似明燈充滿油。
我當發光結出靈果，滿足主對我要求，
若是不能結出善果，辜負聖靈住裡頭。

當日救主苦口教訓，應結善果榮耀神，
荊棘不能結出葡萄，觀果知樹甚分明。
所以我們當行真理，順服聖靈變新人，
靈命健全，靈德完善，多結善果榮主名。

english_page_header: Hymn 219 - Brighten the Corner Where You Are
english_full_lyrics:
Do not wait until some deed of greatness you may do,
Do not wait to shed your light afar,
To the many duties ever near you now be true,
Brighten the corner where you are.

Just above are clouded skies that you may help to clear,
Let not narrow self your way debar,
Tho’ into one heart alone may fall your song of cheer,
Brighten the corner where you are.

Here for all your talent you may surely find a need,
Here reflect the Bright and Morning Star,
Even from your humble hand the bread of life may feed,
Brighten the corner where you are.

REFRAIN
Brighten the corner where you are!
Brighten the corner where you are!
Someone far from harbor you may guide across the bar,
Brighten the corner where you are.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 219 首 - 隨處發光
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
不要等候天父交託大事才做工，因為所得恩賜各不同；
微小的事也要忠心盡本分擔當，無論在何處要發光。

光能顯露一切隱情，使罪人投明，光能指示生命之道路；
真光帶領勞苦的人進入恩典門，無論在何處要發光。

你要奉獻一切才能，去為主發光，主要用你照黑暗四方；
許多同胞離開主路流蕩如亡羊，無論在何處要發光。

副歌
無論在何處要發光，無論在何處要發光；迷路的人正等候你領他歸天鄉，無論在何處要發光。

english_page_header: Hymn 220 - O Come, All Ye Faithful
english_full_lyrics:
O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant,
O come ye, O come ye to Bethlehem!
Come and behold Him, born the King of angels!

Sing, choirs of angels, sing in exultation,
O sing, all ye citizens of heaven above!
Glory to God, all glory in the highest!

Yea, Lord, we greet Thee, born this happy morning,
Jesus, to Thee be all glory giv’n;
Word of the Father, now in flesh appearing!

REFRAIN
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 220 首 - 火煉精金
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聖徒讀聖經，明白主之救恩，
信心已立定，不能搖其深根；
真神所應許，賜我們得永生，
現在已領受，必永遠不變更，
現在已領受，必永遠不變更。

無論何所遇，或患病，或平安，
或居於富境，或處身於貧寒；
在家與在外，行陸地，渡海洋；
隨時主同在，永使我不孤單，
隨時主同在，永使我不孤單。

雖大遭患難，如經歷於水中，
奔騰之大浪，卻不能將我沖；
主常保祐我，必由苦而得甘；
至終成聖潔，收宏益於艱難，
至終成聖潔，收宏益於艱難。

雖重受試煉，如由火裏經行，
主恩卻充足，賜與我常豐盈，
火焰萬無害，主無非存慈心；
欲除我渣滓，而熬煉成精金，
欲除我渣滓，而熬煉成精金。

english_page_header: Hymn 221 - More About Jesus Would I Know
english_full_lyrics:
More about Jesus would I know,
More of His grace to others show,
More of His saving fullness see,
More of His love who dies for me.

More about Jesus let me learn,
More of His holy will discern;
Spirit of God, my teacher be,
Showing the things of Christ to me.

More about Jesus in His Word,
Holding communion with my Lord,
Hearing His voice in ev’ry line,
Making each faithful saying mine.

More about Jesus on His throne,
Riches in glory all His own;
More of His kingdom’s sure increase;
More of His coming, Prince of Peace.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 221 首 - 克制情慾
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
要到天國永生之處，門小、路窄，許多攔阻；
入門走路，莫怕艱辛，想到福地，立志要真。

要到天國，私慾必除，耳目、言語，都要管住；
件件所做，憑主吩咐，七情、六慾，嚴加約束。

莫貪錢財、金、銀、寶器，切莫損人，以求利己；
莫造謊言，莫說壞話，勿怨在上，勿尤在下。

可歎我等軟弱之極，欲行天路，常覺無力；
切求聖靈，時刻相助，使我前進，走完天路。

english_page_header: Hymn 222 - Jesus, I Live to Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus, I live to Thee,
The loveliest and best;
My life in Thee, Thy life in me,
In Thy blest love I rest.

Jesus, I die to Thee,
Whenever death shall come;
To die in Thee is life to me
In my eternal home.

Whether to live or die,
I know not which is best;
To live in Thee is bliss to me,
To die is endless rest.

Living or dying, Lord,
I ask but to be Thine;
My life in Thee, Thy life in me,
Makes heav’n forever mine.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 222 首 - 清心有福
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
福哉，清心之人！因必見主尊榮；
至聖之主與他同行，永遠屬於光明。

基督賜我聖靈，使我身心潔淨；
雖在濁世，超然不染，靠主堅持忠貞。

清心宛如明宮，主即住在其中；
清潔之心為主寶座，主常與之交通。

我今在主面前，求主賜福無邊；
使我心思、意念無邪，進到聖潔完全。

english_page_header: Hymn 223 - Praise Ye the Lord of Hosts
english_full_lyrics:
Praise ye the Lord of Hosts, Hallelujah!
Sing with rejoicing and Praise to His name!
O let us haste to sing!
Tell of His grace, David, Moses, Miriam, join with us in praise!

Praise ye the Lord of Hosts, Hallelujah!
Sing with rejoicing and Praise to His name!
Like the five wise virgins Be ye prepared!
Jesus the Bridegroom will come, bringing love to share.

Praise ye the Lord of Hosts, Hallelujah!
Sing with rejoicing and Praise to His name!
Heavens and earth rejoice, Blest be the Lamb!
In sweet union we shall find peace and joy with Him.

REFRAIN
O for ten thousand harps to sing His praise!
Let the song in heaven praise Him evermore,
Praise to the Lamb of God, rise up and sing, “Hallelujah, Amen”;
Let heaven ring!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 223 首 - 選民靈歌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
哈利路亞，阿們，讚美真神！錫安真有光彩，脫俗出塵；
摩西領唱高音，大衛彈琴，米利暗欣歌舞，苦去甜臨。

哈利路亞，阿們，讚美真神！童女真有光彩，充滿聖靈；
我們許配基督，必須聖潔，速速裝飾整齊，迎接良人。

哈利路亞，阿們，讚美真神！新婦真有光彩，完全更新；
諸天齊聲稱頌羔羊新婚，即真教會被接，與主相親。

副歌
十四萬四千人歌唱、彈琴，如水又如雷在天發好音；
羔羊率領義人，同頌真神，哈利路亞，歌聲充滿天庭！

english_page_header: Hymn 224 - Search Me, O God
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 224 首 - 求主察看
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
求主察看，鑒我心思、意念，肺腑、心腸，求主試驗、熬煉；
察我心田，不令邪念潛藏，不令微酵，留為罪惡根源。

聖目如電，隱情無一不見，懇求照亮，照亮我的心殿；
使我聖潔，與主靈交不倦，存心敬畏，凡事蒙主恩眷。

懇求聖靈時常充滿我心，如火挑旺，使我靈性復興；
不從肉體，使我完全屬靈，求主領導，直到福樂天庭

english_page_header: Hymn 225 - Come to the Saviour
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 225 首 - 順從聖靈
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聖靈的恩惠，我當祈求，寶貝的能力，在我裡頭；
助我結靈果，促進靈修，生命活水長流。

聖靈的聲音，我當恭聞，真神的旨意，我要依從；
忠勤事奉主，做成聖工，盡責任 ，不居功。

聖靈的感動，我不消滅，當我軟弱時，祂必扶持；
凡事遵真道，勝過世界，力量永不衰竭。

聖靈的引導，我要順從，肉體的情慾，我必除淨；
常攻克己身，叫身服我，做主聖潔器皿。

副歌
樂哉，樂哉，必在天聚會！聖父家中福祉最寶貴；
心中必清潔，再不犯罪，靠聖靈的恩惠。

english_page_header: Hymn 226 - Thy Will Be Done
english_full_lyrics:
My God and Father, while I stray
Far from my home, on life’s rough way,
Oh, teach me from my heart to say, “Thy will be done!”

What though in lonely grief I sigh
For friends beloved, no longer nigh,
Submissive still would I reply, “Thy will be done!”

Let but my fainting heart be blest
With Thy sweet Spirit for its guest,
My God, to Thee I leave the rest, “Thy will be done!”

Renew my will from day to day;
Blend it with Thine and take away
All now that makes it hard to say, “Thy will be done!”

Then when on earth I breathe no more
The prayer oft mixed with tears before,
I’ll sing upon a happier shore, “Thy will be done!”

REFRAIN
Thy will be done! Thy will be done!
Oh, teach me from my heart to say, “Thy will be done!”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 226 首 - 願成主旨
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我主！我父！我是客旅，得歸天家，那管崎嶇？
遵主真理，忍耐直趨，願成主旨。
遵主真理，願成主旨；
遵主真理，忍耐直趨，願成主旨。

背架跟主或有艱難，我無怨言，心仍平安；
順服至死，必戴華冠，願成主旨。
順服至死，願成主旨；
順服至死，必戴華冠，願成主旨。

假使分應為道殉身，可得永生，我必甘心；
賞賜無比，不怕艱辛，願成主旨。
賞賜無比，願成主旨；
賞賜無比，不怕艱辛，願成主旨。

主若叫我捨棄一切，可進天國，我必樂意；
奉獻所有，討主歡喜，願成主旨。
奉獻所有，願成主旨；
奉獻所有，討主歡喜，願成主旨。

english_page_header: Hymn 227 - Oh, How Happy Are They
english_full_lyrics:
Oh, how happy are they
Who the Saviour obey,
And have laid up their treasure above!
Tongue can never express
The sweet comfort and peace
Of a soul in its earliest love.

That sweet comfort was mine,
When the favor divine
I received through the blood of the Lamb;
When my heart first believed,
What a joy I received,
What a heaven in Jesus’ dear name!

’Twas a heaven below
My Redeemer to know;
And the angels could do nothing more,
Than to fall at His feet,
And the story repeat,
And the lover of sinners adore.

Oh, the rapturous height
Of that holy delight
Which I felt in the life-giving blood!
Of my Saviour possessed,
I was perfectly bless’d,
As if filled with the fulness of God.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 227 首 - 聽命有福
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
能盡聽主命令，將寶訓藏心中，
此等人所得福，真無窮。
主的話如燈光，常領我行天路，
不偏左，不偏右，樂無疆。

既蒙主贖罪愆，主的話行完全，
如建屋有根基，甚牢堅；
或雨淋，或水沖，或風吹，總安然。
此等人好信德，福無邊。

主誡命都聖潔，又公義，又善良，
凡信徒要遵守，不可忘。
主應許所賜福，誰聽命必享受；
從今生到來世，無限長。

到那時在天國，讚美主不停止，
因蒙主所賜福，真希奇。
願選民在今世，力遵守主命令；
蒙主悅，賜福樂，無窮期。

english_page_header: Hymn 228 - All for Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
All for Jesus, all for Jesus!
All my being’s ransomed powers,
All my thoughts and words and doings,
All my days and all my hours.

Let my hands perform His bidding,
Let my feet run in His ways,
Let my eyes see Jesus only,
Let my lips speak forth His praise.

Since my eyes were fixed on Jesus,
I’ve lost sight of all beside,
So enchained my spirit’s vision,
Looking at the Crucified.

Oh, what wonder! How amazing!
Jesus, glorious King of kings,
Deigns to call me His beloved,
Lets me rest beneath His wings.

REFRAIN
All for Jesus, all for Jesus!
All my days and all my hours;
All for Jesus, all for Jesus!
All my days and all my hours.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 228 首 - 遵命有福
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
要聽救主寶貴命令，祂命令永不變更；
疏懶行道的人須記，主說：「有福在遵行。」

主命我若聽而不行，雖應許無益我身；
領悟真理，努力前進，有福在遵行的人。

遵命的人必進聖城，無罪孽、憂愁、哀哭；
那裡永遠聖潔、榮耀，生命樹每月結果。

副歌
遵命令的人是有福，誠哉，遵命是有福！
遵命令的人是有福，有福，有福屬忠僕。

english_page_header: Hymn 229 - Cast Thy Burden on the Lord
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 229 首 - 謹守十誡
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
一誡當拜獨一神，祂是人類之天父。
二誡不可拜偶像，認魔做父，神必怒。

三誡崇敬神聖名，妄稱、褻瀆，罪不輕。
四誡當守安息日，紀念聖日，百福生。

五誡當孝敬父母，養育之恩不可忘。
六誡不可殺害人，害死人命，罪難擔。

七誡不可犯姦淫，苟合罪必受審判。
八誡不可做盜賊，非我所有，勿妄想。

九誡不可作假證，出言誠實必得福。
十誡不可貪人物，有衣、有食，當知足。

english_page_header: Hymn 230 - Blest Is He Who Is Righteous
english_full_lyrics:
Blest is he who ne’er consents
In the wicked’s way to walk,
Neither stands in sinner’s ways,
Nor with the scoffer’s talk.

But he makes the law of God
His comfort and his delight,
So he reads therein by day,
And meditates by night.

Like a fair tree fed by streams,
That with timely fruit doth bend,
He shall flourish, and success
All his designs attend.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 230 首 - 義人有福
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
不從惡人的計謀，不站罪人的道路，不坐褻慢人座位，這人便為有福。

惟獨喜愛神律法，不分晝夜，常思想，存記在心又遵行，這人便為有福。

像樹栽在溪水旁，按時結果，葉常青，所行、所做盡順利，這人便為有福。

english_page_header: Hymn 231 - My Jesus, as Thou Wilt!
english_full_lyrics:
My Jesus, as Thou wilt!
O may Thy will be mine;
Into Thy hand of love
I would my all resign.
Through sorrow, or through joy,
Conduct me as Thine own;
And help me still to say,
My Lord, Thy will be done!

My Jesus, as Thou wilt!
Though seen through many a tear,
Let not my star of hope
Grow dim or disappear.
Since Thou on earth hast wept
And sorrowed oft alone,
If I must weep with Thee,
My Lord, Thy will be done!

My Jesus, as Thou wilt!
All shall be well for me;
Each changing future scene
I gladly trust with Thee.
Straight to my home above
I travel calmly on,
And sing, in life or death, 
My Lord, Thy will be done!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 231 首 - 照主所願
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
恩主，照祢所願！因祢旨意純全，願將終生萬事，擺祢聖目之前；
無論苦樂、順逆，都放在主聖肩，使我時時能說：「願主旨意成全。」

恩主，照祢所願！主愛總不變遷，有主安慰、倚靠，擦去眼淚漣漣；
主昔亦遇逆境，備嘗苦難熬煎，若必與主同苦，願主旨意成全。

恩主，照祢所願！在我深感安然，任憑前途變幻，靠祢信心彌堅；
在世原為客旅，永遠家鄉在天，不論生死都說：「願主旨意成全。」

english_page_header: Hymn 232 - Those in His Image Shall Shine
english_full_lyrics:
Tho’ rugged the path where our duty may lead,
O! why should we ever repine?
When faithful and true is the promise to all,
That those in His image shall shine.

The grandeur of wealth, and the temples of fame,
Where beauty and splendor combine,
Will perish, forgotten and crumble to dust,
But those in His image shall shine.

Then let us go forth to the work yet to do,
With zeal that shall never decline.
Be strong in the Lord, and the promise believe
That those in His image shall shine.

REFRAIN
They shall shine as bright as stars
In heaven bejeweled with light;
And they that turn many to His righteousness
Shall shine as the stars ever bright.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 232 首 - 要同耶穌一樣
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
希奇哉，希奇哉，救主恩無窮！神要我同耶穌一樣。
有仁愛，有聖潔，與耶穌相同，神要我同耶穌一樣。

耶穌說：「我是聖，你應當成聖。」神要我同耶穌一樣。
祂賜豐富靈力，能使我順服，神要我同耶穌一樣。

有柔和，有謙卑，能忍耐到底，神要我同耶穌一樣。
遇著試探之時，得勝歌高唱，神要我同耶穌一樣。

副歌
希奇呀，真希奇呀，能顯出耶穌的形狀！
我應當遵行聖善主的旨意，神要我同耶穌一樣。

english_page_header: Hymn 233 - I Belong to Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
I belong to Jesus; I am not my own;
All I have and all I am, Shall be His alone.

I belong to Jesus; He is Lord and King,
Reigning in my inmost heart, Over ev’rything.

I belong to Jesus; What can hurt or harm,
When He folds around my soul His almighty arm?

I belong to Jesus; Blessed, blessed thought!
With His own most precious blood Has my soul been bought.

I belong to Jesus; He has died for me;
I am His and He is mine, Through eternity.

I belong to Jesus; He will keep my soul,
When the deathly waters dark Round about me roll.

I belong to Jesus; And ere long I’ll stand
With my precious Saviour there In the glory land.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 233 首 - 聯屬耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我是聯屬耶穌，主為我罪死；主必永遠為我主，我心極歡喜。

我是聯屬耶穌，救恩真奇哉！救主為我流寶血，生命贖回來。

我是聯屬耶穌，不是屬自己；我之生命連百體，一概歸在彼。

我是聯屬耶穌，祂為主與王；時常住在我心裡，掌管我心垣。

我是聯屬耶穌，仇敵無權勢；因主保護我生命，伸出祂膀臂。

我是聯屬耶穌，主愛不變更；不久降臨接我往，同居榮耀城。

english_page_header: Hymn 234 - Nearer, My God, to Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!
E’en though it be a cross
That raiseth me,
Still all my songs shall be,
Nearer, my God, to Thee.
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

Though like the wanderer,
The sun gone down,
Darkness be over me,
My rest a stone;
Yet in my dreams I’d be
Nearer, my God, to Thee.
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

There let the way appear,
Steps unto heav'n;
All that Thou sendest me,
In mercy giv’n;
Angels to beckon me
Nearer, my God, to Thee.
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

Then, with my waking thoughts
Bright with Thy praise,
Out of my stony griefs
Bethel I’ll raise;
So by my woes to be
Nearer, my God, to Thee.
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 234 首 - 與主日近
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
願與我主相親，與主日近，雖有憂愁的事，我仍前進；
發出禱告心聲，願與我主相親，願與我主相親，與主日近。

我今暫為客旅，日已西沉，野地枕石而眠，黑暗漸深；
夜靜憂懼在心，願與我主相親，願與我主相親，與主日近。

夢裡看見一梯，立地頂天，蒙神顯現安慰，賜恩無邊；
聽神應許佳音，願與我主相親，願與我主相親，與主日近。

睡醒滿心感謝，曙色漸明，即將所枕之石，立柱起名；
凡遇艱苦累身，更與我主相親，更與我主相親，與主日近。

english_page_header: Hymn 234A - Nearer, My God, to Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!
E’en though it be a cross
That raiseth me,
Still all my songs shall be,
Nearer, my God, to Thee.
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

Though like the wanderer,
The sun gone down,
Darkness be over me,
My rest a stone;
Yet in my dreams I’d be
Nearer, my God, to Thee.
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

There let the way appear,
Steps unto heaven;
All that Thou sendest me,
In mercy giv’n;
Angels to beckon me
Nearer, my God, to Thee.
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

Then, with my waking thoughts
Bright with Thy praise,
Out of my stony griefs
Bethel I’ll raise;
So by my woes to be
Nearer, my God, to Thee.
Nearer, my God, to Thee,
Nearer to Thee!

english_page_header: Hymn 235 - Here, O My Lord, I See Thee
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 235 首 - 主我一體
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
恩主耶穌，我願親近祢！因祢的愛情，比酒更美；
祢膏油馨香，祢的名芬芳，我樂意舞蹈，趁祢愛笛響。

主對我說：「我願看見祢，因祢的面貌，比花秀美；
願聽祢聲音，因為甚柔和，隨時見聞祢，我心就快樂。」

我屬我主，我主也屬我，我與主聯合，成為一體；
身體連元首，永不能分離，教會屬基督，是極大奧秘。

english_page_header: Hymn 236 - Blessed Assurance, Jesus Is Mine
english_full_lyrics:
Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine!
Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine!
Heir of salvation, purchase of God,
Born of His Spirit, washed in His blood.

Perfect submission, perfect delight,
Visions of rapture now burst on my sight;
Angels descending bring from above,
Echoes of mercy, whispers of love.

Perfect submission, all is at rest,
I in my Savior am happy and blest,
Watching and waiting, looking above,
Filled with His goodness, lost in His love.

REFRAIN
This is my story, this is my song,
Praising my Savior, all the day long;
This is my story, this is my song,
Praising my Savior all the day long.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 236 首 - 我屬耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
至大的福氣，我屬耶穌，救主已贖回我除我罪辜；
得主寶貝血洗淨罪污，聖靈進內心，呼阿爸，父。

完全順服主，萬事安寧，天堂的大榮耀使我看清；
彷彿有天使頌讚歌聲，報明主救恩與主尊榮。

凡事感謝主，奉獻唱詩，永遠的真生命賜我無疑；
時刻仰望主，儆醒預備，不住的祈禱，等主來時。

副歌
希奇的信息，我屬耶穌，讚美我救主，歌唱、歡呼；
述說主慈愛，證主恩典，感謝主救贖，我屬耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 237 - Since Jesus Came into My Heart
english_full_lyrics:
What a wonderful change in my life has been wrought
Since Jesus came into my heart!
I have light in my soul for which long I had sought,
Since Jesus came into my heart!

I have ceased from my wand’ring and going astray,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
And my sins which were many are all washed away,
Since Jesus came into my heart!

I’m possessed of a hope that is steadfast and sure,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
And no dark clouds of doubt now my pathway obscure,
Since Jesus came into my heart!

I shall go there to dwell in that city, I know,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
And I’m happy, so happy, as onward I go,
Since Jesus came into my heart!

REFRAIN
Since Jesus came into my heart,
Since Jesus came into my heart,
Floods of joy o’er my soul like the sea billows roll,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 237 首 - 耶穌住在我心
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我生命已有了真希奇的改變，自耶穌來住在我心；
我久慕的真光，今照耀我裡面，自耶穌來住在我心。

已絕跡我流蕩，不再入那迷途，自耶穌來住在我心；
我的罪雖眾多，主寶血已救贖，自耶穌來住在我心。

我今有大盼望，又堅固又牢靠，自耶穌來住在我心；
我因信能望見，那家鄉極美好，自耶穌來住在我心。

我深知到那日，永居住榮美城，自耶穌來住在我心；
我每日極快樂，能奮勇向前行，自耶穌來住在我心。

副歌
自耶穌來住在我心，自耶穌來住在我心；
喜樂潮溢我心，如海洋浪滾滾，自耶穌來住在我心。

english_page_header: Hymn 238 - Thou Didst Leave Thy Throne
english_full_lyrics:
Thou didst leave Thy throne and Thy kingly crown,
When Thou camest to earth for me;
But in Bethlehem’s home was there found no room
For Thy holy nativity.

Heaven’s arches rang when the angels sang,
Proclaiming Thy royal degree;
But of lowly birth didst Thou come to earth,
And in greatest humility.

The foxes found rest, and the birds their nests
In the shade of the forest tree;
But Thy couch was the sod, O Thou Son of God,
In the deserts of Galilee.

Thou camest, O Lord, with the living Word,
That should set Thy people free;
But with mocking scorn and with crown of thorn,
They bore Thee to Calvary.

When the heavens shall ring, and its choirs shall sing,
At Thy coming to victory,
Let Thy voice call me home, saying, “Yet there is room,
There is room at My side for thee.”

REFRAIN
Oh, come to my heart, Lord Jesus!
There is room in my heart for Thee.
Oh, come to my heart, Lord Jesus, come!
There is room in my heart for Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 238 首 - 來居我心，主耶穌！
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在昔日，我主為罪人降生、撇華冕，離天上尊榮；
在大衛之城一客店馬棚，卑微處是為主預定。

狐狸尚有洞，飛鳥亦有窩，困乏時，得安居穩妥；
惟我主耶穌順父旨奔波，在世間無枕首之所。

主賜生命源，救人脫罪權，真如同解縲絏一般；
人卻戲笑主，加以荊棘冠，釘十架為極刑罪犯

何時唱凱歌，聲滿穹蒼上，同迎接永得勝君王？
願見主恩光普世照輝煌，蒙恩人皆被接主旁。

副歌
求來居我心，主耶穌！在我心有住處為主；
求來居我心，主耶穌來！在我心有住處為主。

english_page_header: Hymn 239 - Abide with Me
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 239 首 - 求主同住
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
願主同住，太陽平西而下，黑影漸深，願主留居我家；
無人可求，世友遠避不顧，惟主可靠，求主與我同住。

浮生若夢，寄居之日無多，世福如煙，轉眼虛華即過；
變幻無常，萬物不久皆無，惟主永存，求主與我同住。

我需要主，時時刻刻同在，靠主大恩，撒但無法侵害；
堅固我心，助我不涉迷途，不論陰晴，求主與我同住。

示你十架，在我離世之間，撥離疑雲，指我靈目向天；
明宮在望，欣見榮光破曙，或生或死，求主與我同住。

english_page_header: Hymn 240 - Singing for Jesus, Our Savious and King
english_full_lyrics:
Singing for Jesus, our Saviour and King,
Singing for Jesus, the Lord whom we love;
All adoration we joyously bring,
Longing to praise as they praise Him above.

Singing for Jesus, and trying to win
Many to love Him, and join in the song;
Calling the weary and wandering in,
Rolling the chorus of gladness along.

Singing for Jesus, our Shepherd and Guide,
Singing for gladness of heart that He gives;
Singing for wonder and praise that He died,
Singing for blessing and joy that He lives.

Singing for Jesus, yes, singing for joy,
Thus will we praise Him and tell out His love;
Till He shall call us to brighter employ,
Singing for Jesus, forever above.

REFRAIN
Singing for Jesus, Saviour and King!
Lift our voices high,
fill the sky with eternal praise!
Lift our heads and loud our voices raise!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 240 首 - 與主同樂
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
屬靈之樂在祈禱於主前，萬事交託，無苦惱，無悲嘆；
靈交日深，常仰慕主聖面，身心聖潔，最快樂且平安。

屬靈之樂在於常讀聖經，藉此寶卷，得聽見主聲音；
靈性飢渴，到主前聽真理，靈糧飽足，真快樂滿心靈。

屬靈之樂在於常傳福音，拯救罪人，出自憐憫、愛心；
引人歸主，離苦海，出迷津，樂主所樂，當為主多得人。

副歌
樂，真快樂，與主一同樂；時時心主心，樂主樂，永與主契合，靈界真福在與主同樂。

english_page_header: Hymn 241 - O Thou in Whose Presence
english_full_lyrics:
O Thou in whose presence my soul takes delight,
On whom in affliction I call,
My comfort by day, and my song in the night,
My hope, my salvation, my all!

The roses of Sharon, the lilies that grow
In vales, on the banks of the streams;
His cheeks, all the beauty of excellence blow,
And His eyes are as quivers of beams.

His voice, as the sound of the dulcimer sweet,
Is heard through the shadows of death;
The cedars of Lebanon bow at His feet,
The air is perfumed with His breath.

He looks, and ten thousands of angels rejoice,
And myriads wait for His word;
He speaks, and eternity, filled with His voice,
Reechoes the praise of the Lord.

Dear Shepherd, I hear and will follow Thy call;
I know the sweet sound of Thy voice;
Restore and defend me, for Thou art my all,
In Thee I will ever rejoice.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 241 首 - 我生命的君王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我心所喜歡，我靈魂所仰望，就是我生命的君王；
隨時讚美祢，隨處稱頌祢，尚覺不能滿我心腸。

我心所喜愛，我的主，我良人，聲音溫和，面容慈祥；
天使朝見祢，大聲唱聖歌，呼應我們所唱詩章。

我心所戀慕，我全身所歸屬，我君王永居我內心；
我生命、希望、福樂全在祢，我要倚靠祢情更深。

english_page_header: Hymn 242 - Let Him In
english_full_lyrics:
There’s a Stranger at the door,
Let Him in;
He has been there oft before,
Let Him in;
Let Him in, ere He is gone,
Let Him in, the Holy One,
Jesus Christ, the Father’s Son,
Let Him in.

Open now to Him your heart,
Let Him in;
If you wait He will depart,
Let Him in;
Let Him in, He is your Friend,
He your soul will sure defend,
He will keep you to the end,
Let him in.

Hear you now His loving voice?
Let Him in;
Now, oh, now make Him your choice,
Let Him in;
He is standing at your door,
Joy to you He will restore,
And His name you will adore,
Let Him in.

Now admit the heav’nly Guest,
Let Him in;
He will make for you a feast,
Let Him in;
He will speak your sins forgiv’n,
And when earth ties all are riv’n,
He will take you home to heav’n,
Let Him in.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 242 首 - 主在門外等候
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
有貴客今在門外，請祂來！在門外忍耐等候，請祂來！
祂是天上神愛子，祂乃聖潔、有恩慈；不要等到祂離開，請祂來！

現在要敞開心懷，請祂來！不要再耽延、等待，請祂來！
請祂來做你良友，將靈魂交祂保守；依靠祂、永遠安泰，請祂來！

你是否聽祂慈聲？請祂來！現在要毅然決定，請祂來！
祂今仍然在門外，要賜你喜樂、平安；使你心口同頌讚，請祂來！

english_page_header: Hymn 243 - I Am Thine, O Lord
english_full_lyrics:
I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice, 
And it told Thy love to me; 
But I long to rise in the arms of faith, 
And be closer drawn to Thee.

Consecrate me now to Thy service, Lord, 
By the pow’r of grace divine; 
Let my soul look up with a steadfast hope, 
And my will be lost in Thine.

O the pure delight of a single hour 
That before Thy throne I spend; 
When I kneel in prayer, and with Thee, my God, 
I commune as friend with friend!

There are depths of love that I cannot know 
Till I cross the narrow sea; 
There are heights of joy that I may not reach 
Till I rest in peace with Thee.

REFRAIN
Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord, 
To the cross where Thou hast died; 
Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer, blessed Lord, 
To Thy precious, bleeding side.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 243 首 - 引我更親近
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我屬祢，恩主！我聞祢言語，言明祢愛我全備；
我切望興起，有信心、勇氣，被吸引更親近祢。

分別我為聖，專為主所用，依靠主大能恩寵；
助我向上看，有堅固盼望，心靈尊主為至上。

多利用時間，跪在恩主前，屬靈喜樂難盡言！
靈與靈相親，心與心相印，與主相交在樂園。

主愛何等深，我今難盡明，要等我度完今生；
永樂何等大，我今未知情，要等我回到天庭。

副歌
引我親近，親近我恩主，到主受死十架前；
引我親近，親近，更親近恩主，終日倚在主身邊。

english_page_header: Hymn 244 - O to Be Like Thee!
english_full_lyrics:
O to be like Thee! blessed Redeemer,
This is my constant longing and prayer;
Gladly I’ll forfeit all of earth’s treasures,
Jesus, Thy perfect likeness to wear.

O to be like Thee! full of compassion,
Loving, forgiving, tender and kind,
Helping the helpless, cheering the fainting,
Seeking the wand’ring sinner to find.

O to be like Thee! while I am pleading,
Pour out Thy Spirit, fill with Thy love;
Make me a temple meet for Thy dwelling,
Fit me for life and heaven above.

REFRAIN
O to be like Thee! O to be like Thee,
Blessed Redeemer, pure as Thou art;
Come in Thy sweetness, come in Thy fullness;
Stamp Thine own image deep on my heart.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 244 首 - 主，我願像祢！
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
榮耀的救主，我深願像祢！這是我盼望，是我禱告；
我甘願捨棄世上的財寶，披戴主基督，守主聖道。

主，我願像祢！有憐憫心腸、溫柔和謙卑、慈愛、善良；
幫助軟弱者，慰痛苦、憂傷，領人得永生，尋找亡羊。

副歌
主，我願像祢！主，我願像祢！榮耀的救主，像祢聖潔！
靠主的聖靈，行主的真理，願基督成形在我心裡。

english_page_header: Hymn 245 - Softly Now the Light of Day
english_full_lyrics:
Softly now the light of day
Fades upon my sight away;
Free from care, from labor free,
Lord, I would commune with Thee.

Thou, whose all pervading eye
Naught escapes, without, within,
Pardon each infirmity,
Open fault and secret sin.

Soon for me the light of day
Shall forever pass away;
Then, from sin and sorrow free,
Take me, Lord, to dwell with Thee.

Thou who, sinless, yet has known
All of man’s infirmity,
Then, from Thine eternal throne,
Jesus, look with pitying eye.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 245 首 - 求主密相契
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
紅日沈西夜色舖，一天容易又穩度；
拋去憂慮與勞苦，求主今夜再保護。

聖目洞察朝與暮，一切隱情盡顯露；
求主向我施憐憫，赦免罪過息聖怒。

地上歲月留不住，人生在世如雲霧；
但我蒙主賜永生，歡然奔走天國路。

在世帳棚原過渡，天上房屋我羨慕；
深願與主密相契，好得無比主同住。

副歌
主，我願像祢！主，我願像祢！榮耀的救主，像祢聖潔！
靠主的聖靈，行主的真理，願基督成形在我心裡。

english_page_header: Hymn 246 - O Bless the Lord, My Soul
english_full_lyrics:
O bless the Lord, my soul!
His grace to thee proclaim!
And all that is within me join
To bless His holy name!

He will not always chide;
He will with patience wait;
His wrath is ever slow to rise,
And ready to abate.

He pardons all thy sins;
Prolongs thy feeble breath;
He healeth thine infirmities,
And ransoms thee from death.

He loves me though I stray,
His truths to me impart;
I shall mount up as eagles strong,
Though aged, with youthful heart.

Then bless His holy name,
Whose grace hath made thee whole,
Whose loving-kindness crowns thy days!
O bless the Lord, my soul!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 246 首 - 懇求聖靈
