chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
懇求聖靈降下，住在各人心內；
極有光明，極有能力，賜我深恩厚惠。

懇求聖靈指教，使我能明真道；
儆醒祈禱，日日進步，一心惟主是靠。

懇求聖靈督責，扶助我心軟弱；
常常悅服我主美意，痛恨一切罪惡。

懇求聖靈眷顧，使我信心堅固；
所出之言，所行之事，能依我主法度。

懇求聖靈安慰，時刻加添恩惠；
使我忍耐經過試煉，升天福樂全備。

english_page_header: Hymn 247 - Pentecostal Power
english_full_lyrics:
The power that fell at Pentecost,
When in the upper room,
Upon the watching, waiting ones,
The Holy Spirit had come,
Remaineth evermore the same,
Unchanging still, O praise His name.

“Ye shall have power,” said Jesus, 
“when the Holy Spirit’s come,”
Your loosened tongues shall speak His praise,
Your lips no more be dumb;
The timid, shrinking ones be brave,
To reach a hand the host to save.

The wav’ring shall steadfast become,
The weak of faith be strong,
With holy boldness going forth,
Denouncing sin and wrong;
With burning zeal each heart aflame,
A whole salvation to proclaim.

Breathe on us now the Holy Spirit,
The young and old inspire;
Let each receive His Pentecost,
Set hearts and tongues afire!
Thou wonderful transforming power,
Come now in this accepted hour.

REFRAIN
The power, the power, the Pentecostal power,
Is just the same today, is just the same today;
The power, the power, the Pentecostal power,
Is just the same today.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 247 首 - 聖靈權能
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
五旬節時在一樓上，顯出非常權能，
門徒聚集同心禱告，直待聖靈降臨；
忽然聲響如風吹過，舌形火焰降到頭上。

聖靈降在各人身上，大家都說方言，
存心救世傳揚福音，敞開天國恩門；
眾人熱衷如火焚燒，同心事主報答鴻恩。

門徒都被聖靈充滿，大得口才、力量，
到處見證救主耶穌，神蹟奇事顯揚；
膽小退縮變為剛強，一同出去拯救亡羊。

虔誠求主賜下聖靈，老少均得領受，
如五旬節充滿各人，能力、智慧俱全；
真理聖靈永不改變，恩賜、權能古今皆然。

副歌
權能，權能，五旬節大權能！權能如同現在，權能如同現在。
權能，權能，五旬節大權能！權能如同現在。

english_page_header: Hymn 248 - Revive Us Again
english_full_lyrics:
We praise Thee, O God! 
for the Son of Thy love,
For Jesus who died,
and is now gone above.

We praise Thee, O God! 
for Thy Spirit of light,
Who hath shown us our Saviour,
and scattered our night.

All glory and praise 
to the Lamb that was slain,
Who hath borne all our sins,
and hath cleansed ev’ry stain.

Revive us again; 
fill each heart with Thy love;
May each soul be rekindled
with fire from above.

REFRAIN
Hallelujah! Thine the glory.
Hallelujah! Amen.
Hallelujah! Thine the glory.
Revive us again.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 248 首 - 我要求聖靈
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我要求聖靈，改變所存志向，使我穿上新人，效法主榜樣。

我要求聖靈，如火旺熱我心，無論遠近各地，見證耶穌名。

我要求聖靈，幫助我有膽量，為主耶穌尊名，能勇敢赴難。

我要求聖靈，時常充滿我心，使我一生一世，遵從神命令。

副歌
哈利路亞，全能聖靈！哈利路亞，阿們！
哈利路亞，全能聖靈！住在我心裡。

english_page_header: Hymn 249 - They Were in an Upper Chamber
english_full_lyrics:
They were in an upper chamber,
They were all with one accord,
When the Holy Spirit descended,
As was promised by our Lord.

Yes, the pow’r from heav’n descended,
With the sound of rushing wind;
Tongues of fire came down upon them,
As the Lord said He would send.

Yes, this “old-time” pow’r was given
To our fathers who were true;
This is promised to believers,
And we all may have it, too.

REFRAIN
O Lord, send the pow’r just now,
O Lord, send the pow’r just now,
O Lord, send the pow’r just now,
And baptize ev’ry one.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 249 首 - 靈洗各人
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
從前門徒同心合意，在五旬節求靈洗；
耶穌應許果然是真，聖靈降臨來印證。

忽然聲響自天降下，彷彿大風吹屋內；
似舌火焰落人頭上，感動各人說方言。

門徒都被聖靈充滿，為真道竭力爭辯；
醫病、趕鬼大顯權能，引人歸主樂無邊。

副歌
主啊，今賜大權能！主啊，今賜大權能！
主啊，今賜大權能！用聖靈洗各人。

english_page_header: Hymn 250 - With Joy We Hail the Sacred Day
english_full_lyrics:
With joy we hail the sacred day
Which God has called His own;
With joy the summons we obey
To worship at His throne.

Spirit of grace, O deign to dwell
Within Thy church below!
Make her in holiness excel,
With pure devotion glow.

Let peace within her walls be found;
Let all her sons unite,
To spread with grateful zeal around
Her clear and shining light.

Great God, we hail the sacred day
Which Thou hast called Thine own;
With joy the summons we obey
To worship at Thy throne.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 250 首 - 從新得力
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
仰求聖靈時常充滿，使我從新得力；
發起熱心如火挑旺，在我冰冷心地。

憐我陷在軟弱之中，世俗纏累不已；
靈魂衰竭，欲振無力，不能抵擋仇敵。

時常想要親主、事主，興致才起復止；
聽道乏味，行道無力，諸多體貼肉體。

主啊！求你領我回轉，使我從新得力；
奮勇跑盡一生路程，直到榮耀天邑。

english_page_header: Hymn 251 - My Heart Is Resting, O My God
english_full_lyrics:
My heart is resting, O my God,
I will give thanks and sing;
My heart is at the secret source
Of ev’ry precious thing.
I thirst for springs of heav’nly life,
And here all day they rise;
I seek the treasure of Thy love,
And close at hand it lies.

I have a heritage of joy,
That yet I must not see;
The hand that bled to make it mine
Is keeping it for me.
And a new song is in my mouth,
To long-loved music set: 
“Glory to Thee for all the grace
I have not tasted yet.”

My heart is resting, O my God,
My heart is in Thy care;
I hear the voice of joy and health
Resounding ev’rywhere.
“Thou art my portion,” saith my soul,
Ten thousand voices say.
The music of their glad amen
Will never die away.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 251 首 - 聖靈的洗
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聖靈如油倒在人身，方言、靈歌是真；
聖靈如雨澆在人身，清新、涼爽是真；
聖靈如風吹在人身，震動、跳舞是真。
我真羨慕，我必祈求，更願靈恩普臨。

聖靈如火落在人身，使人火熱是真；
聖靈如鴿降在人身，馴良、溫柔是真；
聖靈如膏膏在人身，教訓、引導是真。
我真羨慕，我必祈求，更願靈恩普臨。

english_page_header: Hymn 252 - Pour Down on Me, Holy Spirit
english_full_lyrics:
Pour down on me, Holy Spirit,
Fill my heart with Thy grace;
Lord, keep me in Thy presence,
Lest I turn from Thy face.

Thou canst fill me, precious Spirit,
Unto Thee will I bow;
I need Thee to guide me,
Come and dwell with me now.

I am weak, Lord, lend me strength now,
Fill my heart with Thy love;
Keep me on Thy pathway,
With Thy pow’r from above.

May the stream of living water
Fill my heart to the end,
Until in Thy kingdom,
I will ne’er thirst again.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 252 首 - 渴慕聖靈充滿
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我今渴慕聖靈充滿，
渴慕聖靈充滿，
渴慕聖靈充滿，
渴慕聖靈充滿。

今求聖靈
充滿我心，
今日充滿我心，
今日充滿我心，
今日充滿我心。

在我腹中
成為泉源，
成為活水泉源，
成為活水泉源，
成為活水泉源。

流出生命
活水江河，
流出活水江河，
流出活水江河，
流出活水江河。

english_page_header: Hymn 253 - He Is Here!
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus said when bidding them farewell, 
“In a little while I’ll come again.”
What a precious gift to us He’s giv’n:
Promised Holy Spirit to all men.

He has sent His Spirit to be here,
By that power, all sinners are healed,
Pow’r that over Satan shall prevail;
Truth and grace in Him shall be revealed.

He has said that when the Spirit comes,
We’ll receive His power from above.
He will teach us what we ought to say,
Witness for Him, ’til that glorious day.

REFRAIN
He is here! He is here!
O what blessed news we hear, ’Tis the Savior dear!
Come repent, and with zeal,
Welcome Him to our hearts.
He is here, the Promised Spirit is here!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 253 首 - 聖靈已來
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主在臨別對門徒說道，
不多幾日聖靈必來到，
引導明白一切的真理，
永住我們裡面為至寶。

主說信徒要受聖靈洗，
能說方言又能行神蹟，
醫病趕鬼顯明大權柄，
到處證實救恩與真理。

主說聖靈降在人身上，
就必領受上頭的能力，
指教門徒要如何說話，
為主做見證直到地極。

副歌
已來到，已來到，永遠同住的聖靈已來到；
要悔改，發熱心，開心門大歡迎，因主應許的聖靈已來到。

english_page_header: Hymn 254 - Thou Art My Shepherd
english_full_lyrics:
Thou art my Shepherd,
Caring in ev’ry need,
Thy loving lamb to feed,
Trusting Thee still,
In the green pastures low,
Where living waters flow,
Safe by Thy side I go,
Fearing no ill.

Or if my way lie
Where storms are raging nigh,
Nothing can terrify,
I trust Thee still,
How can I be afraid,
While softly on my head
Thy tender hand is laid;
I fear no ill.

Goodness and mercy
Ever shall follow me,
Till by Thy grace I see
Thy holy hill;
Lord, in that home with Thee,
Joyful eternally,
Folded Thy flock shall be,
Safe from all ill.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 254 首 - 方言寶貴
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
方言寶貴，怎能不說？靈洗憑據，符合聖經；
古今聖會，如出一轍，人若反對，何等愚拙！

方言寶貴，怎能不說？聖經明訓，不可棄絕；
若用講道，須有翻譯；若用禱告，能得神悅。

方言寶貴，怎能不說？聖靈造就，自恨、自責；
人雖不懂，乃對神說，在心靈裡，說出奧秘。

方言寶貴，怎能不說？聖靈感動，滿懷火熱；
方言泉湧，句句有節，態度、聲音，絕不暴裂。

english_page_header: Hymn 255 - Saviour, Breathe an Evening Blessing
english_full_lyrics:
Saviour, breathe an evening blessing,
Ere repose our spirits seal;
Sin and want we come confessing:
Thou canst save , and Thou canst heal.

Though destruction walk around us,
Though the arrow past us fly,
Angel guards from Thee surround us;
We are safe if Thou art nigh.

Though the night be dark and dreary,
Darkness cannot hide from Thee;
Thou art He who, never weary,
Watchest where Thy people be.

Should swift death this night o’ertake us,
And our couch become our tomb,
May the morn in heav’n awake us,
Clad in light and deathless bloom.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 255 首 - 主今夜賜福
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
親愛主！今夜賜福氣，祢的恩膏滿心裡；
俯伏在主腳前痛悔，祈求主，免我眾罪。

仇敵雖然四面環繞，還有暗箭在周遭；
主差天使隨時照料，我藏祂安穩懷抱。

暮色雖顯幽暗、陰沉，黑夜不能遮蔽神；
因我天父永不困倦，聖眼常垂顧子民。

今夜主若召我安息，暫時安睡塵土裡；
唯願我得復活見主，永遠與主享安息。

english_page_header: Hymn 256 - There Shall Be Showers of Blessing
english_full_lyrics:
There shall be showers of blessing:
This is the promise of love;
There shall be seasons refreshing,
Sent from the Saviour above.

There shall be showers of blessing,
Precious reviving again;
Over the hills and the valleys,
Sound of abundance of rain.

There shall be showers of blessing:
Send them upon us, O Lord;
Grant to us now a refreshing,
Come, and now honor Thy Word.

There shall be showers of blessing:
Oh, that today they might fall,
Now as to God we’re confessing,
Now as on Jesus we call!

REFRAIN
Showers of blessing,
Showers of blessing we need:
Mercy drops round us are falling,
But for the showers we plead.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 256 首 - 恩雨大降
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
「將有百福降如甘霖」，是主慈愛之應許！
應許時日今已來臨，來自施恩之救主。

「將有百福降如甘霖」，乾枯靈命得復甦；
山野、谿谷皆蒙滋潤，喜見時雨同歡呼。

「將有百福降如甘霖」，我今痛悔仰望神；
呼求耶穌厚施憐憫，好令恩雨降我身。

「將有百福降如甘霖」，只需信靠而順從；
復興、平安即將到臨，只要遵主旨意行。

副歌
福降如甘霖，就是晚雨之聖靈；
已聞周圍滴瀝聲音，但求澆灌我內心！

english_page_header: Hymn 257 - The Saviour Bids Thee Watch and Pray
english_full_lyrics:
The Saviour bids thee watch and pray,
Through life’s momentous hour,
And grants the Spirit’s quick’ning ray
To those who seek His power,
To those who seek His power.

The Saviour bids thee watch and pray,
Maintain a warrior’s strife:
O Christian! hear His voice today:
Obedience is thy life,
Obedience is thy life.

The Saviour bids thee watch and pray,
For soon the hour will come
That calls thee from the earth away
To thy eternal home,
To thy eternal home.

The Saviour bids thee watch and pray,
Oh, hearken to His voice,
And follow where He leads the way
To heav’n’s eternal joys!
To heav’n’s eternal joys!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 257 首 - 儆醒祈禱
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主叫我儆醒祈禱，一生一世不停，應許我有聖靈幫助，
只要靠祂聖名，只要靠祂聖名。

救主叫我儆醒祈禱，盡力做主勇兵，因為仇敵乖巧、凶惡，
要害我的生命，要害我的生命。

救主叫我儆醒祈禱，心裡不要憂苦，今生便可得勝仇敵，
來世得享永福，來世得享永福。

救主叫我儆醒祈禱，我願聽主吩咐，逐日用心學主榜樣，
跟主同走天路，跟主同走天路。

english_page_header: Hymn 258 - ’Tis Not with Eyes of Flesh We See
english_full_lyrics:
’Tis not with eyes of flesh we see
That Thou art God’s anointed One;
With eyes of faith we look to Thee
As God’s beloved only Son—
Eternal King enthroned above,
Revealer of His grace and love.

Thou only hast the words of life;
Unto no other can we go.
None but Thyself can calm our strife,
And none but Thee our hopes can know.
Since Thou hast walked this way before,
Thou art to us the only door.

Believing thus, Thou Son of God,
We walk with Thee along life’s way.
We follow where Thy feet have trod
Unto that realm of glorious day.
Fill Thou our hearts with joyous song;
Sustain our faith and make us strong.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 258 首 - 禁食祈禱
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
禁食能力勝過肉體，耶穌聖靈在我心裡；
制服情慾，治死惡行，堅持信心，忍耐到底。

禁食能力勝過世界，魔鬼試探被我打敗；
人要活著，須靠主話，萬國榮華，視同草芥。

禁食能力勝過邪靈，靠著聖靈宣傳福音；
醫病、趕鬼，救人靈魂，齊心努力，引人歸真。

副歌
我靠聖靈必定得勝，耶穌幫助，使我得勝。

english_page_header: Hymn 259 - Sweet Hour of Prayer
english_full_lyrics:
Sweet hour of prayer! sweet hour of prayer!
That calls me from a world of care,
And bids me at my Father’s throne,
Make all my wants and wishes known.
In seasons of distress and grief,
My soul has often found relief,
And oft escaped the tempter’s snare
By thy return, sweet hour of prayer!

Sweet hour of prayer! sweet hour of prayer!
The joys I feel, the bliss I share,
Of those whose anxious spirits burn
With strong desires for thy return!
With such I hasten to the place
Where God my Saviour shows His face,
And gladly take my station there,
And wait for thee, sweet hour of prayer!

Sweet hour of prayer! sweet hour of prayer!
Thy wings shall my petition bear
To Him, whose truth and faithfulness
Engage the waiting soul to bless.
And since He bids me seek His face,
Believe His Word, and trust His grace,
I’ll cast on Him my ev’ry care,
And wait for thee, sweet hour of prayer!

Sweet hour of prayer! sweet hour of prayer!
May I thy consolation share,
Till from mount Pisgah’s lofty height,
I view my home and take my flight.
This robe of flesh I’ll drop and rise
To seize the everlasting prize,
And shout, while passing through the air, 
“Farewell, farewell, sweet hour of prayer!”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 259 首 - 恆切禱告
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
恆切禱告，心誠意真；能忘俗慮，倚靠真神；
在祂殿中，虔敬跪拜；諸般所求，奉主聖名。
哈拿愁苦，默禱交託；瞎子求醫，呼主不停；
迦南婦人，因信懇求。都得恩惠，沛如甘霖。

恆切禱告，語簡情殷；傾心吐意，如香上焚；
上主慈悲，必然憐恤；醫我身體，救我靈魂。
叩門借餅，情詞迫切；寡婦求官，終得伸冤。
主之選民，晝夜呼籲；若不灰心，必能沐恩。

恆切禱告，隨時多方；出外、在家，或在會堂；
施恩寶座，就在面前；隨地求告，良機勿忘。
海上遇難，呼主蒙祐；陸上危險，主賜平康；
死蔭幽谷，亦不遭害。恆切禱告，蒙恩無量。

english_page_header: Hymn 260 - Awake, My Soul, and with the Sun
english_full_lyrics:
Awake, my soul and with the sun
Thy daily stage of duty run;
Shake off dull sloth, and joyful rise,
To pay thy morning sacrifice,
To pay thy morning sacrifice.

Lord, I my vows to Thee renew:
Disperse my sins as morning dew,
Guard my first springs of thought and will,
And with Thyself my spirit fill,
And with Thyself my spirit fill.

Direct, control, suggest this day,
All I design, or do, or say,
That all my pow’rs, with all their might,
In Thy sole glory may unite,
In Thy sole glory may unite.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 260 首 - 清晨頌主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
倚靠天父時常保護，一夜平安歇息；
於今我要恭敬稱頌，感謝天父恩德，感謝天父恩德。

懇求天父今日照顧，樣樣所做順利；
救我免罪，保我免禍，常常尊主旨意，常常尊主旨意。

慈悲聖靈住我裡面，使我身心安泰；
賜我力量，助我事奉，預備迎主再來，預備迎主再來。

english_page_header: Hymn 261 - O God, Whose Smile Is in the Sky
english_full_lyrics:
O God, whose smile is in the sky,
Whose path is in the sea,
Once more from earth’s tumultuous strife
We gladly turn to Thee.

Now all the myriad sounds of earth
In solemn stillness die;
While wind and wave unite to chant
Their anthems to the sky.

We come as those with toil far spent
Who crave Thy rest and peace,
And from the care and fret of life
Would find in Thee release.

O Father, soothe all troubled thoughts,
Dispel all idle fear,
Purge Thou each heart of secret sin,
And banish ev’ry care.

Until, as shine upon the sea,
The silent stars above,
There shines upon our trusting souls
The light of Thine own love.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 261 首 - 晚禱感恩
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今天又是一日過去，我們大家相會；
都在天父面前跪拜，感謝保佑恩惠。

多蒙天父今日保護，闔家喜樂、平安；
今日夜間懇求天父，再保護到天亮。

加我敬愛，使我深信，德行都能全備；
儆醒預備，日日前進，將來同住福地。

english_page_header: Hymn 262 - I Want a Principle Within
english_full_lyrics:
I want a principle within
Of watchful godly fear,
A sensibility of sin,
A pain to feel it near.
Help me the first approach to feel
Of pride or wrong desire;
To catch the wand’ring of my will,
And quench the kindling fire.

From Thee that I no more may stray,
No more Thy goodness grieve,
Grant me the filial awe, I pray,
The tender conscience give;
Quick as the apple of an eye,
O God, my conscience make!
Awake my soul when sin is nigh,
And keep it still awake.

Almighty God of truth and love,
To me Thy power impart;
The burden from my soul remove,
The hardness from my heart.
O may the least omission pain
My reawakened soul,
And drive me to that grace again,
Which makes the wounded whole.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 262 首 - 與神靈交
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
神子跪禱，捶胸愁臉，忽升第三層天，
聖父慈聲召我進前，問我：「所求那件？」
我說：「今生思慮累住，我父！求你垂憐！
但願先求神國神義，衣、食必賜完全。」

神子跪禱，身潔、衣整，忽升第三層天，
聖父慈手按我兩肩，問我：「所求那件？
我說：「世界罪惡、污穢，我父！求你垂憐！
但願守道不沾惡俗，賜我聖潔完全。

神子跪禱，心誠、意真，忽升第三層天，
聖父慈顏就我身邊，問我：「所求那件？」
我說：「肉體情慾轄制，我父！求你垂憐！
但願日日攻克己身，靈果結出完全。」

神子跪禱，神清、氣爽，忽升第三層天，
聖父慈臂向我擁抱，問我：「所求那件？」
我說：「教會嫉妒、分爭，我父！求你垂憐！
但願彼此謙卑相愛，主裡合一完全。」

english_page_header: Hymn 263 - What a Friend We Have in Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
What a friend we have in Jesus,
All our sins and griefs to bear!
What a privilege to carry
Ev’rything to God in prayer!
O, what peace we often forfeit,
O, what needless pain we bear,
All because we do not carry
Ev’rything to God in prayer!

Have we trials and temptations?
Is there trouble anywhere?
We should never be discouraged;
Take it to the Lord in prayer.
Can we find a friend so faithful
Who will all our sorrows share?
Jesus knows our ev’ry weakness;
Take it to the Lord in prayer.

Are we weak and heavy laden,
Cumbered with a load of care?
Precious Saviour, still our refuge,
Take it to the Lord in prayer:
Do thy friends despise, forsake thee?
Take it to the Lord in prayer;
In His arms He’ll take and shield thee;
Thou wilt find a solace there.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 263 首 - 耶穌恩友
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主耶穌是我恩友，負我罪孽，擔我憂，
何等奇妙，我主恩寵，能將萬事向祂求！
多少平安我們坐失？多少眼淚冤枉流？
都是因為未將萬事，提到耶穌座前求。

我們或有試探、引誘，或有難過苦關頭，
決不應當因此灰心，仍當到主座前求；
何處能尋這般良友，同嘗一切苦與愁？
我們軟弱，主能體恤，放心到主座前求。

我們是否軟弱、多愁，千斤重擔壓肩頭？
主仍做我們避難所，快向耶穌座前求！
你若真逢友叛、親離，當向耶穌座前求，
到祂懷中必蒙保護，有祂安慰便無愁。

english_page_header: Hymn 264 - Pass Me Not, O Gentle Saviour
english_full_lyrics:
Pass me not, O gentle Saviour,
Hear my humble cry;
While on others Thou art calling,
Do not pass me by.

Let me at Thy throne of mercy
Find a sweet relief;
Kneeling there in deep contrition,
Help my unbelief.

Trusting only in Thy merit,
Would I seek Thy face;
Heal my wounded, broken spirit,
Save me by Thy grace.

Thou the spring of all my comfort,
More than life to me,
Whom have I on earth beside Thee?
Whom in heav’n but Thee?

REFRAIN
Saviour, Saviour,
Hear my humble cry;
While on others Thou art calling,
Do not pass me by.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 264 首 - 求主垂憐
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
懇求救主格外垂憐，請聽我禱告；
既有別人蒙主垂聽，使我亦沾恩。

讓我進到恩主台前，永遠不相離；
一心仰望救主憐憫，篤信而不疑。

今只靠托我主慈悲，才敢尋主面；
心中悲傷，求主醫治，賜我大恩典。

救主是我平安根源，比生命更寶；
天上、地下除主以外，無救主可靠。

副歌
親愛救主！請聽我禱告；既有別人蒙主垂聽，使我亦沾恩。

english_page_header: Hymn 265 - Tell It to Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Are you weary, are you heavy hearted?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus;
Are you grieving over joys departed?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

Do the tears flow down your cheeks unbidden?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus;
Have you sins that to men’s eyes are hidden?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

Do you fear the gath’ring clouds of sorrow?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus;
Are you anxious what shall be tomorrow?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

Are you troubled at the thought of dying?
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus;
For Christ’s coming Kingdom are you sighing?
Tell it to Jesus alone.

REFRAIN
Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus,
He is a friend that’s well known;
You’ve no other such a friend or brother,
Tell it to Jesus alone.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 265 首 - 快告訴耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你心若有什麼疑慮、痛苦，
你當告訴耶穌，你當告訴耶穌；
祂必時時安慰，處處匡扶，
故當快告訴耶穌。

你心若有什麼積怨、含怒，
你當告訴耶穌，你當告訴耶穌；
祂必時時開導，處處提醒，
故當快告訴耶穌。

你心若有什麼軟弱、胆怯，
你當告訴耶穌，你當告訴耶穌；
祂必時時幫助，處處看顧，
故當快告訴耶穌。

副歌
你當告訴耶穌，你當告訴耶穌，
最慈愛的主耶穌；祂是你救主，
必允許你所求，必做你隨時幫助。

english_page_header: Hymn 266 - Mighty God, While Angels Bless Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Mighty God, while angels bless Thee,
May a mortal sing Thy name?
Lord of men as well as angels,
Thou art ev’ry creature’s theme.
Lord of ev’ry land and nation,
Ancient of eternal days,
Sounded through the wide creation
Be Thy just and endless praise.

For the grandeur of Thy nature,
Grand beyond a seraph’s thought;
For the wonders of creation;
Works with skill and kindness wrought.
For Thy providence, that governs,
Thro’ Thine empire’s wide domain,
Wings an angel, guides a sparrow,
Blessed be Thy gentle reign.

But Thy rich, Thy free redemption,
Bright, tho’ veiled in darkness long;
Thought is poor, and poor expression;
Who can sing that wondrous song?
Brightness of the Father’s glory,
Shall Thy praise unuttered lie?
Break, my tongue, such guilty silence!
Sing the Lord who came to die.

From the highest throne of glory
To the cross of deepest woe,
All to ransom guilty captives;
Flow my praise, forever flow!
Reascend, immortal Saviour;
Leave Thy footstool, take Thy throne;
Thence return, and reign forever,
Be the kingdom all Thine own!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 266 首 - 傳揚福音
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
奉主差遣，傳揚福音，當做僕役服事人，
百般勞苦，十分謙遜，一點驕傲不敢存。
謹慎戰兢，謹慎戰兢，彷彿羊羔入狼群，
謹慎戰兢，謹慎戰兢，彷彿羊羔入狼群。

我若畏難，退縮因循，恐怕主怒臨我身，
努力進前，尋找亡羊，權柄能力靠聖靈。
放膽宣講，放膽宣講，證明十架主救恩，
放膽宣講，放膽宣講，證明十架主救恩。

勸人悔改，棄假歸真，魔鬼抵擋直到今，
為道爭戰，不畏艱辛，忍受試煉火鍛金。
馴良、靈巧，馴良、靈巧，防備鬼計要儆醒，
馴良、靈巧，馴良、靈巧，防備鬼計要儆醒。

兩個兩個，主派出去，同工、同勞又同心，
兄弟手足，聯絡合作，須知獨木不成林。
彼此相愛，彼此相愛，救主命令當遵憑，
彼此相愛，彼此相愛，救主命令當遵憑。

english_page_header: Hymn 267 - O for a Heart to Praise My God
english_full_lyrics:
O for a heart to praise my God,
A heart from sin set free,
A heart that always feels Thy blood
So freely shed for me.

A humble, lowly, contrite heart,
Believing, true and clean,
Which neither life nor death can part
From Christ that dwells within.

A heart in every thought renewed,
And full of love divine;
Perfect and right and pure and good,
A copy, Lord, of Thine!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 267 首 - 聽主差遣
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我曾聽見主的聲音：「誰肯聽我差遣？」
我對主說：「我在這裡，願主現在差遣！」

差我何往，我必前往；要我何言，必言；
派我何事，我都樂做。身心甘獻主前。

傳揚真道，雖遭艱險，聖靈助我得勝；
聖工完畢，得立主前，主必親贈冠冕。

english_page_header: Hymn 268 - God Is Calling Yet
english_full_lyrics:
God calling yet! shall I not hear?
Earth’s pleasures shall I still hold dear?
Shall life’s swift passing years all fly,
And still my soul in slumber lie?

God calling yet! shall I not rise?
Can I His loving voice despise,
And basely His kind care repay?
He calls me still; can I delay?

God calling yet! and shall He knock,
And I my heart the closer lock?
He still is waiting to receive,
And shall I dare His Spirit grieve?

God calling yet! and shall I give
No heed, but still in bondage live?
I wait, but He does not forsake;
He calls me still; my heart, awake!

God calling yet! I cannot stay;
My heart I yield without delay:
Vain world, farewell, from thee I part;
The voice of God has reached my heart.

REFRAIN
Calling, oh, hear Him,
Calling, oh, hear Him,
God is calling yet, oh, hear Him calling, calling,
Calling, oh, hear Him,
Calling, oh, hear Him,
God is calling yet, oh, hear Him calling yet.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 268 首 - 聽從主呼召
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主在叫我，豈可不聽？我的靈魂應當儆醒；
地上榮華，快樂享受，如同浮雲，轉眼消形。

主在叫我，要快起來，豈可忽視祂的慈愛？
趕快起來，為祂工作，不可將我責任推開。

主在叫我，打開心門，豈可緊閉，令祂愁煩？
聽祂呼召，去傳福音，努力拯救罪中靈魂。

副歌
恩主叫，要聽祂，恩主叫，要聽祂；
恩主叫我，我要聽衪，我要聽衪。
恩主叫，要聽祂，恩主叫，要聽衪；
恩主叫我，我要趕緊聽從祂。

english_page_header: Hymn 269 - Hark, the Voice of Jesus Calling
english_full_lyrics:
Hark, the voice of Jesus calling, 
“Who will go and work today?
Fields are ripe and harvests waiting:
Who will bear the sheaves away?”
Long and loud the Master calls us,
Rich reward He offers free;
Who will answer, gladly saying, 
“Here am I, send me, send me?”

If you cannot cross the ocean,
And the distant lands explore,
You can find the lost around you,
You can help them at your door.
If you cannot give your thousands,
You can give the widow’s mite;
What you truly give for Jesus
Will be precious in His sight.

If you cannot speak like angels,
If you cannot preach like Paul,
You can tell the love of Jesus,
You can say He died for all.
If you cannot rouse the wicked
With the judgment’s dread alarms,
You can lead the little children
To the Savior’s waiting arms.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 269 首 - 聞主呼召我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聽見救主出聲叫我：「什麼人要去工作？
觀看田疇，莊稼已熟，什麼人要去收穫？」
救主很久就在呼叫，祂獎賞實在美好，
有誰甘心即時回應「我在此，差我，差我！」

假使不能前往遠處，傳揚得救的福音，
你之鄰居周圍有人，未曾歸入主聖名；
當向他們勸告、引領，來信耶穌得永生，
爭取時機，為主工作，祂必記念你熱誠。

不可偷懶，故意推辭，說你無力量作工，
世間眾人正在沉淪，你豈可無動於衷?
當速聽從救主命令，盡力作工福無窮，
主在乎召，趕緊回答:「我在此，差我，差我！」

english_page_header: Hymn 270 - The Regions Beyond
english_full_lyrics:
To the regions beyond I must go, I must go,
Where the story has never been told;
To the millions that never have heard of His love,
I must tell the sweet story of old.

To the hardest of places He calls me to go,
Never thinking of comfort or ease;
The world may pronounce me a dreamer, a fool,
Enough if the Master I please.

Oh, you that are spending your leisure and pow’rs
In those pleasures so foolish and fond;
Awake from your selfishness, folly and sin,
And go to the regions beyond.

There are other “lost sheep” that the Master must bring,
And to them must the message be told;
He sends me to gather them out of all lands,
And welcome them back to His fold.

REFRAIN
To the regions beyond I must go, I must go,
Till the world, all the world,
His salvation shall know.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 270 首 - 要遙遠地方
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
到遙遠各地方，我必去，我必去，那裡人未聽見主真理；
千萬人還不知十字架主救恩，快去傳此佳音，勿猶疑。

主耶穌差遣我，到任何艱苦地，切莫想來體貼我自己；
世上人都以我為癡狂，為羞恥，但願主喜悅我便滿意。

莫偷閒，莫遊蕩，好光陰莫拋棄，壞世俗莫留戀去耍戲；
勿淫逸，勿自私，應覺悟，該醒起，快快去遙遠地傳真理。

那亡羊正流離，好牧人曾代死，此佳音應傳入他耳裡；
主差遣我前往，將他們齊聚集，合一群，歸一牧，心歡喜。

副歌
到遠方傳福音，我必去，我必去；
使普世眾罪人，得救恩做主民。

english_page_header: Hymn 271 - Never Be Afraid
english_full_lyrics:
Never be afraid to speak for Jesus,
Think how much a word can do;
Never be afraid to own your Saviour,
He who loves and cares for you.

Never be afraid to work for Jesus
In His vineyard day by day;
Labor with a kind and willing spirit,
He will all your toil repay.

Never be afraid to bear for Jesus
Keen reproaches when they fall;
Patiently endure your ev’ry trial,
Jesus meekly bore them all.

Never be afraid to die for Jesus,
He the Life, the Truth, the Way,
Gently in His arms of love will bear you
To the realms of endless day.

REFRAIN
Never be afraid, Never be afraid,
Never, never, never;
Jesus is your loving Saviour,
Therefore never be afraid.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 271 首 - 不要懼怕
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你不要懼怕，為耶穌見證，當知一言也有益；
你不要懼怕，將主名尊奉，因主時常保祐你。

你不要懼怕，為主做聖工，每日殷勤在園中；
你雖然勞碌，當踴躍、歡呼，主裡不徒然勞苦。

你不要懼怕，為主受艱難，或受逼迫與辱罵；
你不可忘記，你主在世界，曾為你背十字架。

你不要懼怕，為耶穌捨命，主是生命和道路；
當祂再來時，必接你上升，進入天國享永福。

副歌
你不要懼怕，你不要懼怕，莫怕，莫怕，莫怕；
耶穌是你慈悲救主，所以你不要懼怕。

english_page_header: Hymn 272 - The Comforter Has Come
english_full_lyrics:
O spread the tidings ’round, wherever man is found,
Wherever human hearts and human woes abound;
Let ev’ry Christian tongue proclaim the joyful sound:
The Comforter has come!

The long, long night is past, the morning breaks at last,
And hushed the dreadful wail and fury of the blast,
As o’er the golden hills the day advances fast!
The Comforter has come!

Lo, the great King of kings, with healing in His wings,
To ev’ry captive soul a full deliv’rance brings;
And thro’ the vacant cells the song of triumph rings;
The Comforter has come!

O boundless love divine! how shall this tongue of mine
To wond’ring mortals tell the matchless grace divine—
That I, a child of hell, should in His image shine!
The Comforter has come!

REFRAIN
The Comforter has come, The Comforter has come!
The Holy Spirit from Heav’n,
The Father’s promise giv’n;
O spread the tidings ’round, wherever man is found —
The Comforter has come!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 272 首 - 保惠師已經到
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我到大陸、海島，傳揚得救真道，罪中男、女、老、少，都有極大苦惱；
應當靈巧、馴良，快去尋找迷羊，保惠師已經到。

深夜黑暗退藏，天亮顯出日光，許多危險風浪，現在轉入康莊；
速將救恩廣傳，工成必得獎賞，保惠師已經到。

我主萬王之王，權柄能力無雙，人若患病、附鬼，必得完全釋放；
末日凱歌齊唱，樂哉，進入天堂！保惠師已經到。

副歌
保惠師已經到，保惠師已經到，聖靈真是至寶，世上無處可找；
最好信息去報，最好信息去報，保惠師已經到。

english_page_header: Hymn 273 - The Glad Tidings
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 273 首 - 大喜信息
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聽之，聽之，馬其頓人求而呼曰：「過來以主之福音助吾，
使吾聽見，免去罪孽；大喜信息，以主之活泉潤心。」
宣揚基督十字架者，何不興起？須遵主之命，去傳福音，
發出光輝，燭於幽暗，照於內心，傳遍於各地、各城；
東而來者密如雲，西而來者復有人，皆至主前頌尊名。
蒙主救贖古聖民，首戴華冠得尊榮，同在天國享永生。

傳之，傳之，速傳平安大喜信息，將主之救恩宣告萬民，
走遍萬方，登山渡海，為道作證，腳蹤佳美而和平。
宣揚基督十字架者，何不興起？須遵主之命，去傳福音，
吹起號筒，傳播警告，引人歸真，高舉十字架聖旌；
至終地上遠近邦，無不聽見主佳音，信者蒙恩何豐盛！
末日來到主降臨，迎接信徒進天城，同享永遠大尊榮。

副歌
聽之，聽之，馬其頓人求而呼曰：「過來以主之福音助吾，
使吾聽見，免去罪孽；大喜信息，以主之活泉潤心。」

english_page_header: Hymn 274A - The Light of God Is Falling
english_full_lyrics:
The light of God is falling
Upon life’s common way;
The Master’s voice still calling, “Come, walk with Me today”;
No duty can seem lowly
To him who lives with Thee,
And all of life grows holy,
O Christ of Galilee!

Who shares his life’s pure pleasures,
And walks the honest road,
Who trades with heaping measures,
And lifts his brother’s load,
Who turns the wrongs down bluntly,
And lends the right a hand,
He dwells in God’s own country,
He tills the holy land.

Where human lives are thronging
In toil and pain and sin,
While cloistered hearts are longing
To bring the kingdom in,
O Christ, the elder Brother
Of proud and beaten men,
When they have found each other,
Thy kingdom will come then!

Thy ransomed host in glory,
All souls that sin and pray,
Turn toward the cross that bore Thee; “Behold the Man!” they say:
And while Thy church is pleading
For all who would do good,
We hear Thy true voice leading
Our song of brotherhood.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 274 (甲) 首 - 晚雨降臨
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
晚雨聖靈已降臨，居住眾人內心，
所有聖經之應許，日日越看越真；
祈禱聲音達天上，高呼：「哈利路亞！」
選民進入真教會，天下一家相親。

天國福音顯出來，異端邪教消滅，
世間眾人趁此時，要快悔改罪孽；
現在聖靈大降臨，賜人得救印記，
等到萬國都歸真，主恩一齊感激。

世界眾人藉基督，得與天父相親，
同蒙應許受聖靈，感謝歸給真神；
生命、言行都改變，內外一概換新，
救主恩惠深如海，聖會普遍奮興。

末世靈工大發展，到處大開恩門，
收割莊稼要努力，遍行市、縣、鄉、村；
無論貧富與貴賤，人人可得天恩，
勿失良機快歸主，主道永遠長存。

english_page_header: Hymn 274B - From Greenland’s Icy Mountains
english_full_lyrics:
From Greenland’s icy mountains,
From India’s coral strand,
Where Afric’s sunny fountains
Roll down their golden sand,
From many an ancient river,
From many a palmy plain,
They call us to deliver
Their land from error’s chain.

What though the spicy breezes
Blow soft o’er Ceylon’s isle;
Though ev’ry prospect pleases,
And only man is vile;
In vain with lavish kindness
The gifts of God are strewn;
The heathen in his blindness
Bows down to wood and stone.

Shall we, whose souls are lighted,
With wisdom from on high,
Shall we to men benighted
The lamp of life deny?
Salvation! O salvation!
The joyful sound proclaim,
Till earth’s remotest nation
Has learned Messiah’s name.

Waft, waft, ye winds, His story,
And you ye waters, roll,
Till, like a sea of glory,
It spreads from pole to pole;
Till o’er our ransomed nature
The Lamb for sinners slain,
Redeemer, King, Creator,
In bliss returns to reign.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 274 (乙) 首 - 福音要遍傳
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
從格陵蘭冰雪山，至印度珊瑚岸，
在非洲金色沙漠，清泉明映烈陽，
到廣闊河流之地，沃野平原無際，
萬民向我們求救，解除他們憂傷。

和風緩吹送花香，飄到錫蘭島上，
風光雖美麗非常，人卻被罪捆綁，
天父豐盛的恩惠，都成浪費、枉然，
世人都蒙昧心盲，竟拜木石偶像。

我們得福音真光，天上智慧昭亮，
為何不到黑暗地，傳遞生命之光？
將這寶貴的救恩，遍傳各城、各鄉，
直到普天下萬民    認識基督為王。

風啊，願你快吹揚，水啊，願你流暢，
如江河大海汪洋，福音傳遍四方，
直到造物主君王，即贖罪聖羔羊，
榮耀再臨掌王權，統治萬世無疆。

english_page_header: Hymn 275 - Bringing in the Sheaves
english_full_lyrics:
Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness,
Sowing in the noontide and the dewy eve;
Waiting for the harvest, and the time of reaping,
We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves.

Sowing in the sunshine, sowing in the shadows;
Fearing neither clouds nor winter’s chilling breeze;
By and by the harvest and the labor ended,
We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves.

Going forth with weeping, sowing for the Master,
Tho’ the loss sustained our spirit often grieves;
When our weeping’s over, He will bid us welcome,
We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves.

REFRAIN
Bringing in the sheaves, bringing in the sheaves,
We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves;
Bringing in the sheaves, bringing in the sheaves,
We shall come rejoicing, bringing in the sheaves.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 275 首 - 禾捆收回家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
種子撒於早晚，種子撒於日午，撒出天國好種，甚望得萌芽；
等到禾稼成熟，等到收割日子，我們實在歡喜，禾捆收回家。

種子撒於晴日，種子撒於陰日，何懼黑雲遮蔽，風雪並交加？
等到辛苦完了，等到收歛時期，我們實在歡喜，禾捆收回家。

種子撒於各洲，種子撒於眾島，含淚、煩悶前往，景況或不佳；
等到流淚完畢，直到勞苦歇息，我們實在歡喜，禾捆收回家。

為道奔走宣講，靠著聖靈引導，雖然窮鄉、僻壤，跋涉莫怨嗟；
福音傳遍天下，主即來接我們，我們必甚歡喜，永遠在神家。

副歌
禾捆收回家，禾捆收回家，我們實在歡喜，禾捆收回家；
禾捆收回家，禾捆收回家，我們實在歡喜，禾捆收回家。

english_page_header: Hymn 276 - Come, Dear Friends, the Gospel Hear
english_full_lyrics:
Come, dear friends, the Gospel hear!
Listen to His Word!
By His teachings wise and clear,
Let His voice be heard!
Christ forgiveth all:
This our song of hope and joy;
Free from sin we enter in to Live
with Him on High.

Come, ye sinners, to receive
Blessings from above,
God’s truth is His Holy Word,
Shown to us in love.
Jesus is our guide!
Nailed on Calvary He died!
For to save us, life He gave us,
let His love abide!

Come, believers, in His Word!
Understand and see,
God’s truth is the only way,
Just and righteous He!
By His Word made wise,
Baptized all who seek to find
Wisdom, truth and saving grace in Jesus,
sweet and kind.

Come, ye weary, seek the Lord!
Hearken to His voice!
Telling of our heav’nly home
In His Father’s house.
God’s great love reveals
Mysteries of heav’nly grace,
Freely given, freely given to
Ev’ry tongue and race.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 276 首 - 來聽福音
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
親友們！來聽福音，是非要認真，
救世大道理最明，真神施憐憫，
拯救人靈魂；信者脫罪免沉淪，
無論士、農、工、商，男、女、老、幼，億兆民。

親友們！來聽天道，是非要查考，
神聖大道理最好，耶穌做中保，
釘死十字架；信者離俗出苦惱，
無論亞、非、歐、美、澳洲，小嶼與大島。

親友們！來聽真理，是非要知悉，
永生大道理最奇，聖靈指教你，
啟發你靈智；信者受洗歸主裡，
無論南、北、東、西四方，天涯與地極。

親友們！來聽良箴，是非要認清，
天國大道理最真，使你得永生，
真神顯大愛；信者歸真進天城，
無論智愚、貧、富、貴、賤，化外與文明。

english_page_header: Hymn 277 - I Love to Tell the Story
english_full_lyrics:
I love to tell the story Of unseen things above,
Of Jesus and His glory, Of Jesus and His love:
I love to tell the story, Because I know ’tis true;
It satisfies my longings As nothing else can do.

I love to tell the story; More wonderful it seems
Than all the golden fancies Of all our golden dreams:
I love to tell the story, It did so much for me,
And that is just the reason I tell it now to thee.

I love to tell the story; ’Tis pleasant to repeat
What seems each time I tell it, More wonderfully sweet:
I love to tell the story, For some have never heard
The message of salvation From God’s own holy Word.

I love to tell the story; For those who know it best
Seem hungering and thirsting, To hear it, like the rest:
And when in scenes of glory, I sing the new, new song, 
’Twill be the old, old story That I have loved so long.

REFRAIN
I love to tell the story; ’Twill be my theme in glory
To tell the old, old story
Of Jesus and His love.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 277 首 - 喜傳福音
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我傳福音喜不勝，所講耶穌救人，
如何自天而降臨？如何在地受刑？我要宣傳主福音，
因為恩道是真，勝過世上多黃金，使我喜樂滿心。

我傳福音喜不勝，所講除罪更新，
如何受洗做新人？如何懇求聖靈？我要宣傳主福音，
因為應許是真，奉命見證對萬民，不怕許多艱辛。

我傳福音喜不勝，所講耶穌再臨，
如何預備迎主心？如何進入天城？我要宣傳主福音，
因為賞賜是真，竭力跑盡我路程，見主大顯光榮。

副歌
我傳福音喜不勝，得與救主日相親；
宣揚得救之福音，頌讚耶穌慈仁。

english_page_header: Hymn 278 - Jesus Saves
english_full_lyrics:
We have heard the joyful sound:
Jesus saves! Jesus saves!
Spread the tidings all around:
Jesus saves! Jesus saves!

Waft it on the rolling tide:
Jesus saves! Jesus saves!
Tell to sinners far and wide:
Jesus saves! Jesus saves!

Sing above the battle strife:
Jesus saves! Jesus saves!
By His death and endless life,
Jesus saves! Jesus saves!

Give the winds a mighty voice:
Jesus saves! Jesus saves!
Let the nations now rejoice,
Jesus saves! Jesus saves!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 278 首 - 主拯救
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我聽見  喜樂之聲，主拯救，主拯救，
在各處傳揚福音，主拯救，主拯救；
主命令應當遵行，上山頭，又過海面，
至各處當報此信，主拯救，主拯救。

聖靈降，真道顯明，主拯救，主拯救，
傳普世遠近罪人，主拯救，主拯救；
各海島蒙恩綿延，各山嶺傳遍相連，
滿地球都享禧年，主拯救，主拯救。

主捨命，三日復活，主拯救，主拯救，
此福音傳揚廣闊，主拯救，主拯救；
遭苦難，跟主路程，行神蹟，奉主尊名，
大聲唱：「因信得贏，主拯救，主拯救！」

號筒聲吹遍地上，主拯救，主拯救，
願萬邦一齊歸主，主拯救，主拯救；
由海島至諸山岡，皆傳遞救世大恩，
唱凱歌，得勝安康，主拯救，主拯救。

english_page_header: Hymn 279 - There Is a Gate That Stands Ajar
english_full_lyrics:
There is a gate that stands ajar,
And through its portals gleaming;
A radiance from the Cross afar,
The Saviour’s love revealing.

That gate ajar stands free for all
Who seek through it salvation;
The rich and poor, the great and small,
Of ev’ry tribe and nation.

Press onward, then, though foes may frown,
While mercy’s gate is open;
Accept the cross, and win the crown,
Love’s everlasting token.

Beyond the river’s brink we’ll lay
The cross that here is given,
And bear the crown of life away,
And love Him more in heaven.

REFRAIN
Oh, depth of mercy! Can it be
That gate was left ajar for me?
For me, for me?
Was left ajar for me?
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 279 首 - 敞開恩門
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
得救恩門到處開啟，發出光輝照世界；
十架捨命，無限榮耀，表明救主大仁愛。

凡人進入就得永生，此門今開，快進來；
富貴、貧賤、老弱、少壯，萬國、萬民無偏待。

努力向前，不怕阻擋，快進此門，莫遲疑；
因信稱義，靠恩得救，救主大愛永不移。

世人離主，如羊走迷，前途危險應自知；
歸主耶穌，進入恩門，永遠得救正此時。

副歌
靈恩豐盛，至善、至美，此門希奇，到處開啟；
開啟，開啟，此門到處開啟。

english_page_header: Hymn 280 - Tell It Out
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 280 首 - 廣傳福音
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
快到天下各處傳報真耶穌教會，日日傳，高聲傳；
遠處、近處、國內、國外，當急速宣揚，日日傳，高聲傳。
效法耶穌在十二歲以父事為念，效法耶穌受盡萬苦，報告
神禧年；當做好樹多結善果，必永存在天，日日傳，高聲傳。

快到天下各處傳報真耶穌教會，日日傳，高聲傳；
親戚、朋友、鄰里、家屬，當急速宣揚，日日傳，高聲傳。
效法彼得在五旬節收門徒三千，效法彼得站在聖殿，和官
府面前；當做磐石多立教會，敞開主恩門，日日傳，高聲傳。

快到天下各處傳報真耶穌教會，日日傳，高聲傳；
大陸、海島、大街、小巷，當急速宣揚，日日傳，高聲傳。
效法保羅會堂辯道，又站在雅典，效法保羅傳道外邦，勞苦
不徒然；當做工頭多造靈宮，用金、銀、寶石，日日傳，高聲傳。

english_page_header: Hymn 281 - Must I Go, and Empty-Handed?
english_full_lyrics:
Must I go, and empty-handed,
Thus my dear Redeemer meet,
Not one day of service give Him,
Lay no trophy at His feet?

Not at death I shrink nor falter,
For my Saviour saves me now;
But to meet Him empty-handed,
Thought of that now clouds my brow.

O the years in sinning wasted,
Could I but recall them now,
I would give them to my Saviour,
To His will I’d gladly bow.

O ye saints, arouse, be earnest,
Up and work while yet ’tis day;
Ere the night of death o’ertake thee,
Strive for souls while still you may.

REFRAIN
Must I go, and empty-handed?
Must I meet my Saviour so?
Not one soul with which to greet Him:
Must I empty-handed go?
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 281 首 - 嘆未得人
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主若今日接我靈魂，能否歡然進樂園？
缺少珍果向主獻陳，豈非白受主大恩？

此時離世本無憂懼，因主耶穌已救我；
惟有一事使我懷愁，空佔地土未結果。

我們務當竭盡心力，殷勤做工趁白晝；
不多時候黑夜就來，當快引人蒙拯救。

副歌
工作未成我即去乎？何能如此見恩主？
未領一人來歸耶穌，豈可空手回天府？

english_page_header: Hymn 282 - To the Work
english_full_lyrics:
To the work! To the work! We are servants of God,
Let us follow the path that our Master has trod;
With the balm of His counsel our strength to renew,
Let us do with our might what our hands find to do.

To the work! To the work! Let the hungry be fed;
To the fountain of life let the weary be led;
In the cross and its banner our glory shall be,
While we herald the tidings, “Salvation is free!”

To the work! To the work! There is labor for all;
For the kingdom of darkness and error shall fall;
And the name of the Lord God exalted shall be,
In the loud-swelling chorus, “Salvation is free!”

To the work! To the work! In the strength of the Lord,
And a robe and a crown shall our labor reward,
When the home of the faithful our dwelling shall be,
And we shout with the ransomed, “Salvation is free!”

REFRAIN
Toiling on, toiling on,
Toiling on, toiling on;
Let us hope, let us watch,
And labor till the Master comes.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 282 首 - 努力工作
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
來做工，來做工，做主僕要盡忠，要努力；發熱心，緊跟從主腳蹤。
既有祂肯指點，不怕你力不足；只要你不怕苦，主耶穌必幫助。

來做工，來做工，來做主好精兵，要奮勇；攻魔靈，破其寨，搗其營。
主耶穌我元帥，發號令要傾聽；趕快去普天下，傳福音給萬民。

來做工，來做工，做主工不落空；一等到工完畢，迎救主在空中。
我們要耐到底，不爭名，不誇功；同眾人讚美主，施大恩救靈魂。

副歌
當勤勞，當勤勞，當勤勞，當勤勞；
常盼望，多禱告，恆心做工，等主來到。

english_page_header: Hymn 283 - Far and Near
english_full_lyrics:
Far and near the fields are teeming
With the waves of ripened grain;
Far and near their gold is gleaming
O’er the sunny slope and plain.

Send them forth with morn’s first beaming,
Send them in the noontide’s glare;
When the sun’s last rays are gleaming,
Bid them gather ev’rywhere.

O thou, whom thy Lord is sending,
Gather now the sheaves of gold;
Heav’nward then at evening wending,
Thou shalt come with joy untold.

REFRAIN
Lord of harvest, send forth reapers!
Hear us, Lord, to Thee we cry;
Send them now the sheaves to gather,
Ere the harvest-time pass by.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 283 首 - 為主收莊稼
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
舉目觀看天下各處，莊稼長成滿良田；
稻、麥成熟，收割屆時，陽光照下美無邊。

已熟莊稼遍滿田面，收割工人尚缺欠；
懇求田主命令眾僕，速去收割莫遲延。

自天黎明工作到晚，收割完畢心歡欣；
所收莊稼帶到主前，蒙主賞賜大福分。

副歌
謹遵主命，工作努力，為主收割趁時機；
伸出鎌刀收回莊稼，納入天倉主歡喜。

english_page_header: Hymn 284 - Send the Light
english_full_lyrics:
There’s a call comes ringing o’er the restless wave, 
“Send the light! Send the light!”
There are souls to rescue, there are souls to save, 
“Send the light! Send the light!”

We have heard the Macedonian call today, 
“Send the light! Send the light!”
And a golden off’ring at the cross we lay, 
“Send the light! Send the light!”

Let us pray that grace may ev’rywhere abound,
Send the light! Send the light!
And a Christ-like spirit ev’rywhere be found,
Send the light! Send the light!

Let us not grow weary in the work of love,
Send the light! Send the light!
Let us gather jewels for a crown above,
Send the light! Send the light!

REFRAIN
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine from shore to shore!
Send the light, the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine forevermore!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 284 首 - 發出福音真光
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
人生苦海呼救聲音頻傳來，發出光！發出光！
許多靈魂等候救主施恩愛，發出光！發出光！

耳中聽見馬其頓人呼求聲，發出光！發出光！
我們努力為了主的真福音，發出光！發出光！

我們為主所做聖工不徒然，發出光！發出光！
等主再臨必有賞賜存在天，發出光！發出光！

副歌
發出光，主福音的真光！照近處，又照遠方！
發出光，主榮耀的真光！照全地，永遠輝煌！

english_page_header: Hymn 285 - The Mercy of God Is an Ocean Divine
english_full_lyrics:
The mercy of God is an ocean divine,
A boundless and fathomless flood;
Launch out in the deep, cut away the shoreline,
And be lost in the fullness of God.

But many, alas, only stand on the shore
And gaze on the ocean so wide;
They never have ventured its depths to explore,
Or to launch on the fathomless tide.

And others just venture away from the land,
And linger so near to the shore,
That the surf and the slime that beat over the strand,
Dash o’er them in floods evermore.

Oh, let us launch out on this ocean so broad,
Where floods of salvation e’er flow;
Oh, let us be lost in the mercy of God,
Till the depths of His fullness we know.

REFRAIN
Launch out, into the deep,
Oh, let the shoreline go,
Launch out, launch out in the ocean divine,
Out where the full tides flow.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 285 首 - 開船入深海
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
頌讚我天父極恩愛，多慈憐，如海洋深瀚、廣無邊；
纜索快切斷，向深處速進展，豐盛必多求於主前。

可惜，有些人只望洋而興歎，永站在岸邊做旁觀；
奉勸這些人當勇敢大壯膽，下船進海洋莫畏難。

另有一般人雖勉強來試嘗，卻靠那岸邊慢慢航；
膽怯不敢前，怕沖擊大風浪，至終無所得而失望。

弟兄！要奮勇去得人如得魚，開船進深海不空虛；
同心靠救主，祂必指示幫助，收獲必滿載，樂歡呼。

副歌
開船入深海洋，衝破一切波浪！
深入汪洋中必收獲大魚量，為道工作樂無疆。

english_page_header: Hymn 286 - The Gospel Bells
english_full_lyrics:
The gospel bells are ringing
Over land, from sea to sea;
Blessed news of free salvation
Do they offer you and me.
“For God so loved the world,
That His only Son He gave;
Whosoe’er believeth in Him
Everlasting life shall have.”

The gospel bells invite us
To a feast prepared for all;
Do not slight the invitation
Nor reject the gracious call.
“I am the bread of life;
Eat of Me, thou hungry soul;
Tho’ your sins be red as crimson,
They shall be as white as wool.”

The gospel bells give warning,
As they sound from day to day,
Of the fate which doth await them
Who forever will delay.
“Escape ye, for thy life;
Tarry not in all the plain,
Nor behind thee look, oh, never,
Lest thou be consumed in pain.”

The gospel bells are joyful
As they echo far and wide,
Bearing news of perfect pardon
Through a Saviour crucified.
“Good tidings of great joy
To all people do I bring;
Unto you is born a Saviour
Which is Christ the Lord and King.”

REFRAIN
Gospel bells, how they ring;
Over land, from sea to sea;
Gospel bells freely bring
Blessed news to you and me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 286 首 - 傳佈救恩
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
同胞呼救聲殷殷，基督門徒當奮興，從主引導一齊向前，
往普天下傳福音；收割時期來臨，因金穀已屆收成，
穡多工少，努力奮進，載捆運歸天家庭。

無論市、鎮與城、鄉，許多罪人多憂傷，如同群羊無人牧養，
遍在洲島並海洋；群眾被罪捆綁，等待救恩來釋放，
信徒莫再虛度時光，速起傳道救亡羊。

風啊，願你快吹揚！水啊，願你快流暢！直到福音傳到四方，
如江河、大海汪洋；等救贖主君王，即得勝被殺羔羊，
由天降臨，大放榮光，接進天國樂無疆。

副歌
傳福音，引歸真，傳揚聖靈已降臨；
傳福音，引歸真，普救天下萬族人！

english_page_header: Hymn 287 - Labor for Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Willing, willing! Labor for our Jesus,
Gladly answering to His holy call,
At His summons, we will rise to follow,
Gladly we will give Him of our all.

Joyful, joyful! We will spread the Gospel,
Gladly telling of His loving ways,
On the cross, He gave His life to save us,
Saving sinners, O what wondrous grace!

Meekly, meekly! Answer Jesus’ calling,
Work and pray to follow in His way,
Lamb of God, most everloving Saviour
By our side He will forever stay!

REFRAIN
Labor for Jesus!
Joyfully we’ll go, Joyfully we’ll go!
Labor for Jesus!
Joyfully we’ll work for Him!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 287 首 - 為耶穌勞力
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
甘心，甘心，為主耶穌勞力，做祂聖工，勞苦也樂意；
無論何事，祂若分派我們，都要歡欣去做，無難色。

歡欣，歡欣，我們宣傳福音，論主怎樣愛我們世人；
基督耶穌捨身在十架上，救贖罪人恩典何等深！

溫柔，溫柔，服從耶穌命令，忠心跟從祂的腳蹤行；
引導世人來就神的羔羊，靠祂除去罪孽得永生。

副歌
為耶穌勞力，我們歡欣去，我們歡欣去；
為耶穌勞力，此世乃做工之地。

english_page_header: Hymn 288 - Work, for the Night Is Coming
english_full_lyrics:
Work, for the night is coming,
Work thro’ the morning hours;
Work while the dew is sparkling,
Work ’mid springing flow’rs:
Work when the day grows brighter,
Work in the glowing sun;
Work, for the night is coming,
When man’s work is done.

Work, for the night is coming,
Work in the sunny noon;
Fill brightest hours with labor,
Rest comes sure and soon:
Give ev’ry flying minute,
Something to keep in store;
Work, for the night is coming,
When man works no more.

Work, for the night is coming,
Under the sunset skies;
While their bright tints are glowing,
Work, for daylight flies;
Work till the last beam fadeth,
Fadeth to shine no more;
Work, while the night is dark’ning,
When man’s work is o’er.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 288 首 - 趕快工作
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
趕快工作，夜來臨！趁著早晨清醒，
露珠耀眼花笑時，工作要辛勤；
陽光越照越明亮，我要加倍奮興，
趕快工作，夜來臨！夜臨，工當成！

趕快工作，夜來臨！趁著白晝光明，
盡心、盡意、盡力量，勉勵惜分陰；
分陰飛逝難留住，應當力傳福音，
趕快工作，夜來臨！夜臨，工必停！

趕快工作，夜來臨！趁著暮色未深，
紅霞映照群山頂，落日正西沉；
一簣功成看此時，雖勞切莫暫停，
趕快工作，夜來臨！夜臨，工完成！

english_page_header: Hymn 289 - O Lord, Thy Benediction Give
english_full_lyrics:
O Lord, Thy benediction give
On all who teach, on all who learn,
So that Thy church may holier live,
And ev’ry lamp more brightly burn.

Give those who teach pure hearts of love—
Hearts filled with faith and warmed by prayer—
And souls attuned to Thee above,
That they may guide Thy people there.

Give those that learn the willing ear,
The spirit meek, the guileless mind.
Such gifts will make the lowliest here
Far better than a kingdom find.

O bless the shepherd, bless the sheep
That guide and guided both be one,
One in the faithful watch they keep,
One in the joy of work well done.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 289 首 - 派任聖職
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
求主自天降下聖靈，澆灌我主所派僕人；
賞賜他們各種恩惠，為主聖工義勇、忠誠。

領導聚會、訓誨真理，根據聖經，順從聖靈；
使主教會所有信徒，為道奮勇，邁進不停。

求賜智慧、信德、熱誠，既能堅忍，又能和平；
心中顧念我主聖民，多愛我主所愛靈魂。

儆醒祈禱，永不灰心，朝朝暮暮職守殷勤；
鼓勵聖徒，警告罪人，餵養羊羔，愛護全群。

做完主工，盡此一生，滿懷喜樂，卸下艱辛；
等到恩主自天顯現，賞賜冠冕，燦爛光明

english_page_header: Hymn 290 - O Lord of Heaven and Earth and Sea
english_full_lyrics:
O Lord of heaven and earth and sea,
To Thee all praise and glory be;
How shall we show our love to Thee,
Who givest all?

Thou didst not spare Thine only Son,
But gavest Him for a world undone,
And freely with that blessed One
Thou givest all.

We lose what on ourselves we spend;
We have as treasure without end
Whatever, Lord, to Thee we lend,
Who givest all.

To Thee, from whom we all derive -
Our life, our gifts, our power to give;
O may we ever with Thee live,
Who givest all!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 290 首 - 按立禮
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今日我們在聖會裡，恭行禱告按手之禮，
遵守聖訓，奉主的聖名，按立聖職。

凡所按立教會職事，是主揀選，合主旨意，
殷勤工作，照所得恩賜，事主到底。

願主多賜智慧、能力，謙卑、忍耐，學主樣式，
謹慎自己，牧養神教會，以身作則。

本著聖經傳揚真理，忠心順服，討主歡喜，
甘背十架，為主道捨己，賞賜無比。

english_page_header: Hymn 291 - Glory to His Name
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 291 首 - 洗罪泉源
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在十字架上，我主捨命，今日求主把我罪洗淨；
更求恩主改變我罪性，榮耀歸主名。

希奇哉，靠主能離開罪！耶穌時常住在我心內；
我這樣得恩實在不配，榮耀歸主名。

主血如泉源，最妙，最靈，我見這泉便滿心高興；
在此救主把我洗潔淨，感謝主鴻恩。

副歌
榮耀歸主名，榮耀歸主名；
在十架下救主收納我，榮耀歸主名。

english_page_header: Hymn 292 - There Is a Fountain Filled with Blood
english_full_lyrics:
There is a fountain filled with blood
Drawn from Immanuel’s veins;
And sinners, plunged beneath that flood,
Lose all their guilty stains:
Lose all their guilty stains,
Lose all their guilty stains;
And sinners, plunged beneath that flood,
Lose all their guilty stains.

The dying thief rejoiced to see
That fountain in his day;
And there may I, though vile as he,
Wash all my sins away:
Wash all my sins away,
Wash all my sins away;
And there may I, though vile as he,
Wash all my sins away.

Dear dying Lamb, Thy precious blood
Shall never lose its power
Till all the ransomed church of God
Be saved, to sin no more:
Be saved, to sin no more,
Be saved, to sin no more;
Till all the ransomed church of God
Be saved, to sin no more.

E’er since by faith I saw the stream
Thy flowing wounds supply,
Redeeming love has been my theme,
And shall be till I die:
And shall be till I die,
And shall be till I die;
Redeeming love has been my theme,
And shall be till I die.

Lord, I believe Thou hast prepared,
Unworthy though I be,
For me a blood-bought, free reward,
A golden harp for me!
A golden harp for me!
A golden harp for me!
For me a blood-bought, free reward,
A golden harp for me!

There in a nobler, sweeter song,
I’ll sing Thy power to save,
When this poor lisping, stammering tongue
Is ransomed from the grave,
Is ransomed from the grave,
Is ransomed from the grave;
When this poor lisping, stammering tongue
Is ransomed from the grave.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 292 首 - 贖罪妙恩
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今有一處流血之泉，從耶穌身發源；
罪人只用在此一洗，能去全身罪愆。

盜賊臨死切心求救，得見此泉歡喜；
我罪雖然像他沉重，也能洗得潔淨。

慈悲救主，祢的寶血永世得勝死權；
贖罪妙恩，我當宣揚，至終仍然要傳。

等到末了，耶穌再來，被接在於雲中；
那時還要放聲讚美，永遠頌主大功。

副歌
我真相信，我定相信，耶穌為我受害；
天父愛子這樣釘死，真是難報的愛。

english_page_header: Hymn 293 - Whiter Than Snow
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 293 首 - 洗淨罪愆
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我主，我救主，我切願得完全！望主至永遠，常居住我心間；
使敵全敗壞，使邪情都消滅。求主將我洗，使我白超乎雪！

我主，我救主，無稍留我點污，求主用寶血將舊染全洗除；
我為得潔淨，今甘願撇一切。求主將我洗，使我白超乎雪！

我主，我救主，看得明我內心，如今重生我，把靈魂全更新；
未聞人求主，反而被主拒絕。求主將我洗，使我白超乎雪！

我主，我救主，今由天而垂憐，使我能誠心獻全身於主前；
我願奉給主，我所有，我所悅。求主將我洗，使我白超乎雪！

副歌
白超乎雪，皎白超乎雪；因主給我洗，使我白超乎雪！

english_page_header: Hymn 294 - I Hear Thy Welcome Voice
english_full_lyrics:
I hear Thy welcome voice
That calls me, Lord, to Thee,
For cleansing in Thy precious blood
That flowed on Calvary.
I am coming, Lord!
Coming now to Thee!
Wash me, cleanse me in the blood
That flowed on Calvary!

Tho’ coming weak and vile,
Thou dost my strength assure;
Thou dost my vileness fully cleanse,
Till spotless all, and pure.
I am coming, Lord!
Coming now to Thee!
Wash me, cleanse me in the blood
That flowed on Calvary!

’Tis Jesus calls me on
To perfect faith and love,
To perfect hope and peace and trust,
For earth and heav’n above.
I am coming, Lord!
Coming now to Thee!
Wash me, cleanse me in the blood
That flowed on Calvary!

All hail, atoning blood!
All hail, redeeming grace!
All hail, the gift of Christ our Lord,
Our strength and righteousness.
I am coming, Lord!
Coming now to Thee!
Wash me, cleanse me in the blood
That flowed on Calvary!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 294 首 - 我來就祢
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我聽救主慈聲，召我速來就祂，
命我悔改一切惡行，祂血必洗無瑕。
主啊！我今來，我今來就祢！
求主洗滌我身心，在祢大能血裡！

我雖軟弱、邪惡，主必扶持、醫治，
主必盡除我諸愆尤，使我純全無疵。
主啊！我今來，我今來就祢！
求主洗滌我身心，在祢大能血裡！

救主親自應許，白賜恩惠豐盈，
只要我肯信賴、順服，得救工夫必成。
主啊！我今來，我今來就祢！
求主洗滌我身心，在祢大能血裡！

美哉，贖罪寶血！大哉，拯救鴻恩！
奇哉，神將愛子賜我，使我得進天門！
主啊！我今來，我今來就祢！
求主洗滌我身心，在祢大能血裡！

english_page_header: Hymn 295 - Foot Washing Sacrament
english_full_lyrics:
My Savior wants my spirit pure,
As humble as my Lord’s,
Into a basin water poured,
To wash me clean and whole.

My Savior wants my spirit pure,
Our stains He has made clean,
To wash the disciples’ feet,
So humbly did He kneel.

My Savior wants my spirit pure,
So from that very hour,
He with a towel wiped clean their feet,
To walk in sin no more.

My Savior wants my spirit pure,
So spotless I would be,
When wholly washed so clean I’ll stand,
My Lord shall live in me.

REFRAIN
To enter Heav’n, that joyful realm,
To be so free from sin,
We’ll wash our feet, His word we’ll keep,
We’ll have a part with Him.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 295 首 - 洗腳禮
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主要我全身聖潔，願做人所不屑；
將水倒在盆中盈盈，卑微如僕而行。

救主要我全身聖潔，洗去舊染一新；
將手掬水，洗淨信徒，謙卑、和藹可親。

救主要我全身聖潔，如同白璧無瑕；
手巾束腰，洗淨、擦乾，照此而行有福。

救主要我全身聖潔，毫無污點、指摘；
雙足一洗，全身乾淨，成為完全新人。

副歌
天堂福地，至聖至潔，要去要離罪孽；
若不洗腳，違主命令，就與救主無分。

english_page_header: Hymn 295A - He Washed His Servants’ Feet
english_full_lyrics:
Disrobed of all His heav’nly dress,
The Saviour came to earth;
Clothed in a veil of mortal flesh,
And bowed His head in death.

That awful night in which betrayed,
He introduced the feast,
Which we, my friends, have seen displayed,
Where each has been a guest.

The solemn scene about to close,
To make the whole complete,
He meekly from communion rose
And washed His servants’ feet.

“To each,” He said, “let others do
As I, your Lord, have done:
The heav’nly pattern still pursue,
In form as I have shown.”

REFRAIN
He gave us this example,
That we His will complete
By following His teaching
To wash each other’s feet.

english_page_header: Hymn 296A - According to Thy Gracious Word
english_full_lyrics:
According to Thy gracious word,
In meek humility,
This will I do, my dying Lord:
I will remember Thee.

Thy body, broken for my sake,
My bread from heav’n shall be;
Thy testamental cup I take,
And thus remember Thee.

Gethsemane can I forget?
Or there Thy conflict see,
Thy agony and bloody sweat,
And not remember Thee?

When to the cross I turn mine eyes
And rest on Calvary,
O Lamb of God, my sacrifice,
I must remember Thee.

Remember Thee and all Thy pains
And all Thy love to me;
Yea, while a breath, a pulse remains,
Will I remember Thee.

And when these failing lips grow dumb
And mind and mem’ry flee,
When Thou shalt in Thy kingdom come,
Jesus, remember me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 296 (甲) 首 - 紀念主死
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今日我們在主面前，特來恭行聖禮；
如此謹遵我主遺言，我要紀念主死。

因主捨身做我靈餅，心內感念不已；
新約之杯與眾同領，我要紀念主死。

主在山園三次祈禱，負罪憂傷無比；
汗滴如血，滿心苦惱，我要紀念主死。

主釘十架髑髏山上，流血、捨命為祭；
真神羔羊為我獻上，我要紀念主死。

我念主恩，我念主愛，念主為我捨己；
有氣在口，有脈在身，我要紀念主死。

english_page_header: Hymn 296B - Must Jesus Bear the Cross Alone?
english_full_lyrics:
Must Jesus bear the cross alone,
And all the world go free?
No; there’s a cross for ev’ry one,
And there’s a cross for me.

The consecrated cross I’ll bear,
Till death shall set me free,
And then go home my crown to wear,
For there’s a crown for me.

Upon the crystal pavement, down
At Jesus’ pierced feet,
Joyful, I’ll cast my golden crown,
And His dear name repeat.

How happy are the saints above,
Who once went sorrowing here!
But now they taste unmingled love
And joy without a tear.

O precious cross! O glorious crown!
O resurrection day!
Ye angels, from the stars come down,
And bear my soul away.

And when these failing lips grow dumb
And mind and mem’ry flee,
When Thou shalt in Thy kingdom come,
Jesus, remember me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 296 (乙) 首 - 豈能讓主獨背十架
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
世人豈能輕忽主恩，讓主獨背十架？
信徒應當背起十架，我當背負十架。

我願背負成聖十架，離世方能卸下。
恩主為我預備冠冕，在那榮耀天家。

來到天堂水晶映路，向主寶座跪下，
樂將冠冕放主腳前，頌主聖名偉大。

聖徒在世歷經滄桑，在天何等歡暢！
今日飽嚐慈愛、喜樂，再無痛苦、心傷。

榮耀十架，榮耀冠冕，榮耀主已復活，
聖徒改變，被接升天，與主同住天國。

無用唇舌終歸瘖啞，世事不再牽掛，
真神國度降臨之時，耶穌！領我歸家。

english_page_header: Hymn 297 - I Gave My Life for Thee
english_full_lyrics:
I gave My life for thee,
My precious blood, I shed,
That thou might’st ransomed be,
And quickened from the dead;
I gave, I gave My life for thee,
What hast thou giv’n for Me?
I gave, I gave My life for thee,
What hast thou giv’n for Me?

My Father’s house of light,
My glory-circled throne,
I left for earthly night,
For wand’rings sad and lone;
I left, I left it all for thee,
Hast thou left aught for Me?
I left, I left it all for thee,
Hast thou left aught for Me?

I suffer’d much for thee,
More than thy tongue can tell,
Of bitt’rest agony,
To rescue thee from hell;
I’ve borne, I’ve borne it all for thee,
What hast thou borne for Me?
I’ve borne, I’ve borne it all for thee,
What hast thou borne for Me?

And I have brought to thee,
Down from My home above,
Salvation full and free,
My pardon and My love;
I bring, I bring rich gifts to thee,
What hast thou brought to Me?
I bring, I bring rich gifts to thee,
What hast thou brought to Me?
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 297 首 - 為主我立何志?
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主為我捨祂命，疼痛流出寶血，
要將我罪洗淨，使我得成聖潔。
為我之罪，主血流了，我獻給主多少？
為我之罪，主血流了，我獻給主多少？

主為我被鞭打，肋旁又受槍扎，
要將靈恩賜我，捨己做我贖價。
為我之罪，被打、被罵，我用何法報答？
為我之罪，被打、被罵，我用何法報答？

主為我戴荊棘，天上華冕捨棄，
離去光明寶座，受苦受害至極。
主既為我丟棄一切，為主我何捨棄？
主既為我丟棄一切，為主我何捨棄？

主為我釘十架，方有這肉與血，
要將永生賜我，救我進入福地。
主既立志為我捨命，為主我立何志？
主既立志為我捨命，為主我立何志？

english_page_header: Hymn 298 - Your Love, O God, Has Called Us Here
english_full_lyrics:
Your love, O God, has called us here,
For all love finds its source in You;
The perfect love that casts our fear,
The love that Christ makes ever new.

O gracious God, You consecrate
All that is lovely, good, and true;
Bless those who in Your presence wait,
And ev’ry day their love renew.

O God of love, inspire our life,
Reveal Your will in all we do;
Join ev’ry husband, ev’ry wife
In mutual love and love for You.

Your love, O God, has called us here,
For all love finds its source in You;
The perfect love that casts our fear,
The love that Christ makes ever new.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 298 首 - 聖徒婚禮
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今日聚集，大家歡喜，
照主聖旨恭行婚禮；
新郎、新婦，二人合一，
一家、一體、一心、一意。

自此一生同走天路，
相敬、相信、相愛、相助；
天父時常保佑，平安，
無有災害、困苦、艱難。

懇求天父賜福臨門，
使他夫婦均沾鴻恩；
靠著聖靈敬畏天父，
福澤、恩惠，延及子孫。

但願天父聽我禱告，
加恩使他夫妻偕老；
快樂同享，苦難同擔，
以後二人同在天堂。

english_page_header: Hymn 299 - Come, Let Us Gather with Rejoicing
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 299 首 - 婚禮祝歌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今日大家歡喜聚集，讚美天父歌聲四起；
因我所愛弟兄、姊妹，蒙主配合，舉行婚禮。

懇求天父幫助、扶持，使他二人同心一意；
相敬、相愛，快樂無比，同苦、同甘，永不相離。

從今以後言行舉止，都能依照真神指示；
敬大、愛小，家室相宜，齊來榮耀救主名字。

懇求聖靈助他夫妻，誠心結合直到末期；
熱心愛主，常在主裡，後來同享天國福氣。

副歌
求主賜福氣，求主賜福氣，使他能遵守主真理；
求主賜福氣，求主賜福氣，使他得平安大歡喜。

english_page_header: Hymn 300 - When There's Love at Home
english_full_lyrics:
There is beauty all around When there’s love at home;
There is joy in ev’ry sound When there’s love at home.
Peace and plenty here abide, Smiling sweet on ev’ry side.
Time doth softly, sweetly glide When there’s love at home.

There’s no question you can’t ask When there’s love at home;
There is strength for any task When there’s love at home.
Sharing joy in work or play, Confidence to face the day,
Knowing love will find a way When there’s love at home.

Love becomes a way of life When there’s love at home;
Sweet insistent end to strife When there’s love at home.
Glad submission each one’s gift, Willing pledge to love and lift,
Healing balm for ev’ry rift When there’s love at home.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 300 首 - 祝新婚之樂
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我們在此聖所裡，祝結婚禮儀，
所行都從主旨意，合聖經真理；
神所配合之良緣，遵主旨意而成全，
懇求天父大慈愛，賜福到後代。

今日二人蒙主恩，結一體之親，
夫妻同守主命令，相愛盡一生；
同甘、同苦、同起居，相敬、相信、相扶持，
齊心順從真道理，得主的歡喜。

從今一對新夫婦，凡事敬畏主，
建設美滿之家庭，恩愛永無停；
事奉天父多殷勤，百年偕老常歡欣，
相親、相助無限樂，直到回天國。

english_page_header: Hymn 301 - Asleep in Jesus, Blessed Sleep
english_full_lyrics:
Asleep in Jesus! Blessed sleep,
From which none ever wakes to weep;
A calm and undisturbed repose,
Unbroken by the last of foes.

Asleep in Jesus! O how sweet
To be for such a slumber meet;
With holy confidence to rest
In hope of being ever blest.

Asleep in Jesus! Peaceful rest,
Whose waking is supremely blest;
No fear, no woe, shall dim that hour
That manifests the Saviour’s power.

Asleep in Jesus! Soon to rise,
When the last trump shall rend the skies;
Then burst the fetters of the tomb,
And wake in full, immortal bloom.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 301 首 - 人生不長
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
可歎人生，空夢一場，
過眼榮華，如雲不長；
今生好處，切莫流連，
鮮花開過，不能再妍。

清晨看見輕霜、薄雪，
陽光一照，即時消滅；
花開滿樹，眼前富貴，
狂風吹到，忽然落下。

靜觀萬物，變幻無常，
只有天國永生可享；
靈體長存，恩光常亮，
樂無終止，福無限量。

仰望天國，一心奮往，
防備四方魔鬼羅網；
天父望你速歸家鄉，
同聲讚美，快樂無疆。

english_page_header: Hymn 302 - Hear What the Voice from Heav'n Proclaims
english_full_lyrics:
Hear what the voice from heav’n proclaims,
For all the pious dead: 
Sweet is the savor of their names, 
And soft their sleeping bed.

They die in Jesus and are blest;
How kind their slumbers are!
From suff'ring and from sins released,
And freed from ev’ry snare.

Far from this world of toil and strife,
They’re present with the Lord;
The labors of their mortal life
End in a large reward.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 302 首 - 安葬
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
靈胞去世，暫時離別，不用失望、心傷；
無非是主召他安息，等候同住天鄉。

我等送他進入墳墓，肉身歸土安眠；
耶穌已從死裡復活，幽暗變作光明。

主既出墓升到天上，為我開闢新路；
末日我必復活、改變，飛升見主耶穌。

號筒大響，我主發令，吩咐死人復生；
墓裡聖徒立時甦醒，被提與主同榮。

english_page_header: Hymn 303 - When He Cometh
english_full_lyrics:
When He cometh, when He cometh 
To make up His jewels,
All His jewels, precious jewels,
His loved and His own.

He will gather, He will gather
The gems for His kingdom,
All the pure ones, all the bright ones,
His loved and His own.

Little children, little children,
Who love their Redeemer,
Are the jewels, precious jewels,
His loved and His own.

REFRAIN
Like the stars of the morning,
His bright crown adorning,
They shall shine in their beauty
Bright gems for His crown.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 303 首 - 天國來了
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天國來了，時候到了！當悔改，須及早；
要做好樹，結出好果，免斧頭砍倒。

假神去了，真神來了！合家人，福不小；
明白天道，蒙主恩召，領洗入真教。

罪孽赦了，疾病好了！當感謝，常祈禱；
主是中保，流血、代禱，使與神和好。

聖靈得了，心眼開了！有真光，常內照；
救主引導，天路力跑，天國必能到。

副歌
耶穌功比天更高，信者罪赦，福氣多；
得真平安，樂陶陶，必永遠唱歌。

english_page_header: Hymn 304 - Father, Let Me Dedicate
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 304 首 - 浪子回家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
世上眾人都犯罪，遠離天父神，
任意放蕩走己路，尋樂溺迷津；
終日心靈枉虛耗，浪費到困貧，
樂盡悲來友朋散，孤單剩一身。

異地作客永無助，淪落成流民，
飢荒相迫世境苦，籬下依何人？
投靠農家求餬口，豆莢如山珍，
心靈飢餓無救助，待斃有誰憐！

浪子此時忽醒悟，家裡有父親，
為何在外受痛苦，自絕甘沉淪？
我要起來回家去，向父跪哀陳，
從前得罪今悔改，求宥做新人。

天上父神真慈愛，恩典永豐盈，
浪子醒悟今回頭，歸家父歡迎；
厚賜豐衣與美食，懷抱表親情，
因死復活失又得，歡樂滿天庭。

english_page_header: Hymn 305 - Jesus is Mine
english_full_lyrics:
Fade, fade each earthly joy; Jesus is mine.
Break ev'ry tender tie; Jesus is mine.
Dark is the wilderness, Earth has no resting place,
Jesus alone can bless; Jesus is mine.

Tempt not my soul away; Jesus is mine.
Here would I ever stay; Jesus is mine.
Perishing things of clay, Born but for one brief day,
Pass from my heart away; Jesus is mine.

Farewell, ye dreams of night; Jesus is mine.
Lost in this dawning light; Jesus is mine.
All that my soul has tried Left but a dismal void;
Jesus has satisfied; Jesus is mine.

Farewell, mortality; Jesus is mine.
Welcome, eternity; Jesus is mine.
Welcome, O loved and blest; Welcome, sweet scenes of rest,
Welcome, my Saviour’s breast; Jesus is mine.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 305 首 - 儆醒自責
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
惟真神是我父，不多敬愛；
貪愛世界宴樂，難得神悅。

惟教會是我家，不多關心；
醉心名利、虛華，難得神悅。

惟聖靈是我寶，不多禱告；
未能多結善果，難得神悅。

惟傳道是我職，不多出力；
信德有名無實，難得神悅。

副歌
求聖靈全更新，使我變為新人；
效法主耶穌榜樣，榮耀真神。

english_page_header: Hymn 306 - Here from the World We Turn
english_full_lyrics:
Here from the world we turn, Jesus to seek;
Here may His loving voice Tenderly speak!
Jesus, our dearest friend, While at Thy feet we bend,
O let Thy smile descend! ’Tis Thee we seek.

Come, Holy Comforter, Presence Divine,
Now in our longing hearts Graciously shine,
O for Thy mighty pow'r! O for a blessed show'r,
Filling this hallowed hour With joy divine!

Saviour, Thy work revive; Here may we see
Those who are dead in sin Quickened by Thee;
Come to our hearts tonight, Make ev'ry burden light;
Cheer Thou our waiting sight; We long for Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 306 首 - 悔改重生
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主使我重生，感激淚盈，
救我該死罪人，主愛顯明；
回想從前各罪，如海沙數不清，
身心被它捆綁，痛苦莫名。

救主使我重生，賜我聖靈，
方言恩賜明顯，造就更新；
求主助我悔改，使我永作新人，
凡事聽從主命，榮耀主名。

救主使我重生，我願獻身，
專心做主聖工，不貪虛榮；
主必引我路程，使我作主精兵，
向世人作見證，引他歸真。

救主使我重生，為我犧牲，
從死復活上升，永不變更；
求主使我聖潔，助我靈修完成，
末日被接見主，永住天城。

english_page_header: Hymn 307 - Lord, I’m Coming Home
english_full_lyrics:
I’ve wandered far away from God,
Now I’m coming home;
The paths of sin too long I’ve trod,
Lord, I’m coming home.

I’ve wasted many precious years,
Now I’m coming home;
I now repent with bitter tears,
Lord, I’m coming home.

I’ve tired of sin and straying, Lord,
Now I’m coming home;
I’ll trust Thy love, believe Thy Word,
Lord, I’m coming home.

My soul is sick, my heart is sore,
Now I’m coming home;
My strength renew, my hope restore,
Lord, I’m coming home.

REFRAIN
Coming home, coming home,
Nevermore to roam,
Open wide Thine arms of love,
Lord, I’m coming home.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 307 首 - 回來罷！
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
從前失迷，遠離天父，現在要回來；
長年奔走罪惡道路，主，我要回來！

從前枉費光陰遊蕩，現在要回來；
回想憂傷、痛悔滿心，主，我要回來！

從前所行多屬不義，現在要回來；
懇求救主憐憫、醫治，主，我要回來！

從前邪僻、狂傲、自義，現在要回來；
今後願聽聖經真理，主，我要回來！

副歌
回來吧！回來吧！不要再放蕩；
慈愛天父伸手接我，我今要回來！

english_page_header: Hymn 308 - Take Me, O My Father, Take Me
english_full_lyrics:
Take me, O my Father, take me! 
Take me, save me, thro’ Thy Son;
That which Thee wouldst have me, make me, 
Let Thy will in me be done.
Long from Thee my footsteps straying, 
Thorny proved the way I trod;
Weary come I now, and praying, 
Take me to Thy love, my God!

Fruitless years with grief recalling,
Humbly I confess my sin;
At Thy feet, O Father, falling,
To Thy household take me in.
Freely now to Thee I proffer
This relenting heart of mine;
Freely life and soul I offer,
Gift unworthy love like Thine.

Once the world’s Redeemer, dying,
Bore our sins upon the tree;
On that sacrifice relying,
Now I look in hope to Thee:
Father, take me! all forgiving,
Fold me to Thy loving breast;
In Thy love forever living,
I must be forever blest!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 308 首 - 天父接納我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
慈愛天父，請接納我，求主耶穌拯救我，
使我成為祢所喜悅，照祢旨意過生活。
從前悖逆長久迷惑，荊棘道路愁苦多，
疲憊身心來到主前，求主慈懷接納我。

多年奔忙，徒然勞累，今日謙卑認罪愆，
屈膝俯伏在祢腳前，求主帶我進羊圈。
向主全然獻上自己，獻上我痛悔心靈，
身體靈魂全然奉獻，難報主愛廣無邊。

救贖之主曾經受苦，承擔世人眾罪污，
獻己身體成為活祭，我今信靠仰望主。
慈愛天父，請接納我，求祢恩臂懷抱我，
使我永居祢大愛中，得享永生無窮福。

english_page_header: Hymn 309 - Another Year, How Swiftly Come
english_full_lyrics:
Time now has passed; hail the new year!
Saints at God’s throne are gathered here,
Worshiping Him with thanks we sing,
Praises ascend to Christ our King.

Father we thank Thee for past care,
Blessing and guiding through the year.
Take now this year, show us Thy way,
Keep us from straying, Lord, we pray.

Father protect us from all wrong.
Thee would we serve helping the throng.
Grant us the wisdom and the power,
Thy will to do each passing hour.

Dear Lord, increase our faith each day,
To higher planes, lift us we pray.
We place our work within Thy hand,
Oh, give us peace! Revive again.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 309 首 - 新年祈望
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
光陰荏苒又到新年，
聖徒齊集天父座前；
虔誠敬拜，感謝頌讚，
歌聲洋洋上達高天。

感謝天父護衛一年，
賜福、養育、引導、保全；
今歲路程願再交託，
求父保守，勿使走偏。

懇求天父保我身心，
即時事奉，榮主益人；
更求賜我智慧、能力，
遵行父旨，與主相親。

求主使我信德日增，
屬靈生活步步上升；
一年事工託主手中，
求主賜予平安、復興。

english_page_header: Hymn 310 - Come, Ye Thankful People, Come
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 310 首 - 年終感頌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
光陰消逝如飛箭，轉瞬一年又告終，
寒來暑往相交替，新春、盛夏，復秋冬；
總計循環一歲畢，如今回顧省吾躬，
深愧虛度好年月，成就無多主聖工。

人生萬事如補風，勞苦歎息虛空中，
感謝主恩賜靈命，脫離罪惡跟主蹤；
回想年年蒙福樂，主恩賜我永無窮，
求主厚賜我力量，多為主工盡精忠。

感謝所受諸恩典，更祈赦免舊罪愆，
今後勤奮應加倍，進德、修道勝往年；
謹守真道，深愛主，盼望更大，信更堅，
年復一年無虛度，主工完畢享聖筵。

english_page_header: Hymn 311 - All Creatures of Our God and King
english_full_lyrics:
All creatures of our God and King, Lift up your voice and with us sing Alleluia! Alleluia!
Thou burning sun with golden beam, Thou silver moon with softer gleam!
O praise Him! O praise Him!

Thou rushing wind that art so strong, Ye clouds that sail in heav’n along, O praise Him! Alleluia!
Thou rising morn in praise rejoice, Ye lights of evening, find a voice!
O praise Him! O praise Him!

Thou flowing water, pure and clear, Make music for thy Lord to hear, Alleluia, Alleluia!
Thou fire so masterful and bright, That givest us both warmth and light.
O praise Him! O praise Him!

And all ye men of tender heart, Forgiving others, take your part, O sing ye! Alleluia!
Ye who long pain and sorrow bear, Praise God and on Him cast your care!
O praise Him! O praise Him!

REFRAIN
Alleluia! Alleluia! Alleluia!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 311 首 - 一齊來歌頌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
來！神所創造的子民，來！我們高歌讚美神。
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！看！烈日照耀如金輪；
看！明月映照如銀盆。讚美真神，讚美真神！
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！哈利路亞！

聽！原野強風在呼嘯，看！白雲朵朵碧空飄。
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！看！旭日東昇樂歌謠；
聽！星辰夜間在歡笑。讚美真神，讚美真神！
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！哈利路亞！

聽河水清澈流不停，如 美妙樂音頌主名。
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！看！熊熊火焰放光明，
讓大地溫暖不止息。讚美真神，讚美真神！
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！哈利路亞！

凡謙和之人守誡命，必饒恕弟兄，幫助人。
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！凡世人痛苦與憂心，
請快將憂慮卸給神。讚美真神，讚美真神！
哈利路亞！哈利路亞！哈利路亞！

english_page_header: Hymn 312 - Brethren, We Have Met to Worship
english_full_lyrics:
Brethren, we have met to worship
And adore the Lord our God;
Will you pray with all your power,
While we try to preach the Word?
All is vain unless the Spirit
Of the Holy One comes down;
Brethren, pray, and holy manna
Will be showered all around.

Brethren, see poor sinners round you
Slumb’ring on the brink of woe;
Death is coming, hell is moving,
Can you bear to let them go?
See our fathers and our mothers,
And our children sinking down;
Brethren, pray, and holy manna
Will be showered all around.

Sisters, will you join and help us?
Moses’ sister aided him;
Will you help the trembling mourners
Who are struggling hard with sin?
Tell them all about the Saviour,
Tell them that He will be found;
Sisters, pray, and holy manna
Will be showered all around.

Let us love our God supremely,
Let us love each other too;
Let us love and pray for sinners,
Till our God makes all things new.
Then He’ll call us home to heaven,
At His table we’ll sit down;
Christ will gird Himself and serve us
With sweet manna all around.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 312 首 - 齊聚主前
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
弟兄姊妹齊聚主前，虔誠敬拜獨一神；
我傳福音請你代禱，懇切祈求主施恩。
僅憑才能，難得果效，依靠聖靈成大功。
弟兄姊妹懇切祈求，生命之糧必豐盛。

舉目環顧周遭世人，罪惡邊緣快沉淪；
死亡來臨地獄將近，不施救援心何忍？
父母親人，尚未信主，陷於罪中將沉淪。
弟兄姊妹懇切祈求，生命之糧必豐盛。

弟兄姊妹合意同心，努力傳揚主救恩；
迷途罪人等候救贖，基督耶穌有大能。
依靠聖靈脫離罪污，失喪的人蒙主恩。
弟兄姊妹懇切祈求，生命之糧必豐盛。

但願彼此相愛相親，更愛天上至高神；
也愛罪人，為他代求，直到萬物得更新。
將來蒙主召回天家，共享筵席在天庭。
基督必然親臨接待，生命之糧必豐盛。

english_page_header: Hymn 313 - The Light of the World Is Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
The whole world was lost in the darkness of sin,
The Light of the world is Jesus!
Like sunshine at noonday, His glory shone in.
The Light of the world is Jesus!

No darkness have we who in Jesus abide;
The Light of the world is Jesus!
We walk in the light when we follow our Guide!
The Light of the world is Jesus!

Ye dwellers in darkness with sin blinded eyes,
The Light of the world is Jesus!
Go, wash, at His bidding, and light will arise.
The Light of the world is Jesus!

No need of the sunlight in heaven we’re told;
The Light of the world is Jesus!
The Lamb is the Light in the city of gold,
The Light of the world is Jesus!

REFRAIN
Come to the Light, ’tis shining for thee;
Sweetly the Light has dawned upon me.
Once I was blind, but now I can see:
The Light of the world is Jesus!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 313 首 - 這世界的光是耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
全世界都迷失在黑暗罪中，這世界的光是耶穌；
主榮光常照耀，如太陽當空，這世界的光是耶穌。

在耶穌裡全然無黑暗影蹤，這世界的光是耶穌；
隨主引導前行，在祂光明中，這世界的光是耶穌。

被罪蒙蔽心眼而失明的人，這世界的光是耶穌；
遵主命令洗淨，必重見光明，這世界的光是耶穌。

在天堂裡極光明不需陽光，這世界的光是耶穌；
在聖城裡羔羊是萬民之光，這世界的光是耶穌。

副歌
耶穌真光，正照耀煇煌！主的慈光，照亮我身上。
前我瞎眼，今重見亮光。這世界的光是耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 314 - Jesus Calls Us
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus calls us o’er the tumult
Of our life’s wild, restless sea;
Day by day His sweet voice soundeth,
Saying, “Christian, follow Me!”

Jesus calls us from the worship
Of the vain world’s golden store,
From each idol that would keep us,
Saying, “Christian, love Me more!”

In our joys and in our sorrows,
Days of toil and hours of ease,
Still He calls, in cares and pleasures, 
“Christian, love Me more than these!”

Jesus calls us: by Thy mercies,
Saviour, may we hear Thy call,
Give our hearts to Thine obedience,
Serve and love Thee best of all.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 314 首 - 耶穌呼召
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
苦海人生洶湧波濤，耶穌向我們呼召。
溫柔聲音天天呼召，跟隨主行，免飄搖。

遠離世俗，耶穌呼召，莫追求虛榮、財寶
一切偶像都當離棄，我們愛主有多少？

不論安逸或是辛勞，是喜樂或是煩惱，
主都關懷，欣然呼召，當愛主，一生信靠。

滿有恩慈，耶穌呼召，願我們心中記牢。
奉獻身心，遵行主道，事主、愛主蒙恩膏。

english_page_header: Hymn 315 - Immortal, Invisible, God Only Wise
english_full_lyrics:
Immortal, invisible, God only wise,
In light inaccessible hid from our eyes,
Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of Days,
Almighty, victorious, Thy great name we praise.

Unresting, unhasting, and silent as light,
Nor wanting, nor wasting, Thou rulest in might;
Thy justice like mountains high soaring above
Thy clouds, which are fountains of goodness and love.

To all, life Thou givest, to both great and small;
In all life Thou livest, the true life of all;
We blossom and flourish as leaves on the tree,
And wither and perish- but naught changeth Thee.

Great Father of glory, pure Father of light,
Thine angels adore Thee, all veiling their sight;
All praise we would render; O help us to see 
’Tis only the splendor of light hideth Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 315 首 - 永世的君王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
不朽壞，不能見，永世的君王。
隱藏在光明中，智慧無限量。
極豐富，極榮耀，古今皆恆常，
當頌讚祂聖名，全能得勝王。

永生神不急躁，安靜如光照。
無所求，不衰殘，萬有掌管好。
極威赫，極莊嚴，公義如山高，
恩惠如雲在天，如愛泉湧到。

凡宇宙眾生命皆由主而來。
使生命得存活，是萬有主宰。
人生有如花草，美景瞬間開，
轉眼間即朽壞，惟祢永不改。

極榮耀，極光明;偉大聖天父。
眾天使寶座前圍繞敬拜主。
讚美頌揚歸祢，我仰望、求助，
祢隱藏的榮美，聖潔世上無。

english_page_header: Hymn 316 - O Worship the King
english_full_lyrics:
O worship the King, all glorious above,
And gratefully sing His pow’r and His love;
Our Shield and Defender, the Ancient of Days,
Pavilioned in splendor, and girded with praise.

O tell of His might, O sing of His grace,
Whose robe is the light, whose canopy space;
His chariots of wrath the deep thunderclouds form,
And dark is His path on the wings of the storm.

Thy bountiful care, what tongue can recite?
It breathes in the air, it shines in the light;
It streams from the hills, it descends to the plain,
And sweetly distills in the dew and the rain.

Frail children of dust, and feeble as frail,
In Thee do we trust, nor find Thee to fail;
Thy mercies how tender, how firm to the end,
Our Maker, Defender, Redeemer, and Friend.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 316 首 - 敬拜榮耀王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
萬人同敬拜天上榮耀王，
主權能、慈愛，應感謝頌揚。
祂是我的盾牌，是永遠保障，
榮光照耀天庭，歌頌天上王。

主權能慈愛，我歡呼、頌讚，
光輝是主袍，穹蒼是主幔。
以雷電和密雲，作我主車船，
在狂風暴雨中，深藏主平安。

我怎能訴盡主眷顧恩光？
如微風吹拂，如明光照亮。
有泉源自高天，傾注遍山莊，
賜雨露和甘霖，潤澤各村、鄉。

我原是塵土，軟弱無力量，
專心依靠主，信心更堅強。
主愛我到永久，慈愛又善良，
祂造我又護我，救贖主、君王。

english_page_header: Hymn 317 - The Master Hath Come
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 317 首 - 我救主已來到
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我救主已來到，選召我作門徒，跟隨祂的腳步，奮勇走天路。
越過高山峻嶺，穿過平原幽谷，領我一路前行，至親見天父。
恩主已在呼召，敬畏神的子民在主旗下前行，像軍旅邁進。
一心盡忠、愛主，常渴慕親近主，永享神國安息，在榮美天府。

我救主已呼召，雖然艱難重重，困苦、憂愁、危險遍佈路途中。
聖靈親自帶領，安撫憂苦、傷痛，仰望救主耶穌，祂慈手引領。
恩主已在呼召，雖有疑惑、試探常來煩擾挑戰，歌聲仍雷動。
縱然經過災難，仰望標竿前衝，錫安兒女興起，隨君王前行。

我救主已呼召，當趁健康年少，如朝露般清新，活力如春曉。
應當遠離世俗，不懼世人嘲笑，遵守我主真道，同享主榮耀。
恩主已在呼召，真神兒女齊來同領天上福氣，祂慈愛可靠。
同安息在水邊，同享主賜青草，領我入祂國度，完成主呼召。

english_page_header: Hymn 318 - The Haven of Rest
english_full_lyrics:
My soul in sad exile was out on life’s sea,
So burdened with sin and distressed,
Till I heard a sweet voice, saying, “Make Me your choice";
And I entered the “Haven of Rest"!

I yielded myself to His tender embrace,
In faith taking hold of the Word,
My fetters fell off, and I anchored my soul;
The “Haven of Rest” is my Lord.

The song of my soul, since the Lord made me whole,
Has been the old story so blest,
Of Jesus, who’ll save whosoever will have
A home in the “Haven of Rest.”

Oh, come to the Saviour, He patiently waits
To save by His power divine;
Come, anchor your soul in the “Haven of Rest,”
And say, “My Beloved is mine.”

REFRAIN
I’ve anchored my soul in the “Haven of Rest,”
I’ll sail the wide seas no more;
The tempest may sweep over wild, stormy, deep,
In Jesus I’m safe evermore.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 318 首 - 安穩港口
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在人生的大海中我曾漂流，罪惡重擔使我憂愁。
聽救主慈聲說道：「來就近我。」我進入安穩的港口。

我將自己全然投入祂懷裡，以信心緊握祂應許。
我罪鏈得脫，我靈如錨拋牢，在安穩港口無所懼。

我靈要歌唱，因救主醫治我。何等蒙福救恩故事。
誰願意來就耶穌，必蒙引領，到天家永居安樂所。

朋友們！請快快來，主在等你，祂有權能願保護你。
請將你靈魂停靠安穩港口，讓救主居住你心裡。

副歌
我將我靈魂停靠安穩港口，從此不再隨處飄流；
雖風暴時常攻擊，我無所憂，在主裡安穩到永久。

english_page_header: Hymn 319 - Angels, from the Realms of Glory
english_full_lyrics:
Angels, from the realms of glory,
Wing your flight o’er all the earth;
Ye who sang creation’s story,
Now proclaim Messiah’s birth:
Come and worship, come and worship,
Worship Christ, the newborn King!

Shepherds, in the fields abiding,
Watching o’er your flocks by night,
God with man is now residing,
Yonder shines the infant Light:
Come and worship, come and worship,
Worship Christ, the newborn King!

Sages, leave your contemplations,
Brighter visions beam afar;
Seek the great Desire of nations,
Ye have seen His natal star:
Come and worship, come and worship,
Worship Christ, the newborn King!

Saints, before the altar bending,
Watching long in hope and fear,
Suddenly the Lord, descending,
In His temple shall appear:
Come and worship, come and worship,
Worship Christ, the newborn King!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 319 首 - 敬拜基督新生王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
榮耀國度天使環繞，頌主創世權能彰。
奉命展翅飛向牧人，傳揚救主自天降。
齊來敬拜，齊來敬拜，敬拜基督新生王。

曠野牧人看守羊群，黑夜星辰燦爛光，
基督降生榮光普照，神人同住，當歡唱。
齊來敬拜，齊來敬拜，敬拜基督新生王。

東方博士不再沉思，仰看奇星發光芒；
迅速起身前去尋訪，得見萬民所盼望。
齊來敬拜，齊來敬拜，敬拜基督新生王。

忠誠聖徒儆醒事奉，盼望救主降世上；
眾民忽聞君王再臨，榮光充滿聖殿堂。
齊來敬拜，齊來敬拜，敬拜基督新生王。

english_page_header: Hymn 320 - Angels We Have Heard on High
english_full_lyrics:
Angels we have heard on high,
Sweetly singing o’er the plains;
And the mountains in reply
Echoing their joyous strains.
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!

Shepherds, why this jubilee?
Why your joyous strains prolong?
What the gladsome tidings be
Which inspire your heav’nly song?
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!

Come to Bethlehem and see
Him whose birth the angels sing;
Come, adore on bended knee,
Christ the Lord, the newborn King.
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!

See Him in a manger laid,
Whom the choirs of angels praise;
Mary, Joseph, lend your aid,
While our hearts in love we raise.
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!
Gloria, in excelsis Deo!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 320 首 - 天使歌唱
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天使歌唱在高天，美妙歌聲遍平原；
四周山嶺共迴響，清歌高唱多嘹亮！

牧人有何大喜悅，快樂歌聲不停歇；
有何喜訊感心弦，齊發歌聲，同感謝。

請君同往伯利恆，天使所頌救主生，
前來跪拜同仰望：「基督救主已降生！」

和平君王臥馬槽，天兵頌讚聲圍繞，
眾人歌頌神大愛，讚美天地大主宰。

副歌
榮······耀，榮耀歸於真神；
榮······耀，榮耀歸於真神。

english_page_header: Hymn 321 - Come, Christians, Join to Sing
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 321 首 - 信徒齊來頌主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
眾信徒齊頌主，哈利路亞！阿們！
讚美基督耶穌，哈利路亞！阿們！
萬眾齊心唱和，主前稱謝歌頌，
主必歡喜悅納，哈利路亞！阿們！

來！齊心高聲唱，哈利路亞！阿們！
讚美聲達穹蒼，哈利路亞！阿們！
主是牧者良朋，降世救贖罪人，
慈愛豐盈永恆，哈利路亞！阿們！

讚美我主耶穌，哈利路亞！阿們！
生命永遠屬主，哈利路亞！阿們！
在那福樂天鄉，同聲頌揚主恩，
齊歡唱到永遠，哈利路亞！阿們！

english_page_header: Hymn 322 - To God Be the Glory
english_full_lyrics:
To God be the glory, great things He hath done;
So loved He the world that He gave us His Son,
Who yielded His life an atonement for sin,
And opened the life-gate that all may go in.

O perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,
To ev’ry believer the promise of God;
The vilest offender who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

Great things He hath taught us, great things He hath done,
And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;
But purer, and higher, and greater will be
Our wonder, our transport, when Jesus we see.

REFRAIN
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the earth hear His voice!
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the people rejoice!
O come to the Father, through Jesus the Son,
And give Him the glory, great things He hath done.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 322 首 - 榮耀歸於天父
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
榮耀歸於天父，祂愛憐世人。為拯救眾罪人差愛子降生。
主也甘心情願為世人捨命，開啟天國恩門，使人得永生。

天父赦罪恩典因救恩廣佈。凡罪人信靠主必蒙祂救贖。
我罪雖然極重，藉寶血洗淨，就立時蒙赦免，我罪污永除。

極大奧秘顯明，救贖大功成。因信靠主耶穌，必日日歡欣。
直到那日我們要親見主面，何等奇妙改變，得復活升天。

副歌
讚美主，讚美主，全地聽主聲音。讚美主，讚美主，萬民都當歡欣！
藉著救主耶穌，可親近父神，救贖大功已成，榮耀歸父神！

english_page_header: Hymn 323 - Crown Him with Many Crowns
english_full_lyrics:
Crown Him with many crowns,
The Lamb upon His throne.
Hark! how the heav'nly anthem drowns
All music but its own.
Awake, my soul, and sing
Of Him who died for thee,
And hail Him as thy matchless King
Through all eternity.

Crown Him the Lord of life,
Who triumphed o’er the grave,
And rose victorious in the strife
For those He came to save.
His glories now we sing,
Who died, and rose on high,
Who died eternal life to bring,
And lives that death may die.

Crown Him the Lord of peace,
Whose pow'r a scepter sways
From pole to pole, that wars may cease,
And all be prayer and praise.
His reign shall know no end,
And round His pierced feet
Fair flow'rs of paradise extend
Their fragrance ever sweet.

Crown Him the Lord of love,
Behold His hands and side,
Those wounds, yet visible above,
In beauty glorified.
All hail, Redeemer, hail!
For Thou hast died for me;
Thy praise and glory shall not fail
Throughout eternity.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 323 首 - 獻上千萬榮冠
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
獻上千萬榮冠，寶座羔羊為王。
聽！天上新歌齊歡唱，歌聲雲霄響亮。
當甦醒稱頌祂，因祂為我捨命，
尊祂為王，聽祂命令，天國之福永享。

稱頌生命君王，勝過陰間權杖。
從死復活，拯救萬民，親自征服死亡。
歌頌耶穌基督，讚美祂大榮耀，
主是道路、真理、生命，信靠祂免沉淪。

稱頌和平君王，威儀君臨天壤。
寰宇地極戰爭止息，普世歡唱、頌揚。
基督統治萬邦，國度永恆無疆，
生命花朵永遠開放，滿佈甜美、馨香。

稱頌仁愛君王，看祂手、足、肋旁，
昔日傷痕，依然清晰，今顯美善、榮光。
齊來頌讚救主，祂曾為我死亡，
讚美、榮耀 永不止息，直到地極萬邦。

english_page_header: Hymn 324 - Blessed Redeemer
english_full_lyrics:
Up Calv'ry's mountain, one dreadful morn,
Walked Christ my Saviour, weary and worn;
Facing for sinners death on the cross,
That He might save them from endless loss.

“Father, forgive them!” thus did He pray,
E’en while His lifeblood flowed fast away;
Praying for sinners while in such woe-
No one but Jesus ever loved so.

O how I love Him, Saviour and Friend,
How can my praises ever find end!
Thro’ years unnumbered on heaven’s shore,
My tongue shall praise Him forevermore.

REFRAIN
Blessed Redeemer! Precious Redeemer!
Seems now I see Him on Calvary’s tree;
Wounded and bleeding, for sinners pleading,
Blind and unheeding- dying for me!
