chinese_trad_title--header: 第 324 首 - 慈愛的救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
各各他山上淒涼清晨，耶穌我救主辛苦獨行；
為世上罪人釘死十架，為要拯救我脫離永刑。

十架上救主，寶血流盡，仍不忘求父憐憫罪人，
祂呼求：「父阿！赦免他們。」無人像耶穌如此慈仁。

我深愛救主，祂是良友！我讚美救主，祂聽我求！
述說主恩典，時刻紀念。我讚美救主，直到永久。

副歌
慈愛的救主，尊貴的救主！我彷彿看見祂被釘十架，
受創傷流血，為罪人代求捨棄祂生命做我贖價！

english_page_header: Hymn 325 - He Is So Precious to Me
english_full_lyrics:
So precious is Jesus, my Saviour, my King;
His praise all the day long with rapture I sing;
To Him in my weakness for strength I can cling,
For He is so precious to me.

He stood at my heart’s door in sunshine and rain,
And patiently waited an entrance to gain;
What shame that so long He entreated in vain,
For He is so precious to me.

I stand on the mountain of blessing at last,
No cloud in the heavens a shadow to cast,
His smile is upon me; the valley is past,
For He is so precious to me.

I praise Him, because He appointed a place
Where, some day, through faith in His wonderful grace,
I know I shall see Him, shall look on His face,
For He is so precious to me.

REFRAIN
For He is so precious to me;
For He is so precious to me. 
’Tis heaven below, my Redeemer to know,
For He is so precious to me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 325 首 - 救主耶穌是我至寶
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主耶穌是我救主至寶君王，我時時刻刻歡欣讚美歌唱；
倚靠耶穌我軟弱變為剛強。因主耶穌是我至寶。

無論風雨烈日，我主在門外，忍耐等候直到我敞開心懷；
長久拒絕救恩，我心必敗壞。因主耶穌是我至寶。

我至終必站立於錫安山上，烏雲已散再無黑影來阻擋；
走過幽谷救主以笑容相向。因主耶穌是我至寶。

讚美耶穌！祂為我預備住處，到那日必因信得奇妙救贖，
必讓我在寶座前親見恩主!因主耶穌是我至寶。

副歌
救主耶穌是我至寶；救主耶穌是我至寶。
於普天之下，傳揚耶穌尊名，因主耶穌是我至寶。

english_page_header: Hymn 326 - He Keeps Me Singing
english_full_lyrics:
There’s within my heart a melody;
Jesus whispers sweet and low, 
“Fear not, I am with thee, peace, be still,”
In all of life’s ebb and flow.

All my life was wrecked by sin and strife,
Discord filled my heart with pain,
Jesus swept across the broken strings,
Stirred the slumb’ring chords again.

Feasting on the riches of His grace,
Resting ’neath His shelt’ring wing,
Always looking on His smiling face,
That is why I shout and sing.

Tho’ sometimes He leads thro’ waters deep,
Trials fall across the way,
Tho’ sometimes the path seems rough and steep,
See His footprints all the way.

Soon He’s coming back to welcome me,
Far beyond the starry sky;
I shall wing my flight to worlds unknown,
I shall reign with Him on high.

REFRAIN
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus,
Sweetest name I know,
Fills my ev’ry longing,
Keeps me singing as I go.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 326 首 - 歡唱詠不停
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我有優美旋律在心中，乃主溫柔叮嚀聲：
「有我同行，心靈當平靜。莫畏世間路難行。」

昔日曾有禍患罪重擔，滿心痛苦多愁煩；
救主理我心琴拂我絃，悠然清韻滿心間。

主賜無窮恩福我享用，在祂翼下有安寧；
時刻仰望我救主慈容，我心歡樂，我歌頌。

有時耶穌領我涉深水，試煉滿布在前途；
有時經過崎嶇危險路。仍願跟隨主腳步。

不久我主要從天降臨，那時主向我歡迎；
與主奔向那榮耀天庭，同主掌權到永恆。

副歌
耶穌！耶穌！耶穌！最甘美之名，
慰我渴慕心靈，使我歡唱詠不停。

english_page_header: Hymn 327 - More About Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
More about Jesus would I know,
More of His grace to others show;
More of His saving fulness see,
More of His love who died for me.

More about Jesus let me learn,
More of His holy will discern;
Spirit of God, my teacher be,
Showing the things of Christ to me.

More about Jesus, in His Word,
Holding communion with my Lord;
Hearing His voice in ev’ry line,
Making each faithful saying mine.

More about Jesus on His throne,
Riches in glory all His own;
More of His kingdom’s sure increase;
More of His coming, Prince of Peace.

REFRAIN
More, more about Jesus,
More, more about Jesus;
More of His saving fulness see,
More of His love who died for me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 327 首 - 多認識耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我願多認識主耶穌，多傳揚我恩主救贖；
多體驗主救恩豐富，多認識深愛我的主。

我願多學習效法主，常追求聖潔如同主；
求聖靈作我保惠師，多從主得啟示、祝福。

多讀經，深知主耶穌，常靈修，親近我救主；
從聖經恭聽主聲音，我心靈因祂得滿足。

多認識寶座全能主，榮耀又尊貴，多豐富！
多宣道擴張主國度，和平君是我主基督。

副歌
願多認識耶穌，願多認識耶穌；
多體驗主救恩豐富，多認識深愛我的主。

english_page_header: Hymn 328 - Praise to the Lord, the Almighty
english_full_lyrics:
Praise to the Lord, the Almighty,
the King of creation!
O my soul, praise Him,
for He is thy health and salvation!
All ye who hear, now to His temple draw near;
Join me in glad adoration!

Praise to the Lord, who o’er all things
so wondrously reigneth,
Shelters thee under His wings,
yea, so gently sustaineth!
Hast thou not seen how thy desires e’er have been
Granted in what He ordaineth?

Praise to the Lord, who doth prosper
thy work and defend thee;
Surely His goodness and mercy here
daily attend thee.
Ponder anew what the Almighty can do,
If with His love He befriend thee.

Praise to the Lord, O let all
that is in me adore Him!
All that hath life and breath,
come now with praises before Him.
Let the Amen sound from His people again,
Gladly for aye we adore Him.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 328 首 - 讚美真神創造主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
讚美真神，全能全智，宇宙萬有君王！
我心靈歌頌主救贖，祂恩賜我安康。
聽主聲音，信徒當親近真神，
虔敬向主歡欣頌揚。

讚美真神，造物奇妙，統治世間萬有！
以恩翼懷抱極周到，將我扶持護祐。
我豈不知？主已經安排萬事，
按祂旨意，應允祈求。

讚美真神，興旺我靈，扶助保護恩庇。
以恩惠慈愛常追隨，永同在，永不棄。
我當思想，全能主大愛深長，
祂是良友，何等福氣。

讚美真神，願以心靈、誠實敬拜尊崇。
普世萬族人齊聚集，同來讚美稱頌；
高唱：「阿們！」眾信徒同心歌詠，
敬拜真神，與主同榮。

english_page_header: Hymn 329 - God of Our Fathers
english_full_lyrics:
God of our fathers, whose almighty hand
Leads forth in beauty all the starry band
Of shining worlds in splendor through the skies,
Our grateful songs before Thy throne arise.

Thy love divine hath led us in the past,
In this free land by Thee our lot is cast,
Be Thou our Ruler, Guardian, Guide, and Stay,
Thy Word our law, Thy paths our chosen way.

From war’s alarms, from deadly pestilence,
Be Thy strong arm our ever sure defense;
Thy true religion in our hearts increase,
Thy bounteous goodness nourish us in peace.

Refresh Thy people on their toilsome way,
Lead us from night to never-ending day;
Fill all our lives with love and grace divine,
And glory, laud, and praise be ever Thine.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 329 首 - 天父我神
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天父我神，用大權能聖手，
照你旨意舖張美麗宇宙；
榮耀光芒照耀天空四周，
敬向寶座高舉感恩雙手。

真神慈愛，自古引導、眷顧，
賞賜聖民自由美麗樂土；
願我天父統領、扶助、保護，
聖言、真理作我得救道路。

願主膀臂，作我護衛保障，
使我無懼戰爭災禍死亡；
願祢真道在我心中增長，
祢的良善使我永享安康。

前路艱難，求主甦醒我靈，
經過黑夜進入永遠光明；
願我生命滿有恩慈、憐憫，
榮耀頌讚都歸祢無窮盡。

english_page_header: Hymn 330 - Sweet Peace, the Gift of God’s Love
english_full_lyrics:
There comes to my heart one sweet strain,
A glad and a joyous refrain,
I sing it again and again,
Sweet peace, the gift of God’s love.

Through Christ on the cross peace was made,
My debt by His death was all paid,
No other foundation is laid.
For peace, the gift of God’s love.

In Jesus for peace I abide,
And as I keep close to His side,
There’s nothing but peace doth betide.
Sweet peace, the gift of God’s love.

REFRAIN
Peace, peace, sweet peace,
Wonderful gift from above!
Oh, wonderful, wonderful peace,
Sweet peace, the gift of God’s love.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 330 首 - 奇妙平安由神來
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
美好信息入我心靈；不禁流露快樂歌聲；
使我歡呼不住歌頌；奇妙平安由神來。

十架寶血賜我平安；主代我死，還清罪債；
除祂以外別無根基；奇妙平安由神來。

在主恩中得享安泰；時常親近救主胸懷；
唯祂能賜平安希望；奇妙平安由神來。

副歌
平安，平安，奇妙平安由神來，
奇妙平安由神而來，奇妙平安由神來。

english_page_header: Hymn 331 - Holy Spirit, Faithful Guide
english_full_lyrics:
Holy Spirit, faithful Guide,
Ever near the Christian’s side;
Gently lead us by the hand,
Pilgrims in a desert land.
Holy Spirit, faithful Guide,
Ever near the Christian’s side;
Gently lead us by the hand,
Pilgrims in a desert land.

Ever present, truest Friend,
Ever near Thine aid to lend,
Leave us not to doubt and fear,
Groping on in darkness drear.
When the storms are raging sore,
Hearts grow faint and hopes give o’er.
Whisp’ring softly, “Wand’rer, come,
Follow Me, I’ll guide thee home.”

When our days of toil shall cease,
Waiting still for sweet release,
Nothing left but heav’n and prayer,
Knowing that our names are there;
Wading deep the dismal flood,
Pleading naught by Jesus’ blood,
Whisp’ring softly, “Wand’rer, come,
Follow Me, I’ll guide thee home.”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 331 首 - 聖靈信實保惠師
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聖靈信實保惠師，指教真理在我心，
歷經沙漠曠野地，溫柔攜手領我行。
聽見親切慈愛聲，疲憊心靈得奮興，
慈聲呼喚：「遊子來！跟隨我，安歇我懷。」

忠實良友善安慰，時常引領又保護；
路途黑暗危險多，不要疑惑，主眷顧。
雖在暴雨狂風中，所有希望盡落空，
慈聲呼喚：「遊子來！跟隨我，安歇我懷。」

世上勞苦即將過，等候恩主來釋放，
同眾聖徒回天庭，生命冊上有我名。
苦海奔波多罪孽，惟有依靠主寶血，
慈聲呼喚：「遊子來！跟隨我，安歇我懷。」

english_page_header: Hymn 332 - The Love of God
english_full_lyrics:
The love of God is greater far
Than tongue or pen can ever tell;
It goes beyond the highest star,
And reaches to the lowest hell;
The guilty pair, bowed down with care,
God gave His Son to win;
His erring child He reconciled,
And pardoned from his sin.

When hoary time shall pass away,
And earthly thrones and kingdoms fall,
When men who here refuse to pray,
On rocks and hills and mountains call,
God’s love so sure, shall still endure,
All measureless and strong;
Redeeming grace to Adam’s race-
The saints’ and angels’ song.

Could we with ink the ocean fill,
And were the skies of parchment made,
Were ev’ry stalk on earth a quill,
And ev’ry man a scribe by trade;
To write the love of God above
Would drain the ocean dry;
Nor could the scroll contain the whole,
Tho’ stretched from sky to sky.

REFRAIN
Oh love of God, how rich and pure!
How measureless and strong!
It shall forevermore endure
The saints’ and angels’ song.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 332 首 - 真神大愛
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
真神大愛無盡無窮，超越諸星，深過海洋，口舌筆墨難以形容，
長闊高深無法測量，始祖犯罪，惶恐憂傷，耶穌帶來希望，
使我罪人與神和好，我罪得到釋放。

世事滄桑，變幻無常，君王權位衰弱敗亡，頑梗世人拒絕神恩，
卻向山石呼求保障，真神慈愛始終不變，偉大無限無量，
亞當後嗣得蒙救贖，天使聖徒頌揚。

湖泊海洋當作墨水，諸天穹蒼 作為紙張，葉柄枝梗用作筆桿，
世上眾人書寫詩章，竭盡心力描繪神愛，用乾河水海洋，
書卷雖長如天無邊，仍難描述周詳。

副歌
真神大愛何等豐富，偉大無限無量，
永遠不變，永遠堅定，天使聖徒頌揚。

english_page_header: Hymn 333 - Safely Through Another Week
english_full_lyrics:
Safely through another week
God has brought us on our way;
Let us now a blessing seek,
Waiting in His courts today:
Day of all the week the best,
Emblem of eternal rest,
Day of all the week the best,
Emblem of eternal rest.

While we pray for pard'ning grace,
Through the dear Redeemer’s name,
Show Thy reconciled face,
Take away our sin and shame;
From our worldly cares set free,
May we rest this day in Thee,
From our worldly cares set free,
May we rest this day in Thee.

Here we come Thy name to praise;
Let us feel Thy presence near,
May Thy glory meet our eyes,
While we in Thy house appear;
Here afford us, Lord, a taste
Of our everlasting feast,
Here afford us, Lord, a taste
Of our everlasting feast.

May Thy Gospel’s joyful sound
Conquer sinners, comfort saints;
May the fruits of grace abound,
Bring relief for all complaints:
Thus may all our Sabbaths prove
Till we join the church above,
Thus may all our Sabbaths prove
Till we join the church above.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 333 首 - 欣逢聖日
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
又平安到主聖日，感謝主帶領、護庇，
恭敬祈求等候主賜福恩祐無盡期。
安息日是最美日，預表將來永安息。
安息日是最美日，預表將來永安息。

同心求主賜恩典，奉主耶穌的聖名。
倚靠主救贖大能，洗滌我污穢、罪行。
救我脫離罪牽絆，在主懷裡享安寧。
救我脫離罪牽絆，在主懷裡享安寧。

主尊名我們頌揚，感受主在我身旁。
當我在殿中仰望，深願看見主榮光。
永遠平安之喜筵，求主賜我今得嚐。
永遠平安之喜筵，求主賜我今得嚐。

我要傳揚主福音，拯救罪人慰聖徒。
願恩典佳果豐盛，安慰憂苦，罪惡除。
願眾人遵守聖日，直到相聚在天庭。
願眾人遵守聖日，直到相聚在天庭。

english_page_header: Hymn 334 - Jesus, Rose of Sharon
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus, Rose of Sharon, bloom within my heart;
Beauties of Thy truth and holiness impart,
That where’er I go my life may shed abroad
Fragrance of the knowledge of the love of God.

Jesus, Rose of Sharon, sweeter far to see
Than the fairest flow’rs of earth could ever be,
Fill my life completely, adding more each day
Of Thy grace divine and purity, I pray.

Jesus, Rose of Sharon, balm for ev’ry ill,
May Thy tender mercy’s healing pow’r distill
For afflicted souls of weary burdened men,
Giving needy mortals health and hope again.

Jesus, Rose of Sharon, bloom forevermore;
Be Thy glory seen on earth from shore to shore,
Till the nations own Thy Sov’reignty complete,
Lay their honors down and worship at Thy feet.

REFRAIN
Jesus, Rose of Sharon,
Bloom in radiance and in love within my heart.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 334 首 - 耶穌，沙崙玫瑰
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌，沙崙玫瑰，在我心開放，顯出祢真理，美麗聖潔芳香；
我無論何往，願主馨香傳揚，讓萬人都知道神慈愛無疆。

耶穌，沙崙玫瑰，甜美沁心房，馥郁越眾香，百花無此芬芳；
我福杯滿溢，願日日更加添，祈求恩上加恩，更聖潔、芬芳。

耶穌，沙崙玫瑰，治病的香膏，主慈悲憐憫，醫治拯救迷羊；
困倦負重者，得自由蒙釋放，賞賜給需要者平安與盼望。

耶穌，沙崙玫瑰，永盛開綻放，浩瀚宇宙中，普世見主榮光，
權能遍四方；萬國向主仰望，萬民尊崇耶穌，同沐主榮光。

副歌
耶穌，沙崙玫瑰，
願在我心中顯出慈愛光輝。

english_page_header: Hymn 335 - Stand Amazed in the Presence
english_full_lyrics:
I stand amazed in the presence
Of Jesus the Nazarene,
And wonder how He could love me,
A sinner, condemned, unclean.

For me it was in the garden He prayed, 
“Not My will, but Thine.”
He had no tears for His own griefs,
But sweat drops of blood for mine.

In pity angels beheld Him,
And came from the world of light
To comfort Him in the sorrows
He bore for my soul that night.

He took my sins and my sorrows,
He made them His very own;
He bore the burden to Calv’ry,
And suffered and died alone.

When with the ransomed in glory
His face I at last shall see, 
’Twill be my joy thro’ the ages
To sing of His love for me.

REFRAIN
How marvelous! How wonderful!
And my song shall ever be;
How marvelous! How wonderful!
Is my Saviour’s love for me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 335 首 - 真希奇！我主的慈愛
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
真希奇！我主的慈愛，竟如此廣大普遍；
像我這般污穢罪人，也能得著祂愛憐。

主在客西馬尼園內，遵父旨意懇切求，
極其傷痛，為我憂愁，汗滴如血為我流。

時當夜半救主孤單，為我靈魂受苦難。
一位天使從天顯現，加添力量主身邊。

主負我罪，除我重擔，為我將一切償還。
祂釘十架在各各他，捨身洗我罪萬千。

在榮耀裡蒙贖聖徒，一同迎見主聖容。
何等喜樂直到永遠，讚美主愛同歌頌。

副歌
恩，何廣闊！愛，何奇妙！我竟蒙救主愛憐！
恩，何廣闊！愛，何奇妙！我要歌頌到永遠。

english_page_header: Hymn 336 - Does Jesus Care?
english_full_lyrics:
Does Jesus care when my heart is pained
Too deeply for mirth or song,
As the burdens press,
and the cares distress
And the way grows weary and long?

Does Jesus care when my way is dark
With a nameless dread and fear?
As the daylight fades
into deep night shades,
Does He care enough to be near?

Does Jesus care when I’ve tried and failed
To resist some temptation strong;
When for my deep grief
there is no relief,
Though my tears flow all the night long?

Does Jesus care when I’ve said “goodbye”
To the dearest on earth to me,
And my sad heart aches
till it nearly breaks,
Is it aught to Him? Does He see?

REFRAIN
Oh yes, He cares, I know He cares,
His heart is touched with my grief;
When the days are weary,
the long nights dreary,
I know my Saviour cares.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 336 首 - 耶穌是否仍然看我？
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌是否仍然看顧我？當我心中充滿愁苦，
前途滿荊棘，重擔難背負，主耶穌是否仍看顧？

耶穌是否仍然看顧我？有時黑雲滿天密布，
我心靈驚恐，又充滿愁苦，主耶穌是否仍看顧？

耶穌是否仍然看顧我？當我遇試探難抵擋，
我心極憂傷，痛苦難承擔，黑夜裡我淚水滿眶！

耶穌是否仍然看顧我？當親友已永別不回，
我心已破碎，有誰來安慰，憂傷心靈誰來撫慰？

副歌
祂必看顧，祂必看顧！因祂體恤我憂苦；
白晝雖有痛苦，黑夜覺淒楚，但救主必看顧。

english_page_header: Hymn 337 - He Included Me
english_full_lyrics:
I am so happy in Christ today,
That I go singing along my way;
Yes, I’m so happy to know and say, 
“Jesus included me, too.”

Gladly I read, “Whosoever may
Come to the fountain of life today”;
But when I read it I always say, 
“Jesus included me, too.”

Ever God’s Spirit is saying, “Come!” 
Hear the Bride saying, “No longer roam”;
But I am sure while they’re calling home,
Jesus included me, too.

“Freely come drink,” words the soul to thrill!
O with what joy they my heart do fill!
For when He said, “Whosoever will,”
Jesus included me, too.

REFRAIN
Jesus included me, Yes, He included me,
When the Lord said, “Whosoever,” He included me; 
Jesus included me, Yes, He included me, 
When the Lord said, “Whosoever,” He included me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 337 首 - 耶穌揀選我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
歸途中邊行走邊唱歌，在主裡我心靈多快樂，
我內心喜樂，因我知道主耶穌也揀選我。

凡愛慕真道心靈飢渴，生命活水使你不再渴。
我相信聖經上主的話：主耶穌要揀選我。

快前來！聖靈在呼喚我，從今後不再流離失所。
我相信這信息已應許，主耶穌必揀選我。

請進來！得滿足免飢渴，我內心充滿屬靈喜樂。
因祂說任何人都可來，主耶穌已揀選我。

副歌
主耶穌揀選我，主耶穌揀選我，當救主說：「無論何人」，祂也揀選我。
主耶穌揀選我，主耶穌揀選我，當救主說：「無論何人」，祂也揀選我。

english_page_header: Hymn 338 - In Lovingkindness Jesus Came
english_full_lyrics:
In loving-kindness Jesus came
My soul in mercy to reclaim,
And from the depths of sin and shame
Thro’ grace He lifted me.

He called me long before I heard,
Before my sinful heart was stirred,
But when I took Him at His word,
Forgiv’n, He lifted me.

His brow was pierced with many a thorn,
His hands by cruel nails were torn,
When from my guilt and grief, forlorn,
In love He lifted me.

Now on a higher plane I dwell,
And with my soul I know ’tis well;
Yet how or why I cannot tell
He should have lifted me.

REFRAIN
From sinking sand He lifted me,
With tender hand He lifted me,
From shades of night to plains of light,
O praise His name, He lifted me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 338 首 - 祂拯救我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主耶穌由天而來，祂的慈愛要臨到我；
在過犯中，罪惡迫害，主伸恩手救我。

恩主呼聲為時已久，但我硬心不肯回家；
我今醒悟憂傷悔過，主赦免拯救我。

主為我戴荊棘冠冕，祂流寶血，潔淨了我；
因我陷在罪中可憐，主伸慈手救我。

我今居住屬天樂境，我靈蒙福，喜樂安寧；
我真難以述說詳盡，主如何拯救我。

副歌
從污泥中祂拯救我，用慈愛手祂拯救我；
從黑暗中進入光明，讚美主名，祂拯救我。

english_page_header: Hymn 339 - Jesus Is All the World to Me
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus is all the world to me,
My life, my joy, my all;
He is my strength from day to day,
Without Him I would fall.
When I am sad, to Him I go,
No other one can cheer me so;
When I am sad, He makes me glad,
He’s my Friend.

Jesus is all the world to me,
My Friend in trials sore;
I go to Him for blessings,
and He gives them o’er and o’er.
He sends the sunshine and the rain,
He sends the harvest’s golden grain;
Sunshine and rain, harvest of grain,
He’s my Friend.

Jesus is all the world to me,
And true to Him I’ll be;
Oh, how could I this Friend deny,
When He’s so true to me?
Following Him I know I’m right,
He watches o’er me day and night;
Following Him by day and night,
He’s my Friend.

Jesus is all the world to me,
I want no better Friend;
I trust Him now, I’ll trust Him when
Life’s fleeting days shall end.
Beautiful life with such a Friend,
Beautiful life that has no end,
Eternal life, eternal joy,
He’s my Friend.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 339 首 - 耶穌是我一切所有
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌是我一切所有，生命、喜樂 、珍寶。
是我每日生活力量，離祂我必跌倒。
當我愁苦來就耶穌，無人像祂如此可靠，
使我歡欣，解我心憂，我良友。

耶穌是我一切所有，是急難時拯救。
我到主前求祂施恩，賜我恩福豐厚。
祂賞賜日光，降甘霖，祂使禾田
金穀豐收，日光、甘霖，禾田豐收，我良友。

耶穌是我一切所有，我願作主忠僕。
恩主對我何等信實，我怎能不認主？
跟隨主行必無錯誤，我蒙救主日夜看顧，
跟隨主行，蒙主看顧，我良友。

耶穌是我一切所有，在世別無恩友。
我信靠祂，終身靠祂，直到世路盡頭。
得此良友，生命豐盛，人生美滿，喜樂無憂，
生命豐厚，喜樂無憂，我良友。

english_page_header: Hymn 340 - Jesus! What a Friend for Sinners
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus! what a Friend for sinners!
Jesus! Lover of my soul;
Friends may fail me, foes assail me,
He, my Savior, makes me whole.

Jesus! what a Strength in weakness!
Let me hide myself in Him.
Tempted, tried, and sometimes failing,
He, my Strength, my vict'ry wins.

Jesus! what a Help in sorrow!
While the billows o’er me roll,
Even when my heart is breaking,
He, my Comfort, helps my soul.

Jesus! what a Guide and Keeper!
While the tempest still is high,
Storms about me, night o’ertakes me,
He, my Pilot, hears my cry.

Jesus! I do now receive Him,
More than all in Him I find.
He hath granted me forgiveness,
I am His, and He is mine.

REFRAIN
Hallelujah! what a Savior!
Hallelujah! what a Friend!
Saving, helping, keeping, loving,
He is with me to the end.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 340 首 - 奇妙的救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌救主，罪人朋友，耶穌我心靈良友；
敵雖害我，友雖離我，救主必定護祐我。

耶穌救主，奇妙力量，我在主裡永穩妥；
或遇試探，或遭患難，靠主能力我勝過。

耶穌救主，安慰、扶助，縱然海浪漫我身，
醫治痛苦，破碎心靈，慈愛救主伴我行。

耶穌救主，導我前行，浪濤洶湧主拯救，
狂風吹襲，黑夜來臨，主是良友，聽我求。

耶穌救主，我接受祂，得蒙救贖，主恩多。
主用寶血洗我罪愆，我屬恩主，祂屬我。

副歌
哈利路亞，奇妙救主！哈利路亞，我良友！
救我，助我，護我，愛我，與我同在到永久。

english_page_header: Hymn 341 - Let Jesus Come into Your Heart
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 341 首 - 讓主耶穌進入你心
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你是否願離棄罪惡苦情？讓主耶穌進入你心；
你是否渴慕得新生命？讓主耶穌進入你心。

罪惡轄制人心，無法自主，讓主耶穌進入你心；
主寶血泉源洗你罪污，讓主耶穌進入你心。

當人生遇風浪難以平息，讓主耶穌進入你心；
這世界無法填滿你心，讓主耶穌進入你心。

你是否渴慕平安的心靈？讓主耶穌進入你心；
你是否願得喜樂、歡欣？讓主耶穌進入你心。

副歌
現在切莫再猶豫，現在切莫再推辭；
現在將心門打開，讓主耶穌進入你心。

english_page_header: Hymn 342 - Let the Lower Lights Be Burning
english_full_lyrics:
Brightly beams our Father’s mercy
From His lighthouse evermore,
But to us He gives the keeping
Of the lights along the shore.

Dark the night of sin has settled,
Loud the angry billows roar;
Eager eyes are watching, longing
For the lights along the shore.

Trim your feeble lamp, my brother:
Some poor sailor tempest tossed,
Trying now to make the harbor,
In the darkness may be lost.

REFRAIN
Let the lower lights be burning!
Send a gleam across the wave!
Some poor, fainting, struggling seaman
You may rescue, you may save.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 342 首 - 你的光當照耀
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天父慈愛明亮恩光，有如燈塔照四方，
我們應當持續發光，乃是神殷殷期望。

罪的暗夜如幕落下，揚起狂風和巨浪，
多少人正迫切等待，切盼看見岸邊光。

朋友！快將殘燈剔亮，風雨中有人迷航，
為黑暗中迷失的人，尋得溫暖避風港。

副歌
你的光當照耀明亮，讓亮光穿越波浪，
照亮罪海世人方向，引領他們快回港。

english_page_header: Hymn 343 - Love Lifted Me
english_full_lyrics:
I was sinking deep in sin,
Far from the peaceful shore,
Very deeply stained within,
Sinking to rise no more;
But the Master of the sea
Heard my despairing cry,
From the waters lifted me,
Now safe am I.

All my heart to Him I give,
Ever to Him I’ll cling,
In His blessed presence live,
Ever His praises sing;
Love so mighty and so true
Merits my soul’s best songs;
Faithful, loving service, too,
To Him belongs.

Souls in danger, look above,
Jesus completely saves;
He will lift you by His love
Out of the angry waves;
He’s the Master of the sea,
Billows His will obey;
He your Saviour wants to be,
Be saved today.

REFRAIN
Love lifted me! Love lifted me!
When nothing else could help,
Love lifted me.
Love lifted me! Love lifted me!
When nothing else could help,
Love lifted me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 343 首 - 愛拯救我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我曾陷溺罪海中，遠離了安全港，罪惡壓迫極深重，心靈痛苦失望；
幸蒙萬有大主宰，聽見我哀求聲，恩手救我離苦海，免我淪亡。

我今願奉獻身心，跟隨主永不離，我要讚美主聖名，祂懷中享安息；
主的愛廣大真誠，我靈歌唱不停，願向主忠心事奉，順祂旨意。

你遇危險或災害，當仰望慈愛主，祂有恩典與大愛，你就必得幫助；
天地海洋祂掌管，風浪聽祂命令，祂今願意你悔改，除你罪辜。

副歌
愛拯救我，愛拯救我。當我灰心絕望，愛拯救我。
愛拯救我，愛拯救我。當我灰心絕望，愛拯救我。

english_page_header: Hymn 344 - A Shelter in the Time of Storm
english_full_lyrics:
The Lord’s our Rock, in Him we hide,
A shelter in the time of storm;
Secure whatever ill be tide,
A shelter in the time of storm.

A shade by day, defense by night,
A shelter in the time of storm;
No fears alarm, no foes affright,
A shelter in the time of storm.

The raging storms may round us beat,
A shelter in the time of storm;
We’ll never leave our safe retreat,
A shelter in the time of storm.

O Rock divine, O Refuge dear,
A shelter in the time of storm;
Be Thou our helper, ever near,
A shelter in the time of storm.

REFRAIN
Oh, Jesus is a Rock in a weary land,
A weary land, a weary land;
Oh, Jesus is a Rock in a weary land,
A shelter in the time of storm.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 344 首 - 暴風雨中的避難所
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主是磐石，容我藏躲，暴風雨中的避難所；
災禍來臨，我得穩妥，暴風雨中的避難所。

無論日夜我都交託，暴風雨中的避難所；
不怕仇敵，不畏災禍，暴風雨中的避難所。

驚濤駭浪四周襲我，暴風雨中的避難所；
我永不離這安穩所，暴風雨中的避難所。

神聖磐石容我藏躲，暴風雨中的避難所；
時刻扶助，永遠交託，暴風雨中的避難所。

副歌
主耶穌為磐石，作我避難所，如沙漠地有蔭涼所。
主耶穌為磐石，作我避難所，暴風雨中的避難所。

english_page_header: Hymn 345 - O the Deep, Deep Love of Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
O the deep, deep love of Jesus,
Vast, unmeasured, boundless, free!
Rolling as a mighty ocean
In its fullness over me!
Underneath me, all around me,
Is the current of Thy love-
Leading onward, leading homeward,
To Thy glorious rest above!

O the deep, deep love of Jesus-
Spread His praise from shore to shore!
How He loveth, ever loveth,
Changeth never, nevermore!
How He watches o’er His loved ones,
Died to call them all His own;
How for them He intercedeth,
Watcheth o’er them from the throne!

O the deep, deep love of Jesus,
Love of every love the best! 
’Tis an ocean full of blessing, 
’Tis a haven giving rest!
O the deep, deep love of Jesus- 
’Tis a heav’n of heav’ns to me;
And it lifts me up to glory,
For it lifts me up to Thee!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 345 首 - 深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛！無限廣闊，無限量；
浩浩蕩蕩有如汪洋，主愛臨我多周詳。
將我蔭庇，將我環繞，滔滔慈愛領我航；
導我前行，領我歸家，安息天上永生享。

深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛！廣闊無邊似大海；
何等的愛，永久的愛，永永遠遠不更改。
耶穌看顧屬祂兒女，呼召到祂跟前來；
寶座之前，為我代求，賞賜恩典，永同在。

深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛！無以倫比多深長；
廣闊如海，賜福無量，領我安息避風港。
深哉，深哉，耶穌的愛！使我有如在天堂；
領我進入榮光之中，領我就近主身旁。

english_page_header: Hymn 346 - Softly and Tenderly Jesus Is Calling
english_full_lyrics:
Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling,
Calling for you and for me;
See, on the portals He’s waiting and watching,
Watching for you and for me.

Why should we tarry when Jesus is pleading,
Pleading for you and for me?
Why should we linger and heed not His mercies,
Mercies for you and for me?

Time is now fleeting, the moments are passing,
Passing from you and from me;
Shadows are gathering, deathbeds are coming,
Coming for you and for me.

Oh! for the wonderful love He has promised,
Promised for you and for me;
Tho’ we have sinned, He has mercy and pardon,
Pardon for you and for me.

REFRAIN
Come home, come home,
Ye who are weary come home;
Earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling,
Calling, O sinner, come home!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 346 首 - 耶穌溫柔慈聲呼喚
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌溫柔慈聲懇切在呼喚，祂呼喚你、呼喚我。
祂耐心在門外等候你回盼，祂等候你，等候我。

主已為你代求，為何還耽延？為你代求，也為我。
為何遲延不顧救主的慈憐，祂憐憫你，憐憫我。

光陰飛逝如梭，一刻不停留，不等候你，不等我。
陰暗死亡籠罩，黑夜快臨頭，快臨近你，臨近我。

耶穌應許賜下奇妙大慈愛，應許愛你，也愛我。
罪過雖多，主能赦免我罪債，祂赦免你，赦免我。

副歌
歸家，歸家，憂傷困倦者歸家；
耶穌溫柔慈聲懇切在呼喚，呼喚你快快歸家。

english_page_header: Hymn 347 - The Rock That Is Higher than I
english_full_lyrics:
O sometimes the shadows are deep,
And rough seems the path to the goal,
And sorrows, sometimes how they sweep
Like tempests down over the soul!

O sometimes how long seems the day,
And sometimes how weary my feet;
But toiling in life’s dusty way,
The Rock’s blessed shadow, how sweet!

O near to the Rock let me keep,
If blessings or sorrows prevail,
Or climbing the mountain way steep,
Or walking the shadowy vale.

REFRAIN
O then to the Rock let me fly,
To the Rock that is higher than I;
O then to the Rock let me fly,
To the Rock that is higher than I!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 347 首 - 萬古磐石藏身所
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
有時烏雲濃，陰影深，奔走天國路多艱辛，
憂傷猶如風雨掃蕩，心靈受震撼，昏茫茫。

有時度一日如一年，步履既疲憊又困倦。
人生勞苦，前途黯淡，盤石蔭庇我，何甘甜！

容我來就近靈磐石，無論遇祝福或災禍。
或爬高山，或攀陡坡，或經死蔭谷，仍穩妥。

副歌
奔向靈磐石得穩妥，藏身於主至高靈磐石。
萬古靈磐藏身之所，我奔向靈磐石得穩妥。

english_page_header: Hymn 348 - He’s a Wonderful Saviour to Me
english_full_lyrics:
I was lost in sin, but Jesus rescued me,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me;
I was bound by fear, but Jesus set me free,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me.

He’s a Friend so true, so patient and so kind,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me;
Ev’rything I need in Him I always find,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me.

He is always near to comfort and to cheer,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me;
He forgives my sins, He dries my ev’ry tear,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me.

Dearer grows the love of Jesus day by day,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me;
Sweeter is His grace while pressing on my way,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me.

REFRAIN
For He’s a wonderful Saviour to me,
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me.
I was lost in sin, but Jesus took me in:
He’s a wonderful Saviour to me;
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 348 首 - 祂是奇妙救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
從前陷罪中，主耶穌來救贖，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。
從前多驚恐，但耶穌釋放我，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。

主是我良友，施恩慈又保護，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。
一切我所需，主耶穌必賞賜，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。

我常依靠主，得安慰與扶助，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。
赦免我眾罪，祂擦去我眼淚，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。

耶穌施慈愛，必日日更豐富，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。
耶穌有恩典，必日日更豐足，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。

副歌
祂就是奇妙的奇妙救主；祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。
從前陷罪中，但耶穌拯救我，祂是奇妙的奇妙救主。

english_page_header: Hymn 349 - The Saviour Is Waiting
english_full_lyrics:
The Saviour is waiting to enter your heart,
Why don’t you let Him come in?
There’s nothing in this world to keep you apart,
What is your answer to Him?

If you’ll take one step t’ward the Saviour my friend,
You’ll find His arms open wide;
Receive Him, and all of your darkness will end,
Within your heart He’ll abide.

REFRAIN
Time after time He has waited before,
And now He is waiting again
To see if you’re willing to open the door,
Oh, how He wants to come in.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 349 首 - 救主正在等待
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主耶穌正等待，要進你心懷，何不請救主進來？
無世上事能使你與主隔開，快回應耶穌的愛。

若願親近救主，到主面前來，祂慈手為你展開。
除去憂悶、黑暗，快將主接待，祂永遠住你心懷。

副歌
你心門外救主耐心等待，現在祂仍願施慈愛。
問你是否願意把心門打開，讓耶穌進你心懷。

english_page_header: Hymn 350 - Saviour, More than Life
english_full_lyrics:
Saviour, more than life to me,
I am clinging, clinging close to Thee;
Let Thy precious blood applied,
Keep me ever, ever near Thy side.

Thro’ this changing world below,
Lead me gently, gently as I go;
Trusting Thee, I cannot stray,
I can never, never lose my way.

Let me love Thee more and more,
Till this fleeting, fleeting life is o’er;
Till my soul is lost in love,
In a brighter, brighter world above.

REFRAIN
Ev’ry day, ev’ry hour, Let me feel
Thy cleansing pow’r;
May Thy tender love to me
Bind me closer, closer, Lord, to Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 350 首 - 主比生命更寶貴
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主比生命更寶貴，我要靠近、靠近祢身邊。
願祢寶血洗淨我，使我永遠、永遠近祢前。

經過多變的世界，求主溫柔、溫柔領我路。
倚靠耶穌無錯誤，我必永不、永不走迷途。

我愛救主更堅定，直到短促、短促人生盡。
願主慈愛滿我心，進入光明、光明天家庭。

副歌
每一天， 每一刻，願主大權能彰顯。
願主愛索常繫連，使我更近、更近祢身邊。

english_page_header: Hymn 351 - Day by Day
english_full_lyrics:
Day by day and with each passing moment,
Strength I find to meet my trials here;
Trusting in my Father’s wise bestowment,
I’ve no cause for worry or for fear.
He whose heart is kind beyond all measure
Gives unto each day what He deems best-
Lovingly, its part of pain and pleasure,
Mingling toil with peace and rest.

Ev'ry day the Lord Himself is near me
With a special mercy for each hour;
All my cares He fain would bear, and cheer me,
He whose name is Counselor and Power.
The protection of His child and treasure
Is a charge that on Himself He laid; 
“As thy days, thy strength shall be in measure,”
This the pledge to me He made.

Help me then in ev'ry tribulation
So to trust Thy promises, O Lord,
That I lose not faith’s sweet consolation
Offered me within Thy holy word.
Help me Lord, when toil and trouble meeting
E’er to take, as from a father’s hand,
One by one, the days, the moments fleeting, 
’Til I reach the promised land.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 351 首 - 每一天
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
每一天所度過的每一刻，我得力量能勝過試煉；
依靠天父智慧周詳供應，我永不再恐慌與掛念。
祂的慈愛難測長闊高深，祂每天都安排極周全，
不論愁苦或是喜樂時刻，都有寧靜和平安。

每一天主耶穌與我親近，每時每刻賜格外憐憫；
我的掛慮主安慰與擔當，祂的名是策士與權能。
主保護祂兒女猶如珍寶，祂必親自看顧和指引；
「你日子如何，力量也如何，」祂的應許都是真。

每當遭遇患難，求主幫助，堅信我主信實的應許；
不容信心軟弱無助退步，只確信主必安慰、憐恤。
懇求主幫助我脫離憂慮；平穩、試煉都有主美意，
我一生年日將如飛而去，直到進應許福地。

english_page_header: Hymn 352 - He Hideth My Soul
english_full_lyrics:
A wonderful Saviour is Jesus my Lord,
A wonderful Saviour to me;
He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,
Where rivers of pleasure I see.

A wonderful Saviour is Jesus my Lord,
He taketh my burden away;
He holdeth me up, and I shall not be moved,
He giveth me strength as my day.

With numberless blessings each moment He crowns,
And filled with His fullness divine,
I sing in my rapture, oh, glory to God
For such a Redeemer as mine!

When clothed in His brightness, transported I rise
To meet Him in clouds of the sky,
His perfect salvation, His wonderful love
I’ll shout with the millions on high.

REFRAIN
He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock
That shadows a dry, thirsty land;
He hideth my life in the depths of His love,
And covers me there with His hand,
And covers me there with His hand.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 352 首 - 主藏我靈
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
奇妙的救贖主是耶穌我主，祂是我的奇妙救主；
祂藏我靈魂在那磐石穴中，喜樂江河湧流無窮。

奇妙的救贖主是耶穌我主，祂挪去我一切重負；
祂扶持我，保守我不至動搖，賜我力量奔走天路。

每時每刻祂賜我無窮厚福，豐盛的愛使我滿足；
我快樂歌唱，榮耀歸與真神，因祂賞賜恩典、救贖。

當我穿上潔白衣被接升空，與救主在雲中相逢；
與眾聖徒同聚集，歡呼歌頌完美救恩、奇妙恩寵。

副歌
祂藏我靈魂在那磐石穴中，如在乾渴地得蔭庇；
祂藏我生命在祂愛之深處，祂大能手將我扶助，祂大能手將我扶助。

english_page_header: Hymn 353 - Beneath the Cross of Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Beneath the cross of Jesus
I fain would take my stand,
The shadow of a mighty rock
Within a weary land;
A home within the widerness,
A rest upon the way,
From the burning of the noontide heat
And the burden of the day.

Upon that cross of Jesus
Mine eye at times can see
The very dying form of One
Who suffered there for me;
And from my smitten heart with tears
Two wonders I confess,
The wonders of His glorious love
And my unworthiness.

I take, O Cross, thy shadow
For my abiding place;
I ask no other sunshine than
The sunshine of His face;
Content to let the world go by,
To know no gain or loss,
My sinful self my only shame,
My glory all the cross.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 353 首 - 在主十架下
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在主耶穌十架下，我願站立堅定，
如酷熱天辛苦遠行，進入磐石之蔭；
如曠野中欣逢居所，路途喜見涼亭；
到此得釋肩頭重擔，全力奔赴前程。

在主耶穌十架下，我常昂首仰望，
隱見救主受苦慘狀，為我忍受死亡；
熱淚滿眶寸心欲裂，內心反覆思想；
思想我身不配受恩，思想主愛非常。

我願以主十架下，為我定居之鄉，
我不尋求其他光照，只求主面慈光；
甘願撇下世界虛榮，得失不再衡量，
我將己罪看為羞恥，十架為我榮光。

english_page_header: Hymn 354 - Only Trust Him
english_full_lyrics:
Come, ev’ry soul by sin oppressed,
There’s mercy with the Lord,
And He will surely give you rest
By trusting in His word.

For Jesus shed His precious blood
Rich blessings to bestow;
Plunge now into the crimson flood
That washes white as snow.

Yes, Jesus is the truth, the way,
That leads you into rest;
Believe in Him without delay,
And you are fully blest.

Come, then, and join this holy band,
And on to glory go,
To dwell in that celestial land,
Where joys immortal flow.

REFRAIN
Only trust Him, only trust Him,
only trust Him now;
He will save you, He will save you,
He will save you now.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 354 首 - 只要信祂
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
被罪壓制的人，請來！接受恩主愛憐，
祂要救你，賜你平安，只要信祂恩言。

耶穌為你曾流寶血，祂恩典何豐盛！
快來信靠寶血救恩，必白如雪潔淨。

耶穌就是道路、真理，領你進入安息，
快信靠祂勿再遲疑，必得永生福氣。

請來加入聖徒行列，同往榮耀天鄉，
福樂美地無憂無慮，永享福樂無疆。


副歌
只要信祂，只要信祂，今日信靠祂，
祂必救你，祂必救你，今日必救你。

english_page_header: Hymn 355 - Constantly Abiding
english_full_lyrics:
There’s a peace in my heart
that the world never gave,
A peace it cannot take away;
Tho’ the trials of life
may surround like a cloud,
I’ve a peace that has come there to stay!

All the world seemed to sing
of a Saviour and King,
When peace sweetly came to my heart;
Troubles all fled away
and my night turned to day,
Blessed Jesus, how glorious Thou art!

This treasure I have
in a temple of clay,
While here on His footstool I roam;
But He’s coming to take
me some glorious day,
Over there to my heavenly home!

REFRAIN
Constantly abiding, Jesus is mine;
Constantly abiding, rapture divine;
He never leaves me lonely,
whispers, O so kind: “I will never leave thee.” Jesus is mine.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 355 首 - 平安永在我心
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
平安永在我心，並非世界所賜，
無人能奪去這平安；
雖有烏雲環繞，雖有試煉艱難，
我心永遠有這真平安。

當這甜美平安充滿在我心中，
普世彷彿向主歌頌；
黑暗頓成光明，愁苦全失蹤影，
萬福主耶穌何等光榮。

在世寄居之日，雖然漂泊無定，
但主賜我安樂融融；
將來榮耀大日，主必再來接我，
回到天上極榮美家中。

副歌
永遠住在我心，耶穌我主；
永遠住在我心，無限快樂。
主永不將我撇棄，慈聲對我說：
「我永不離開你。」耶穌我主。

english_page_header: Hymn 356 - Faith Is the Victory
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 356 首 - 信心使我得勝
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
光明山上基督精兵，大家振作精神，當趁黑夜尚未來臨，
加緊衝鋒陷陣，居高臨下，全力進攻，決心將敵滅盡，
靠著信心終必得勝，我得勝靠信心。

真神慈愛是我旌旗，神言是我寶劍，全備信德是我盾牌，
滅盡惡者火箭，我們屢將仇敵擊敗，信心如風疾捲，
大家同走先聖道路，高唱凱歌向前。

四周盡是仇敵圍繞，列陣向我攻擊，趕快離開安樂營地，
沉著向前迎敵，頭上戴起救恩頭盔，腰間束帶真理，
步伐整齊，震動大地，呼聲響徹天際。

副歌
信！使我全得勝。信！使我全得勝。
喔！榮耀的大勝利，勝世界靠信心。

english_page_header: Hymn 357 - The Lord’s My Shepherd
english_full_lyrics:
The Lord’s my Shepherd, I’ll not want;
He makes me down to lie
In pastures green; He leadeth me
The quiet waters by.

My soul He doth restore again,
And me to walk doth make
Within the paths of righteousness,
E’en for His own name’s sake.

Yes, though I walk in death’s dark vale,
Yet will I fear no ill;
For Thou art with me, and Thy rod
And staff me comfort still.

My table Thou hast furnished
In presence of my foes:
My head Thou dost with oil anoint,
And my cup overflows.

Goodness and mercy all my life
Shall surely follow me,
And in God’s house forevermore
My dwelling place shall be.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 357 首 - 主耶和華是我牧者
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主耶和華是我牧者，我必不至缺乏。
使我躺臥青草地上，領我安歇水邊。

祂使我靈魂得甦醒，時刻眷顧保護，
因祂榮耀聖善尊名，領我行走義路。

我雖行過死蔭幽谷，也必不怕遭害，
祢杖、祢竿都安慰我，因祢與我同在。

主在我眾仇敵面前，為我擺設筵席，
祢用膏油膏我的頭，使我福杯滿溢。

恩惠慈愛必隨著我，一生一世不斷，
且要住在我主殿中，從今直到永遠。

english_page_header: Hymn 358 - Christ Liveth in Me
english_full_lyrics:
Once far from God and dead in sin,
No light my heart could see,
But in God’s Word the light I found-
Now Christ liveth in me.

As rays of light from yonder sun
The flow’rs of earth set free,
So life and light and love came forth
From Christ living in me.

With longing all my heart is filled
That like Him I may be,
As on the wondrous thought I dwell,
That Christ liveth in me.

REFRAIN
Christ liveth in me,
Christ liveth in me;
O what a salvation this-
That Christ liveth in me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 358 首 - 基督活在我心
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
前遠離主，在罪中死，內心毫無亮光；
藉神聖言，我蒙光照，今主居我心房。

正如太陽發出光芒，遍地百花齊放；
祂賜生命、慈愛、恩光，因主居我心房。

在我心中充滿渴慕，甚願像主一樣；
奇妙主恩我常思量，救主居我心房。

副歌
主活在我心；主活在我心。
是！何等奇妙救恩，基督活在我心。

english_page_header: Hymn 359 - Marching to Zion
english_full_lyrics:
Come, we that love the Lord,
And let our joys be known;
Join in a song with sweet accord,
Join in a song with sweet accord,
And thus surround the throne,
And thus surround the throne.

Let those refuse to sing
Who never knew our God;
But children of the heav’nly King,
But children of the heav’nly King,
May speak their joys abroad,
May speak their joys abroad.

The hill of Zion yields
A thousand sacred sweets,
Before we reach the heav’nly fields,
Before we reach the heav’nly fields,
Or walk the golden streets,
Or walk the golden streets.

Then let our songs abound,
And ev’ry tear be dry;
We’re marching through Immanuel’s ground,
We’re marching through Immanuel’s ground,
To fairer worlds on high,
To fairer worlds on high.

REFRAIN
We’re marching to Zion,
Beautiful, beautiful Zion;
We’re marching upward to Zion,
The beautiful city of God.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 359 首 - 同心前往錫安
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
快起來，眾聖徒，大家歡喜快樂；齊聲歌頌，聖徒唱和，
齊聲歌頌，聖徒唱和，同環繞主寶座，同環繞主寶座。

眾罪人不認主，不願向神歌唱；唯主耶穌所愛群羊，
唯主耶穌所愛群羊，將喜信齊傳揚，將喜信齊傳揚。

齊前往錫安山，盛產百果甜香；當我們到更美家鄉，
當我們到更美家鄉，同歡聚在天堂，同歡聚在天堂。

讓我們齊歡唱，不再流淚哀哭；同走以馬內利旅途，
同走以馬內利旅途，到天庭見天父，到天庭見天父。

副歌
同心前往錫安，美麗的，美麗的聖山；
眾聖徒同心往錫安，前往光輝榮耀聖山。

english_page_header: Hymn 360 - Have You Any Room for Jesus?
english_full_lyrics:
Have you any room for Jesus,
He who bore your load of sin?
As He knocks and asks admission,
Sinner, will you let Him in?

Room for pleasure, room for business,
But for Christ the Crucified,
Not a place that He can enter,
In the heart for which He died?

Have you any room for Jesus,
As in grace He calls again?
O today is time accepted,
Tomorrow you may call in vain.

Room and time now give to Jesus,
Soon will pass God’s day of grace;
Soon thy heart left cold and silent, 
And thy Saviour’s pleading cease.

REFRAIN
Room for Jesus, King of glory!
Hasten now His word obey;
Swing the heart’s door widely open,
Bid Him enter while you may.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 360 首 - 你心可有住處為主？
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你心可有住處為主？祂為你償還罪債，
祂在叩門，慈聲呼喚，你可願接祂進來？

繁華世界佔據你心，卻無心思念主愛，
祂曾為你捨命十架，為何不願迎主來？

你心可有住處為主？救主呼喚把門開，
今日應當接受救恩，莫待明日空無奈；

你心當有住處為主，恩典必滿你心懷，
救主耶穌正在等待，當趁今日心門開。

副歌
讓榮耀主耶穌進來！切莫讓祂立門外；
將你心門快快打開，歡迎耶穌住進來。

english_page_header: Hymn 361 - Lead Me to Calvary
english_full_lyrics:
King of my life, I crown Thee now,
Thine shall the glory be;
Lest I forget Thy thorn-crowned brow,
Lead me to Calvary.

Show me the tomb where Thou wast laid,
Tenderly mourned and wept;
Angels in robes of light arrayed
Guarded Thee whilst Thou slept.

May I be willing, Lord, to bear
Daily my cross for Thee;
Even Thy cup of grief to share,
Thou hast borne all for me.

REFRAIN
Lest I forget Gethsemane;
Lest I forget Thine agony;
Lest I forget Thy love for me,
Lead me to Calvary.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 361 首 - 領我到髑髏地
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
生命之主，願祢做王，榮耀都歸於祢，
使我莫忘祢荊棘冠，領我到髑髏地。

主為我受死釘十架，門徒憂傷哭泣，
有天使穿潔白衣裳，看守在主墓地。

主阿!我情願順服祢，背十架跟從祢，
救主苦杯我願領受，一生事主不息。

副歌
使我莫忘客西馬尼，莫忘我主受苦之地，
莫忘我主慈愛不息，領我到髑髏地。

english_page_header: Hymn 362 - Break Thou the Bread of Life
english_full_lyrics:
Break Thou the bread of life,
Dear Lord, to me,
As Thou didst break the loaves
Beside the sea;
Beyond the sacred page
I seek Thee, Lord;
My spirit pants for Thee,
O living Word.

Bless Thou the truth, dear Lord,
To me, to me,
As Thou didst bless the bread
By Galilee;
Then shall all bondage cease,
All fetters fall;
And I shall find my peace,
My all in all.

Thou art the bread of life,
O Lord, to me,
Thy holy Word the truth
That saveth me;
Give me to eat and live
With Thee above;
Teach me to love Thy truth,
For Thou art love.

O send Thy Spirit, Lord,
Now unto me,
That He may touch mine eyes,
And make me see;
Show me the truth concealed
Within Thy Word,
And in Thy Book revealed
I see the Lord.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 362 首 - 求主擘生命餅
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
求主擘生命餅，供我需用，
有如當年祢在海邊所行；
藉著聖經話語，得見主面，
我靈安靜等候救主命令。

求主向我顯明生命真理，
有如祝謝擘餅在加利利；
救主解我束縛，除我捆鎖，
我屬我主耶穌，在主愛裡。

祢是生命靈糧，賜我力量，
祢聖言是真理，我得亮光；
願與我主同活，如在天上，
願愛慕主真理，救主君王。

求主差遣聖靈感動我心，
求主開我心眼，使我看清；
求主向我啟示寶貴真理，
主所賜生命糧就在聖經。

english_page_header: Hymn 363 - Standing on the Promises
english_full_lyrics:
Standing on the promises of Christ my King,
Thro’ eternal ages let His praises ring;
Glory in the highest, I will shout and sing,
Standing on the promises of God.

Standing on the promises that cannot fail,
When the howling storms of doubt and fear assail,
By the living word of God I shall prevail,
Standing on the promises of God.

Standing on the promises of Christ the Lord,
Bound to Him eternally by love’s strong cord,
Overcoming daily with the Spirit’s Sword,
Standing on the promises of God.

Standing on the promises I cannot fall,
Listening every moment to the Spirit’s call,
Resting in my Saviour as my all in all,
Standing on the promises of God.

REFRAIN
Standing, standing,
Standing on the promises of God my Saviour,
Standing, standing,
I’m standing on the promises of God.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 363 首 - 堅立在應許上
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
堅立在我主權柄的應許上，萬古千秋將主聖名齊頌揚；
榮耀歸於至高真神，我歌唱；堅立在我主的應許上。

堅立在我主不變的應許上，每當驚惶如浪侵襲我心房；
藉主生命、話語，使我得堅強，堅立在我主的應許上。

堅立在我主寶貴的應許上，永遠繫在主的愛索不動盪；
帶著聖靈寶劍天天打勝仗，堅立在我主的應許上。

堅立在我主信實的應許上，時刻祈求聖靈引領我前往；
救主是我一切倚靠的力量，堅立在我主的應許上。

副歌
堅立，堅立，堅立在我主的寶貴應許之上，
堅立，堅立，要堅立在我主的應許上。

english_page_header: Hymn 364 - Thy Word Have I Hid in My Heart
english_full_lyrics:
Thy Word is a lamp to my feet,
A light to my path alway,
To guide and to save me from sin,
And show me the heav’nly way.

Forever, O Lord, is Thy Word
Established and fixed on high;
Thy faithfulness unto all men
Abideth forever nigh.

At morning, at noon, and at night
I ever will give Thee praise;
For Thou art my portion, O Lord,
And shall be thro’ all my days!

Thro’ Him whom Thy Word hath foretold,
The Saviour and Morning Star,
Salvation and peace have been bro’t
To those who have strayed afar.

REFRAIN
Thy Word have I hid in my heart,
That I might not sin against Thee;
That I might not sin, That I might not sin,
Thy Word have I hid in my heart.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 364 首 - 主話語深藏我心
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主言是我腳前的燈，是我路上的亮光；
領我前往，救我離罪，直到進榮耀天堂。

主言真實永不改變，主道安定永在天；
祂信實必存到永遠，祂公義廣大無邊。

我每日要高聲傳揚，時時頌主恩無窮；
因主是我永遠福份，天國樂境已在望。

真神言語滿有力量，普世傳揚遍四方；
平安、喜樂歸與聖民，榮耀歸於天上王。

副歌
主話語深藏我心房，免去罪惡，我靈堅強。
我靈要歌唱，我心要讚揚，主話語深藏我心房。

english_page_header: Hymn 365 - O Sacred Head, Now Wounded
english_full_lyrics:
O sacred Head, now wounded,
With grief and shame weighed down,
Now scornfully surrounded With thorns,
Thine only crown;
How pale Thou art with anguish,
With sore abuse and scorn!
How does that visage languish,
Which once was bright as morn!

What Thou, my Lord, hast suffered
Was all for sinners’ gain:
Mine, mine was the transgression,
But Thine the deadly pain;
Lo, here I fall, my Saviour! ’Tis I deserve Thy place;
Look on me with Thy favor,
Vouchsafe to me Thy grace.

What language shall I borrow
To thank Thee, dearest Friend,
For this Thy dying sorrow,
Thy pity without end?
O make me Thine forever,
And should I fainting be,
Lord, let me never, never
Outlive my love to Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 365 首 - 救主受難
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主聖首曾受創傷，憂痛羞辱難擔，
被迫戴荊棘冠冕，忍受嘲諷、誹謗；
仰瞻慈容何蒼白，充滿愁苦悽愴，
原本面貌似晨光，今竟憔悴神傷。

我主! 祢受盡苦難，罪人得蒙恩典，
祢背負十架重擔，因我深重罪愆；
思想我當受苦刑，俯伏我主腳前，
懇求繼續賜恩典，常瞻仰祢聖顏。

我當用何等言語，感謝深厚大愛，
祢代死忍受苦痛，無限愛滿心懷；
願我永遠跟隨祢，忠心永不更改，
莫容我軟弱退後，永遠對祢敬拜。

english_page_header: Hymn 366 - His Way with Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Would you live for Jesus,
and be always pure and good?
Would you walk with Him within the narrow road?
Would you have Him bear your burden,
carry all your load?
Let Him have His way with thee.

Would you have Him make you free,
and follow at His call?
Would you know the peace that comes by giving all?
Would you have Him save you so that
you can never fall?
Let Him have His way with thee.

Would you in His kingdom
find a place of constant rest?
Would you prove Him true in providential test?
Would you in His service labor
always at your best?
Let Him have His way with thee.

REFRAIN
His pow’r can make you what you ought to be:
His blood can cleanse your heart and make you free;
His love can fill your soul, and you will see 
’Twas best for Him to have His way with thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 366 首 - 照主旨意行
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你可願意為主而活，做聖潔子民？可願跟隨主奔走天國路程？
你可願意讓主擔當一切重擔負？願你照主旨意行。

你可願意得着自由，聽從主呼聲？可願奉獻所有得享真平靜？
你可願意讓主攙扶，永遠不失足？願你照主旨意行。

你可願意在神國裡尋得安歇處？可願接受試煉，彰顯主信實？
你可願意盡心盡意盡力事奉主？願你照主旨意行。

副歌
祂權能使你完全變新人；祂寶血使你潔淨得自由；
祂慈愛極豐盛，你必明白：你應當遵照主的旨意行。

english_page_header: Hymn 367 - His Eye Is on the Sparrow
english_full_lyrics:
Why should I feel discouraged,
Why should the shadows come,
Why should my heart be lonely
And long for Heav’n and home,
When Jesus is my portion?
My constant Friend is He:
His eye is on the sparrow,
And I know He watches me.

“Let not your heart be troubled,”
His tender word I hear,
And resting on His goodness,
I lose my doubts and fears;
Tho’ by the path He leadeth
But one step I may see:
His eye is on the sparrow,
And I know He watches me.

Whenever I am tempted,
Whenever clouds arise,
When songs give place to sighing,
When hope within me dies,
I draw the closer to Him,
From care He sets me free;
His eye is on the sparrow,
And I know He cares for me.

REFRAIN
His eye is on the sparrow,
And I know He watches me.
I sing because I’m happy,
I sing because I’m free,
For His eye is on the sparrow,
and I know He watches me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 367 首 - 祂看顧麻雀
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
為何灰心常怨嘆？ 為何黑影瀰漫？
為何心靈覺孤單？ 甚至欲脫塵寰？
耶穌是我的良友，萬福賜我享受，
祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷祐。

我聽救主溫柔聲：「除去你心憂悶。」
安息主懷多恬靜，毫無疑懼戰兢；
有主引領在前頭，步步跟隨祂走，
祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷祐。

當我每次遇試探，黑雲遮蓋迷漫，
喜樂詩歌變哀歎，盼望轉為暗淡；
我願更親近恩主，祂必除我憂愁，
祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷祐。

副歌
祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷祐。
我唱因我得自由，我唱因我無憂，
我主既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷祐。

english_page_header: Hymn 368 - O Zion, Haste
english_full_lyrics:
O Zion, haste, thy mission, high fulfilling,
To tell to all the world that God is Light;
That He who made all nations is not willing
One soul should perish, lost in shades of night.

Behold how many thousands still are lying,
Bound in the darksome prisonhouse of sin,
With none to tell them of the Saviour’s dying,
Or of the life He died for them to win.

Proclaim to ev’ry people, tongue, and nation
The God, in whom they live and move, is Love:
Tell how He stoop’d to save His lost creation,
And died on earth that man might live above.

Give of thy sons to bear the message glorious;
Give of thy wealth to speed them on their way;
Pour out thy soul for them in prayer victorious;
And all thou spendest Jesus will repay.

REFRAIN
Publish glad tidings, tidings of peace,
Tidings of Jesus, redemption and release.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 368 首 - 快傳福音
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
錫安子民! 快將主福音傳揚，普告天下，惟有真神是光，
慈愛天父不願有一人失喪，不願有一人黑暗中淪亡。

看! 多少人仍然被罪權綑綁，黑暗重重，被困罪惡牢房，
無人告知基督已甘願捨命，為拯救世人，帶來新希望。

宣告天下萬族萬民和萬邦，真神是愛，祂是生命之光，
謙卑降世，為救世人免淪亡，捨身十字架，信者進天堂。

獻你兒女將榮耀信息宣揚，獻你財物，助福音傳遠方，
恆切代禱，助工人打勝靈仗，你一切奉獻必蒙主報償。

副歌
傳大好信息和平福音，傳揚主耶穌，使罪人得釋放。

english_page_header: Hymn 369 - At Calvary
english_full_lyrics:
Years I spent in vanity and pride,
Caring not my Lord was crucified,
Knowing not it was for me He died
On Calvary.

By God’s Word at last my sin I learned;
Then I trembled at the law I’d spurned, 
Till my guilty soul imploring turned
To Calvary.

Now I’ve giv’n to Jesus ev’rything,
Now I gladly own Him as my King,
Now my raptured soul can only sing
Of Calvary.

Oh, the love that drew salvation’s plan!
Oh, the grace that bro’t it down to man!
Oh, the mighty gulf that God did span
At Calvary.

REFRAIN
Mercy there was great, and grace was free;
Pardon there was multiplied to me;
There my burdened soul found liberty,
At Calvary.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 369 首 - 在各各他
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
從前我貪慕虛榮奢華，不願思想救主釘十架，
未曾知道我主為我死在各各他。

主的真理照亮我內心，使我知罪，悔改不走差，
我今前來感念主大恩在各各他。

我將一切所有獻給祂，不歸自己，全歸神的家，
我靈歡喜快樂高聲唱在各各他。

神的慈愛救贖真浩大，耶穌捨命成全祂計畫，
滅了冤仇，我與神和好在各各他。


副歌
耶穌慈愛奇妙恩典大，沉重罪擔在此得卸下，
赦免眾罪愆，我得自由在各各他。

english_page_header: Hymn 370 - If God Be for Us
english_full_lyrics:
Rejoice in the Lord! oh, let His mercy cheer;
He sunders the bands that enthrall;
Redeemed by His blood, why should we ever fear-
Since Jesus is our “all in all”?

Be strong in the Lord! rejoicing in His might,
Be loyal and true day by day;
When evils assail, be valiant for the right,
And He will be our strength and stay.

Confide in His Word- His promises so sure;
In Christ they are “yea and amen”;
Tho’ earth pass away, they ever shall endure, 
’Tis written o’er and o’er again.

Abide in the Lord: secure in His control, 
’Tis life everlasting begun;
To pluck from His hand the weakest, trembling soul-
It never, never can be done!

REFRAIN
“If God be for us, if God be for us, if God be for us,
Who can be against us?
Who? who? who?
Who can be against us, against us?”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 370 首 - 主幫助我們
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
靠主常喜樂，主愛滿溢我心，賜我們自由，免罪債；
寶血作贖價，使我們不懼怕，因主與我們常同在。

靠主當剛強，在主裡得喜樂，要忠誠信實倚靠主；
惡者雖攻擊，勇敢為義爭戰，加添我能力為耶穌。

當信主的話，在耶穌基督裡，主應許永遠不落空；
天地將過去，主話語必長存，永遠被紀念、被傳頌。

在主蔭庇下，蒙祂保守平安，享受真生命到永遠；
我靈雖軟弱，但靠主大能手，必活出煥然新生命。

副歌
主幫助我們，主幫助我們，主幫助我們，誰能敵擋我們?
誰? 誰? 誰·····?主幫助，誰能敵擋我們?

english_page_header: Hymn 371 - In the Hour of Trial
english_full_lyrics:
In the hour of trial,
Jesus, plead for me,
Lest, by base denial
I depart from Thee.
When Thou seest me waver,
With a look recall,
Nor for fear or favor
Suffer me to fall.

With forbidden pleasures
Would this vain world charm,
Or its sordid treasures
Spread to work me harm,
Bring to my remembrance
Sad Gethsemane,
Or, in darker semblance,
Cross-crowned Calvary.

Should Thy mercy send me
Sorrow, toil, and woe,
Or should pain attend me
On my path below,
Grant that I may never
Fail Thy hand to see;
Grant that I may ever
Cast my care on Thee.

When my last hour cometh,
Fraught with strife and pain,
When my dust returneth
To the dust again,
On Thy trust relying,
Through that mortal strife,
Lord, receive me, dying,
To eternal life.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 371 首 - 面臨試煉時候
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
面臨試煉時候，聖靈代我求。
免得我不靠主，遠離主保祐。
當我信心動搖，求主牽我手，
面臨恐懼利誘，護我莫接受。

無數罪中享樂，在世常引誘；
不義之財誘惑，我常想擁有。
思想客西馬尼，念主釘痕手，
追憶我主捨命各各他山頭。

若因主的憐愛，我受苦與愁；
若我在世旅途，遇著痛與憂。
願主開我心眼，看見主恩手，
願將難負重擔，卸於主肩頭。

當我面臨死亡，遇痛苦心憂；
我這塵土肉身，歸塵土時候。
願我交托信靠，安祥攜主手，
求主接納我靈，天堂福永久。

english_page_header: Hymn 372 - Hear Us, O Saviour!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 372 首 - 降百福甘霖
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主阿! 求祢聽我禱告，我在此謙卑認罪，
懇求祢賜應許甘霖，澆灌我，充滿我心。

主阿! 我到祢寶座前，懇求祢賜福愛憐，
懇求祢賜恩典甘霖，澆灌我，充滿我心。

主阿! 祢信實不改變，祢應許必定實現，
懇求祢加添我信心，賜甘霖充滿我心。

副歌
降百福甘霖，甦醒我靈魂，
賜我百福甘霖，求主降甘霖。

english_page_header: Hymn 373 - Only Believe
english_full_lyrics:
Fear not, little flock, from the cross to the throne,
From death into life He went for His own;
All power in earth, all power above,
Is given to Him for the flock of His love.

Fear not, little flock, He goeth ahead,
Your Shepherd selecteth the path you must tread;
The waters of Marah He’ll sweeten for thee
He drank all the bitter in Gethsemane.

Fear not, little flock, whatever your lot;
He enters all rooms, “the doors being shut.”
He never forsakes, He never is gone
So count on His presence in darkness and dawn.

REFRAIN
Only believe, only believe;
All things are possible, only believe;
Only believe, only believe:
All things are possible, only believe.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 373 首 - 只要相信
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
群羊不要怕，牧者已復活，祂曾釘十架，今已登寶座；
天地諸權柄，都歸祂掌握，為所愛群羊，一切預備安妥。

群羊不要怕，牧者引你路，你當跟從祂，前途交託主；
瑪拉泉雖苦，主變為甘甜；在客西馬尼，救主為你受苦。

群羊不要怕，不論禍與福，縱使門關閉，救主能進入；
祂不丟棄你，慈愛不遠離，光明或黑暗，你都要依靠主。

副歌
只要相信，只要相信，在神凡事都能，只要相信。
只要相信，只要相信，在神凡事都能，只要相信。

english_page_header: Hymn 374 - Lead On, O King Eternal
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 374 首 - 求永恆君王前導
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
求永恆君王前導，出征之時已到，
戰地營幕為我家，惟祢是我倚靠；
準備時日已久長，主恩使我剛強，
永恆君王在前導，歡唱戰歌聲豪。

求永恆君王前導，直到戰爭終了，
成聖之人將吟唱：「阿們! 平安臨到。」
陣前不聞戰鼓聲，攻擊不用鎗、刀，
仁義兵器勝仇敵，真神國度臨到。

求永恆君王前導，我願勇敢跟從，
喜樂湧出如晨光，因見我主聖容；
十架高舉光照耀，艱險路程奮勇，
冠冕留給得勝者，跟隨主享光榮。

english_page_header: Hymn 375 - Come, Oh Come, with Thy Broken Heart
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 375 首 - 主呼召你
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
凡心靈哀慟的朋友，主呼召你前來。
只要你懇求主耶穌，恩門必為你開，
主醫治你受傷心靈，賜你平靜心懷，
你為何還在恩典外?  快就近主慈懷。

倚靠救主的十字架，祂必給你慈愛。
只要你信靠活水泉，寶血贖你罪債，
祂慈聲呼召你前來，別讓祂空等待，
要卸下一切罪重擔，耶穌為你擔待。

祂擺設豐盛的筵席，熱誠歡喜款待。
與恩主永居快樂地，同享天父慈愛，
要深信救主大慈愛，有恩典常同在，
祂熱切盼望等候你，擁你在祂慈懷。

english_page_header: Hymn 376 - The Solid Rock
english_full_lyrics:
My hope is built on nothing less
Than Jesus’ blood and righteousness;
I dare not trust the sweetest frame,
But wholly lean on Jesus’ name.

When darkness seems to hide His face,
I rest on His unchanging grace;
In ev'ry high and stormy gale,
My anchor holds within the veil.

His oath, His covenant, His blood
Support me in the whelming flood;
When all around my soul gives way,
He then is all my hope and stay.

When He shall come with trumpet sound,
Oh, may I then in Him be found;
Dressed in His righteousness alone,
Faultless to stand before the throne.

REFRAIN
On Christ, the solid Rock, I stand;
All other ground is sinking sand,
All other ground is sinking sand.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 376 首 - 堅固磐石
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我心所望別無根基，惟救主寶血與公義；
除祂以外，別無拯救，我獨信靠耶穌旨意。

有時黑雲遮蔽前路，耶穌恩典永遠看顧；
狂風巨浪我不畏懼，信心堅固，跟隨基督。

主曾流血立此新約，應許救我，扶助軟弱。
良朋密友雖都遠離，我靠救主安慰穩妥。

末日聽見號筒聲音，與主相遇永遠相親，
穿上救主所賜義袍，潔白無瑕，同享光榮。

副歌
我立於基督磐石上，其他根基，
沙石土壤，其他根基，沙石土壤。

english_page_header: Hymn 377 - Thou Thinkest, Lord, of Me
english_full_lyrics:
Amid the trials that I meet,
Amid the thorns that pierce my feet,
One thought remains supremely sweet,
Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

The cares of life come thronging fast,
Upon my soul their shadows cast;
Their gloom reminds my heart at last,
Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!
Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!
What need I fear when Thou art near,
And thinkest, Lord, of me.

Let shadows come, let shadows go,
Let life be bright, or dark with woe,
I am content, for this I know,
Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!
Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!
What need I fear when Thou art near,
And thinkest, Lord, of me.

REFRAIN
Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!
Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!
What need I fear when Thou art near,
And thinkest, Lord, of me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 377 首 - 主常常顧念我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
當我遇見試煉、災殃，道路崎嶇，荊棘刺傷，
我心思想，頓覺歡暢，因主常顧念我。

思慮、愁苦環繞心上，黑影籠罩，暗無亮光，
我憑信心，主賜力量，主常常顧念我。

烏雲或來，烏雲或去，今生或樂，或多憂慮，
我心滿足，因有確據，主常常顧念我。

副歌
主常常顧念我，主常常顧念我；
我不驚惶，主在身旁，主常常顧念我。

english_page_header: Hymn 378 - Trust and Obey
english_full_lyrics:
When we walk with the Lord
In the light of His Word,
What a glory He sheds on our way!
While we do His good will,
He abides with us still,
And with all who will trust and obey.

Not a burden we bear,
Not a sorrow we share,
But our toil He doth richly repay;
Not a grief or a loss,
Not a frown or a cross,
But is blest if we trust and obey.

But we never can prove
The delights of His love
Until all on the altar we lay;
For the favor He shows,
For the joy He bestows,
Are for them who will trust and obey.

Then in fellowship sweet
We will sit at His feet,
Or we’ll walk by His side in the way;
What He says we will do,
Where He sends we will go;
Never fear, only trust and obey.

REFRAIN
Trust and obey, for there’s no other way
To be happy in Jesus, But to trust and obey.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 378 首 - 信靠順服
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在主福音光中，我與救主同行，何等光輝，祂照亮前程!
只要聽主命令，主必與我同行，信靠順服者，主必同行。

為主背負重擔，為主遭受患難，一切辛勞主紀念償還；
倘遇損失、悲苦，或經十架苦難，信靠順服者，主賜平安。

除非我將一切奉獻救主無偽，否則難知主慈愛豐沛；
因主賜下恩惠，賜下喜樂、榮美，信靠順服者，才獲全備。

我願在主腳前，享主恩典甘甜，行走天路跟隨主身邊；
聽從祂的聖言，順服祂的差遣，信靠順服者，總無驚險。

副歌
信靠順服，此外別無他路，要在主裡得喜樂，惟有信靠順服。

english_page_header: Hymn 379 - Turn Your Eyes upon Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
O soul, are you weary and troubled?
No light in the darkness you see?
There’s a light for a look at the Saviour,
And life more abundant and free!

Thro' death into life everlasting
He passed, and we follow Him there;
Over us sin no more hath dominion-
For more than conquerors we are!

His Word shall not fail you- He promised;
Believe Him, and all will be well:
Then go to a world that is dying,
His perfect salvation to tell!

REFRAIN
Turn your eyes upon Jesus,
Look full in His wonderful face,
And the things of earth will grow strangely dim,
In the light of His glory and grace.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 379 首 - 轉眼仰望耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你心靈是否煩惱困苦，不見亮光，黑暗滿布？
仰望救主耶穌得光明，你生命更活潑、豐富。

主已勝過死亡入光明，我跟隨主得享永生，
已不再被罪權所綑綁，靠救主已得勝有餘。

我救主的應許永不變，信靠祂萬事蒙恩典，
快去傳祂全備的福音，拯救罪人脫離苦監。


副歌
轉眼仰望主耶穌，定睛在祂奇妙慈容，
在救主榮耀恩典光輝中，世上之事必顯為虛空。

english_page_header: Hymn 380 - I’ll Put Jesus First
english_full_lyrics:
The world all about me has now no allure:
Its pleasures bring pain, Its wisdom is vain;
I seek a foundation that’s steadfast and sure:
I’ll put Jesus first in my life.

The Lord Jesus died my salvation to win:
He went in my stead To Calv’ry and bled;
Redemption impels me to give up all sin:
I’ll put Jesus first in my life.

I know there’s a home for the ransomed and blest,
When death is no more, When struggle is o’er,
For those who love Jesus and give Him their best:
I’ll put Jesus first in my life.

Though earth’s tribulations continue each day,
Though pleasures may call, Though evil enthrall,
His grace will protect me forever and aye:
I’ll put Jesus first in my life.

REFRAIN
In all that I say, In all that I do,
Throughout the world of toil and strife,
By day and by night, Through trust in His might,
I’ll put Jesus first in my life.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 380 首 - 我主是我生命標竿
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
從前沉迷世界的繁華虛空，歡笑如幻夢，美名如捕風。
唯主基督我保障永遠安穩，我主是我生命標竿。

因我罪深，主為我代死十架，在各各他山寶血做贖價。
救恩功成，主使我罪擔卸下，我主是我生命標竿。

我深信主已為我預備天堂，不再有悲傷，永遠有歡唱。
我必穿潔白衣裳在主身旁，我主是我生命標竿。

世上的憂患困苦從未間斷，罪惡時迷惑，試探常引誘，
但靠主恩保守我直到永遠，我主是我生命標竿。

副歌
願我口所言，願我手所做，無論何往，主名傳揚。
願主在我旁，願顯主芬芳，因主是我生命標竿。

english_page_header: Hymn 381 - Oh, How I Love Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
There is a name I love to hear,
I love to sing its worth;
It sounds like music in my ear,
The sweetest name on earth.

It tells me of a Saviour’s love,
Who died to set me free;
It tells me of His precious blood,
The sinner’s perfect plea.

It tells me what my Father hath
In store for ev’ry day,
And though I tread a darksome path,
Yields sunshine all the way.

It tells of One whose loving heart
Can feel my deepest woe;
Who in each sorrow bears a part
That none can bear below.

REFRAIN
Oh, how I love Jesus,
Oh, how I love Jesus,
Oh, how I love Jesus,
Because He first loved me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 381 首 - 我何等愛耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌聖名我最敬愛，配得稱頌、敬拜；
此名似樂，美妙動聽，普世無所不在。

此名使我能知主愛，捨命償我罪債；
救主流血為我受害，罪人惟此倚賴。

此名使我認識父神，每日賜福豐盈；
我雖行過死蔭幽谷，有主恩光引領。

此名示我主愛深長，祂知我心痛苦；
擔我憂愁，分我悲傷，世間無人像主！


副歌
我何等愛耶穌，我何等愛耶穌，
我何等愛耶穌，因耶穌先愛我。

english_page_header: Hymn 382 - Be Still, My Soul
english_full_lyrics:
Be still, my soul: the Lord is on thy side.
Bear patiently the cross of grief or pain.
Leave to thy God to order and provide;
In ev'ry change He faithful will remain.
Be still, my soul: thy best, thy heav’nly Friend
Thro’ thorny ways leads to a joyful end.

Be still my soul: thy God doth undertake
To guide the future as He has the past.
Thy hope, thy confidence let nothing shake;
All now mysterious shall be bright at last.
Be still, my soul: the waves and winds still know
His voice Who ruled them while He dwelt below.

Be still, my soul: the hour is hast’ning on
When we shall be forever with the Lord.
When disappointment, grief, and fear are gone,
Sorrow forgot, love’s purest joys restored.
Be still, my soul: when change and tears are past
All safe and blessed we shall meet at last.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 382 首 - 我靈安穩
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我靈安穩，因主幫助、眷愛，痛苦憂傷靠主擔當、忍耐；
交託救主，必有供應安排。世途多變，唯主可以信賴。
我靈安穩，耶穌恩友同在，度過艱難，享平安於主懷。

我靈安穩，一切有主擔當，未來旅途，耶穌引領如常；
信心堅定，凡事皆有盼望。今日迷霧，來日豁然開朗。
我靈安穩，暴風駭浪雖狂，聽主命令，風平浪靜穩當。

我靈安穩，光明清晨在望，救主再臨，那時號筒吹響；
盡忘凡塵失望、憂懼、哀傷，無再愁苦，喜樂驅散驚惶。
我靈安穩，再無悲哀動盪，榮耀天堂，安穩福樂無疆。

english_page_header: Hymn 383 - Some Day!
english_full_lyrics:
Somewhere the sun is shining,
Somewhere the song birds dwell;
Hush, then, thy sad repining,
God lives, and all is well.
Some day! Some day!
We shall behold His glory!
Coming again, evermore to reign,
All will be wondrous glory!

Soon will earth’s night be over,
Soon will the morning dawn;
Soon will the Christ of glory
Call His redeemed ones home.
Some day! Some day!
We shall behold His glory!
Coming again, evermore to reign,
All will be wondrous glory!

There amid heaven's beauties
They shall behold His face,
And through eternal ages
Sing of His wondrous grace.
Some day! Some day!
We shall behold His glory!
Coming again, evermore to reign,
All will be wondrous glory!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 383 首 - 將有一天
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
那裡有榮光照亮，那裡的鳥兒歌唱，
那裡永不再悲傷，因我主在身旁。

黑夜將不再籠罩，黎明已即將來到，
榮耀主在至高處，召我回祂懷抱。

那裡是美麗天堂，得見我救主臉龐，
永享受救主恩光，同讚美齊頌揚。


副歌
將有一天，我們要圍在主身邊，
見祂容顏，永不離主面，歌頌主奇妙恩典。

english_page_header: Hymn 384 - I Would Be Like Jesus
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 384 首 - 我願效法耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今世宴樂我不同流，我願效法耶穌；
絕不隨從世俗繁華，我願效法耶穌。

祂已除去罪惡束縛，我願效法耶穌；
叫我更能服事救主，我願效法耶穌

在世行完人生旅途，一路效法耶穌；
宣揚恩主慈愛救贖，一生效法耶穌。

在那天鄉必見主面，因為效法耶穌；
蒙主誇讚忠心良善，永遠效法耶穌。

副歌
我願效法主耶穌，無論在家或外出，
時刻效法主耶穌，我願效法耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 385 - Redeemed, How I Love to Proclaim It
english_full_lyrics:
Redeemed, how I love to proclaim it!
Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;
Redeemed thro’ His infinite mercy,
His child, and forever, I am.

Redeemed, and so happy in Jesus,
No language my rapture can tell;
I know that the light of His presence
With me doth continually dwell.

I think of my blessed Redeemer,
I think of Him all the day long;
I sing, for I cannot be silent;
His love is the theme of my song.

I know I shall see in His beauty
The king in whose law I delight;
Who lovingly guardeth my footsteps,
And giveth me songs in the night.

REFRAIN
Redeemed, redeemed,
Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;
Redeemed, redeemed,
His child, and forever, I am.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 385 首 - 救贖
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我喜傳揚主救贖恩典，賴羔羊血洗滌潔淨。
因神憐憫，我已得救贖，蒙福兒女主恩豐盈。

我真喜樂在主裡得贖，這大喜樂無法訴盡。
主慈愛的光輝常引導，我深知祂與我同行。

我常思念慈愛的救主，時時刻刻永遠紀念。
願讚美的歌聲永不停，願頌揚祂慈愛無邊。

因祂隨時保守我無恙，在黑夜中我仍歌唱。
我深知在天上的家鄉，必見榮耀救主君王。

副歌
救贖，救贖，賴羔羊血洗滌潔淨。
主救贖，主救贖，蒙福兒女主恩豐盈。

english_page_header: Hymn 386 - I’ve Found a Friend
english_full_lyrics:
I’ve found a friend,
oh, such a friend!
He loved me ere I knew Him;
He drew me with the cords of love,
And thus He bound me to Him;
And round my heart still closely twine
Those ties which naught can sever,
For I am His, and He is mine,
Forever and forever.

I’ve found a friend,
oh, such a friend!
He bled, He died to save me.
And not alone the gift of life,
But His own self He gave me;
Naught that I have my own I call,
I hold it for the Giver,
My heart, my strength, my life, my all
Are His, and His forever.

I’ve found a friend,
oh, such a friend!
All pow’r to Him is given,
To guard me on my onward course,
And bring me safe to heaven.
Th’eternal glories gleam afar
To nerve my faint endeavor;
So now to watch, to work, to war,
And then to rest forever.

I’ve found a friend,
oh, such a friend!
So kind and true and tender,
So wise a counselor and guide,
So mighty a defender!
From Him who loves me now so well
What pow’r my soul can sever?
Shall life or death or earth or hell?
No! I am His forever.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 386 首 - 我得一友
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我得一友，至好朋友，未識先蒙祂愛眷，
慈繩引我，愛索繫我，使我常在祂裡面。
緊緊隨繞，綿綿牽掛，牢牢繫在我心間，
因我屬祂，祂也屬我，一生一世不改變。

我得一友，至好朋友，祂流血贖我罪愆，
又賞賜我永遠生命，恩如深淵，如高天。
卑微如我竟蒙恩召，惟將所有全奉獻，
凡我身心，生命一切，完全屬祂不改變。

我得一友，至好朋友，他得權柄到永遠，
賜保惠師來指教我，護我在祂胸懷間。
大愛對我如此美好，世事有何能離間？
或生或死，在地在天，我永屬祂不改變。

我得一友，至好朋友，愛我之心何真誠！
扶攙、領導，做我保障，領我安然進天城。
遙望遠處榮耀天鄉，領我前行向光明，
時時儆醒，殷勤做工，打美仗直到天庭。

english_page_header: Hymn 387 - Lord, Speak to Me
english_full_lyrics:
Lord, speak to me, that I may speak
In living echoes of Thy tone;
As Thou hast sought, so let me seek
Thy erring children lost and lone.

O lead me, Lord, that I may lead
The wand'ring and the wav'ring feet;
O feed me, Lord, that I may feed
Thy hung'ring ones with manna sweet.

O teach me, Lord, that I may teach
The precious things Thou dost impart;
And wing my words, that they may reach
The hidden depths of many a heart.

O fill me with Thy fullness, Lord,
Until my very heart o'erflow
In kindling thought and glowing word,
Thy love to tell, Thy praise to show.

O use me, Lord, use even me,
Just as Thou wilt, and when, and where,
Until Thy blessed face I see, Thy rest,
Thy joy, Thy glory share.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 387 首 - 求主對我述說
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主！懇求祢述說真理，使我能傳揚主信息；
我願像主尋找迷羊，引領迷失罪人歸祢。

主！引領我行走義路，使我能帶領人腳步；
求主餵我天上靈糧，使我能領他人歸主。

主！教導我真理聖言，使我能宣講主恩言；
使我言詞帶有能力，使人心意回轉主前。

主！賞賜我豐富生命，願主聖靈充滿我心；
願我言行全聽主命，時時讚揚主愛、主恩。

主！差遣我，不丟棄我，我願忠心謙卑順從；
直到在天見主聖面，同享安息快樂光榮。

english_page_header: Hymn 388 - Near to the Heart of God
english_full_lyrics:
There is a place of quiet rest,
Near to the heart of God.
A place where sin cannot molest,
Near to the heart of God.

There is a place of comfort sweet,
Near to the heart of God.
A place where we our Saviour meet,
Near to the heart of God.

There is a place of full release,
Near to the heart of God.
A place where all is joy and peace,
Near to the heart of God.

REFRAIN
O Jesus, blest Redeemer,
Sent from the heart of God,
Hold us who wait before Thee
Near to the heart of God.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 388 首 - 靠近耶穌慈懷
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
有一安息恬靜之處，靠近耶穌慈懷；
罪惡不能侵擾之處，靠近耶穌慈懷。

有一安慰溫暖之處，靠近耶穌慈懷；
我們與主相會之處，靠近耶穌慈懷。

有一完全釋放之處，靠近耶穌慈懷；
平安喜樂充滿之處，靠近耶穌慈懷。

副歌
慈愛的救主耶穌，降自天父慈懷，
求主使我蒙保守，靠近耶穌慈懷。

english_page_header: Hymn 389 - Nearer, Still Nearer
english_full_lyrics:
Nearer, still nearer, close to Thy heart,
Draw me, my Saviour-, so precious Thou art!
Fold me, oh, fold me close to Thy breast.
Shelter me safe in that ‟Haven of Rest”;
Shelter me safe in that ‟Haven of Rest.”

Nearer, still nearer, nothing I bring,
Naught as an off’ring to Jesus, my King;
Only my sinful, now contrite heart.
Grant me the cleansing Thy blood doth impart.
Grant me the cleansing Thy blood doth impart.

Nearer, still nearer, Lord, to be Thine!
Sin, with its follies, I gladly resign;
All of its pleasures, pomp, and its pride,
Give me but Jesus, my Lord, crucified.
Give me but Jesus, my Lord, crucified.

Nearer, still nearer, while life shall last.
Till safe in glory my anchor is cast;
Through endless ages ever to be,
Nearer, my Saviour, still nearer to Thee;
Nearer, my Saviour, still nearer to Thee!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 389 首 - 親近，更親近
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
親近，更親近，就主心懷，引我更親近，到主跟前來！
求主懷抱我，靠祢胸懷，在天堂安息，永享主慈愛；
在天堂安息，永享主慈愛。

親近，更親近，主入我心，無貴重供物奉獻做禮品；
惟獻我痛悔憂傷心靈，靠救主寶血，我罪得潔淨；
靠救主寶血，我罪得潔淨。

親近，更親近，我願屬主！我罪惡愚行，必盡力脫除；
願撇下一切驕傲虛浮，為要得耶穌，祂為我受辱；
為要得耶穌，祂為我受辱。

親近，更親近，終生靠主，直到進榮耀在主懷安宿，
永遠不止息，永無盡期，親近我救主，更親近恩主；
親近我救主，更親近恩主。

english_page_header: Hymn 390 - Just a Closer Walk with Thee
english_full_lyrics:
I am weak but Thou art strong;
Jesus, keep me from all wrong;
I’ll be satisfied as long
As I walk, let me walk close to Thee.

Thro’ this world of toil and snares,
If I falter, Lord, who cares?
Who with me my burden shares?
None but Thee, dear Lord, none but Thee.

When my feeble life is o’er,
Time for me will be no more;
Guide me gently, safely o’er
To Thy kingdom shore, to Thy shore.

REFRAIN
Just a closer walk with Thee,
Grant it, Jesus, is my plea,
Daily walking close to Thee,
Let it be, dear Lord, let it be.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 390 首 - 主！我願更親近
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我本軟弱主剛強，求主保守離罪網；
心靈滿足無憂傷，行天路，領我近祢旁。

勞苦罪惡常捆綁，若我跌倒誰療傷？
若有重擔誰分擔？我救主，惟祢代擔當。

當我脆弱的生命，轉瞬消失歸塵土；
恩主求祢引我路，到天家，永與主同住。

副歌
主！我願更親近祢。與主相親樂無比。
每日同行更親密。親愛主，求祢密相契。

english_page_header: Hymn 391 - Never Alone
english_full_lyrics:
I’ve seen the lightning flashing,
And heard the thunder roll,
I’ve felt sin’s breakers dashing,
Trying to conquer my soul;
I’ve heard the voice of Jesus,
Telling me still to fight on,
He promised never to leave me,
Never to leave me alone.

The world’s fierce winds are blowing,
Temptations are sharp and keen;
I feel a peace in knowing
My Saviour stands between;
He stands to shield me from danger,
When earthly friends are gone,
He promised never to leave me,
Never to leave me alone.

He died for me on the mountain,
For me they pierced His side,
For me He opened that fountain,
The crimson, cleansing tide;
For me He waiteth in glory,
Seated upon His throne;
He promised never to leave me,
Never to leave me alone.

REFRAIN
No, never alone, No, never alone,
He promised never to leave me,
Never to leave me alone;
No, never alone, No, never alone,
He promised never to leave me,
Never to leave me alone.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 391 首 - 永不孤單
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我見閃閃的電光，我聞隆隆雷聲，
我被罪如浪沖擊，欲戰勝我的靈魂。
我聞主耶穌呼聲，叫我仍要作戰，
主應許永不離開我，永不離我致孤單。

世界狂風直吹來，試探、引誘不斷，
深知我必有平安，因救主與我相伴。
扶助保護脫危險，雖友叛、親離散，
主應許永不離開我，永不離我致孤單。

救主為我釘十架，肋旁又受槍傷，
為我開活水泉源，為我把罪債償還。
為我在天堂等候，高居在寶座上，
主應許永不離開我，永不離我致孤單。


副歌
不！永不孤單；不！永不孤單。
主應許永不離開我，永不離我致孤單。
不！永不孤單；不！永不孤單。
主應許永不離開我，永不離我致孤單。

english_page_header: Hymn 392 - I’ll Go Where You Want Me to Go
english_full_lyrics:
It may not be on the mountain’s height,
Or over the stormy sea;
It may not be at the battle’s front
My Lord will have need of me;
But if by a still, small voice He calls
To paths I do not know,
I’ll answer, dear Lord, with my hand in Thine,
I’ll go where You want me to go.

Perhaps today there are loving words
Which Jesus would have me speak;
There may be now, in the paths of sin,
Some wand’rer whom I should seek.
O Saviour, if Thou wilt be my Guide,
Tho’ dark and rugged the way,
My voice shall echo the message sweet,
I’ll say what You want me to say.

There’s surely somewhere a lowly place
In earth’s harvest fields so wide,
Where I may labor thro’ life’s short day
For Jesus, the Crucified.
So, trusting my all unto Thy care,
I know Thou lovest me!
I’ll do Thy will with a heart sincere,
I’ll be what You want me to be.

REFRAIN
I’ll go where You want me to go, dear Lord,
O’er mountain, or plain, or sea;
I’ll say what You want me to say, dear Lord,
I’ll be what you want me to be.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 392 首 - 任主差派
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主若差我前去事奉祂，未必是遠渡重洋，
未必是在那荒山嶇路，或艱難危險戰場；
但聞救主溫柔聲呼喚，令我前往他鄉，
我必欣然回答恩主，任主差派，我必前往。

耶穌今天有慈愛信息，祂差派我去傳揚，
若有人迷失在罪惡中，祂差派我去救亡；
若主願意引領我前途，雖經過幽暗路，
聽聞主命隨主腳步，任主差派，我必順服。

我知主差我作工之處，即世界的大禾田，
我一生時日不再虛度，全為榮耀主奉獻；
今將所有全交託我主，報答主大恩典，
甘心順服在主腳前，任主差派，我心所願。

副歌
任主差派，我必聽從、前往，或經高山，渡重洋；
我必遵主旨意，真理傳揚。任主差派，忠心前往。

english_page_header: Hymn 393 - Bring Them In
english_full_lyrics:
Hark! ’tis the Shepherd’s voice I hear,
Out in the desert dark and drear,
Calling the sheep who’ve gone astray
Far from the Shepherd’s fold away.

Who’ll go and help this Shepherd kind,
Help Him the wand’ring ones to find?
Who’ll bring the lost ones to the fold,
Where they’ll be sheltered from the cold?

Out in the desert hear their cry,
Out on the mountains wild and high;
Hark! ’tis the Master speaks to thee, 
“Go find My sheep where’er they be.”

REFRAIN
Bring them in, bring them in,
Bring them in from the fields of sin;
Bring them in, bring them in,
Bring the wand’ring ones to Jesus.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 393 首 - 聽！良牧慈聲
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
聽！良牧慈聲在呼召，在曠野中夜已深沉。
呼喚迷羊快快回頭，別遠離牧人離正路。

誰願與良牧同前往，去尋找迷羊回正路？
要帶領他們回羊圈，讓他們得享主祝福。

在曠野中或荒山裡，呼救的聲音何急促！
聽救主急切吩咐你：「快尋找迷羊，免耽誤。」

副歌
領他們，領他們，引領迷羊脫離罪惡，
領他們，領他們，引領迷羊就近耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 394 - Thanks to God
english_full_lyrics:
Thanks to God for my Redeemer,
Thanks for all Thou dost provide!
Thanks for times now but a mem’ry,
Thanks for Jesus by my side!
Thanks for pleasant, balmy springtime,
Thanks for dark and dreary fall!
Thanks for tears by now forgotten,
Thanks for peace within my soul!

Thanks for prayers that Thou hast answered,
Thanks for what Thou dost deny!
Thanks for storms that I have weathered,
Thanks for all Thou dost supply!
Thanks for pain, and thanks for pleasure,
Thanks for comfort in despair!
Thanks for grace that none can measure,
Thanks for love beyond compare!

Thanks for roses by the wayside,
Thanks for thorns their stems contain!
Thanks for home and thanks for fireside,
Thanks for hope, that sweet refrain!
Thanks for joy and thanks for sorrow,
Thanks for heav’nly peace with Thee!
Thanks for hope in the tomorrow,
Thanks thro’ all eternity!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 394 首 - 感謝神
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
感謝神賜我救贖主，感謝神預備豐富！
感謝神常與我同在，感謝神恩惠充足！
感謝神賜春暖、秋涼，感謝神使我知足！
感謝神將眼淚抹乾，感謝神賜我恩福！

感謝神禱告蒙應允，感謝神雖未回應！
感謝神我曾經風暴，感謝神豐富供應！
感謝神賜苦難、歡樂，感謝神慰我心靈！
感謝神賜無限恩典，感謝神無比憐憫！

感謝神賜玫瑰花開，感謝神百花爭豔！
感謝神賜家庭溫暖，感謝神福氣加添！
感謝神賜喜樂、憂愁，感謝神賜我平安！
感謝神賜明天盼望，感謝神直到永遠！

english_page_header: Hymn 395 - Higher Ground
english_full_lyrics:
I’m pressing on the upward way,
New heights I’m gaining ev’ry day;
Still praying as I’m onward bound, 
“Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.”

My heart has no desire to stay
Where doubts arise and fears dismay;
Though some may dwell where those abound,
My prayer, my aim, is higher ground.

I want to live above the world,
Though Satan’s darts at me are hurled;
For faith has caught the joyful sound,
The song of saints on higher ground.

I want to scale the utmost height
And catch a gleam of glory bright;
But still I’ll pray till heav’n I’ve found, 
“Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.”

REFRAIN
Lord, lift me up and let me stand,
By faith, on heaven’s tableland,
A higher plane than I have found;
Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 395 首 - 向高處行
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我今奔向更高之地，步步堅立，日日高昇；
當我前行，禱告不停，求主領我向高處行。

世上充滿疑慮無助，非我所願常居之處；
有人或願世間久住，但我祈求更高之處。

魔鬼雖然暗箭猛攻，屬世生活，何足輕重！
憑信得聞快樂歌聲，天上聖徒所發讚頌。

我必上升穹蒼極境，進入天堂榮華美景，
如今我靈祈禱不停，求主同行直到天庭。

副歌
求提升我，使我堅定，憑信站在天上樂境；
我心嚮往更高之地，求主領我向高處行。

english_page_header: Hymn 396 - I Would Be True
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 396 首 - 我要真誠
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我要真誠，莫辜負他人信任。我要潔淨，因有人極關心。
我要剛強，才能擔人間苦痛。我要壯膽，主應許必得勝；
我要壯膽，主應許必得勝。

我要愛人，愛敵也愛淪落人。我要給予，誠心不求回報。
我要虛懷，不忘記自身軟弱。我要向上，喜樂、行善、助人；
我要向上，喜樂、行善、助人。

我要祈求，有更多禱告良辰。我要恆心，常親近主真神。
我要聆聽父慈愛微小聲音。我要篤信，隨基督腳蹤行；
我要篤信，隨基督腳蹤行。

english_page_header: Hymn 397 - Why Not Now?
english_full_lyrics:
While you pray and while we plead,
While you see your soul’s deep need,
While our Father calls you home,
Will you not, my brother, come?

You have wandered far away;
Do not risk another day;
Do not turn from God your face,
But today accept His grace.

In the world you’ve failed to find
Aught of peace for troubled mind;
Come to Christ, on Him believe,
Peace and joy you shall receive.

Come to Christ, confession make;
Come to Christ, and pardon take;
Trust in Him from day to day,
He will keep you all the way.

REFRAIN
Why not now? Why not now?
Why not come to Jesus now?
Why not now? Why not now?
Why not come to Jesus now?
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 397 首 - 何不現在歸耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我要真誠，莫辜負他人信任。我要潔淨，因有人極關心。
我要剛強，才能擔人間苦痛。我要壯膽，主應許必得勝；
我要壯膽，主應許必得勝。

我要愛人，愛敵也愛淪落人。我要給予，誠心不求回報。
我要虛懷，不忘記自身軟弱。我要向上，喜樂、行善、助人；
我要向上，喜樂、行善、助人。

我要祈求，有更多禱告良辰。我要恆心，常親近主真神。
我要聆聽父慈愛微小聲音。我要篤信，隨基督腳蹤行；
我要篤信，隨基督腳蹤行。

副歌
歸耶穌，歸耶穌，何不今日歸耶穌？
歸耶穌，歸耶穌，何不今日歸耶穌？

english_page_header: Hymn 398 - Living for Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Living for Jesus, a life that is true,
Striving to please Him in all that I do;
Yielding allegiance, gladhearted and free,
This is the pathway of blessing for me.

Living for Jesus who died in my place,
Bearing on Calv’ry my sin and disgrace;
Such love constrains me to answer His call,
Follow His leading and give Him my all.

Living for Jesus thro’ earth’s little while,
My dearest treasure, the light of His smile;
Seeking the lost ones He died to redeem,
Bringing the weary to find rest in Him.

REFRAIN
O Jesus, Lord and Saviour,
I give myself to Thee;
For Thou, in Thine atonement,
Didst give Thyself for me;
I own no other Master,
My heart shall be Thy throne;
My life I give, henceforth to live,
O Christ, for Thee alone.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 398 首 - 為主而活
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我願獻身心，為基督而活，在一切事上討我主喜樂；
歡欣順服主，任祂指引我，願背十字架，一生為主活。

慈悲主耶穌受死作中保，使我免罪孽，又與神和好。
感激主大愛，願聽主呼召，奉獻我一切，跟隨主引導。

短暫的生命願為主而活，耶穌的笑容使我心快樂；
深願為我主去尋找迷羊，引領迷路者回到安樂窩。

副歌
哦！主耶穌，我救主，我心奉獻給祢，因祢獻自己為祭，為我生命捨棄。
懇求祢作我救主，來住在我心裡。我一生一世為主活，我願為主而活。

english_page_header: Hymn 399 - Lord, I Want to Be a Christian
english_full_lyrics:
Lord, I want to be a Christian in my heart, in my heart,
Lord, I want to be a Christian in my heart.
In my heart, in my heart,
Lord, I want to be a Christian in my heart.

Lord, I want to be more loving in my heart, in my heart,
Lord, I want to be more loving in my heart.
In my heart, in my heart,
Lord, I want to be more loving in my heart.

Lord, I want to be more holy in my heart, in my heart,
Lord, I want to be more holy in my heart.
In my heart, in my heart,
Lord, I want to be more holy in my heart.

Lord, I want to be like Jesus in my heart, in my heart,
Lord, I want to be like Jesus in my heart.
In my heart, in my heart,
Lord, I want to be like Jesus in my heart.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 399 首 - 主，我願做祢門徒
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主啊！ 我要做祢門徒，盡全心，盡全意；
主啊！ 我要做祢門徒，盡全力。
盡全心，盡全意，
主啊！ 我要做祢門徒，盡全力。

主啊！ 我要更加愛人，盡全心，盡全意；
主啊！ 我要更加愛人，盡全力。
盡全心，盡全意，
主啊！ 我要更加愛人，盡全力。


主啊！ 我要更加聖潔，盡全心，盡全意；
主啊！ 我要更加聖潔，盡全力。
盡全心，盡全意，
主啊！ 我要更加聖潔，盡全力。


主啊！ 我要學習像祢，盡全心，盡全意；
主啊！ 我要學習像祢，盡全力。
盡全心，盡全意，
主啊！ 我要學習像祢，盡全力。

english_page_header: Hymn 400 - More Like Jesus Would I Be
english_full_lyrics:
More like Jesus would I be,
Let my Saviour dwell in me;
Fill my soul with peace and love,
Make me gentle as a dove;

If He hears the raven’s cry,
If His ever watchful eye
Marks the sparrows when they fall,
Surely He will hear my call:

More like Jesus when I pray,
More like Jesus day by day,
May I rest me by His side,
Where the tranquil waters glide.

REFRAIN
More like Jesus, while I go,
Pilgrim in this world below;
Poor in spirit would I be;
Let my Saviour dwell in me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 400 首 - 我深願更像耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我深願更像耶穌，求主耶穌來同住；
平安仁愛滿我心，馴良如鴿，效法主。
我在塵世行天路，一心仰望我救主；
我願謙卑更柔和，求主耶穌來同住。

天父聆聽烏鴉啼，天父雙眼常關注；
天上麻雀祂眷顧，祂必垂聽我求呼。
祂教我敬虔度日，我的過犯得去除；
我願清心更聖潔，求主耶穌來同住。

我祈求更像耶穌，日益彰顯榮美主；
我願親近我恩主，寧靜溪旁安歇住。
靠祂恩典得重生，主愛使我心順服；
我願信心更長進，求主耶穌來同住。

english_page_header: Hymn 401 - Take Time to Be Holy
english_full_lyrics:
Take time to be holy,
Speak oft with thy Lord;
Abide in Him always,
And feed on His Word:
Make friends of God’s children,
Help those who are weak;
Forgetting in nothing
His blessing to seek.

Take time to be holy,
The world rushes on;
Spend much time in secret
With Jesus alone:
By looking to Jesus
Like Him thou shalt be;
Thy friends in thy conduct
His likeness shall see.

Take time to be holy,
Let Him be thy guide,
And run not before Him
Whatever betide;
In joy or in sorrow
Still follow thy Lord,
And looking to Jesus,
Still trust in His Word.

Take time to be holy,
Be calm in thy soul;
Each tho’t and each motive
Beneath His control;
Thus led by His Spirit
To fountains of love,
Thou soon shalt be fitted
For service above.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 401 首 - 須用工夫成聖
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
須用工夫成聖，常儆醒禱告；
常與主密相契，常領受主道。
與神兒女為友，助軟弱靈胞，
無論所做何事，當唯主是靠。

須用工夫成聖，息世上勞碌；
入密室朝見主，享我主恩福。
當仰望主耶穌，你就必像主，
親友因你行為，能看見耶穌。

須用工夫成聖，主引領你路；
一路與主同行，祂慈手扶助。
或福樂或困苦，仍跟隨我主，
定睛仰望耶穌，堅信我救主。

須用工夫成聖，使內心敬虔；
讓耶穌來掌管，你心思意念。
隨主聖靈引領，到愛之泉源，
就配作主門徒，事主到永遠。

english_page_header: Hymn 402 - God’s Way
english_full_lyrics:
God’s way is the best way, Tho’ I may not see
Why sorrows and trials Oft gather ’round me;
He ever is seeking My gold to refine,
So humbly I trust Him, My Saviour divine.

God’s way shall be my way, He knoweth the best,
And leaning upon Him, Sweet, sweet is my rest.
No harm can befall me, Safe, safe shall I be,
I’ll cling to Him ever. So precious is He.

REFRAIN
God’s way is the best way,
God’s way is the right way,
I’ll trust in Him alway, He knoweth the best.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 402 首 - 神的道路
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
神道路最美善，雖我不明瞭
為何憂愁試煉，常將我環繞。
主用各樣方法，煉我如精金，
故要順服信靠，我父神恩道。

神道路我最愛，惟祂能引導，
我全心投靠祂，甜蜜且安好；
災害不能臨到，平安無煩惱，
我要永遠靠主，祂至聖、至寶。

副歌
神道路最美善，神道路最美好，
我願常倚靠祂，惟祂能引導。

english_page_header: Hymn 403 - Have Thine Own Way, Lord
english_full_lyrics:
Have Thine own way, Lord!
Have Thine own way!
Thou art the potter,
I am the clay;
Mold me and make me
After Thy will,
While I am waiting,
Yielded and still.

Have Thine own way, Lord!
Have Thine own way!
Search me and try me,
Master, today!
Whiter than snow Lord,
Wash me just now,
As in Thy presence
Humbly I bow.

Have Thine own way, Lord!
Have Thine own way!
Wounded and weary,
Help me, I pray!
Power, all power
Surely is Thine!
Touch me and heal me,
Saviour divine.

Have Thine own way, Lord!
Have Thine own way!
Hold o’er my being
Absolute sway!
Fill with Thy Spirit
Till all shall see
Christ only, always,
Living in me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 403 首 - 任憑主旨意
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
任憑主旨意！憑主旨意！
主，祢是窯匠，我乃是泥；
塑我與造我，照主旨意，
我在此等待，虔誠依祢。

任憑主旨意！憑主旨意！
鑒察與試驗，就在今夕；
求主血洗淨，潔白如玉，
我謙卑跪下，順主心意。

任憑主旨意！憑主旨意！
憂傷與疲倦，求主除去；
能力與權柄，全屬於祢，
醫治與拯救，惟主旨意！

任憑主旨意！憑主旨意！
思想與言行，聽主話語；
求聖靈充滿，顯明旨意，
惟求主耶穌，住我心裡。

english_page_header: Hymn 404 - Praise Him! Praise Him!
english_full_lyrics:
Praise Him! praise Him!
Jesus, our blessed Redeemer!
Sing, O Earth, His wonderful love proclaim!
Hail Him! hail Him! highest archangels in glory;
Strength and honor give to His holy name!
