Like a shepherd, Jesus will guard His children;
In His arms He carries them all day long:

Praise Him! praise Him!
Jesus, our blessed Redeemer!
For our sins He suffered and bled and died;
He our Rock, our hope of eternal salvation,
Hail Him! hail Him! Jesus the crucified:
Sound His praises! Jesus who bore our sorrows,
Love unbounded, wonderful, deep, and strong:

Praise Him! praise Him!
Jesus, our blessed Redeemer!
Heav’nly portals loud with hosannas ring!
Jesus, Saviour, reigneth forever and ever:
Crown Him! crown Him! prophet and priest and king!
Christ is coming, over the world victorious,
Pow’r and glory unto the Lord belong:

REFRAIN
Praise Him! praise Him!
tell of His excellent greatness;
Praise Him! praise Him! ever in joyful song!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 404 首 - 讚美救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
讚美！讚美！主耶穌我們的救主，
全地歌唱，齊頌揚慈愛主。
歡呼！歡呼！榮耀中天使齊歡呼，
能力、尊榮，都歸於主耶穌。
如同牧人，主的羊耶穌保護，
祂以膀臂，終日懷抱安撫。

讚美！讚美！主耶穌我們的救主，
為我眾罪，十架上受苦楚。
萬古磐石！主救恩是極大祝福，
歡呼！歡呼！耶穌君王、我主。
高聲讚美，祂擔當諸多苦處，
無比大愛，奇妙深厚堅固。

讚美！讚美！主耶穌我們的救主，
頌讚歌聲，響遍諸天各處。
永永遠遠，主耶穌掌王權國度，
仰望！仰望！真神在至高處。
基督快來，全世界尊祂為主，
榮耀、權柄，都歸救主耶穌。

副歌
讚美！讚美！傳揚祂無比的大愛；
讚美！讚美！同歡唱，永享福。

english_page_header: Hymn 405 - Did You Think to Pray
english_full_lyrics:
Ere you left your room this morning,
Did you think to pray?
In the name of Christ our Saviour,
Did you sue for loving favor,
As a shield today?

When you met with great temptation,
Did you think to pray?
By His dying love and merit,
Did you claim the Holy Spirit
As your guide and stay?

When your heart was filled with anger,
Did you think to pray?
Did you plead for grace, my brother,
That you might forgive another
Who has crossed your way?

When sore trials came upon you,
Did you think to pray?
When your soul was bowed in sorrow,
Balm of Gilead did you borrow,
At the gates of day?

REFRAIN
Oh, how praying rests the weary!
Prayer will change the night to day;
So in sorrow and in gladness,
Don’t forget to pray.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 405 首 - 你是否已禱告
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
當你今早離開家前，是否已禱告？
是否奉主耶穌聖名，懇求主以慈愛看顧，施保護引導？

當你遇見極大試煉，是否已禱告？
是否藉主捨命大愛，懇求聖靈扶持帶領，堅定不跌倒？

當你心裡充滿憤怒，是否已禱告？
是否求主憐憫施恩，教你以主慈愛寬容，與他人和好？

當你面臨痛苦試煉，是否已禱告？
當你憂傷，意志消沉，可曾求主香膏裹傷？趁黎明祈禱？

副歌
禱告使疲倦者安息，將黑暗變為光耀，
生活愁苦或是歡樂，勿忘記禱告！

english_page_header: Hymn 406 - I Must Tell Jesus
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 406 首 - 要告訴耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我一切苦楚，全告訴耶穌，我不能獨自擔此重負。
我在患難中，主憐憫眷顧，祂永遠愛我，體恤扶助。

我一切憂愁，全告訴耶穌，祂是我良友，仁慈照顧。
我向祂祈求，祂必定救助，挪去我憂傷，消除愁苦。

受誘惑試探，更需要救主，助我解疑難，代背重負。
要告訴耶穌，要告訴耶穌，惟祂除愁煩，關懷垂顧。

罪惡滿世界，誘惑我離主，我心靈脆弱，容易被蠱。
要告訴耶穌，助我明好惡，勝過諸罪過，終身蒙福。

副歌
要告訴耶穌，全告訴耶穌，我不能獨自擔此重負。
要告訴耶穌，全告訴耶穌，惟有主耶穌，隨時幫助。

english_page_header: Hymn 407 - In the Garden
english_full_lyrics:
I come to the garden alone,
While the dew is still on the roses,
And the voice I hear,
Falling on my ear,
The Son of God discloses.

He speaks, and the sound of His voice
Is so sweet the birds hush their singing,
And the melody
That He gave to me,
Within my heart is ringing.

I’d stay in the garden with Him
Though the night around me be falling,
But He bids me go;
Through the voice of woe
His voice to me is calling.

REFRAIN
And He walks with me, and He talks with me,
And He tells me I am His own;
And the joy we share as we tarry there,
None other has ever known.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 407 首 - 在花園裡
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
獨步徘徊在花園裡，玫瑰花尚有晶瑩朝露，
忽有溫柔聲，傳入我耳中，乃是神子主耶穌。

我主慈聲何等甜蜜，小雀鳥停歌屏息傾聽，
祂使我聽見，天上美妙音，讓我心快樂甦醒。

我願與主在花園裡，直到黃昏夜幕已漸垂，
但主命我去，傳揚好信息，要我順從祂旨意。

副歌
祂與我同行又與我共話，對我說我單屬於祂；
與主在園中心靈真快樂，前無人曾經歷過。

english_page_header: Hymn 408 - What if It Were Today?
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus is coming to earth again, What if it were today?
Coming in power and love to reign, What if it were today?
Coming to claim His chosen Bride, All the redeemed and purified,
Over this whole earth scattered wide, What if it were today?

Satan’s dominion will then be o’er, O that it were today!
Sorrow and sighing shall be no more, O that it were today!
Then shall the dead in Christ arise, Caught up to meet Him in the skies,
When shall these glories meet our eyes? What if it were today?

Faithful and true would He find us here If He should come today?
Watching in gladness and not in fear, If He should come today?
Signs of His coming multiply, Morning light breaks in eastern sky,
Watch, for the time is drawing nigh, What if it were today?

REFRAIN
Glory, glory! Joy to my heart ’twill bring;
Glory, glory! When we shall crown Him King;
Glory, glory! Haste to prepare the way;
Glory, glory! Jesus will come some day.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 408 首 - 若主今日再臨
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主耶穌若今日再來臨，你是否能同行？
以威嚴和慈愛掌王權，若主今日再臨。
從萬邦揀選屬祂子民，蒙救贖聖潔者進天庭，
與主同在直到永遠，若主今日再臨。

撒旦的掌權日將過去，但願就在今天。
再沒有悲傷也無嘆息，但願就在今天。
在主裡睡了的人復活，在空中與救主樂相見，
何時能看見主榮耀？但願就在今天。

你是否既良善又忠心，若主今日再臨？
我必要歡欣地等候祂，若主今日再臨。
主再來預兆日日顯明，如晨光在東方現光明，
當儆醒等候那時辰，若主今日再臨。

副歌
榮耀，榮耀！我要歡樂歌唱。
榮耀，榮耀！擁戴我主為王；
榮耀，榮耀！快預備主道路，
榮耀，榮耀！主耶穌快臨降。

english_page_header: Hymn 409 - Am I a Soldier of the Cross?
english_full_lyrics:
Am I a soldier of the cross?
A foll’wer of the Lamb?
And shall I fear to own His cause
Or blush to speak His name?

Must I be carried to the skies
On flow’ry beds of ease,
While others fought to win the prize
And sailed thru bloody seas?

Are there no foes for me to face?
Must I not stem the flood?
Is this vile world a friend to grace,
To help me on to God?

Sure I must fight if I would reign-
Increase my courage, Lord!
I’ll bear the toil, endure the pain,
Supported by Thy Word.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 409 首 - 我可願作十架精兵?
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我可願作十架精兵，隨基督腳蹤行？
我豈能膽怯違主命，羞人前稱祂名？

眾弟兄流血戰場上，必得著主獎賞。
我豈能獨自圖安逸，袖手旁觀遊蕩？

豈無惡敵需要對抗？豈無破口阻擋？
我豈能親近這世界，主恩福猶妄想？

我願為救主赴戰場，求加添我力量。
願與我主苦難同擔，為真理打美仗。

english_page_header: Hymn 410 - Where the Gates Swing Outward Never
english_full_lyrics:
Just a few more days to be filled with praise,
And to tell the old, old story;
Then, when twilight falls, and my Saviour calls,
I shall go to Him in glory.

Just a few more years with their toil and tears,
And the journey will be ended;
Then I’ll be with Him, where the tide of time
With eternity is blended.

Tho’ the hills be steep and the valleys deep,
With no flow’rs my way adorning;
Tho’ the night be lone and my rest a stone,
Joy awaits me in the morning.

What a joy ’twill be when I wake to see
Him for whom my heart is burning!
Nevermore to sigh, nevermore to die -
For that day my heart is yearning.

REFRAIN
I’ll exchange my cross for a starry crown,
Where the gates swing outward never;
At His feet I’ll lay ev’ry burden down,
And with Jesus reign forever.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 410 首 - 再等不多時
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
再等不多時，讚美聲不停，耶穌救恩即將完成，
白晝快來臨，救主呼召我，得以進入輝煌天城。

再等不多時，不再有痛苦，我將行完人生旅途，
到那日恩主必與我同住，歡欣享受永生大福。

天路多險阻，途經死蔭谷，荊棘滿布沙漠荒蕪，
長夜雖漫漫，我心不孤獨，歡欣等候基督救主。

樂哉！福無邊，將親見恩主，我的靈要歌唱歡呼，
不再有死亡，不再有悲傷，盼主再臨，永世君王。

副歌
十字架苦難變為榮耀冠，進入恩門，永不離散。
一切罪重擔卸在主腳前，與主同做王到永遠。

english_page_header: Hymn 411 - The Beautiful Garden of Prayer
english_full_lyrics:
There’s a garden where Jesus is waiting,
There’s a place that is wondrously fair;
For it glows with the light of His presence, ’Tis the beautiful garden of prayer.

There’s a garden where Jesus is waiting,
And I go with my burden and care,
Just to learn from His lips words of comfort,
In the beautiful garden of prayer.

There’s a garden where Jesus is waiting,
And He bids you to come meet Him there,
Just to walk and to talk with my Saviour,
In the beautiful garden of prayer.

REFRAIN
O the beautiful garden, the garden of prayer,
O the beautiful garden of prayer;
There my Saviour awaits, and He opens the gates
To the beautiful garden of prayer.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 411 首 - 美麗的禱告花園
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主等候在禱告的花園，那裡滿有憐憫與恩典；
救主臨到，慈愛榮光顯現，在那美麗的禱告花園。

救主等候在禱告的花園，將重擔憂傷交託主前；
從祂恩言得到無限恤憐，在那美麗的禱告花園。

救主等候在禱告的花園，祂懇切呼喚你快進前；
走近主身邊，聆聽主聖言，在那美麗的禱告花園。

副歌
在那美麗的美麗的禱告花園，心靈平安，有主的恩眷；
救主正在等候，勸你莫要遲延，在那美麗的禱告花園。

english_page_header: Hymn 412 - ’Tis the Blessed Hour of Prayer
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 412 首 - 寶貴禱告良辰
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
寶貴禱告良辰，我心謙卑等候，同聚會敬拜耶穌救主我良友，
憑信心來到主前，得享我主保祐，是困倦者的良藥，何等甜美時辰！

寶貴禱告良辰，與主親密靈交，祂以憐憫與慈愛，聽兒女祈禱，
當將你一切重擔，在主足前卸掉，是困倦者的良藥，何等甜美時辰！

寶貴禱告良辰，當我遭遇試探，來到主前靠主愛，我心得平安，
主有深切的憐憫，必然看顧分擔，是困倦者的良藥，何等甜美時辰！

寶貴禱告良辰，全心交託真神，祂深知我們需要，必按時供應，
只要誠心信靠主，便能盡除憂悶，是困倦者的良藥，何等甜美時辰！

副歌
是禱告良辰、是寶貴良辰，是困倦者的良藥，何等甜美時辰！

english_page_header: Hymn 413 - We Gather Together
english_full_lyrics:
We gather together to ask the Lord’s blessing,
He chastens and hastens His will to make known;
The wicked oppressing now cease from distressing,
Sing praises to His name, He forgets not His own.

Beside us to guide us, our God with us joining,
Ordaining, maintaining His kingdom divine;
So from the beginning the fight we were winning,
Thou, Lord, wast at our side: the glory be Thine!

We all do extol Thee, Thou leader in battle,
And pray that Thou still our defender wilt be.
Let Thy congregation escape tribulation;
Thy name be ever praised: O Lord, make us free!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 413 首 - 我們同心聚集
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我們同心聚集，祈求主賜福氣。
主用各樣方法，顯明祂旨意。
罪權不再壓制，痛苦憂傷止息，
歌頌讚美主名，主民祂不忘記。

救主引導我們，常與我們同行，
建立基督國度，萬世永長存。
爭戰之初已知勝利屬於我們，
有主親自同在，榮耀歸於真神。

我們同心歡呼，主是勝利元帥，
我們虔誠祈求，投靠主胸懷。
願主施行拯救，保守免於禍害，
我們讚美主名，永遠自由自在。

english_page_header: Hymn 414 - Still, Still with Thee
english_full_lyrics:
Still, still with Thee, when purple morning breaketh,
When the bird waketh, and the shadows flee;
Fairer than morning, lovelier than the daylight,
Dawns the sweet consciousness, I am with Thee.

Alone with Thee, amid the mystic shadows,
The solemn hush of nature newly born;
Alone with Thee in breathless adoration,
In the calm dew and freshness of the morn.

When sinks the soul, subdued by toil, to slumber,
Its closing eyes look up to Thee in prayer;
Sweet the repose beneath Thy wings o’ershading,
But sweeter still to wake and find Thee there.

So shall it be at last, in that bright morning
When the soul waketh, and life’s shadows flee;
Oh, in that hour, fairer than daylight dawning,
Shall rise the glorious thought- I am with Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 414 首 - 恩主與我同在
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
雀鳥歌唱，黑暗消逝，光明來，
晨光破曉，恩主與我同在；
美哉救主！遠勝白晝的光彩，
在我心中常覺與主同在。

與主同住，在至高者隱密處，
靜對自然，體會造化工夫；
與主同在；莊嚴虔誠依靠主，
朝露晶瑩，充滿喜樂無度。

勞苦一日，靈魂疲乏睡意濃，
困倦雙眼，禱告仰望主榮；
在恩翼下，夜眠甘美安寧中，
更加甜美，醒來與主相逢。

恩主再臨，祂榮耀晨光普照，
我靈甦醒，世界黑影全消；
在那時刻，欣然見主顯榮耀，
我心歡樂永遠與主靈交。

english_page_header: Hymn 415 - Give of Your Best to the Master
english_full_lyrics:
Give of your best to the Master,
Give of the strength of your youth;
Throw your soul’s fresh, glowing ardor
Into the battle for truth:
Jesus has set the example,
Dauntless was He, young and brave;
Give Him your loyal devotion,
Give Him the best that you have.

Give of your best to the Master,
Give Him first place in your heart;
Give Him first place in your service,
Consecrate ev’ry part:
Give, and to you shall be given,
God His beloved Son gave;
Gratefully seeking to serve Him,
Give Him the best that you have.

Give of your best to the Master,
Naught else is worthy His love;
He gave Himself for your ransom,
Gave up His glory above;
Laid down His life without murmur,
You from sin’s ruin to save;
Give Him your heart’s adoration,
Give Him the best that you have.

REFRAIN
Give of your best to the Master,
Give of the strength of your youth;
Clad in salvation’s full armor,
Join in the battle for truth.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 415 首 - 獻上至好的
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
當將你至好的獻上，盡你的一切力量；
用純潔熱情的心靈，忠心為真理打仗。
主耶穌已做你榜樣，勇敢堅定迎向前；
要虔誠，忠心敬愛主，至好的向祂獻上。

當將你至好的獻上，你心要尊主為王；
以主為首毫不保留，將自己完全獻上。
當盡力將所有奉獻，因神將愛子賜下；
要感恩，努力事奉主，至好的向祂獻上。

當將你至好的獻上，主慈愛無比偉大；
祂捨己為你作贖價，賞賜你天上榮華。
祂捨命，竟毫無怨言，救贖你，又把血灑；
要虔誠，熱心敬畏主，至好的向祂獻上。

副歌
當將你至好的獻上，盡你的一切力量，
穿上救恩全副軍裝，忠心為真理打仗。

english_page_header: Hymn 416 - Are Ye Able?
english_full_lyrics:
“Are ye able,” said the Master, 
“To be crucified with Me?” 
“Yes,” the sturdy dreamers answered, 
“To the death we follow Thee.”

“Are ye able?” still the Master
Whispers down eternity,
And heroic spirits answer,
Now, as then in Galilee.

REFRAIN
“Lord, we are able,” our spirits are Thine,
Remold them, make us like Thee, divine:
Thy guiding radiance above us shall be
A beacon to God, to faith and loyalty.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 416 首 - 你可情願？
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
「你可情願？」恩主問道，「與我同釘十字架？」
堅定的人憑信回答：「我願跟從祢到底。」

「你可情願？」恩主問道，微聲呼召我和你，
勇敢隨主，心志專一，如門徒在加利利。

副歌
主啊！我情願。我靈已屬祢；重造我心靈，聖潔像祢。
求主賜恩光，照耀引導我，使我更愛祢，忠貞堅信不移。

english_page_header: Hymn 417 - Jesus Leads Us Home
english_full_lyrics:
Along the sandy desert, ’Mid scorching winds that blow;
Across the rugged mountains, Whose tops are white with snow;
Or in the darksome valley Where’er our feet may roam,
How sweet the blest assurance, That Jesus leads us home!

It makes us glad and joyful, And lightens ev’ry load,
To know that He goes with us Along life’s rugged road;
Each day we feel His presence, Tho’ trials oft may come;
How sweet the blest assurance, That Jesus leads us home!

The flow'rs beside our pathway May wither, fade, and die;
But fairer ones are blooming For us beyond the sky:
And tho’ ’mid care and sorrow Our weary steps may roam,
How sweet the blest assurance, That Jesus leads us home!

REFRAIN
That Jesus leads us home,
That Jesus leads us home,
How sweet the blest assurance,
That Jesus leads us home!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 417 首 - 耶穌領我回家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我越過沙漠曠野，又經狂風炎夏；我穿過崎嶇山嶺，見白雪覆山崖。
我身處幽暗山谷，又四處空徘徊，有美好應許賜下，主必領我回家。

這應許使我歡欣，使我重擔卸下，有恩主與我同行艱難路不懼怕。
祂每日與我同在，我終能勝試探，有美好應許賜下，主必領我回家。

這世界變化無常，轉眼凋謝如花，但主賜榮美天家，在那地樂無涯。
雖經歷憂愁悲傷，我疲憊走四方，有美好應許賜下，主必領我回家。

副歌
耶穌領我回家，耶穌領我回家。
這應許何等甘甜，耶穌領我回家。

english_page_header: Hymn 418 - Is Your All on the Altar?
english_full_lyrics:
You have longed for sweet peace, and for faith to increase,
And have earnestly, fervently prayed;
But you cannot have rest or be perfectly blest
Until all on the altar is laid.

Would you walk with the Lord in the light of His Word,
And have peace and contentment alway;
You must do His sweet will to be free from all ill,
On the altar your all you must lay.

Oh, we never can know what the Lord will bestow
Of the blessings for which we have prayed,
Till our body and soul He doth fully control,
And our all on the altar is laid.

Who can tell all the love He will send from above,
And how happy our hearts will be made,
Of the fellowship sweet we shall share at His feet,
When our all on the altar is laid.

REFRAIN
Is your all on the altar of sacrifice laid?
Your heart, does the Spirit control?
You can only be blest and have peace and sweet rest,
As you yield Him your body and soul.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 418 首 - 一切獻在壇上
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你心渴望平安，期待信心增長，亦曾恆心地祈求仰望，
卻無美滿福氣，不能安息如常，直到將自己完全獻上。

你若與主同行，以主道為亮光，又願多得著滿足平安，
就當遵主旨意，遠離一切惡事，更要將所有獻主壇上。

你若向主祈求，盼望主賜福氣，卻不願體認救主心意，
直到靈魂身體，讓主親自管理，完全無保留獻上自己。

主慈愛無限量，有誰能盡傳揚？主的愛能使你心歡暢，
與主甜蜜交往，與主福樂同享，只要將一切獻主壇上。

副歌
是否你已經將所有獻作活祭？是否順從聖靈管理？
若將你的身心獻在主的手裡，必蒙祂賞賜平安、福氣。

english_page_header: Hymn 419 - Make Me a Channel of Blessing
english_full_lyrics:
Is your life a channel of blessing?
Is the love of God flowing through you?
Are you telling the lost of the Saviour?
Are you ready His service to do?

Is your life a channel of blessing?
Are you burdened for those who are lost?
Have you urged upon those who are straying
The Saviour who died on the cross?

Is your life a channel of blessing?
Is it daily telling for Him?
Have you spoken the word of salvation
To those who are dying in sin?

We cannot be channels of blessing
If our lives are not free from known sin;
We will barriers be and a hindrance
To those we are trying to win.

REFRAIN
Make me a channel of blessing today,
Make me a channel of blessing, I pray;
My life possessing, my service blessing,
Make me a channel of blessing today.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 419 首 - 因我得福
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
可曾有人因我得恩福？神的愛是否經我傳述？
可曾去宣揚耶穌的恩典？可曾預備心事奉基督？

可曾有人因我得恩福？我是否牽掛迷失人數？
可曾勸告人莫徘徊歧途，快歸向慈愛救主耶穌？

可曾有人因我得恩福？是否日日都見證耶穌？
可曾憐憫人在罪中受苦，快宣告耶穌奇妙救贖？

倘若我仍生活在罪污，如何引領人就近恩主？
盼望諸親友接受主救贖，我卻成為人信仰攔阻！

副歌
懇求主使眾人因我得福。懇求主使眾人因我得福。
生命屬基督，事奉皆蒙福。懇求主使眾人因我得福！

english_page_header: Hymn 420 - Saviour, Thy Dying Love
english_full_lyrics:
Saviour, Thy dying love
Thou gavest me,
Nor should I aught withhold,
Dear Lord, from Thee:
In love my soul would bow,
My heart fulfil its vow,
Some off’ring bring Thee now,
Something for Thee.

At the blest mercy seat,
Pleading for me,
My feeble faith looks up,
Jesus, to Thee:
Help me the cross to bear,
Thy wondrous love declare,
Some song to raise, or prayer,
Something for Thee.

Give me a faithful heart,
Likeness to Thee,
That each departing day
Henceforth may see
Some work of love begun,
Some deed of kindness done,
Some wand’rer sought and won,
Something for Thee.

All that I am and have,
Thy gifts so free,
In joy, in grief, thro’ life,
Dear Lord, for Thee!
And when Thy face I see,
My ransomed soul shall be,
Thro’ all eternity,
Something for Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 420 首 - 奉獻與祢
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
救主為愛捨命，憐我、救我；
我不該為自己保留什麼。
我心願得實現，在愛中順服祢，
今願將我所有，奉獻與祢。

在施恩寶座前為我求父，
我信心雖軟弱，但仰望主，
助我背負十架，努力宣揚真理，
以禱告，以詩歌奉獻與祢。

賜誠意敬虔心，像主忠貞，
一日又過一日，行主旨意，
敬愛主，勤工作，榮主名，顯公義，
得尋獲迷失者，奉獻與祢。

一切恩賜所有，蒙祢眷顧，
一生甘苦、順逆，全然為主；
當親見主聖面，得享永生福氣，
我靈魂蒙救贖，奉獻與祢。

english_page_header: Hymn 421 - Come to the Feast
english_full_lyrics:
“All things are ready,” come to the feast!
Come, for the table now is spread;
Ye famishing, ye weary, come,
And thou shalt be richly fed.

“All things are ready,” come to the feast!
Come, for the door is open wide;
A place of honor is reserved
For you at the Master’s side.

“All things are ready,” come to the feast!
Come, while He waits to welcome thee;
Delay not while this day is thine,
Tomorrow may never be.

“All things are ready,” come to the feast!
Leave ev’ry care and worldly strife;
Come, feast upon the love of God,
And drink everlasting life.

REFRAIN
Hear the invitation,
Come, “whosoever will;”
Praise God for full salvation,
For “whosoever will.”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 421 首 - 請來赴宴
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
喜筵已預備，請來赴宴！來！因為各樣都齊全，
凡飢渴者，請你快來，必得飽嚐主恩典！

喜筵已預備，請來赴宴！來！因為恩門大敞開，
榮耀席位為你預留，救主盛筵等你來！

喜筵已預備，請來赴宴！來！耶穌等候，恩門開，
把握今天，切莫耽延，明日機會不再來！

喜筵已預備，請來赴宴！將愁苦紛擾放主前，
快來飽嚐主大恩典，暢飲生命活水泉！

副歌
聽！耶穌邀請你。快來！主請你來。
讚美主！全備恩典，與主同享喜筵！

english_page_header: Hymn 422 - We Have an Anchor
english_full_lyrics:
Will your anchor hold in the storms of life,
When the clouds unfold their wings of strife?
When the strong tides lift, and the cables strain,
Will your anchor drift, or firm remain?

It is safely moored, ’twill the storm withstand,
For ’tis well secured by the Saviour’s hand;
And the cables, passed from His heart to mine,
Can defy that blast, thro’ strength divine.

It will firmly hold in the straits of fear,
When the breakers have told the reef is near;
Tho’ the tempest rave and the wild winds blow,
Not an angry wave shall our bark o'erflow.

When our eyes behold thro’ the gath’ring night
The city of gold, our harbor bright,
We shall anchor fast by the heav’nly shore,
With the storms all past forevermore.

REFRAIN
We have an anchor that keeps the soul
Steadfast and sure while the billows roll,
Fastened to the Rock which cannot move,
Grounded firm and deep in the Saviour’s love.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 422 首 - 我錨堅固牢靠
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
今生風暴多，烏雲四面繞，你的錨是否堅固牢靠？
水深索鏈緊，風急浪又高，你的錨是否堅固牢靠？

我錨極可靠，風暴莫奈何，因救主慈手安放穩妥；
主心與我心，錨索相聯合，藉主大能，我船安然泊。

雖近恐懼渦，疑慮暗礁多，動盪海興波，我錨堅固；
雖雨急風狂，迅雷當空響，浪濤澎湃，我船無顛簸。

當黃昏來臨，以信心遙望，見福樂家鄉華美天堂；
我船彼岸泊，我錨永穩妥，往昔風波患難全然忘。

副歌
我錨極堅固，我靈安妥，不怕急雨，不怕大風波；
永遠穩固盤石不動搖；深繫主愛中，必永遠牢靠。

english_page_header: Hymn 423 - Tell Me the Story of Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Tell me the story of Jesus, Write on my heart ev'ry word;
Tell me the story most precious, Sweetest that ever was heard.
Tell how the angels, in chorus, Sang as they welcomed His birth, 
“Glory to God in the highest! Peace and good tidings to earth.”

Fasting alone in the desert, Tell of the days that are past,
How for our sins He was tempted, Yet was triumphant at last.
Tell of the years of His labor, Tell of the sorrow He bore,
He was despised and afflicted, Homeless, rejected and poor.

Tell of the cross where they nailed Him, Writhing in anguish and pain;
Tell of the grave where they laid Him, Tell how He liveth again.
Love in that story so tender, Clearer than ever I see:
Stay, let me weep while you whisper, Love paid the ransom for me.

REFRAIN
Tell me the story of Jesus,
Write on my heart ev'ry word;
Tell me the story most precious,
Sweetest that ever was heard.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 423 首 - 對我述說耶穌故事
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
對我述說耶穌故事，句句都深印我心；對我述說寶貴故事，
最甜美應許佳音。述說天使如何歌頌，報救主耶穌降臨。
天上榮耀歸於真神，地上平安歸於人。

述說耶穌禁食故事，獨在曠野四十天，祂為我受魔鬼試探，
藉神聖言勝撒但。述說耶穌如何辛勞，歷經憂傷苦無邊。
被人棄絕 、藐視 、凌辱，居無定所受饑寒。

述說救主被釘十架，受苦擔世人罪過，述說救主葬在墳墓，
三日後死裡復活。奇妙故事傳揚主愛，我深信主恩實多。
思想救主為我捨身，感謝耶穌拯救我。

副歌
對我述說耶穌故事，句句都深印我心，
對我述說寶貴故事，最甜美應許佳音。

english_page_header: Hymn 424 - The King’s Business
english_full_lyrics:
I am a stranger here, within a foreign land;
My home is far away, upon a golden strand;
Ambassador to be of realms beyond the sea,
I’m here on business for my King.

This is the King’s command: that all men, ev’rywhere,
Repent and turn away from sin’s seductive snare;
That all who will obey, with Him shall reign for aye,
And that’s my business for my King.

My home is brighter far than Sharon’s rosy plain,
Eternal life and joy thro’out its vast domain;
My Sov'reign bids me tell how mortals there may dwell,
And that’s my business for my King.

REFRAIN
This is the message that I bring,
A message angels fain would sing: “Oh, be ye reconciled,”
Thus saith my Lord and King, “Oh, be ye reconciled to God.”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 424 首 - 我王之事工
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我在世為客旅，今暫居在異鄉，我的家在遠方，就在那黃金岸；
我今日受差遣，做使者顯真光，我樂意工作為我王。

這是我王命令，福音遍地傳揚，當從罪惡深淵認罪悔改回轉；
聽從祂呼聲者，必與主同為王，我樂意從命為我王。

主命我去傳揚，天家美好故鄉，勝過沙崙平原，永遠喜樂平安；
世間無此樂土，信者長享安康，我樂意盡忠為我王。


副歌
美好信息，我要傳揚，眾天使亦為此歌唱：「願你與神和好！」
我救主發慈聲：「與父神和好，免淪亡！」

english_page_header: Hymn 425 - I Belong to the King
english_full_lyrics:
I belong to the King, I’m a child of His love,
I shall dwell in His palace so fair;
For he tells of its bliss in yon heaven above,
And His children in splendor shall share.

I belong to the King, and He loves me I know,
For His mercy and kindness, so free,
Are unceasingly mine, wheresoever I go,
And my refuge unfailing is He.

I belong to the King, and His promise is sure,
That we all shall be gathered at last
In His kingdom above, by life’s waters so pure,
When this life with its trials is past.

REFRAIN
I belong to the King, I’m a child of His love,
And He never forsaketh His own;
He will call me some day to His palace above,
I shall dwell by His glorified throne.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 425 首 - 我屬我王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我屬我主我王，慈愛天父兒女，將永居我王華美天堂。
主曾訴說天鄉，永恆美好無疆，神子分享祂燦爛榮光。

我屬我主我王，深知祂永愛我，常以慈悲與恩惠眷顧。
無論我往何處，主慈愛總豐富，永遠作我的避難之處。

我屬我主我王，祂的應許確實，祂已在天家預備住處。
祂將領我進入，享受生命活水，卸下我今生愁苦勞碌。

副歌
我屬我主我王，慈愛天父兒女，祂永不離棄屬祂子民。
那日祂必召我回到福樂天堂，在他寶座前敬拜、歌唱。

english_page_header: Hymn 426 - What a Wonderful Saviour!
english_full_lyrics:
Christ has for sin atonement made,
What a wonderful Saviour!
I am redeemed, the price is paid;
What a wonderful Saviour!

I praise Him for the cleansing blood,
What a wonderful Saviour!
That reconciled my soul to God;
What a wonderful Saviour!

He cleansed my heart from all its sin,
What a wonderful Saviour!
And now He reigns and rules therein;
What a wonderful Saviour!

He gives me overcoming pow’r,
What a wonderful Saviour!
And triumph in each trying hour;
What a wonderful Saviour!

REFRAIN
What a wonderful Saviour is Jesus, my Jesus!
What a wonderful Saviour is Jesus, my Lord!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 426 首 - 何等奇妙的救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
基督贖罪救恩完成，何等奇妙的救主！
我罪得贖代價付清，何等奇妙的救主！

我讚美祂贖罪寶血，何等奇妙的救主！
基督使我與神和好，何等奇妙的救主！

靠祂洗淨我心罪愆，何等奇妙的救主！
今在我心執掌王權，何等奇妙的救主！

祂賜力量使我堅固，何等奇妙的救主！
使我勝過試煉、艱苦，何等奇妙的救主！

副歌
何等奇妙的救主，是耶穌我救主，
何等奇妙的救主，是耶穌我主。

english_page_header: Hymn 427 - We’ve a Story to Tell to the Nations
english_full_lyrics:
We’ve a story to tell to the nations,
That shall turn their hearts to the right,
A story of truth and sweetness,
A story of peace and light,
A story of peace and light.

We’ve a song to be sung to the nations,
That shall lift their hearts to the Lord;
A song that shall conquer evil
And shatter the spear and sword,
And shatter the spear and sword.

We’ve a message to give to the nations,
That the Lord Who reigneth above,
Hath sent us His Son to save us,
And show us that God is love,
And show us that God is love.

We’ve a Saviour to show to the nations,
Who the path of sorrow has trod,
That all of the world’s great people
Might come to the truth of God,
Might come to the truth of God.

REFRAIN
For the darkness shall turn to dawning,
And the dawning to noonday bright,
And Christ’s great kingdom shall come on earth,
The kingdom of love and light.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 427 首 - 有一故事傳給萬邦
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我們有一故事傳給萬邦，能使人心歸回轉向，
故事真實美妙詩章，滿有平安與亮光，滿有平安與亮光。

我們有一詩歌唱給萬邦，能使人心向主仰望，
詩歌力量勝過罪權，粉碎利劍與矛槍，粉碎利劍與矛槍。

我們有一信息傳給萬邦，真神高天掌權作王，
差遣愛子拯救世人，真神慈愛無限量，真神慈愛無限量。

我們要將救主傳給萬邦，祂在世間痛苦備嘗，
但願世人多多思量，靠主真理奮勇往，靠主真理奮勇往。

副歌
因黑夜必要轉為晨光，到正午更顯明輝煌，
主基督國度降臨地上，全地充滿愛與光。

english_page_header: Hymn 428 - Jesus Will Walk with Me
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus will walk with me down thru the valley,
Jesus will walk with me over the plain;
When in the shadow or when in the sunshine,
If He goes with me I shall not complain.

Jesus will walk with me when I am tempted,
Giving me strength as my need may demand;
When in affliction His presence is near me,
I am upheld by His almighty hand.

Jesus will walk with me, guarding me ever,
Giving me victory thru storm and strife;
He is my Comforter, Counselor, Leader,
Over the uneven journey of life.

Jesus will walk with me in life’s fair morning,
And when the shadows of evening must come;
Living or dying, He will not forsake me.
Jesus will walk with me all the way home.

REFRAIN
Jesus will walk with me, He will talk with me;
He will walk with me;
In joy or in sorrow, today and tomorrow,
I know He will walk with me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 428 首 - 耶穌與我同行
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌與我同行，同經過山谷；耶穌與我同行經過平原。
我前途不論是幽暗或光明，耶穌與我同行，無限歡欣。

耶穌與我同行，當試探來臨，賜給我力量，使我全得勝。
憂傷來臨時主親自來安慰，主大能手將我扶持安穩。

耶穌與我同行，當風暴來襲，祂必保護引領到平安地。
祂是我安慰者，是我的策士，領我一生直到天家安息。

耶穌與我同行，在晨曦之時，在黃昏與黑夜與我同行。
不論我生或死，祂總不撇棄，耶穌與我同行，直到天庭。

副歌
耶穌與我同行，祂與我交談，祂與我同行。
或喜樂或憂傷，或今日或明日，我知主與我同行。

english_page_header: Hymn 429 - Battle Hymn of the Republic
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 429 首 - 我必親見榮耀主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我的眼睛已經看見主降臨的大榮光，祂正除盡一切污穢罪惡，
使公義顯彰；祂已抽出祂的聖劍發出閃閃的光芒，主真理必降臨。

萬軍之主率領千萬天使自天再來臨，祂將坐在榮耀寶座之上，
威嚴發號令。我要在祂榮光照耀之下聆聽祂判定，審判主必降臨。

千萬天使吹響號筒，宣告救主的降臨，世人一切心思意念在祂
座前見分明。我的靈魂時時儆醒，我心速與主回應，榮耀主必降臨。

我主耶穌降生世界，芬芳有如百合香，祂的慈顏光明榮耀燦爛，
遠勝世上王。我主捨命釘死十架，我願以主為榜樣，全能主必降臨。

副歌
榮耀！榮耀！哈利路亞！榮耀！榮耀！哈利路亞！
榮耀！榮耀！哈利路亞！榮耀主必降臨。

english_page_header: Hymn 430 - Shall We Gather at the River?
english_full_lyrics:
Shall we gather at the river,
Where bright angel feet have trod;
With its crystal tide forever
Flowing by the throne of God?

On the margin of the river,
Washing up its silver spray,
We will walk and worship ever,
All the happy golden day.

Ere we reach the shining river,
Lay we ev’ry burden down;
Grace our spirits will deliver,
And provide a robe and crown.

Soon we’ll reach the shining river,
Soon our pilgrimage will cease,
Soon our happy hearts will quiver
With the melody of peace.

REFRAIN
Yes, we’ll gather at the river,
The beautiful, the beautiful river,
Gather with the saints at the river
That flows by the throne of God.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 430 首 - 我們聚集生命河邊
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
恩主座前生命河邊，光明天使齊朝見，
生命活水明亮如晶，從羔羊寶座發源。

遠處望見生命河邊，銀色水波盪河間，
在那快樂光輝日子，頌揚敬拜寶座前。

未到福樂生命河邊，應先卸下罪重擔，
靈魂得救安歇主懷，蒙賜義袍和冠冕。

轉瞬到那生命河邊，居住福地人皆歡，
平安樂音頌歌嘹亮，救主恩典難述完。

副歌
我們聚集生命河邊，在極其美麗、極其美麗河邊，
得救聖徒歡聚在一起，歡聚在恩主座前。

english_page_header: Hymn 431 - O Perfect Love
english_full_lyrics:
O perfect Love, all human thought transcending,
Lowly we kneel in prayer before Thy throne,
That theirs may be the love which knows no ending,
Whom Thou forevermore dost join in one.

O perfect Life, be Thou their full assurance,
Of tender charity and steadfast faith,
Of patient hope and quiet, brave endurance,
With childlike trust that fears no pain nor death.

Grant them the joy which brightens earthly sorrow;
Grant them the peace which calms all earthly strife,
And to life’s day the glorious unknown morrow
That dawns upon eternal love and life.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 431 首 - 全備的愛
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
愛何全備，遠勝過世人想像。
我們屈膝在寶座前頌揚，
願主保守，在主裡合而為一。
永遠相繫，愛心散發馨香。

永恆的主，願祢做堅固保障。
賞賜溫柔、慈憐、忍耐、堅強，
平靜勇敢，持守永久的盼望。
單純信靠，不懼困苦動盪。

求主賜福，使喜樂照亮憂傷。
使他平安，勝過世事戰場。
願主保守，每日恩光常照亮。
全備真愛，永遠生命同享。

english_page_header: Hymn 432 - The Touch of His Hand on Mine
english_full_lyrics:
There are days so dark that I seek in vain
For the face of my Friend divine;
But though darkness hide, He is there to guide
By the touch of His hand on mine.

There are times, when tired of the toilsome road,
That for ways of the world I pine;
But He draws me back to the upward track
By the touch of His hand on mine.

Oh, the touch of His hand on mine,
Oh, the touch of His hand on mine!
There is grace and pow’r, in the trying hour,
In the touch of His hand on mine.

Oh, the touch of His hand on mine,
Oh, the touch of His hand on mine!
There is grace and pow’r, in the trying hour,
In the touch of His hand on mine.

REFRAIN
Oh, the touch of His hand on mine,
Oh, the touch of His hand on mine!
There is grace and pow’r, in the trying hour,
In the touch of His hand on mine.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 432 首 - 祂大能手扶持我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
黑暗路途中我獨自摸索，尋找救贖主我恩友。
黑暗雖遮蔽，祂仍引導我，因祂大能手扶持我。

有時因世事勞累心憂愁，有時因思慮靈疑惑；
但祂扶持我，繼續引領我，因祂大能手扶持我。

世上事如謎叫我難看透，不知祂巧手怎掌握。
但我心歡喜，相信祂承諾，因祂大能手扶持我。

生命近尾聲，我獨自度過，死亡的權勢包圍我，
當黑暗捲襲，祂恩典助我，因祂大能手扶持我。

副歌
因祂大能手扶持我，因祂大能手扶持我，
困苦中必有主恩典、力量，因祂大能手扶持我。

english_page_header: Hymn 433 - Wonderful Peace
english_full_lyrics:
Far away in the depths of my spirit tonight
Rolls a melody sweeter than psalm;
In celestial-like strains it unceasingly falls
O’er my soul like an infinite calm.

What a treasure I have in this wonderful peace,
Buried deep in the heart of my soul,
So secure that no power can mine it away,
While the years of eternity roll!

I am resting tonight in this wonderful peace,
Resting sweetly in Jesus’ control;
For I’m kept from all danger by night and by day,
And His glory is flooding my soul!

And I think when I rise to that city of peace,
Where the Author of peace I shall see,
That one strain of the song which the ransomed will sing
In that heavenly kingdom will be:

REFRAIN
Peace, Peace wonderful peace,
Coming down from the Father above!
Sweep over my spirit forever, I pray
In fathomless billows of love!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 433 首 - 奇妙平安
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在我心靈的最深處有一活泉，不斷湧流出美妙詩篇；
比一切世上詩歌更美妙甘甜，使我心靈有喜悅平安。

我因這奇妙平安而喜樂歡顏，深藏在我的心靈中間；
雖有惡勢力亦無法將它搬遷，因主應許同在到永遠。

我今安穩的享受這奇妙平安，有主耶穌掌管生命權；
一切災害與危險祂保護周全，主的榮光已滿我心田。

將來我必能到聖城享受平安，與賜平安的耶穌見面；
在榮耀天家與聖徒一同頌讚，奇妙平安歌和詠神前。

副歌
平安，奇妙平安，這是我天父所賜平安，
求耶穌的大慈愛充滿我心，使我永有奇妙平安。

english_page_header: Hymn 434 - Just Over in the Gloryland
english_full_lyrics:
I’ve a home prepared where the saints abide,
Just over in the glory land;
And I long to be by my Saviour’s side,
Just over in the glory land.

I am on my way to those mansions fair,
Just over in the glory land;
There to sing God’s praise and His glory share,
Just over in the glory land.

What a joyful thought that my Lord I’ll see,
Just over in the glory land;
And with kindred saved, there forever be,
Just over in the glory land.

With the blood-washed throng I will shout and sing,
Just over in the glory land;
Glad hosannas to Christ, the Lord and King,
Just over in the glory land.

REFRAIN
Just over in the glory land, 
I’ll join the happy angel band, 
Just over in the glory land;
Just over in the glory land, 
There with the mighty host I’ll stand, 
Just over in the glory land.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 434 首 - 在那榮耀國度
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我有家在天為我預備齊，就在那榮耀國度裡；
我渴望歸家與我主同住，就在那榮耀國度裡。

我奮勇前往得見華美地，就在那榮耀國度裡；
每日頌讚主，冠冕獻主前，就在那榮耀國度裡。

我何等快樂!與我主相聚，就在那榮耀國度裡；
眾聖徒在天相聚永不離，就在那榮耀國度裡。

我要同聖徒讚美主不息，就在那榮耀國度裡；
歡唱：「和散那歸與永生王」，就在那榮耀國度裡。

副歌
就在那榮耀國度裡，與天使唱和頌讚主，唱：「哈利路亞讚美主。」
就在那榮耀國度裡，永遠在天家享福氣，就在那榮耀國度裡。

english_page_header: Hymn 435 - My Redeemer
english_full_lyrics:
I will sing of my Redeemer,
And His wondrous love to me;
On the cruel cross He suffered,
From the curse to set me free.

I will tell the wondrous story,
How my lost estate to save,
In His boundless love and mercy,
He the ransom freely gave.

I will praise my dear Redeemer,
His triumphant power I’ll tell,
How the victory He giveth
Over sin, and death, and hell.

I will sing of my Redeemer,
And His heav’nly love to me;
He from death to life hath brought me,
Son of God, with Him to be.

REFRAIN
Sing, O sing of my Redeemer,
With His blood He purchased me.
On the cross He sealed my pardon,
Paid the debt and made me free.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 435 首 - 歌頌救贖恩主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我要歌頌救贖恩主，因祂奇妙大慈愛。
祂在十架受盡苦楚，為要除盡我罪債。

我要歌頌救贖恩主，祂已贖盡我罪愆。
祂的豐盛慈愛憐憫，今將我罪全赦免。

我要歌頌救贖恩主，祂的大能我傳述。
祂使我能得勝歡呼，勝過死亡與罪污。

我要歌頌救贖恩主，豐盛救恩祂賞賜。
使我重生得享天福，與祂同作神後嗣。

副歌
歌頌，歌頌救贖恩主，祂寶血為我流出。
十字架上受盡痛苦，還清罪債，將我贖。

english_page_header: Hymn 436 - All the Way My Saviour Leads Me
english_full_lyrics:
All the way my Saviour leads me; What have I to ask beside?
Can I doubt His tender mercy, Who through life has been my Guide?
Heav'nly peace, divinest comfort, Here by faith in Him to dwell!
For I know, whate’er befall me, Jesus doeth all things well;
For I know, whate’er befall me, Jesus doeth all things well.

All the way my Saviour leads me, Cheers each winding path I tread,
Gives me grace for every trial, Feeds me with the living bread.
Though my weary steps may falter, And my soul athirst may be,
Gushing from the Rock before me, Lo! A spring of joy I see;
Gushing from the Rock before me, Lo! A spring of joy I see.

All the way my Saviour leads me; Oh, the fullness of His love!
Perfect rest to me is promised In my Father’s house above.
When my spirit, clothed immortal, Wings its flight to realms of day,
This my song through endless ages: Jesus led me all the way;
This my song through endless ages: Jesus led me all the way.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 436 首 - 我一生蒙救主引導
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我一生蒙救主引導，在今世有何所求？我豈需要猜疑主愛？
祂常引領又眷祐；享受平安，得主安慰，我憑信天家居留。
我深知不論何境遇，救主美意必成就！
我深知不論何境遇，救主美意必成就！

我一生蒙救主引導，遇試煉蒙主賜恩，天路崎嶇祂施恩惠，
賞賜天糧享不盡；有時腳步軟弱疲憊，靈命乾渴無信心。
救恩磐石顯現眼前，湧流活水，我甦醒，
救恩磐石顯現眼前，湧流活水，我甦醒。

我一生蒙救主引導，主恩愛長闊高深！真正安息主已應許，
在我父家已留存；直到那日復活改變，我必住榮美天庭。
歡欣歌唱直到永遠：「耶穌領我天路行！」
歡欣歌唱直到永遠：「耶穌領我天路行！」

english_page_header: Hymn 437 - Who at My Door Is Standing?
english_full_lyrics:
Who at my door is standing,
Patiently drawing near,
Entrance within demanding?
Whose is the voice I hear?

Lonely without He’s staying;
Lonely within am I;
While I am still delaying,
Will He not pass me by?

All through the dark hours dreary,
Knocking again is He;
Jesus, art Thou not weary,
Waiting so long for me?

Door of my heart, I hasten!
Thee will I open wide.
Though He rebuke and chasten,
He shall with me abide.

REFRAIN
Sweetly the tones are falling; 
“Open the door for Me!
If thou wilt heed My calling,
I will abide with thee.”
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 437 首 - 誰正守候在門外?
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
誰正守候在門外，呼喚我心門開？
情詞迫切求進來，溫柔聲叩心懷。

門外我主枯等待，門內我心未開。
莫再遲疑莫耽延，主永遠不離開。

寒夜中主仍等待，主叩門聲仍在。
無倦無悔主大愛，為我苦苦等待。

快快敞開我心懷，開心門迎主來。
雖有管教卻是愛，主與我永同在。

副歌
耶穌慈聲在呼召：開心門迎主來；
恭聽回應主恩召，主必與我同在。

english_page_header: Hymn 438 - For the Beauty of the Earth
english_full_lyrics:
For the beauty of the earth,
For the glory of the skies,
For the love which from our birth
Over and around us lies.

For the beauty of each hour,
Of the day and of the night,
Hill and vale, and tree and flow’r,
Sun and moon, and stars of light.

For the joy of ear and eye,
For the heart and mind’s delight,
For the mystic harmony
Linking sense to sound and sight.

For the joy of human love,
Brother, sister, parent, child,
Friends on earth, and friends above,
For all gentle thoughts and mild.

For Thy Church that evermore
Lifteth holy hands above,
Off’ring up on ev’ry shore
Her pure sacrifice of love.

For Thyself, best Gift Divine,
To the world so freely giv’n,
For that great, great love of Thine,
Peace on earth, and joy in heav’n.

REFRAIN
Lord of all, to Thee we raise
This our hymn of grateful praise.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 438 首 - 頌主創造美好
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
遍地燦爛好風光，榮耀煇煌滿穹蒼。
回想出生到如今，主愛伴隨我身旁。

神賜良辰妙而美，晝來夜往依常軌。
山川花木景緻偉，日月星辰放光輝。

天父賞賜天倫樂，親子兄弟愛相守。
天上人間良友多，溫柔仁愛長相和。

上主國度心所繫，向天舉手訴心意。
萬民敬獻馨香祭，心誠意真舉靈祭。

耳聽眼見用心學，感受主恩心喜悅。
以靈領受真神奇，所見所聞共和諧。

榮耀基督我所倚，拯救萬民得稱義。
奇妙大愛無窮盡，人間平安天歡喜。

副歌
敬向萬有權能神，感謝讚美齊歌頌。

english_page_header: Hymn 439 - Moment by Moment
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 439 首 - 時刻交託主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
與耶穌同死才得以復生，與耶穌同活我恩典日增；
仰望我恩主，榮光必照臨。時時刻刻我都與主相親。

無有一試探主不開恩門；無有一重擔我主不減輕；
無有一憂慮，我主不與分。時時刻刻我都蒙主鴻恩。

無有一悲傷我主不慰問；無有一眼淚我主不憐憫；
無有一危險，我主不施恩。時時刻刻我靠主得安寧。

無有一軟弱我主不扶助；無有一病患我主不看顧；
時也而刻也，得福或受苦，耶穌我救主都與我同度。

副歌
時時刻刻都蒙救主之恩；時時刻刻都靠主而得生；
時時刻刻我都做主子民。仰望我恩主，榮光必照臨。

english_page_header: Hymn 440 - In Christ There Is No East or West
english_full_lyrics:
In Christ there is no East or West,
In Him no South or North;
But one great fellowship of love
Throughout the whole wide earth.

In Him shall true hearts ev'rywhere
Their high communion find;
His service is the golden cord,
Close binding all mankind.

Join hands, then, brothers of the faith,
Whate’er your race may be!
Who serves my Father as a son
Is surely kin to me.

In Christ now meet both East and West,
In Him meet South and North;
All Christly souls are one in Him,
Throughout the whole wide earth.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 440 首 - 在主愛中團契
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在主基督耶穌愛中，不分南北西東；
宇宙萬有浩瀚世界，契合在主愛中。

在主愛中互諒、互信，彼此相愛、相親；
基督慈懷有如環帶，契合萬族、萬民。

主內弟兄國族不分，齊來攜手歡欣；
同為兒女，事奉天父，契合如敘天倫。

在主基督耶穌愛中，聯合各族、各民；
主內同靈互為肢體，契合在主愛中。

english_page_header: Hymn 441 - I Am Resolved
english_full_lyrics:
I am resolved no longer to linger,
Charmed by the world’s delight;
Things that are higher, things that are nobler,
These have allured my sight.

I am resolved to go to the Saviour,
Leaving my sin and strife;
He is the true One, He is the just One,
He hath the words of life.

I am resolved to follow the Saviour,
Faithful and true each day;
Heed what He sayeth, do what He willeth,
He is the living way.

I am resolved to enter the kingdom,
Leaving the paths of sin;
Friends may oppose me, foes may beset me,
Still will I enter in.

I am resolved, and who will go with me?
Come, friends, without delay,
Taught by the Bible, led by the Spirit,
We’ll walk the heav'nly way.

REFRAIN
I will hasten to Him,
Hasten so glad and free;
Jesus, greatest, highest,
I will come to Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 441 首 - 我立下決心
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我立下決心永不再留戀這世界的虛名，
屬天的美景，寶貴的信息，已吸引我心靈。

我立下決心歸向主耶穌，離開罪惡枷鎖，
祂信實不變，祂公義永存，祂應許必成就。

我立下決心跟隨主耶穌，忠誠仰望救主，
聽從祂命令，遵行祂旨意，祂是生命、道路。

我立下決心進主的國度，遠離罪惡道路，
朋友雖遠離，仇敵雖攻擊，我必坦然見主

我立下決心，誰願意同行？朋友! 請快決定，
聖經有明訓，聖靈必引領，請來同享永生。

副歌
耶穌！ 我來就祢，我靈自由歡喜。
耶穌！ 至高真神，我要來就祢。

english_page_header: Hymn 442 - God Leads Us Along
english_full_lyrics:
In shady, green pastures, so rich and so sweet,
God leads His dear children along;
Where the water’s cool flow bathes the weary one’s feet,
God leads His dear children along.

Sometimes on the mount where the sun shines so bright,
God leads His dear children along;
Sometimes in the valley, in darkest of night,
God leads His dear children along.

Though sorrows befall us and Satan oppose,
God leads His dear children along;
Through grace we can conquer, defeat all our foes,
God leads His dear children along.

Away from the mire, and away from the clay,
God leads His dear children along;
Away up in glory, eternity’s day,
God leads His dear children along.

REFRAIN
Some thro’ the waters, some through the flood,
Some thro’ the fire, but all through the blood;
Some through great sorrow, but God gives a song,
In the night season and all the day long.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 442 首 - 神一路引領
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
那蔭涼的草地，極茂盛馨香，神引領祂兒女前行；
水流清涼，洗淨我旅途疲困，神引領祂兒女前行。

有時登上山頭，見陽光燦爛，神引領祂兒女前行；
有時行經幽谷，黑夜已深沉，神引領祂兒女前行。

雖憂煩常來襲，撒但常攻擊，神引領祂兒女前行；
靠主恩典得勝，仇敵終退敗，神引領祂兒女前行。

從淤泥中救起，從塵世遠離，神引領祂兒女前行；
在榮耀中被提入永遠光明，神引領祂兒女前行。

副歌
或渡過江河，或越洪流，或經烈火，寶血都潔淨；
憂傷時以詩歌安慰我心；無論晝夜，真神一路引領。

english_page_header: Hymn 443 - Glory Ever Be to Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Glory ever be to Jesus,
God’s own well beloved Son;
By His grace He hath redeemed us, 
“It is finished,” all is done.

Oh, the weary days of wand’ring,
Longing, hoping for the light;
These at last all lie behind us,
Jesus is our strength and might.

In His safe and holy keeping, 
’Neath the shadow of His wing,
Gladly in His love confiding,
May our souls His praises sing.

REFRAIN
Saved by grace thro’ faith in Jesus,
Saved by His own precious blood,
May we in His love abiding,
Follow on to know the Lord.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 443 首 - 榮耀永歸耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
榮耀永遠歸於耶穌，祂是真神獨生子，
祂以恩慈救贖我們，祂釘十架成救恩。

漂泊流浪困頓歲月，渴慕盼望主恩光，
如今終於得見光明，耶穌是我的力量。

蒙主眷顧保守聖潔，大能膀臂蔭庇我，
在主愛中，我靈歌唱，歡然信靠樂交託。

副歌
本乎恩，也因信耶穌，祂寶血使我得贖。
願主保守永在愛中，緊緊跟隨慈愛主。

english_page_header: Hymn 444 - Jesus Is the Sweetest Name I Know
english_full_lyrics:
There have been names that I have loved to hear,
But never has there been a name so dear
To this heart of mine, as the name divine,
The precious, precious name of Jesus.

There is no name in earth or Heav’n above,
That we should give such honor and such love,
As the blessed name, let us all acclaim,
That wondrous, glorious name of Jesus.

And some day I shall see Him face to face
To thank and praise Him for His wondrous grace,
Which He gave to me, when He made me free,
The blessed Son of God called Jesus.

REFRAIN
Jesus is the sweetest name I know,
And He’s just the same as His lovely name,
And that’s the reason why I love Him so;
Oh, Jesus is the sweetest name I know.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 444 首 - 耶穌聖名最甜美
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
曾聽過世上許多的美名，但未有一名如此的動聽。
神聖至美名，安慰我心靈，是主耶穌的寶貴聖名。

在天上地下沒有其他名，使我們如此愛慕和尊敬，
萬福至美名，我們當歡迎，是主奇妙的榮耀聖名。

當主再來時，與祂面對面，必稱謝讚美奇妙主恩典，
賜我真自由，慈愛廣無邊，救主耶穌聖名最甘甜。

副歌
耶穌聖名最美、最甘甜，祂一生所行，正合祂聖名。
願深愛救主，奉獻我生命，最美麗甘甜是耶穌聖名。

english_page_header: Hymn 445 - Grace Greater Than Our Sin
english_full_lyrics:
Marvelous grace of our loving Lord,
Grace that exceeds our sin and our guilt!
Yonder on Calvary’s mount outpoured,
There where the blood of the Lamb was spilt.

Sin and despair like the sea waves cold,
Threaten the soul with infinite loss;
Grace that is greater, yes, grace untold,
Points to the refuge, the mighty cross.

Dark is the stain that we cannot hide,
What can avail to wash it away?
Look! There is flowing a crimson tide,
Brighter than snow you may be today.

Marvelous, infinite, matchless grace,
Freely bestowed on all who believe!
You that are longing to see His face,
Will you this moment His grace receive?

REFRAIN
Grace, grace, God’s grace,
Grace that will pardon and cleanse within;
Grace, grace, God’s grace,
Grace that is greater than all our sin.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 445 首 - 恩典大過我罪愆
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
慈愛主滿有奇異恩典，這恩典遠超我的罪愆！
各各他山上寶血流出，羔羊血能洗淨眾罪愆。

罪惡絕望如寒風浪捲，威脅生命，將永遠淪陷；
幸有救主無限大慈愛，引向十架，救恩贖罪愆。

過犯眾多，自己難改變，罪惡、污點也無法遮掩；
但有主耶穌寶血泉源，洗我比雪潔白無罪愆

奇妙的、無窮的大恩典，白白賞賜，信者得恩眷 ！
你是否渴望見主聖面？ 你是否願接受主恩典？

副歌
真神恩典，潔淨我內心靠主恩典。
真神恩典恩典大過我的眾罪愆。

english_page_header: Hymn 446 - Blessed Be the Name
english_full_lyrics:
All praise to Him who reigns above
In majesty supreme,
Who gave His Son for man to die,
That He might man redeem!

His name above all names shall stand,
Exalted more and more,
At God the Father’s own right hand,
Where angel hosts adore.

Redeemer, Saviour, Friend of man
Once ruined by the fall,
Thou hast devised salvation’s plan,
For Thou hast died for all.

His name shall be the Counselor,
The mighty Prince of Peace,
Of all earth’s kingdoms Conqueror,
Whose reign shall never cease.

REFRAIN
Blessed be the name! Blessed be the name!
Blessed be the name of the Lord!
Blessed be the name! Blessed be the name!
Blessed be the name of the Lord!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 446 首 - 頌讚主聖名
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
願頌讚歸於主聖名，至高、至聖、至尊，
神賜愛子為人捨命，救贖世人靈魂。

耶穌聖名滿有權能，超乎世間萬名，
祂在天父寶座右邊，天使敬拜、尊崇。

全能救主，至善恩友，拯救沉淪罪人，
因主捨身，擔我罪孽，成全最美救恩

主名稱為奇妙策士，全能和平之君，
萬膝跪拜，萬口頌揚，榮耀永歸主名。

副歌
頌讚主聖名！ 頌讚主聖名!頌讚、榮耀歸主聖名！
頌讚主聖名！ 頌讚主聖名!頌讚、榮耀歸主聖名！

english_page_header: Hymn 447 - Hosanna, Loud Hosanna
english_full_lyrics:
Hosanna, loud hosanna, the little children sang;
Through pillared court and temple, the lovely anthem rang.
To Jesus, who had bless’d them, close folded to His breast,
The children sang their praises, the simplest and the best.

From Olivet they followed among the joyful crowd;
The vict’ry palm branch waving, with priases clear and loud.
The Lord of earth and heaven rode on in lowly state,
Nor scorned that little children should on His bidding wait.

“Hosanna in the highest!” that ancient song we sing;
For Christ is our Redeemer, the Lord of heav’n, our King.
O may we ever praise Him with heart and life and voice,
And in His blissful presence eternally rejoice!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 447 首 - 高唱和散那
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
和散那! 唱「和散那!」眾孩童高聲唱，
美妙樂音滿天庭，頌讚歌聲悠揚。
主耶穌賜福小孩，常懷抱坐膝上，
孩童揚聲齊歌唱，讚美主榮耀王。

群眾擁戴我救主，歡呼聲達雲壤，
持棕樹枝葉揮舞，歌聲美妙高亢。
救主耶穌極謙卑，騎驢駒進聖城，
男女老少齊聚集，迎接救主君王。

和散那歸至高神，歡呼聲傳四方，
基督耶穌我救主，是天上大君王。
以心靈誠實敬拜，讚美主，樂洋洋，
直到天家見主面，永遠歡欣歌唱。

english_page_header: Hymn 448 - Rejoice, the Lord Is King
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 448 首 - 歡欣，主為君王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
歡欣，主為君王！你當崇拜景仰 ！
要高聲稱謝主，永遠得勝君王。

救主君王掌權，真神慈愛無限；
洗淨我罪完全，榮升寶座在天。

主耶穌永為王，國度永遠興旺；
天地屬祂掌管，得勝陰間死亡。

何等榮耀盼望！主再臨，永為王，
來迎接祂忠僕，同回天上家鄉。

副歌
振作你心，揚聲高唱！
歡欣，歡欣，應當歡欣!

english_page_header: Hymn 449 - And Can It Be That I Should Gain?
english_full_lyrics:
And can it be that I should gain
An int’rest in the Saviour’s blood?
Died He for me, who caused His pain?
For me, who Him to death pursued?
Amazing love! How can it be
That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me?
Amazing love! How can it be,
That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me?

He left His Father’s throne above,
So free, so infinite His grace;
Emptied Himself of all but love,
And bled for Adam’s helpless race;
’Tis mercy all, immense and free;
O praise my God, it reaches me.
Amazing love! How can it be,
That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me?

Long my imprisoned spirit lay,
Fast bound in sin and nature’s night;
Thine eye diffused a quick’ning ray,
I woke, the dungeon flamed with light;
My chains fell off, my heart was free;
I rose, went forth, and followed Thee.
Amazing love! How can it be,
That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me?

No condemnation now I dread;
Jesus, and all in Him, is mine;
Alive in Him, my living Head,
And clothed in righteousness divine,
Bold I approach th’eternal throne,
And claim the crown, through Christ my own.
Amazing love! How can it be,
That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me?
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 449 首 - 何能如此
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
何能如此，罪人如我，也蒙寶血救贖恩賜 ?
主已為我忍受痛苦，更為我在十架上死，
奇異的愛，何能如此我主我神為我受死?

我主離開天上寶座，無窮恩惠白白賞賜，
謙卑虛己彰顯慈愛，流血救贖亞當後嗣，
恩典憐愛無邊、無涯，罪人如我竟蒙扶持 !

我靈受困在牢獄中，被罪包圍，黑暗重重；
得蒙救主照亮我心，我靈甦醒，我心光明，
枷鎖脫落，心靈獲釋，起來前進，跟隨主行。

不再定罪，除盡憂愁，主愛豐盛，是我所有。
永活主裡，基督為首，穿起義袍聖潔無垢，
坦然無懼到寶座前，公義冠冕為我存留。

副歌
奇異的愛，何能如此我主，我神竟為我死！

english_page_header: Hymn 450 - Sound the Battle Cry
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 450 首 - 吹響征戰號
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
仇敵已臨近，吹響征戰號，高舉我基督大旌旗，
穿全副軍裝，威武眾英豪，凱旋勝敵信靠主號召。

大家向前進，勇敢佔敵營，主道必顯明，能得勝；
盾甲與旌旗閃耀在光中，為真理而爭戰必得勝。

萬軍全能神聽我呼求聲，主恩極豐富必夠用，
戰爭已完成，唱凱歌高聲，頭戴冠冕榮耀主聖名。

副歌
精兵興起，群聚在旌旗下，預備前進，將此令傳開。
向前，向前，高聲唱: 「和散那!」基督為此雄師大元帥。

english_page_header: Hymn 451 - Hiding in Thee
english_full_lyrics:
O safe to the Rock that is higher than I,
My soul in its conflicts and sorrows would fly;
So sinful, so weary, Thine, Thine, would I be;
Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

In the calm of the noontide, in sorrow’s lone hour,
In times when temptation casts o’er me its pow’r;
In the tempests of life, on its wide, heaving sea,
Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

How oft in the conflict, when pressed by the foe,
I have fled to my refuge and breathed out my woe;
How often, when trials like sea billows roll,
Have I hidden in Thee, O Thou Rock of my soul.

REFRAIN
Hiding in Thee, hiding in Thee,
Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 451 首 - 藏身主裡
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我靈困苦憂傷，願藏身主懷，投靠萬古磐石，享受主慈愛。
我過犯雖眾多，但深願屬祢，是萬古靈磐石，我藏身主懷。

無論平靜安泰，或痛苦難耐，無論遭受試探，或遇敵阻礙。
或遇狂風暴雨，飄搖在大海，是萬古靈磐石，我藏身主懷。

仇敵時時侵擾，內心真無奈，速奔避難處所，藏身在主懷。
試煉臨近我身，如大海洪濤，是萬古靈磐石，我藏身主懷。

副歌
藏身主懷，藏身主懷，是萬古靈磐石，我藏身主懷。

english_page_header: Hymn 452 - Be Thou My Vision
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 452 首 - 我願常見祢
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我願常見祢，我親愛救主，
不念凡塵俗事，只見耶穌，
白晝或黑夜，我切慕祢，
起來或躺臥，願祢常賜福。

祢是我智慧，祢賜我真道，
祢常與我同在，做我倚靠，
偉大的天父，愛我憐我，
常住我心裡，蒙聯屬懷抱。

我不求財富，也不求虛榮，
主！ 祢是我產業，自始至終，
祢在我心中，獨居首位，
至高天上王，是我最寶貴。

至高天上王，領我凱旋歸，
得享天上喜樂，沐主光輝!
以祢心為心，不論禍福，
我願常見祢，天天蒙恩惠。

english_page_header: Hymn 453 - A Child of the King
english_full_lyrics:
My Father is rich in houses and lands,
He holdeth the wealth of the world in His hands!
Of rubies and diamonds, of silver and gold,
His coffers are full, He has riches untold.

My Father’s own Son, the Saviour of men,
Once wandered on earth as the poorest of them;
But now He is pleading our pardon on high,
That we may be His when He comes by and by.

I once was an outcast sinner on earth,
A sinner by choice, and an alien by birth,
But I’ve been adopted, my name’s written down,
An heir to a mansion, a robe and a crown.

A tent or a cottage, why should I care?
They’re building a palace for me over there;
Though exiled from home, yet still I may sing: 
All glory to God, I’m a child of the King.

REFRAIN
I’m a child of the King,
A child of the King:
With Jesus my Saviour,
I’m a child of the King.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 453 首 - 我是君王後嗣
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我父的產業，極多難數計，天下的財寶我父都不在意!
紅玉和鑽石，白銀和黃金，充滿祂庫裡，珍寶無以算計。

我父獨生子，世人的救主，卑微降世間，成為窮乏貧苦；
如今祂在天，為我求赦免；將來主再臨，我得歸屬耶穌。

往昔在世界，我流浪沉淪，陷在罪惡中，未聞救贖之恩，
今蒙主收納，名錄生命冊，作天父後嗣，承受華冕天庭。

大屋或草房，我何需介意，在遙遠天家，王宮為我建起；
雖漂泊在世，我依然歡喜：「榮耀歸真神!」我是君王後嗣。

副歌
我是君王後嗣，是君王後嗣；
因主耶穌救贖，我是君王後嗣。

english_page_header: Hymn 454 - O Come, O Come, Emmanuel
english_full_lyrics:
O come, O come, Emmanuel,
And ransom captive Israel,
That mourns in lonely exile here,
Until the Son of God appear.

O come, Thou Dayspring, come and cheer
Our spirits by Thine advent here;
Disperse the gloomy clouds of night,
And death’s dark shadows put to flight.

O come, Thou Wisdom from on high,
And order all things, far and nigh;
To us the path of knowledge show,
And teach us in her ways to go.

O come, Desire of nations, bind
In one the hearts of all mankind;
Bid Thou our sad divisions cease,
And be Thyself our King of Peace.

REFRAIN
Rejoice! Rejoice! Emmannuel
Shall come to thee, O Israel.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 454 首 - 以馬內利，懇求降臨
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
以馬內利，懇求降臨，解救贖回以色列民，
淪落異邦寂寞傷心，引頸渴望神子降臨。

清晨日光，懇求降臨，藉主來臨安慰眾心，
衝破長夜幽暗愁雲，驅散死亡深沉黑影。

榮耀君王，懇求降臨，統治萬物，帶領萬民，
懇求顯明智慧大能，引領群生步步遵循。

萬邦所望，懇求降臨，團結萬民一志一心，
永息干戈、妒忌、紛爭，和平之君今日來臨。

副歌
歡欣！歡欣！以馬內利必定臨到以色列民。

english_page_header: Hymn 455 - I Know of a Name
english_full_lyrics:
I know of a name, a beautiful name,
That angels brought down to earth;
They whispered it low, one night long ago,
To a maiden of lowly birth.

I know of a name, a beautiful name,
That unto a Babe was giv’n;
The stars glittered bright throughout that glad night,
And angels praised God in heav’n.

The One of that name, my Saviour became,
My Saviour of Calvary;
My sins nailed Him there, my burdens He bare,
He suffered all this for me.

I love that blest name, that wonderful name,
Made higher than all in heav’n;
’Twas whispered, I know, in my heart long ago,
To Jesus my life I’ve giv’n.

REFRAIN
That beautiful name, that beautiful name,
From sin has pow’r to free us!
That beautiful name, that wonderful name,
That matchless name is Jesus!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 455 首 - 最美聖名
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我知一聖名，最美麗聖名，由天使傳達人間；
天使迦百列向童女顯現，明示耶穌是主名。

我知一聖名，最美麗聖名，此名賜予小嬰孩；
昔年歡樂夜，晨星放光明，眾天使讚美不停。

此唯一聖名，是耶穌聖名，祂曾被釘十架上；
為我罪捨命，背負我罪行，為救我受盡苦刑。

我愛這聖名，最奇妙美名，遠超過諸天之上；
在心靈深處，願為主耶穌將卑微生命獻上。

副歌
最美麗聖名，最美麗聖名，使我脫罪與痛苦！
最美麗聖名，最奇妙聖名，最大聖名是耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 456 - Mid Pleasures and Palaces
english_full_lyrics:
’Mid pleasures and palaces though we may roam,
Be it ever so humble, there’s no place like home!
A charm from the skies seems to hallow us there,
Which, seek through the world, is ne’er met with elsewhere.

An exile from home, splendor dazzles in vain
Oh, give me my lowly thatched cottage again,
The birds singing sweetly that come at my call,
Give me them with that peace of mind, dearer than all.

To us, in despite of the absence of years,
How sweet the remembrance of home still appears;
From allurements abroad which but flatter the eye,
The unsatisfied heart turns and says with a sigh.

REFRAIN
Home! Home! Sweet, sweet home!
Be it ever so humble, there’s no place like home!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 456 首 - 歸家
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
高低眾多山嶺，清泉雜松風，我心仰望救主，恬逸百慮空；
遙望天上青雲，彼岸是樂土，我心切切渴望，何時歸家中？

雖經過流淚谷，主恩仍隆豐，晨曦漸漸顯露，陰影從此終；
我願跟從救主，歸家路已通，主已戰勝惡魔，前進心更雄。

讚美我主耶穌，加恩日益隆，天國路將行盡，歡樂滿我衷；
高唱：「哈利路亞，離我家已近！」仰望救主耶穌，接我回家中。

副歌
家，家，更美家；我家在天上，歸家樂無窮。

english_page_header: Hymn 457 - Wonderful Grace of Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Wonderful grace of Jesus, Greater than all my sin;
How shall my tongue describe it, Where shall its praise begin?
Taking away my burden, Setting my spirit free;
For the wonderful grace of Jesus reaches me.

Wonderful grace of Jesus, Reaching to all the lost,
By it I have been pardoned, Saved to the uttermost,
Chains have been torn asunder, Giving me liberty;
For the wonderful grace of Jesus reaches me.

Wonderful grace of Jesus, Reaching the most defiled,
By its transforming power, Making him God’s dear child,
Purchasing peace and heaven, For all eternity;
And the wonderful grace of Jesus reaches me.

REFRAIN
Wonderful the matchless grace of Jesus,
Deeper than the mighty rolling sea;
Higher than the mountain, sparkling like a fountain,
All sufficient grace for even me,
Broader than the scope of my transgressions,
Greater far than all my sin and shame,
O magnify the precious name of Jesus,
Praise His name!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 457 首 - 耶穌的奇妙救恩
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌奇妙的救恩，超過我眾罪行，
我口舌怎能述說，又如何頌讚神？
他除我罪擔憂愁，使我得真自由，
耶穌奇妙的救恩，使我得拯救。

耶穌奇妙的救恩，拯救失喪之人，
藉救恩我罪得赦，並拯救我靈魂；
主為我解脫捆綁，使我得著釋放，
耶穌奇妙的救恩，使我得拯救。

耶穌奇妙的救恩，臨到罪惡之人，
靠主的大能救贖，使我順服歸神；
蒙主賜平安滿足，得享天國永生，
耶穌奇妙的救恩，使我得拯救。

副歌
我主耶穌奇妙無比救恩，深過波濤滾滾大海洋；
高過最高山嶺，美過最美泉源，奇妙救恩足夠我需用；
超過我的一生所行過犯，勝過我的罪污和邪情；
我稱頌救主耶穌極美聖名。頌主名！

english_page_header: Hymn 458 - Were You There?
english_full_lyrics:
Were you there when they crucified my Lord?
Were you there when they crucified my Lord?
Oh!
Sometimes it causes me to tremble, tremble, tremble.
Were you there when they crucified my Lord?

Were you there when they nailed Him to the tree?
Were you there when they nailed Him to the tree?
Oh! 
Sometimes it causes me to tremble, tremble, tremble.
Were you there when they nailed Him to the tree?

Were you there when they laid Him in the tomb?
Were you there when they laid Him in the tomb?
Oh!
Sometimes it causes me to tremble, tremble, tremble.
Were you there when they laid Him in the tomb?
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 458 首 - 你在那裡?
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主捨命十架時你在哪裡？
主捨命十架時你在哪裡？
啊！每當我想起就戰兢，戰兢，戰兢。
主捨命十架時你在哪裡？

當救主被釘時你在哪裡？
當救主被釘時你在哪裡？
啊！每當我想起就戰兢，戰兢，戰兢。
當救主被釘時你在哪裡？

主被葬墳墓時你在哪裡？
主被葬墳墓時你在哪裡？
啊！每當我想起就戰兢，戰兢，戰兢。
主被葬墳墓時你在哪裡？

english_page_header: Hymn 459 - On Jordan’s Stormy Banks I Stand
english_full_lyrics:
On Jordan’s stormy banks I stand,
And cast a wishful eye
To Canaan’s fair and happy land,
Where my possessions lie.

All o’er those wide extended plains,
Shines one eternal day;
There God the Son forever reigns,
And scatters night away.

No chilling winds nor pois’nous breath
Can reach that healthful shore;
Sickness and sorrow, pain and death,
Are felt and feared no more.

When I shall reach that happy place,
I’ll be forever blest.
For I shall see my Father’s face,
And in His bosom rest.

REFRAIN
I am bound for the promised land,
I am bound for the promised land;
Oh who will come and go with me?
I am bound for the promised land.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 459 首 - 約但河畔
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
佇立滾滾約旦河畔，遙望我心所盼，
那是迦南榮美福地，我心所繫產業。

在那寬廣遼闊平原，陽光輝煌、燦爛，
榮耀之主永遠掌權，驅散黑夜幽暗。

在那歡樂安穩彼岸，再無刺骨風寒，
病痛、困苦、死亡、憂傷，永不擾我心田。

何時得進歡樂天堂，享受永遠平安？
何時親眼看見天父，享受永遠平安？

副歌
我必進那應許美地，我必進那應許美地；
誰願與我同奔天路？一同進那應許美地！

english_page_header: Hymn 460 - The Lord Bless You and Keep You
english_full_lyrics:
The Lord bless you and keep you:
The Lord lift His countenance upon you,
And give you peace, and give you peace;
The Lord make His face to shine upon you,
And be gracious unto you, be gracious,
The Lord be gracious, gracious unto you.
Amen.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 460 首 - 願主賜福保佑你
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
願主賜福保祐你，願主展開祂的慈容照耀你，
賜你平安，賜你平安，願主向你仰臉榮光照耀你，
並將恩惠賜給你，恩待你，願主恩待你，
願主恩待你。阿們。

english_page_header: Hymn 461 - Throw Out the Life Line
english_full_lyrics:
Throw out the life line across the dark wave,
There is a brother whom someone should save; 
Somebody’s brother! Oh, who then will dare
To throw out the life line, his peril to share?

Throw out the life line with hand quick and strong:
Why do you tarry, why linger so long?
See! he is sinking; oh, hasten today-
And out with the life boat! away, then, away!

Throw out the life line to danger fraught men,
Sinking in anguish where you’ve never been:
Winds of temptation and billows of woe
Will soon hurl them out where the dark waters flow.

Soon will the season of rescue be o’er,
Soon will they drift to eternity’s shore,
Haste then, my brother, no time for delay,
But throw out the life line and save them today.

REFRAIN
Throw out the life line! Throw out the life line!
Someone is drifting away;
Throw out the life line! Throw out the life line!
Someone is sinking today.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 461 首 - 快拋救生索
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
看！浪濤洶湧，快拋救生索，有人將沉溺，盼你速援救；
他是你兄弟，有誰伸援手？危險我主保祐，快拋救生索。

要敏捷、堅定，快拋救生索，你為何猶豫？你為何耽擱？
驚濤駭浪中，他即將沉沒，將救生艇開出，救主會掌舵。

波浪極險惡，快拋救生索，他已陷痛苦，你未經歷過；
災難如巨浪，誘惑似狂風，一轉眼間就把人捲入漩渦。

有待救之人，快拋救生索，拯救的良機將瞬間即過；
弟兄們！快來！救溺如救火，拋救生索救人，使他免沉沒。

副歌
快拋救生索，快拋救生索，有人陷苦海漩渦；
快拋救生索，快拋救生索，快救人，免他沉沒。

english_page_header: Hymn 462 - Hallelujah! What a Saviour
english_full_lyrics:
“Man of Sorrows,” what a name
For the Son of God who came
Ruined sinners to reclaim!
Hallelujah! What a Saviour!

Bearing shame and scoffing rude,
In my place condemned He stood;
Sealed my pardon with His blood.
Hallelujah! What a Saviour!

Lifted up was He to die, 
“It is finished,” was His cry;
Now in heav'n exalted high.
Hallelujah! What a Saviour!

When He comes, our glorious King,
All His ransomed home to bring,
Then anew His song we’ll sing:
Hallelujah! What a Saviour!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 462 首 - 哈利路亞，奇妙君王
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
天父愛子由天降，拯救罪人免淪亡，
竟然為我擔憂患，哈利路亞，奇妙君王！

受盡羞辱與悽涼，代替我罪苦難擔，
藉主寶血罪洗清，哈利路亞，奇妙君王！

被釘十架生命王，完成救恩回天上，
今在高天榮美城，哈利路亞，奇妙君王！

祂再臨是榮耀王，迎接聖徒回天堂，
那時新歌一同唱，哈利路亞，奇妙君王！

english_page_header: Hymn 463 - Rejoice and Be Glad
english_full_lyrics:
Rejoice and be glad!
The Redeemer has come!
Go look on His cradle,
His cross, and His tomb.

Rejoice and be glad!
It is sunshine at last!
The clouds have departed,
the shadows are past.

Rejoice and be glad!
For the blood hath been shed;
Redemption is finished,
the price hath been paid.

Rejoice and be glad!
Now the pardon is free!
The Just for the unjust
has died on the tree.

Rejoice and be glad!
For the Lamb that was slain
O’er death is triumphant,
and liveth again.

Rejoice and be glad!
For our King is on high,
He pleadeth for us on
His throne in the sky.

Rejoice and be glad!
For He cometh again;
He cometh in glory,
the Lamb that was slain.

REFRAIN
1-6
Sound His praises, tell the
story Of Him Who was slain;
Sound His praises,
tell with gladness,
He liveth again.

7
Sound His praises, tell the
story Of Him Who was slain;
Sound His praises,
tell with gladness,
He cometh again.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 463 首 - 當歡欣喜樂
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
當歡欣喜樂！救主耶穌降臨，請看馬槽、十架和已空之墳。

當歡欣喜樂！公義日光照臨，那烏雲已消逝，再也無死蔭！

當歡欣喜樂！聖潔寶血流盡，主救贖已完成，贖價亦付清。

當歡欣喜樂！神願赦免罪人，差耶穌釘十架，寶血洗罪行。

當歡欣喜樂！因那受害羔羊，是生命復活主，已勝過死亡。

當歡欣喜樂！中保祭司在天，日日為人祈求於寶座右邊。

當歡欣喜樂！因主快要再來，逾越節的羔羊，將榮耀再臨。

副歌
稱頌讚美，竭力宣揚，主代我受刑；
稱頌讚美，欣然宣告，我主已得勝！

(七)
稱頌讚美，竭力宣揚，主代我受刑；
稱頌讚美，欣然宣告，我主必再臨！

english_page_header: Hymn 464- Faith of Our Fathers
english_full_lyrics:
Faith of our fathers, living still
In spite of dungeon, fire, and sword,
O how our hearts beat high with joy
Whene’er we hear that glorious Word!

Faith of our fathers, we will strive
To win all nations unto thee,
And through the truth that comes from God,
We all shall then be truly free.

Faith of our fathers, we will love
Both friend and foe in all our strife,
And preach thee, too, as love knows how
By kindly words and virtuous life.

REFRAIN
Faith of our fathers, holy faith!
We will be true to thee till death.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 464 首 - 先賢所信
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
先賢所信，萬世永存，火焚不懼，刀下猶生。
每當思念先賢所行，心中立覺踴躍奮興！
先賢所信，聖潔堅貞，我願至死堅守此信。

先賢所信，我願宣講，傳於列邦，吸引萬民。
自由真理本出於神，世人若信，靈命永存。
先賢所信，聖潔堅貞，我願至死堅守此信。

先賢所信，我願傳揚，愛敵與友，不避危困；
行為可親，言語溫馴，善用愛心，廣傳此信。
先賢所信，聖潔堅貞，我願至死堅守此信。

english_page_header: Hymn 465 - Go Tell It on the Mountain
english_full_lyrics:
When I was a seeker, I sought both night and day;
I asked the Lord to help me, and He showed me the way.

He made me a watchman Upon a city wall,
And if I am a Christian, I am the least of all.

D.C.
Go tell it on the mountain,
Over the hills and ev’rywhere;
Go tell it on the mountain,
That Jesus Christ is born!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 465 首 - 到各山嶺去傳揚
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
到各山嶺去傳揚，越過山崗到各地方，
到各山嶺去傳揚，說基督已臨降。
不論黑夜白晝，我追尋又探訪，
我祈求耶穌幫助，祂指示我方向。
到各山嶺去傳揚，越過山崗到各地方，
到各山嶺去傳揚，說基督已臨降。

到各山嶺去傳揚，越過山崗到各地方，
到各山嶺去傳揚，說基督已臨降。
主派我做守望，登高站在城牆。
雖然只是主小羊，我願為主發光。
到各山嶺去傳揚，越過山崗到各地方，
到各山嶺去傳揚，說基督已臨降。

english_page_header: Hymn 466 - When Morning Gilds the Skies
english_full_lyrics:
When morning gilds the skies,
My heart awaking cries:
May Jesus Christ be praised!
Alike at work and prayer,
To Jesus I repair:
May Jesus Christ be praised!

Whene’er the sweet church bell
Peals over hill and dell,
May Jesus Christ be praised!
O hark to what it sings,
As joyously it rings,
May Jesus Christ be praised!

The night becomes as day,
When from the heart we say:
May Jesus Christ be praised!
The pow’rs of darkness fear,
When this sweet chant they hear:
May Jesus Christ be praised!

In heav'n's eternal bliss
The loveliest strain is this,
May Jesus Christ be praised!
Let earth, and sea, and sky
From depth to height reply,
May Jesus Christ be praised!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 466 首 - 讚美耶穌基督
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
晨光燦爛耀空，我靈甦醒歌頌。
讚美耶穌基督！或祈禱、或作工，
我心仰望耶穌，讚美耶穌基督！

會堂鐘鳴處處，聲音響遍山谷。
讚美耶穌基督！傾聽悠揚音符，
快樂信息鼓舞，讚美耶穌基督！

當黑夜變白晝，我心快樂呼求。
讚美耶穌基督！詠唱聖詩良久，
黑暗權勢消除，讚美耶穌基督！

天城永恆歌曲，是最優美旋律。
讚美耶穌基督！穹蒼海洋歡喜，
萬有應聲歡呼，讚美耶穌基督！

english_page_header: Hymn 467 - His Promise to Me
english_full_lyrics:
Darkness may o’ertake me
and my song forsake me,
But alone I never shall be;
For the Friend beside me
promised He would guide me
And will keep His promise to me.

Should misfortune meet me,
friends may fail to greet me,
But if true to Jesus I stay,
He will still uphold me,
let His love enfold me
Ev’ry dreary mile of the way.

How the tho’t enthralls me
that whate’er befalls me,
One will always love me the same;
Not a trial ever causes Him to sever
From the ones who honor His name.

REFRAIN
He will keep His promise to me,
All the way with me He will go;
He has never broken any promise spoken;
He will keep His promise, I know.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 467 首 - 主的應許
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
縱然黑暗環繞，晴空不再，但我深知我必永不孤單。
有一良友必要永遠領我，祂的應許必會成就周全。

災禍速臨我身，親友離開，但我必要緊緊跟隨我主。
祂以恩臂扶持、大愛懷抱，領我前程，度過黑暗險阻。

雖然荊棘滿途，世事無常，主必不會掩面，祂必看顧。
無論何時何地，主愛不離，我要尊崇讚美慈悲救主。

副歌
祂必信守應許之言，不論前途有多艱險；
祂必信守應許絕不落空，祂必永遠信守應許之言。

english_page_header: Hymn 468 - Precious Memories
english_full_lyrics:
Precious mem'ries, unseen angels,
Sent from somewhere to my soul;
How they linger, ever near me,
And the sacred past unfold.

Precious father, loving mother,
Fly across the lonely years;
And old home scenes of my childhood,
In fond memory appears.

In the stillness of the midnight,
Echoes from the past I hear;
Old time singing, gladness bringing,
From that lovely land somewhere.

As I travel on life’s pathway,
Know not what the years may hold;
As I ponder, hope grows fonder,
Precious mem’ries flood my soul.

REFRAIN
Precious mem'ries, how they linger,
How they ever flood my soul.
In the stillness of the midnight,
Precious, sacred scenes unfold.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 468 首 - 寶貴回憶
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
蒙主賜下寶貴回憶，時刻滋潤我心田。
日夜思想歷歷在目，過往見證在眼前。

慈愛父母、溫暖家庭，寂寞歲月伴我行。
家鄉事物，童年情景，記憶浮現在我心。

寂靜深夜思緒迴旋，昔日往事湧心田。
記憶徘徊，喜樂再現，一切美好如在天。

品嘗甘苦，經歷人間，未來時日主恩眷。
當我沉思，盼望更堅，寶貴回憶溢心間。

副歌
寶貴回憶，歷歷在前，如潮湧入我心田。
寂靜深夜，思緒迴旋過往見證在眼前。

english_page_header: Hymn 469 - Jesus Loves the Little Children
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus loves the children dear,
Them He blessed when He was here:
And He never turned the little ones away:
But He said, “forbid them not.”
Bring the precious little tot,
E’en the dusky little heathen far away.

Many thousand die each day,
In the countries far away;
Who have never heard of Jesus and His love:
Let us pray, and give, and go,
That these little ones may know
Of the glory that’s awaiting them above.

When their infant voices raise
In the dear Redeemer’s praise,
And the hosts of heaven join in glad acclaim,
When we crown Him Lord and King,
All the earth with joy shall ring,
And rejoice at mention of the Saviour’s name.

Let us tell the story o’er
Till it reaches ev'ry shore,
And the gospel has been heard in ev'ry land:
Till in ev'ry tribe and tongue
Our Redeemer’s praise is sung,
Oh, the great redemption chorus- ’twill be grand!

REFRAIN
Jesus loves the little children,
All the children of the world,
Brown and yellow, black and white,
All are precious in His sight,
Jesus loves the little children of the world.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 469 首 - 靈恩大會
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
靈恩大會今開了，弟兄、姊妹全來到，
靜聽真道，專心、誠實做禱告；
各樣俗事全拋棄，一切雜念都丟掉，
虛心、迫切祈求聖靈快臨到。

聖靈降臨真奇妙，各樣恩賜都顯照，
方言、靈歌、靈笑、靈哭、靈舞蹈；
如鴿、如風、如火舌，又如江河水滔滔，
賞賜力量，醫病、趕鬼傳真道。

聖靈功能像火燒，能把我們重改造，
除去污穢、洗去雜質，成美好；
啟迪我們明真道，代替我們做禱告，
加添力量，幫助我們行天道。

副歌
聖靈乃是無價寶，世界上無處可找；
得了聖靈真快樂，可到天堂真美好；
我們大家都要求這真至寶。

english_page_header: Hymn 470 - Have You Counted the Cost?
english_full_lyrics:
There’s a line that is drawn by rejecting our Lord,
Where the call of His Spirit is lost,
And you hurry along with the pleasure-mad throng-
Have you counted, have you counted the cost?

You may barter your hope of eternity’s morn,
For a moment of joy at the most,
For the glitter of sin and the things it will win-
Have you counted, have you counted the cost?

While the door of His mercy is open to you,
Ere the depth of His love you exhaust,
Won’t you come and be healed, won’t you whisper, I yield-
I have counted, I have counted the cost?

REFRAIN
Have you counted the cost, if your soul should be lost,
Though you gain the whole world for your own?
Even now it may be that the line you have crossed,
Have you counted, have you counted the cost?
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 470 首 - 如果棄絕救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
如果棄絕救主，勢必越過界線，從此聽不見聖靈呼喚；
若只隨波逐流，盲目取樂追歡，細想：樂盡悲來，是否合算？

逸樂不過一時，痛苦卻是永遠，罪海最無情，回頭是岸；
隨從罪情一點，喪失永福無限，細想：貪小失大，是否合算？

趁著得救門開，恩典日期未滿，不要再奔向地獄邊緣；
應當聽主呼喚，悔改信靠耶穌，出死入生，此乃無比妙算。

副歌
神的寶貴真理就是分明界線，越此界線即地獄邊緣；
靈魂若是喪失，得全世界何益？權衡輕重，得失應當明白。

english_page_header: Hymn 471 - I'd Rather Have Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
I’d rather have Jesus than silver or gold,
I’d rather be His than have riches untold;
I’d rather have Jesus than houses or lands,
I’d rather be led by His nail-pierced hand.

I’d rather have Jesus than men’s applause,
I’d rather be faithful to His dear cause;
I’d rather have Jesus than worldwide fame,
I’d rather be true to His holy name.

He’s fairer than lilies of rarest bloom,
He’s sweeter than honey from out the comb;
He’s all that my hungering spirit needs,
I’d rather have Jesus and let Him lead.

REFRAIN
Than to be the king of a vast domain
Or be held in sin’s dread sway.
I’d rather have Jesus than anything
This world affords today.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 471 首 - 我寧願有耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我寧願有耶穌，不要金錢；我寧願屬主，不顧財富無邊；
我寧願有耶穌，不要房產；我寧願讓祂釘傷手扶攙。

我寧願有耶穌，不要虛榮；我寧願盡忠，終生做主聖工；
我寧願有耶穌，不要美名；我寧願忠誠宣揚主聖名。

主遠比百合花美麗、鮮豔，祂更比新鮮下滴的蜜甘甜；
我飢渴的心靈，急需要祂；我願有耶穌，終生跟隨祂。

副歌
不願做君王統治四海，卻被罪權所苦害；
我寧願有耶穌，不要塵世任何繁華、光榮。

english_page_header: Hymn 472 - No One Ever Cared for Me Like Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
I would love to tell you what I think of Jesus,
Since I found in Him a friend so strong and true;
I would tell you how He changed my life completely,
He did something that no other friend could do.

All my life was full of sin when Jesus found me,
All my heart was full of misery and woe;
Jesus placed His strong and loving arms about me,
And He led me in the way I ought to go.

REFRAIN
No one ever cared for me like Jesus,
There’s no other friend so kind as He;
No one else could take the sin and darkness from me,
O how much He cared for me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 472 首 - 主是罪人的朋友
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
讓我向你述說主耶穌的慈愛：祂曾離棄天上榮耀大寶座，
祂曾被釘在十架上流血捨命；為要拯救眾罪人出死入生。

讓我向你述說主如何憐憫我:祂曾來尋找我失喪的靈魂，
祂曾洗淨我眾罪污在祂血裡；為要使我完全成聖進神國。

副歌
無人像耶穌這樣愛罪人，無人像主這樣憐憫我；
主是罪人的朋友，永遠不改變，只要你切實悔改。

english_page_header: Hymn 473 - Great Is Thy Faithfulness
english_full_lyrics:
Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father,
There is no shadow of turning with Thee;
Thou changest not, Thy compassions, they fail not;
As Thou hast been Thou forever wilt be.

Summer and winter, and springtime and harvest,
Sun, moon, and stars in their courses above
Join with all nature in manifold witness
To Thy great faithfulness, mercy, and love.

Pardon for sin and a peace that endureth,
Thine own dear presence to cheer and to guide;
Strength for today and bright hope for tomorrow,
Blessings all mine, with ten thousand beside!

REFRAIN
Great is Thy faithfulness!
Great is Thy faithfulness!
Morning by morning new mercies I see;
All I have needed Thy hand hath provided;
Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 473 首 - 你信實何廣大
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
祢信實何廣大，我天父真神，祢恩愛不間斷，常存不息。
祢始終不改變，未如影轉移，自太初到永遠恆常不易。

春夏秋冬四季，栽種和收成，眾星、太陽、月亮運行天空。
宇宙萬有一切都做袮見證，信實恩典、慈愛廣大無窮。

袮赦免我罪過，賜永遠平安，每日與我同在，扶持引領。
今天賜我力量，明日有盼望，使我福杯滿溢，主恩豐盈。

副歌
祢信實何廣大，祢信實何廣大，每日清晨得嚐袮新恩惠。
主！我所需一切，袮手已預備，祢信實何廣大，我親體會。

english_page_header: Hymn 474 - How Great Thou Art
english_full_lyrics:
O Lord my God! When I in awesome wonder
Consider all the worlds Thy hands have made,
I see the stars, I hear the rolling thunder,
Thy pow’r throughout the universe displayed,

When through the woods and forest glades I wander
And hear the birds sing sweetly in the trees;
When I look down from lofty mountain grandeur
And hear the brook and feel the gentle breeze;

And when I think that God, His Son not sparing,
Sent Him to die, I scarce can take it in;
That on the cross, my burden gladly bearing,
He bled and died to take away my sin;

When Christ shall come with shout of acclamation
And take me home, what joy shall fill my heart!
Then I shall bow in humble adoration
And there proclaim, my God, how great Thou art!

REFRAIN
Then sings my soul, my Saviour God to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!
Then sings my soul, my Saviour God to Thee;
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 474 首 - 袮真偉大
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主阿，我神！我每逢舉目觀看，袮手所造一切奇妙大工；
看見星宿，又聽到隆隆雷聲，袮的大工遍滿了宇宙中。

漫步森林，樹蔭下花開如錦，樹上飛鳥歌聲清脆動人。
佇立山頭，俯視那群山環繞，溪水潺潺，微風輕拂歡欣。

當我想到，神竟願差祂愛子，降世捨命，我竟無法體會；
主在十架，願背負我的重擔，流血捨身為赦免我的罪。

當主再來，歡呼聲響徹天空，何等喜樂，主接我回天家。
我要敬拜，在主前謙恭跪下，並要頌揚：「神阿，袮真偉大！」

副歌
我靈歌唱，讚美救主我神；袮真偉大，何等偉大！
我靈歌唱，讚美救主我神；袮真偉大，何等偉大！

english_page_header: Hymn 475 - Glorious Is Thy Name
english_full_lyrics:
Blessed Saviour, we adore Thee,
We Thy love and grace proclaim;
Thou art mighty, Thou art holy,
Glorious is Thy matchless name!

Great Redeemer, Lord and Master,
Light of all eternal days;
Let the saints of ev’ry nation
Sing Thy just and endless praise!

From the throne of heaven’s glory
To the cross of sin and shame,
Thou didst come to die a ransom
Guilty sinners to reclaim.

REFRAIN
Glorious, Glorious,
Glorious is Thy name, O Lord!
Glorious, Glorious,
Glorious is Thy name, O Lord!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 475 首 - 榮耀歸於主聖名
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
親愛救主，我敬拜袮，傳揚袮慈愛救恩；
全能至大，聖潔無暇，榮耀歸於主聖名。

耶穌基督，我主我神，袮是真光永輝煌；
普天之下萬國萬民，齊來頌揚天上王。

捨棄天上榮耀寶座，甘願受辱十架上；
為要拯救世人靈魂，情願代死苦杯嚐。

副歌
榮耀，榮耀，榮耀歸於主聖名！
榮耀，榮耀，榮耀歸於主聖名！

english_page_header: Hymn 476 - Surely Goodness and Mercy
english_full_lyrics:
A pilgrim was I and awand’ring,
In the cold night of sin I did roam,
When Jesus the kind Shepherd found me,
And now I am on my way home.

He restoreth my soul when I’m weary,
He giveth me strength day by day;
He leads me beside the still waters,
He guards me each step of the way.

When I walk thro’ the dark lonesome valley,
My Saviour will walk with me there;
And safely His great hand will lead me
To the mansions He’s gone to prepare.

REFRAIN
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
All the days, all the days of my life;
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
All the days, all the days of my life.

3 D.C.
And I shall dwell in the house of the Lord forever,
And I shall feast at the table spread for me;
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
All the days, all the days of my life.
All the days, all the days of my life.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 476 首 - 必有恩惠與慈愛
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我是客旅，我是流浪者，我在黑暗罪惡中徘徊；
當慈愛主耶穌找到我，引領我向父家歸回。

我疲倦時，祂使我振作，每日祂賜力量給我；
祂領我到安靜的水邊，又保守我腳步穩妥。

當我走過寂寞的幽谷，救主領我行走天路；
祂大能手引領又保護，到主預備永久住處。

副歌
一生一世我必有恩惠、慈愛隨著我，直到永永遠遠。
一生一世我必有恩惠、慈愛隨著我，直到永永遠遠。

D.C.
且要住在至高神的殿中到永遠；敵人面前祂為我擺設筵席。
一生一世我必有恩惠、慈愛隨著我，直到永永遠遠。
到永遠，直到永永遠遠。

english_page_header: Hymn 477 - Then Jesus Came
english_full_lyrics:
One sat alone beside the highway begging,
His eyes were blind, the light he could not see;
He clutched his rags and shivered in the shadows,
Then Jesus came and bade his darkness flee.

From home and friends the evil spirits drove him,
Among the tombs he dwelt in misery;
He cut himself as demon pow’rs possessed him,
Then Jesus came and set the captive free.

REFRAIN
When Jesus comes the tempter’s pow’r is broken,
When Jesus comes the tears are wiped away;
He takes the gloom and fills the life with glory,
For all is changed when Jesus comes to stay.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 477 首 - 耶穌一來
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
孤單可憐，一乞丐坐在路旁，雙目失明，不能看見亮光；
緊握破衣，黑暗中戰競哀傷，耶穌一來，使他得見亮光。

昔有一人，被污鬼附在身上，離別親友，獨住山墳淒涼；
傷害己身，惡者將他緊捆綁，耶穌一來，他得自由釋放。

副歌
耶穌一來，撒旦權勢難猖狂，耶穌一來，抹去眼淚滿眶；
除去幽暗，祂使萬物得更新；耶穌一來，生命充滿亮光。

english_page_header: Hymn 478 - Because He Lives
english_full_lyrics:
God sent His Son, they called Him Jesus,
He came to love, heal and forgive;
He lived and died to buy my pardon,
An empty grave is there to prove my Saviour lives.

How sweet to hold a newborn baby,
And feel the pride, and joy He gives;
But greater still the calm assurance.
This child can face uncertain days because He lives.

And then one day I’ll cross the river,
I’ll fight life’s final war with pain;
And then as death gives way to vict'ry,
I’ll see the lights of glory and I’ll know He lives.

REFRAIN
1,2
Because He lives I can face tomorrow,
Because He lives all fear is gone;
Because I know He holds the future.
And life is worth the living just because He lives.

3
Because He lives I can face tomorrow;
Because He lives all fear is gone;
Because I know He holds the future,
And life is worth the living just because He lives!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 478 首 - 因祂活著
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
神差愛子，名稱為耶穌，為愛降生，醫治、寬恕；
為贖我罪主釘死十架，空墳墓更證明我救主仍活著。

新生嬰孩，在慈母懷裡，何等安詳，令人欣喜；
我也確信這幼小生命，必能夠面對明天因祂仍活著。

當我走完人生的路程，面對死亡，痛苦爭戰；
救主為我已戰勝死權，榮光中見我救主因祂仍活著。

副歌
因祂活著，我能面對明天；因祂活著，不再懼怕。
我深知道，祂掌管明天，生命充滿了希望，只因祂活著。

english_page_header: Hymn 479 - O How He Loves You and Me
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 479 首 - 祂何等愛你
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主耶穌何等愛你，主耶穌何等愛我；
祂的生命賜給你和我。
祂何等愛你、祂何等愛我，
祂何等愛你，愛我。

主捨命在各各他，為愛世人釘十架；
復活升天，賜永生盼望。
祂何等愛你、祂何等愛我，
祂何等愛你，愛我。

english_page_header: Hymn 480 - Wonderful, Wonderful Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
There is never a day so dreary,
There is never a night so long,
But the soul that is trusting Jesus
Will somewhere find a song.

There is never a cross so heavy,
There is never a weight of woe,
But that Jesus will help to carry
Because He loveth so.

There is never a care or burden,
There is never a grief or loss,
But that Jesus in love will lighten
When carried to the cross.

There is never a guilty sinner,
There is never a wand’ring one,
But that God can in mercy pardon
Through Jesus Christ, His Son.

REFRAIN
Wonderful, wonderful Jesus,
In the heart He implanteth a song:
A song of deliv’rance, of courage, of strength;
In the heart He implanteth a song.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 480 首 - 奇妙的耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
雖然有時候日子淒涼，黑夜漫長何時天亮，
只要你全心倚靠耶穌，必能隨時歌唱。

雖然有時候十架沉重，痛苦如重擔壓心中，
救主耶穌必幫助擔當，因祂慈愛無窮。

雖然有掛慮，心靈煩惱，悲哀與失落常臨到，
只要你提到主十架前，主必安慰、引導。

世上眾罪人天父垂憐，一切迷路者祂顧念，
只要你信靠神子耶穌，必蒙憐恤、赦免。

副歌
奇妙的，奇妙的耶穌，祂使我心靈快樂歌唱；
歌唱主賜力量，使我得釋放，祂使我心靈快樂歌唱。

english_page_header: Hymn 481 - He Lives
english_full_lyrics:
I serve a risen Saviour, He’s in the world today;
I know that He is living, whatever men may say;
I see His hand of mercy, I hear His voice of cheer,
And just the time I need Him He’s always near.

In all the world around me I see His loving care,
And though my heart grows weary I never will despair;
I know that He is leading through all the stormy blast,
The day of His appearing will come at last.

Rejoice, rejoice, O Christian, lift up your voice and sing
Eternal hallelujahs to Jesus Christ the King!
The hope of all who seek Him, the help of all who find,
None other is so loving, so good and kind.

REFRAIN
He lives, He lives, Christ Jesus lives today!
He walks with me and talks with me
along life’s narrow way.
He lives, He lives; salvation to impart!
You ask me how I know He lives:
He lives within my heart.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 481 首 - 祂活著
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我所侍奉復活主，祂常伴我身旁，
我知祂確實活著，不論人怎麼講。
見祂慈手施憐恤，聽聞祂安慰聲，
每次當我呼求祂，總必答應。

在我的生活當中，主愛常在我旁，
雖有時心中愁煩，但我永不失望。
我知救主引領我，衝破狂風巨浪，
那日我主必再來，從天而降。

聖徒歡欣又喜樂，同心高聲頌揚，
齊歌頌：「哈利路亞」，讚美基督我王。
尋找救主就尋見，祈求必得幫忙，
無人堪比主大愛、仁慈、善良。

副歌
基督，耶穌，祂已活在我心，
祂與我談，祂伴我走，生命窄路同行。
基督，耶穌，救恩臨到萬民，
若問我怎知祂活著，因祂活在我心。

english_page_header: Hymn 482 - Victory in Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
I heard an old, old story,
how a Saviour came from glory,
How He gave His life on Calvary
to save a wretch like me;
I heard about His groaning,
of His precious blood’s atoning.
Then I repented of my sins
and won the victory.

I heard about His healing,
of His cleansing pow’r revealing,
How He made the lame to walk again
and caused the blind to see;
And then I cried, “dear Jesus,
come and heal my broken spirit.”
And somehow Jesus came and
bought to me the victory.

I heard about a mansion
He has built for me in glory,
And I heard about the streets of gold
beyond the crystal sea;
About the angels singing,
and the old redemption story,
And some sweet day I’ll sing
up there the song of victory.

REFRAIN
O Victory in Jesus,
my Saviour, forever,
He sought me and bought me
with His redeeming blood;
He loved me ere I knew Him,
and all my love is due Him,
He plunged me to victory,
beneath the cleansing flood.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 482 首 - 靠主耶穌得勝
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我曾聽過一故事，救主如何由天降臨，
祂曾捨生命在各各他，為救我這罪人；
我聽見祂低呻吟，流出寶血贖我罪行，
我憂傷痛悔呼求神，靠主耶穌得勝。

祂曾在世行奇事，顯出祂的醫治大能，
祂使瘸腿的跳躍行走，瞎眼能看美景；
我呼求祂：「主耶穌，醫治我破碎的心靈。」
主耶穌恩手懷抱我，靠主我必得勝。

我深信主在天堂為我預備榮耀天庭，
遙遠望見那明亮天家，黃金街、碧玉城；
好像聽見眾天使，仍高唱救恩的故事，
到那日我必在那邊，同唱凱歌得勝。

副歌
靠主耶穌我救主，必永遠能得勝。
主慈愛尋找我，賜我贖罪救恩。
我深知道祂愛我，我願全心愛耶穌。
主寶血已潔淨我，使我永遠得勝。

english_page_header: Hymn 483 - Breathe on Me
english_full_lyrics:
Holy Spirit, breathe on me,
Until my heart is clean;
Let sunshine fill its inmost part,
With not a cloud between.

Holy Spirit, breathe on me,
My stubborn will subdue;
Teach me in words of living flame
What Christ would have me do.

Holy Spirit, breathe on me,
Fill me with pow'r divine;
Kindle a flame of love and zeal
Within this heart of mine.

Holy Spirit, breathe on me,
Till I am all Thine own,
Until my will is lost in Thine,
To live for Thee alone.

REFRAIN
Breathe on me, breathe on me,
Holy Spirit, breathe on me;
Take Thou my heart, cleanse ev'ry part,
Holy Spirit, breathe on me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 483 首 - 懇求聖靈充滿我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
懇求聖靈充滿我，直到心潔如玉，
讓光輝照遍我心底，除去烏雲遮蔽。

懇求聖靈充滿我，使頑固變謙虛，
教我活潑生命道理，使我遵主旨意。

懇求聖靈充滿我，神聖權能滿溢，
點燃起火熱愛主心，深深烙印心裡。

懇求聖靈充滿我，直到我全屬祢，
更顯專為恩主而活，主旨做我心意。

副歌
充滿我，充滿我，懇求聖靈充滿我，
洗滌我心，潔淨我靈，懇求聖靈充滿我。

english_page_header: Hymn 484 - Have Faith in God
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 484 首 - 當信服神
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
當信服神，即使你路途孤寂，祂眷顧你，留意你的腳步。
你雖弱小，祂未曾忽略不顧。當信服神，當信服神。

當信服神，即使你未得回應，祂未忘記你的恆切呼聲。
堅心等候，深信祂寶貴應允，當信服神，當信服神。

當信服神，即使你憂傷、痛苦，祂能體恤你失望的淚痕。
完全交託，只仰望救主憐憫，祂必施恩，祂必施恩。

當信服神，即使人對你失信，當信服神，祂必開啟恩門。
世事滄桑，主慈愛永不變更，當信服神，當信服神。

副歌
當信服神，祂得尊榮；當信服神，祂正看顧、施恩；
凡神兒女，靠祂得勝，當信服神，當信服神。
