english_page_header: Hymn 485 - I Know Who Holds Tomorrow
english_full_lyrics:
I don’t know about tomorrow,
I just live from day to day.
I don’t borrow from its sunshine,
For its skies may turn to gray.
I don’t worry o’er the future,
For I know what Jesus said,
And today I’ll walk beside Him,
For He knows what is ahead.

Ev’ry step is getting brighter,
As the golden stairs I climb;
Ev’ry burden’s getting lighter;
Ev’ry cloud is silver lined.
There the sun is always shining,
There no tear will dim the eye,
At the ending of the rainbow,
Where the mountains touch the sky.

I don’t know about tomorrow,
It may bring me poverty;
But the one who feeds the sparrow,
Is the one who stands by me,
And the path that be my portion,
May be through the flame or flood,
But His presence goes before me,
And I’m covered with His blood.

REFRAIN
Many things about tomorrow,
I don’t seem to understand;
But I know who holds tomorrow,
And I know who holds my hand.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 485 首 - 我知誰掌管明天
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我不知明天的道路，每一天只為主活；
我不借明天的太陽，因明天或許陰暗。
我不要為將來憂慮，因為信主的應許；
我今天要與主同行，因祂知前面如何。

每一步越走越光明，像攀登黃金階梯；
每重擔越挑越輕省，每朵雲披上銀衣。
在那裡陽光常普照，在那裡沒有哭泣；
在美麗彩虹的盡頭，眾山嶺與天連起。

我不知明天的道路，因明天或遇困苦；
小麻雀既蒙主養活，我深信祂必眷顧。
在奔跑人生的旅途，雖經過死蔭幽谷；
但救主必與我同住，祂寶血將我救贖。

副歌
有許多未來的事情；我現在不能識透；
但我知誰掌管明天，我也知誰牽我手。

english_page_header: Hymn 486 - I Need Jesus
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 486 首 - 我需要耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我要耶穌，我真需要耶穌，在憂愁時，無朋友像我主。
我要耶穌，我喜歡親近主，雖有人獨自背重負，但我要耶穌。

我要耶穌，引領我走天路，在幽暗中，祂必引導保護。
我要耶穌，我遇敵受困苦，我若靠自己必失敗，故我要耶穌。

我要耶穌，我一生需要主，無人像主，祂將罪人救贖。
我要耶穌，急難時需要主，因主是慈愛和信實，故我要耶穌。

副歌
我要耶穌，我要耶穌，每日我需要耶穌。
光明時日需要祂，黑雲滿佈需要祂，每日在我生命中，我需要耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 487 - In Times Like These
english_full_lyrics:
In times like these you need a Saviour,
In times like these you need an anchor;
Be very sure, be very sure
Your anchor holds and grips the Solid Rock!

In times like these you need the Bible,
In times like these, Oh, be not idle;
Be very sure, be very sure
Your anchor holds and grips the Solid Rock!

In times like these I have a Saviour,
In times like these I have an anchor;
I’m very sure, I’m very sure
My anchor holds and grips the Solid Rock!

REFRAIN
This Rock is Jesus,
Yes, He’s the One; This Rock is Jesus, The only One!
Be very sure, be very sure
Your anchor holds and grips the Solid Rock!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 487 首 - 在這時候
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在這時候，你需要救主，當你茫然，有主來引導；
極其牢靠，永不動搖，因你站在穩固的盤石上。

在這時候，你需要真理，應當奮起，固守主真道；
極其牢靠，永不動搖，因你站在穩固的盤石上。

在這時候，主與你同在，狂風暴雨，主是堅固錨；
極其牢靠，永不動搖，因你站在穩固的盤石上。

副歌
耶穌是盤石，祂拯救你；是惟一盤石，永不動搖；
極其牢靠，永不動搖，因你站在穩固的盤石上。

english_page_header: Hymn 488 - The Nail-Scarred Hand
english_full_lyrics:
Have you failed in your plan of your storm-tossed life?
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;
Are you weary and worn from its toil and strife?
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

Are you walking alone through the shadows dim?
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;
Christ will comfort your heart, put your trust in Him,
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

Would you follow the will of the risen Lord?
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;
Would you live in the light of His blessed Word?
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

Is your soul burdened down with its load of sin?
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;
Throw your heart open wide, let the Saviour in,
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.

REFRAIN
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand,
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand;
He will keep to the end, He’s your dearest friend,
Place your hand in the nail-scarred hand.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 488 首 - 主釘痕手
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
你是否生命中曾遭遇失敗？用你手牽主釘痕手；
你是否掙扎中疲乏受苦害？用你手牽主釘痕手。

你是否獨自在黑暗中行走？用你手牽主釘痕手；
信靠主祂必定安慰與保佑，用你手牽主釘痕手。

你是否願意來順從主旨意？用你手牽主釘痕手；
你可願生活在祂的應許裡？用你手牽主釘痕手。

你是否心靈中曾被罪苦害？用你手牽主釘痕手；
你心門快敞開，讓救主進來，用你手牽主釘痕手。

副歌
用你手牽主釘痕手，用你手牽主釘痕手，
祂是你好朋友，至終都保守，用你手牽主釘痕手。

english_page_header: Hymn 489 - In My Heart There Rings a Melody
english_full_lyrics:
I have a song that Jesus gave me,
It was sent from heav’n above;
There never was a sweeter melody, 
’Tis a melody of love.

I love the Christ who died on Calv’ry,
For He washed my sins away;
He put within my heart a melody,
And I know it’s there to stay.

’Twill be my endless theme in glory,
With the angels I will sing; 
’Twill be a song with glorious harmony,
When the courts of heaven ring.

REFRAIN
In my heart there rings a melody,
There rings a melody with heaven’s harmony;
In my heart there rings a melody;
There rings a melody of love.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 489 首 - 我心常吟讚美詩
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主耶穌賜下一首詩歌，從天上賞賜給我；
從未有如此甜美天上曲，真是奇妙愛之歌。

我愛主，因祂擔我罪過，赦免我罪洗淨我；
真快樂，因祂住在我心裡，時時歡唱讚美歌。

在那日進入榮耀時刻，與眾天使同唱和；
這時有美妙樂音齊迴響，同在寶座前唱歌。

副歌
在我心裡常吟讚美詩歌，常吟奇妙詩歌，天使同唱和；
在我心裡常吟讚美詩歌，常吟奇妙愛之歌。

english_page_header: Hymn 490 - Sooner or Later
english_full_lyrics:
Sooner or later the skies will be bright,
Tears will be all wiped away;
Sooner or later, then cometh the light,
Night will be turned into day.

Sooner or later, our Lord knows the hour,
He’ll send His beloved Son;
Sooner or later, in His might and pow’r,
Our battles all will be won.

Sooner or later, yes, sooner for some,
Darkness will all then be past;
Sooner or later our Saviour will come,
With Him will your lot be cast?

REFRAIN
Sooner or later cares will have flown,
Sunshine and gladness we’ll see;
Sooner or later God calleth His own,
With Him forever to be.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 490 首 - 主必再來
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主再來，諸天將大放光明，不再有眼淚憂愁。
主再來，榮光要普照宇宙，黑夜將變成白晝。

主再來，那時候祂已預定，我救主親自降臨。
主再來，祂權柄旨意成全，得勝利救恩完成。

主再來，我主就必快再來！污穢與罪惡不再。
主再來，我主就必快再來。你是否做好安排？

副歌
主必再來，我主必再來，將要見主的光彩。
主再來，眾聖徒都要改變，永遠與救主同在。

english_page_header: Hymn 491 - Thank You, Lord
english_full_lyrics:
Some thank the Lord for friends and home,
For mercies sure and sweet;
But I would praise Him for His grace,
In prayer I would repeat.

Some thank Him for the flow’rs that grow,
Some for the stars that shine;
My heart is filled with joy and praise,
Because I know He’s mine.

I trust in Him from day to day,
I prove His saving grace;
I’ll sing this song of praise to Him,
Until I see His face.

REFRAIN
Thank you, Lord, for saving my soul;
Thank you, Lord, for making me whole;
Thank you, Lord, for giving to me
Thy great salvation so rich and free.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 491 首 - 感恩歌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
有人為家庭、為朋友，感謝主常眷顧；
我卻因救恩歌頌祂，讓我再讚美主！

有人為百花、青草地，為群星感謝主；
我卻為主永屬於我，心喜樂口歡呼！

我日日信靠慈愛主，傳主恩典救贖；
我歌唱讚美主聖名，直到再見我主。

副歌
感謝主，拯救我靈魂；感謝主，使我得完全；
感謝主，白白賜給我豐豐富富的奇妙恩典。

english_page_header: Hymn 492 - Let Others See Jesus in You
english_full_lyrics:
While passing thro’ this world of sin,
And others your life shall view,
Be clean and pure without, within,
Let others see Jesus in you.

Your life’s a book before their eyes,
They’re reading it thro’ and thro’;
Say, does it point them to the skies,
Do others see Jesus in you?

What joy ’twill be at set of sun,
In mansions beyond the blue,
To find some souls that you have won;
Let others see Jesus in you.

Then live for Christ both day and night,
Be faithful, be brave and true,
And lead the lost to life and light;
Let others see Jesus in you.

REFRAIN
Let others see Jesus in you,
Let others see Jesus in you;
Keep telling the story, be faithful and true,
Let others see Jesus in you.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 492 首 - 從你認識耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
經過世上罪惡道路，你生活常受矚目，
應當裡外聖潔無瑕，讓人從你認識耶穌。

生活像書展在人前，被眾人時時閱讀，
你是否能引人歸主，是否從你認識耶穌？

當蒙召歸回天父家，所領靈魂都歸主，
何等喜樂，何等安慰！因人從你認識耶穌。

不論日夜為主而活，真誠忠勇像恩主，
引領人得生命真光，讓人從你認識耶穌。

副歌
讓人從你認識耶穌，讓人從你認識耶穌，
忠心誠意傳揚主耶穌救贖，讓人從你認識耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 493 - Into My Heart
english_full_lyrics:
Come into my heart, blessed Jesus,
Come into my heart, I pray;
My soul is so troubled and weary,
Come into my heart today.

Come into my heart, blessed Jesus,
I need Thee thro’ life’s dreary way;
The burden of sin is so heavy,
Come into my heart to stay.

Come into my heart, blessed Jesus,
And take all my guilt away;
Then spotless I’ll stand in Thy presence,
When breaks Thine eternal day.

Come into my heart, blessed Jesus,
O cleanse and illumine my soul;
Fill me with Thy wonderful Spirit,
Come in and take full control.

REFRAIN
Into my heart, into my heart,
Come into my heart, Lord Jesus;
Come in today, Come in to stay,
Come into my heart, Lord Jesus.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 493 首 - 求主進我心
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
請進我心親愛主耶穌，求主快快住進我心。
因我心靈飢渴又軟弱，求主現在進我心。

請進我心親愛主耶穌，求主領我天國路程。
我無力量負罪惡重擔，求救主與我同行。

請進我心親愛主耶穌，求主洗除所有罪污，
使我聖潔無瑕疵見主，到那日得享永福。

請進我心親愛主耶穌，求主光照潔淨我心，
求主賞賜奇妙的聖靈，充滿帶領我的心。

副歌
請主耶穌，請主耶穌，請救主耶穌進我心。
現在進來，永遠同在，請救主耶穌進我心。

english_page_header: Hymn 494 - Make Me a Blessing
english_full_lyrics:
Out in the highways and byways of life,
Many are weary and sad;
Carry the sunshine where darkness is rife,
Making the sorrowing glad.

Tell the sweet story of Christ and His love,
Tell of His pow’r to forgive;
Others will trust Him if only you prove
True, ev'ry moment you live.

Give as ’twas given to you in your need,
Love as the Master loved you;
Be to the helpless a helper indeed,
Unto your mission be true.

REFRAIN
Make me a blessing, Make me a blessing,
Out of my life May Jesus shine;
Make me a blessing, O Saviour, I pray,
Make me a blessing to someone today.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 494 首 - 藉我賜恩福
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
塵世間崎嶇的生命道路，多少人困倦悲苦；
當黑暗滿佈將真光照亮，使憂傷變為祝福。

述說主慈愛和奇妙故事，述說祂赦罪大能；
當見證主救恩，引人歸真，傳揚祂盡你一生。

白白地得來，要白白施與，愛人當像主愛你；
對無助軟弱者，盡力扶持，忠於主，始終如一。

副歌
藉我賜恩福，藉我賜恩福，藉我生命榮耀恩主。
藉我賜恩福，救主！聽我求，藉我賜恩福，他人得救贖。

english_page_header: Hymn 495 - Teach Me to Pray
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 495 首 - 教我祈禱
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
懇求我救主，教我祈禱，這是我心聲，晝夜求告；
渴望能明白神旨、真道；懇求我救主教我祈禱。

隨時多禱告，多有力量，因世界充滿罪惡悲傷；
許多人迷失、垂死、惆悵，隨時多禱告，多有力量。

我意志薄弱，主能復興，我罪惡本性主能導正，
主賜新力量，充滿我靈，有力量禱告，遵行主命。

懇求我救主教我祈禱，祢是我模範，天天領導，
祢是我中保，慈愛光照，懇求我救主教我祈禱。

副歌
願主常同住，永居我心，懇切祈求主永遠同住；
賜我有力量、自由、更新，有力量行道，緊隨恩主。

english_page_header: Hymn 496 - Serve the Lord with Gladness
english_full_lyrics:
“Serve the Lord with gladness,” In our works and ways, 
Come before His presence With our songs of praise;
Unto Him our Maker We would pledge anew
Life’s supreme devotion To service true.

“Serve the Lord with gladness,” Thankful all the while 
For His tender mercies, For His loving smile:
Blessed truth enduring, Always just the same,
We will serve with gladness And praise His name.

“Serve the Lord with gladness,” This shall be our theme, 
As we walk together In His love supreme:
List'ning, ever list'ning For the still, small voice,
His sweet will so precious Will be our choice.

REFRAIN
“Serve Him with gladness,” Enter His courts with song;
To our Creator True praises belong: 
Great is His mercy, Wonderful is His name,
We gladly serve Him, His great love proclaim.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 496 首 - 樂意事奉救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
樂意事奉救主，工作或前途，來到恩主台前，歌頌讚美主；
敬向造物主宰，將心願獻出，生命崇高目標，忠誠事主。

樂意事奉救主，一切存感恩，因祂溫柔慈愛，祂笑容可親；
真理恆久長存，永遠不變更，我要樂意事主，頌祂聖名。

樂意事奉救主，乃生命主題，在主崇高愛中，眾步伐整齊；
常常留心傾聽，主慈聲美意，甜美寶貴叮嚀，慰我心靈。

副歌
樂意事奉主，歌唱進祂的院，向造物主宰，獻虔誠詩篇；
大哉！主慈愛；祂名稱為奇妙，樂意事奉主，傳主愛豐饒。

english_page_header: Hymn 497 - The Longer I Serve Him
english_full_lyrics:
Since I started for the Kingdom,
Since my life He controls,
Since I gave my heart to Jesus,
The longer I serve Him, the sweeter He grows.

Ev'ry need He is supplying,
Plenteous grace He bestows;
Ev'ry day my way gets brighter,
The longer I serve Him, the sweeter He grows.

REFRAIN
The longer I serve Him the sweeter He grows,
The more that I love Him, more love He bestows;
Each day is like heaven, my heart overflows,
The longer I serve Him the sweeter He grows.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 497 首 - 事奉祂越久越甘甜
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
自從我接受主耶穌，祂成為我主宰，
自從我跟隨主耶穌，我事奉祂愈久愈感到甘甜。

祂賜下各樣的需要，祂賜豐富恩典，
每天路徑滴下脂油，我事奉祂愈久愈感到甘甜。

副歌
我事奉祂愈久愈感到甘甜，我愛祂愈深刻賜福愈加添，
使我福杯滿溢，在地如在天。我事奉祂愈久愈感到甘甜。

english_page_header: Hymn 498 - I Have Decided to Follow Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
I have decided to follow Jesus,
I have decided to follow Jesus,
I have decided to follow Jesus,
No turning back, no turning back.

Tho’ none go with me I still will follow,
Tho’ none go with me I still will follow,
Tho’ none go with me I still will follow,
No turning back, no turning back.

My cross I’ll carry till I see Jesus,
My cross I’ll carry till I see Jesus,
My cross I’ll carry till I see Jesus,
No turning back, no turning back.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 498 首 - 決心跟隨耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我已經決心要跟隨耶穌，
我已經決心，要跟隨耶穌，
我已經決心，要跟隨耶穌，
我要永遠跟隨耶穌。

雖無人同行，仍跟隨耶穌；
雖無人同行，仍跟隨耶穌；
雖無人同行，仍跟隨耶穌；
我要永遠跟隨耶穌。

我要背十架，永跟隨耶穌；
我要背十架，永跟隨耶穌；
我要背十架，永跟隨耶穌；
我要永遠跟隨耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 499 - Pass It On
english_full_lyrics:
It only takes a spark
to get a fire going,
And soon all those around
can warm up in its glowing;

What a wondrous time is spring-
when all the trees are budding,
The birds begin to sing,
the flowers start their blooming;

I wish for you, my friend,
this happiness that I’ve found-
You can depend on Him,
it matters not where you’re bound;

REFRAIN
That’s how it is with God’s love,
once you’ve experienced it:
You spread His love to ev'ryone,
you want to pass it on.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 499 首 - 傳給人
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
一點星星之火，可以將火點燃起，
圍在火旁的人，立時便感到暖意；
真神慈愛極豐富，當你有這經歷，
你必願意將這慈愛，向每個人傳揚。

春天何等美麗，新葉嫩綠滿樹上，
小鳥開始歌唱，萬花都爭先開放；
真神慈愛極豐富，當你有這經歷，
祢必願意讚美歌唱，將主妙愛傳揚。

朋友，願你分享我已得到的喜樂，
願你也信靠祂，不論你境況如何；
我願登高山宣告，向世界高聲唱：
救主的愛已臨到我，我要向人傳揚。

english_page_header: Hymn 500 - There's a Quiet Understanding
english_full_lyrics:
There’s a quiet understanding
When we’re gathered in the Spirit,
It’s a promise that He gives us,
When we gather in His name.

And we know when we’re together,
Sharing love and understanding,
That our brothers and our sisters
Feel the oneness that He brings,

REFRAIN
1
There’s a love we feel in Jesus,
There’s a manna that He feeds us,
It’s a promise that He gives us
When we gather in His name.

2
Thank You, thank You, thank You, Jesus,
For the way You love and feed us,
For the many ways You lead us,
Thank You, thank You, Lord.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 500 首 - 靈裡的默契
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我們聚集同在一起，聖靈感動心有默契，
這是耶穌所賜應許，奉祂聖名在一起。
祂的慈愛滿我心裡，嗎哪使我靈魂得力，
這是耶穌所賜應許，奉祂聖名在一起。

主與我們同在一起，彼此分享靈裡相繫，
兄弟姊妹在主愛裡，情同手足心合一。
感謝耶穌教導真理，祢使我們喜樂滿溢，
引領我們進入天城，感謝主應許。

english_page_header: Hymn 501 - He Looked Beyond My Fault
english_full_lyrics:
Amazing grace shall always be my song of praise,
For it was grace that bought my liberty;
I do not know just why He came to love me so,
He looked beyond my fault and saw my need.
I shall forever lift mine eyes to Calvary,
To view the cross where Jesus died for me,
How marvelous the grace that caught my falling soul,
He looked beyond my fault and saw my need.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 501 首 - 祂關懷我需求
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
奇妙救恩使我永遠歌頌不休。何等恩惠！主賜我真自由。
耶穌慈愛長闊高深不能測透，不念過犯，祂關懷我需求。
我要舉目，仰望著各各他山頭，念主耶穌捨生命寶血流。
奇妙救恩吸引失落靈魂回頭。不念過犯，祂關懷我需求。

english_page_header: Hymn 502 - Bring Back the Springtime
english_full_lyrics:
When in the spring the flow’rs are
blooming bright and fair,
After the gray of winter’s gone.
Once again the lark begins its tuning,
Back in the meadows of my home.

Lord, make me like the stream that
flows so cool and clear
Down from the mountains high above;
I will tell the world the wondrous story
Of the precious stream filled with Your love.

REFRAIN
Lord, to my heart bring back the springtime,
Take away the cold and dark of sin.
O refill me now, sweet Holy Spirit:
May I warm and tender be again.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 502 首 - 春回大地
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
春光真明媚，更換灰暗的冬衣，野地的百花爭艷麗。
雲雀唱出悅耳動聽歌曲，餘音迴響我家園裡。

我願如水流，澄澈清涼的小溪，因泉源湧流自山裡。
救主奇妙故事我要傳遞，各各他洗罪泉湧溢。

副歌
主！使我心如春回大地，清除陰冷幽暗的罪跡；
請再充滿我，應許的聖靈，助我謙和，遵行主旨意。

english_page_header: Hymn 503 - Let All Things Now Living
english_full_lyrics:
Let all things now living A song of thanksgiving
To God the Creator triumphantly raise,
Who fashioned and made us, protected and stayed us,
Who guideth us on to the end of our days.
His banners are o’er us, His light goes before us,
A pillar of fire shining forth in the night,
Till shadows have vanished And darkness is banished,
As forward we travel from light into light.

His law He enforces: the stars in their courses,
The sun in its orbit obediently shine;
The hills and the mountains, the rivers and fountains,
The deeps of the ocean proclaim Him divine.
We too, should be voicing our love and rejoicing,
With glad adoration a song let us raise.
Till all things now living unite in thanksgiving
To God in the highest, hosanna and praise!
Amen
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 503 首 - 願萬有歌頌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
願萬有齊歌頌，獻上感謝讚美，
因主戰勝死亡又復活升天；
真神創造我們，極其呵護憐惜，
祂領我們走完那客居歲月。
旌旗在上飄揚，明燈在前指引，
火炷照亮黑夜那漫長旅途，
直到死蔭遁跡，直到黑暗消弭。
我們從光明中，進永遠榮光。

神掌管自然律，群星依序運行，
太陽遵循軌道運轉又照耀；
丘陵高山起伏，江河泉源滾滾，
深淵海洋傳揚祂榮耀神聖。
我們也當歡樂述說心所愛慕，
我們歡喜敬拜，並讚美歌頌！
願萬有齊歌頌，同心感謝讚美，
稱頌至高救主，和散那！歌頌！阿們！

english_page_header: Hymn 504 - Only a Touch
english_full_lyrics:
Only a touch of Thy hand, dear Lord,
Only a word from Thee,
Will all my heart’s wild anguish still,
Joyful my soul shall be.

Only a touch of Thy hand, dear Lord,
Only a word from Thee,
Calms all my weary, troubled soul,
Stilleth life’s surging sea.

REFRAIN
Only a touch of Thy hand, dear Lord,
And o’er my soul shall sweep,
Melody sweet from life’s broken chords,
Awakened from silence deep.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 504 首 - 願祢慈手安慰我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
祢慈手安慰我，主耶穌！祢恩言一發出，
煎熬與痛苦即平靜，我靈魂享歡欣。

祢慈手安慰我，主耶穌！祢恩言一發出，
疲憊與憂傷得撫平，驚濤駭浪平靜。

副歌
祢慈手安慰我，主耶穌！我靈魂得安寧，
破碎心弦再彈甜美曲，我心甦醒歌頌神。

english_page_header: Hymn 505 - Don't Go Away Without Jesus
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 505 首 - 莫離耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
莫離耶穌偏行己路。在世奔波莫離耶穌；
祂願意救你脫離罪污，洗淨你心聖潔像主。
來接受祂的憐恤眷顧，享用祂無盡的鴻福。
莫離救主，請快開心門迎耶穌。

english_page_header: Hymn 506 - No One Understands Like Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
No one understands like Jesus,
He’s a friend beyond compare;
Meet Him at the throne of mercy,
He is waiting for you there.

No one understands like Jesus,
Ev'ry woe He sees and feels;
Tenderly He whispers comfort,
And the broken heart He heals.

No one understands like Jesus,
When the foes of life assail;
You should never be discouraged,
Jesus cares and will not fail.

No one understands like Jesus,
When you falter on the way,
Though you fail Him, sadly fail Him,
He will pardon you today.

REFRAIN
No one understands like Jesus,
When the days are dark and grim;
No one is so near, so dear as Jesus,
Cast your ev'ry care on Him.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 506 首 - 無一朋友像主耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
無一朋友像主耶穌，祂比眾友更可靠，
趕快到主施恩座前，祂正等候你來到。

無一朋友像主耶穌，你的痛苦祂同情，
祂用慈愛溫柔話語，醫治破碎的心靈。

無一朋友像主耶穌，倘若仇敵攻擊你，
千萬不要失去勇氣，主必看顧你到底。

無一朋友像主耶穌，一生道路祂引領，
我們縱然失去信心，仍然得到祂憐憫。

副歌
無一朋友像主耶穌，當祢遇艱難困苦；
無人如此親愛像主耶穌，萬事都有祂看顧。

english_page_header: Hymn 507 - All Because of Calvary
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 507 首 - 倚靠各各他十字架
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我罪得赦免，倚靠各各他十架；
唱生命凱歌，倚靠各各他十架。
基督已復活，信靠祂使我自由。
主必快再來，賜我榮耀輝煌，都是倚靠各各他十架。

english_page_header: Hymn 508 - Lord, Lay Some Soul upon My Heart
english_full_lyrics:
Lord, lay some soul upon my heart,
And love that soul through me;
And may I bravely do my part
To win that soul for Thee.

Lord, lead me to some soul in sin,
And grant that I may be
Endued with power and love to win
That soul, dear Lord, for Thee.

To win that soul for Thee alone
Will be my constant prayer;
That when I’ve reached the great white throne
I’ll meet that dear one there.

REFRAIN
Some soul for Thee, some soul for Thee,
This is my earnest plea;
Help me each day, on life’s highway,
To win some soul for Thee.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 508 首 - 引人歸主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
懇求聖靈充滿我心，勇敢傳主福音；
靠主大恩，善盡本分，引人親近真神。

求主使我與祢同行，關愛世人靈魂；
靠主大能，宣揚主恩，引人歸向真神。

求主垂聽僕人心聲，使我事主忠心；
靠主大愛，奔向天庭，引人同享福音。

副歌
引人歸主，引人歸主，我願喜傳福音。
求主日日領我、助我，引人歸向真神。

english_page_header: Hymn 509 - Beyond the Sunset
english_full_lyrics:
Beyond the sunset, O blissful morning,
When with our Savior heav’n is begun,
Earth’s toiling ended, O glorious dawning,
Beyond the sunset when day is done.

Beyond the sunset, no clouds will gather,
No storms will, threaten, no fears annoy;
O day of gladness, O day unending,
Beyond the sunset eternal joy!

Beyond the sunset, a hand will guide me
To God, the Father, whom I adore;
His glorious presence, His words of welcome,
Will be my portion on that fair shore.

Beyond the sunset, O glad reunion,
With our dear loved ones who’ve gone before;
In that fair homeland we’ll know no parting,
Beyond the sunset forevermore!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 509 首 - 日落之那邊
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
日落之那邊，得福之晨間，在天堂樂境，與主相見；
勞碌盡完畢，榮耀之明天，日落之那邊，歡樂永遠。

日落之那邊，雲霧盡消散，暴風雨遠離，無憂心安；
榮耀快樂日，永遠無心煩，日落之那邊，歡樂永遠。

日落之那邊，主親手引薦，到父寶座前，見父容顏；
在祂榮耀中，與我主相見，日落之那邊，歡樂永遠。

日落之那邊，故人樂團圓，與親朋好友，歡喜相見；
在天家美地，不再有離別，日落之那邊，歡樂永遠。

english_page_header: Hymn 510 - Heaven Came Down
english_full_lyrics:
O what a wonderful, wonderful day-
Day I will never forget;
After I’d wandered in darkness away,
Jesus my Savior I met.
O what a tender, compassionate friend,
He met the need of my heart;
Shadows dispelling, with joy I am telling,
He made all the darkness depart!

Born of the Spirit with life from above
Into God’s fam’ly divine;
Justified fully thru Calvary’s love,
O what a standing is mine!
And the transaction so quickly was made,
When as a sinner I came,
Took of the offer of grace He did proffer,
He saved me, O praise His dear name!

Now I’ve a hope that will surely endure
After the passing of time;
I have a future in heaven for sure,
There in those mansions sublime.
And it’s because of that wonderful day
When at the cross I believed;
Riches eternal and blessings supernal
From His precious hand I received.

REFRAIN
Heaven came down and glory filled my soul,
When at the cross the Savior made me whole;
My sins were washed away
And my night was turned to day,
Heaven came down and glory filled my soul!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 510 首 - 天上榮耀
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
是何等奇妙的奇妙日子，那日子不能忘記；
當我在黑暗中顛沛流離，我與主耶穌相遇。
多溫柔、多體諒，我的良友，滿足我心靈需求；
黑雲已消散，我欣喜去傳揚，祂使暗夜變為晨曦。

屬靈的生命藉聖靈重生，從此進父神家裡；
主被釘各各他我得稱義，是何等奇妙真理。
我罪孽雖深重，祂不記念，接納我，賜我福氣，
我接受主耶穌預備的恩典，祂拯救我離罪稱義！

當那日我生命即將結束，必得著永生應許；
在天家祂為我預備住處，榮耀中與主同席。
自從我相信主十架救恩，我重生，我靈歡喜，
永遠的福氣，及豐富的賞賜，靠祂恩典成聖稱義。

副歌
天上榮耀充滿我心靈裡，
十架恩典今使我得稱義。
我罪已經洗淨，黑夜已轉為晨曦，
天上榮耀充滿我心靈裡。

english_page_header: Hymn 511 - Only One Plan
english_full_lyrics:
There’s only one plan of redemption for man,
And we are a part of that plan;
To us has been given this story of love,
Our part is to reach ev’ry man.
This plan of redemption to save a lost world,
Was formed in the mind of our God.
Salvation for all through Christ’s death on the cross,
But the world must the story be told.

The price of the plan was the Father’s own Son,
The dearest thing heaven could hold;
In infinite love He sent Jesus to die,
What a price to reclaim a lost world!
This plan of the ages required of the Son,
That He gives His own self on a tree.
His lifeblood to shed for the sins of mankind,
That man, in his guilt, might go free.

God’s part is complete, He is looking to you
To spread the glad message abroad;
If the world is to hear, If the story is told,
God’s plan now depends upon you.
There’s only one plan for the lost world to hear,
The message by us must go forth.
For we must tell others, and, they others still,
Till the story has covered the earth.

REFRAIN
God’s plan now depends upon you,
God’s plan now depends upon you.
There’s no other way that a lost world will know;
God’s plan now depends upon you.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 511 首 - 救贖計畫
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
只有一個計畫使人得永生，我們也在這計畫中，
主已賜與世人這慈愛信息，我們應當殷勤作工。
救贖計畫要搭救世上群倫，早安排在主計畫中，
藉主釘死十架上救恩完成，這信息要速去傳送。

神獨生子已完成救贖大功，天上珍寶極其貴重，
因無窮盡大慈愛耶穌捨命，何等奇妙救世恩功！
父差愛子早已在祂經綸中，為救罪人受盡苦刑，
祂流寶血為赦免世上萬眾，使信者得自由永生

主工作已完成，等我們跟從，當努力傳救世恩功，
讓世人都聽見主救世光榮，當盡責任努力做工。
只有一個計畫使人得永生，這信息靠我們傳送，
努力宣告福音給世上萬眾，直到傳遍南北西東。

副歌
主救恩靠我們傳揚；主救恩靠我們傳揚。
別無方法傳達給世界各方，主救恩靠我們傳揚。

english_page_header: Hymn 512 - The King is Coming
english_full_lyrics:
The market place is empty,
No more traffic in the streets,
All the builders’ tools are silent,
No more time to harvest wheat;
Busy housewives cease their labors,
In the courtroom no debate,
Work on earth is all suspended
As the King comes through the gate.

Happy faces line the hallways,
Those whose lives have been redeemed,
Broken homes that He has mended,
Those from prison He has freed;
Little children and the aged
Hand in hand stand all aglow,
Who were crippled, broken, ruined,
Clad in garments white as snow.

I can hear the chariots rumble,
I can see the marching throng,
The flurry of God’s trumpets
Spells the end of sin and wrong;
Regal robes are now unfolding,
Heaven’s grandstands all in place,
Heaven’s choir is now assembled,
Start to sing “Amazing Grace!”

REFRAIN
O the King is coming, The King is coming!
I just heard the trumpets sounding,
And now His face I see;
O the King is coming, The King is coming!
Praise God, He’s coming for me!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 512 首 - 主將來臨
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
市場上空曠無人跡，街道上人少冷清，
所有工匠不再忙碌，莊稼禾場待收成。
婦人不再日夜辛勞，法庭兩造不爭論，
地上萬國都要過去，因為我主要來臨。

蒙恩得救贖的子民，刹那間復活改變，
神的子民不再流淚，復活聖徒都升天。
耶穌再臨時候到了，身穿白衣極光明，
男女老幼歡喜快樂，欣喜盼望主來臨。

隆隆聲音，天軍前來！雄壯隊伍向前行，
號角聲音響徹雲霄，宣告救主已再臨。
天國陣容聲勢浩大，聖徒身穿細麻衣，
天上萬軍高聲頌揚，讚美神: 「奇妙恩典！」

副歌
我的王要來臨，我王要來臨！
我已聽見號角聲音，我將見主榮顏，
我的王要來臨，我王要來臨，
為我，祂必要來臨。

english_page_header: Hymn 513 - Springs of Living Water
english_full_lyrics:
I thirsted in the barren land of sin and shame,
And nothing satisfying there I found;
But to the blessed cross of Christ one day I came,
Where springs of living water did abound.

How sweet the living water from the hills of God,
It makes me glad and happy all the way;
Now glory, grace, and blessing mark the path I’ve trod,
I’m shouting “Hallelujah” ev'ry day.

O sinner, won’t you come today to Calvary?
A fountain there is flowing deep and wide;
The Savior now invites you to the water free,
Where thirsting spirits can be satisfied.

REFRAIN
Drinking at the spings of living water,
Happy now am I, My soul they satisfy;
Drinking at the springs of living water,
O wonderful and bountiful supply!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 513 首 - 活水泉源
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
在罪惡羞辱荒漠地我口甚乾，卻無法得著活水的甘泉；
但有一天我來到基督十架前，得飲我救主豐盛活水泉。

主賞賜豐盛活水泉源甚甘甜，祂使我得著喜樂滿心田；
有恩惠、榮耀、祝福，一路得平安，我歌唱：『哈利路亞』到永遠。

眾罪人都當尋求主救贖活泉，這寶血活泉湧流闊又遠；
我救主白白賞賜豐盛的恩典，使饑渴心靈得飲活水泉。

副歌
得飲救主豐盛活水泉源，我心極喜樂，我靈魂得愛憐；
得飲救主豐盛活水泉源，是何等甜美豐盛活水泉！

english_page_header: Hymn 514 - My Wonderful Lord
english_full_lyrics:
I have found a deep peace that I never had known,
And a joy this world could not afford,
Since I yielded control of my body and soul
To my wonderful, wonderful Lord.

I desire that my life shall be ordered by Thee,
That my will be in perfect accord
With Thine own sov'reign will, Thy desires to fulfill,
My wonderful, wonderful Lord.

All the talents I have -- I have laid at Thy feet,
Thy approval shall be my reward;
Be my store great or small, I surrender it all
To my wonderful, wonderful Lord.

Thou art fairer to me than the fairest of earth,
Thou omnipotent, lifegiving Word;
O Thou Ancient of Days, Thou art worthy all praise,
My wonderful, wonderful Lord.

REFRAIN
My wonderful Lord, my wonderful Lord,
By angels and seraphs in heaven adored!
I bow at Thy shrine, my Savior divine,
My wonderful, wonderful Lord.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 514 首 - 我的奇妙救主
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我心深處有平安非人所能懂，我有喜樂非人所賜福。
自從將我身心完全獻給救主，我奇妙的奇妙救主。

我願將我的生命交託主耶穌，我心志完全歸向基督。
惟願救主旨意成全在我身上，我奇妙的奇妙救主。

我願將所有才能奉獻我救主，蒙祢悅納是極大賜福。
全身所有一切我願獻給救主，我奇妙的奇妙救主。

祢何等美好，遠勝過世上財富，祢是全能者生命之父。
從亙古到永遠配得榮耀讚美，我奇妙的奇妙救主。

副歌
奇妙的救主，奇妙的救主，高天之上眾天使讚美歡呼！
我俯伏敬拜救贖我的主，我奇妙的奇妙救主。

english_page_header: Hymn 515 - He Touched Me
english_full_lyrics:
Shackled by a heavy burden, 
’Neath a load of guilt and shame-
Then the hand of Jesus touched me,
And now I am no longer the same.

Since I met this blessed Savior,
Since He cleansed and made me whole,
I will never cease to praise Him-
I’ll shout it while eternity rolls.

REFRAIN
He touched me, O He touched me,
And O the joy that floods my soul;
Something happened, and now I know,
He touched me and made me whole.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 515 首 - 祂救我
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
罪惡重擔將我捆住，滿心羞愧多憂苦。
幸有耶穌慈手眷顧，因祂拯救我，使我得贖。

自從認識耶穌基督，蒙祂洗淨重罪污。
我要永遠讚美救主，我讚美救主恩典無數。

副歌
祂救我，祂拯救我，耶穌救我，使我完全。
救主使我生命改變，祂賜我喜樂無限。

english_page_header: Hymn 516 - Burdens Are Lifted at Calvary
english_full_lyrics:
Days are filled with sorrow and care,
Hearts are lonely and drear;
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.

Cast your care on Jesus today,
Leave your worry and fear;
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.

Troubled soul, our Saviour can see
Ev’ry heartache and tear;
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.

REFRAIN
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Calvary, Calvary;
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 516 首 - 罪重擔脫落在各各他
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
日日充滿掛慮憂傷，心裡寂寞徬徨，
罪重擔脫落在各各他，耶穌就在身旁。

一切愁煩交託耶穌，卸下憂悶驚慌，
罪重擔脫落在各各他，耶穌就在身旁。

心靈痛苦，眼淚盈眶，救主安慰療傷，
罪重擔脫落在各各他，耶穌就在身旁。

副歌
罪重擔脫落在各各他，各各他，各各他。
罪重擔脫落在各各他，耶穌就在身旁。

english_page_header: Hymn 517 - Now I Belong to Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Jesus my Lord will love me forever,
From Him no pow’r of evil can sever,
He gave His life to ransom my soul,
Now I belong to Him;

Once I was lost in sin’s degradation,
Jesus came down to bring me salvation,
Lifted me up from sorrow and shame,
Now I belong to Him;

Joy floods my soul for Jesus has saved me,
Freed me from sin that long had enslaved me,
His precious blood He gave to redeem,
Now I belong to Him;

REFRAIN
Now I belong to Jesus,
Jesus belongs to me,
Not for the years of time alone,
But for eternity.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 517 首 - 我永遠屬於祂
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
耶穌我救主，愛我不止息，無權勢能使我與主分離。
祂救贖我靈，捨命十架，我永遠屬於祂。

我從前墮落，罪惡中沉迷，主耶穌降世，給我好信息。
我不再羞恥、憂傷、懼怕，我永遠屬於祂。

我心靈快樂，我已得拯救，從前為罪奴，今主賜自由。
為救贖我靈，祂寶血流，我永遠屬於祂。

副歌
我永遠屬主耶穌，主耶穌也屬我，
雖時空變換或遷移，與主永不分離。

english_page_header: Hymn 518 - They That Sow in Tears
english_full_lyrics:
Though it seems that your prayers have been in vain,
Though your faith the world would destroy,
Though your heart should ache till it breaks in two,
They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.

Though the mists of despair cloud the sky above,
Do you pray till His face appears?
In your heart do you know that you’ve touched the throne?
They shall reap in joy who sow in tears.

Does your heart fill with doubt when alone you pray?
Does the world your soul annoy?
Lift your sights! Look beyond! God is standing near!
They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.

REFRAIN
They that sow in tears shall reap in joy,
For God is on His throne,
Though you’ve prayed till it seems that your heart would break,
They that sow in tears shall reap in joy!
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 518 首 - 流淚撒種
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
有時候你祈禱，似乎無功效，你信心似已動搖；
你心靈甚憂苦，彷彿如刀割，流淚撒種必歡呼收割。

有時候快絕望，心靈多煎熬，是否仍不住祈禱？
你可知慈愛主在寶座施恩？流淚撒種必歡呼收割。

有時候你祈禱，仍疑惑 、煩惱，世俗事依舊困擾？
當舉目仰望主，祂就在身側，流淚撒種必歡呼收割。

副歌
流淚撒種，必歡呼收割，神在寶座垂聽，
祂知道你心意，祂必施憐憫。流淚撒種必歡呼收割。

english_page_header: Hymn 519 - His Sheep Am I
english_full_lyrics:
In God’s green pastures feeding, by His cool waters lie;
Soft in the evening walk my Lord and I.
All the sheep of His pastures fare so wondrously fine,
His sheep am I.

Waters cool, Pastures green,
In the evening walk my Lord and I;

Dark the night, Rough the way,
Step by step my Lord and I.

REFRAIN
In God’s green pastures feeding, by His cool waters lie;
Soft in the evening walk my Lord and I.
All the sheep of His pastures fare so wondrously fine,
His sheep am I.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 519 首 - 我是主羊
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
主領我到青草地安歇在溪水旁，黃昏時，主與我一路同行。
牧場上，凡是屬於主的羊都強壯，我是主羊。
青草地，溪水旁，黃昏時有主與我同行。
黑暗夜，路崎嶇，一步一步隨主行。
主領我到青草地安歇在溪水旁，黃昏時，主與我一路同行。
牧場上，凡是屬於主的羊都強壯，我是主羊。

english_page_header: Hymn 520 - Twas Jesus' Blood
english_full_lyrics:
A sinner, lost, condemned was I,
Doomed an eternal death to die;
But Jesus died for me,
He bore sin’s penalty,
On Calv’ry’s hill was lifted high.

I ne’er could be at peace with God,
But for the cleansing, crimson flood,
No one but Christ could win
Atonement for all sin-
He signed my pardon with His blood.

No doubter’s scorn or creed of man
Can shake my faith in Calv’ry’s plan;
His blood redeemed my soul,
It made me pure and whole;
By faith my life in Him began.

REFRAIN
Twas Jesus’ blood that ransomed me,
From chains on sin He set me free,
While ages roll, my song shall be: 
Twas Jesus’ blood that ransomed me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 520 首 - 耶穌寶血
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我原是迷失的罪人，末日審判難脫沉淪，但耶穌為我死，
在各各他捨命，用己身承擔我罪行。

蒙主寶血洗滌我身，才得潔淨與神相親，我深知唯有主，
才能作我贖價，祂寶血領我回天庭。

各各他十字架救恩，我靈感動我心堅定，祂寶血救我靈，
使我潔白無瑕，因信心得主賜永生。

副歌
耶穌寶血，已拯救我，從罪惡中，祂拯救我。
世世代代都要頌揚，耶穌寶血已拯救我。

english_page_header: Hymn 521 - What a Day That Will Be
english_full_lyrics:
There is coming a day when no heartaches shall come,
No more clouds in the sky, no more tears to dim the eye;
All is peace forevermore on that happy golden shore-
What a day, glorious day, that will be.

There’ll be no sorrow there, no more burdens to bear,
No more sickness, no pain, no more parting over there;
And forever I will be with the One who died for me-
What a day, glorious day, that will be.

REFRAIN
What a day that will be when my Jesus I shall see,
And I look upon His face - the One who saved me by His grace;
When He takes me by the hand, and leads me through the Promised Land,
What a day, glorious day, that will be.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 521 首 - 何等榮耀日
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
有一日要來臨，無眼淚無愁煩，無黑雲無風暴，無試煉也無艱難，
在那天堂快樂地，在主懷裡享安息。到那日，何等快樂榮耀日！

有一地無憂慮，無重擔無畏懼，無病痛無嘆息，無死亡也無分離，
在那美地福無比，我願與主永相聚。到那日，何等快樂榮耀日！

副歌
到那日，極榮耀，歡喜得見主聖顏！我將與主面對面，得蒙救贖，靠主恩典。
我行走，主牽我手，在應許地享福永久，到那日，何等快樂榮耀日！

english_page_header: Hymn 522 - O Let Your Soul Now Be Filled With Gladness
english_full_lyrics:
O let your soul now be filled with gladness,
Your heart redeemed, rejoice indeed!
O may the thought banish all your sadness
That in His blood you have been freed.
That God’s unfailing love is yours,
That you the only Son were given,
That by His death He has opened heaven,
That you are ransomed as you are.

If you seem empty of any feeling,
Rejoice - you are His ransomed bride!
If those you cherish seem not to love you,
And dark assails from ev'ry side,
Still yours the promise, come what may,
In loss and triumph, in laughter, crying,
In want and riches, in living, dying,
That you are purchased as you are.

It is a good, ev'ry good transcending,
That Christ has died for you and me!
It is a gladness that has no ending
There in God’s wondrous love to see!
Praise be to Him, the spotless Lamb,
Who through the desert my soul is leading
To that fair city of joy exceeding,
For which He bought me as I am.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 522 首 - 願你心靈充滿歡欣
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
願你的心靈能充滿歡唱，願喜樂滿足你心腸。
除去你心中一切的悲傷，因耶穌寶血得釋放。
父神的大愛永不變，賜獨生愛子代世人死亡，
祂痛苦受死，為你開福源，使你能蒙恩免淪亡。

你應當歡喜，因得蒙拯救，空虛與愁煩不再有。
雖然有黑暗環繞在四周，朋友也遠離你左右。
但神的應許永不變，不論是得失，或歡笑、憂愁，
或貧窮、富足，或生或死囚，你已經蒙恩得拯救。

主耶穌受死，是為你和我，祂恩典豐富，美善多。
奇妙的大愛，我無法述說，祂使我歡暢無限樂。
讚美主耶穌聖羔羊，祂帶我靈魂經野地荒漠，
到天上聖城，那歡樂福地，因我已蒙恩得永活。

english_page_header: Hymn 523 - He's Everything to Me
english_full_lyrics:
In the stars His handiwork I see,
On the wind He speaks with majesty,
Though He ruleth over land and sea,
What is that to me?

I will celebrate my liberty,
And the wonder of His death for me,
Sure, He came to set His people free,
What is that to me?

Till by faith I met Him face to face,
And I felt the wonder of His grace,
Then I knew that He was more than just a
God who didn’t care,
That lived away out there and

Now He walks beside me day by day,
Ever watching o’er me lest I stray,
Helping me to find that narrow way,
He’s everything to me.

Till by faith I met Him face to face,
And I felt the wonder of His grace,
Then I knew that He was more than just a
God who didn’t care,
That lived away out there and

Now He walks beside me day by day,
Ever watching o’er me lest I stray,
Helping me to find that narrow way,
He’s everything to me.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 523 首 - 救主是我所有
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
群星閃耀述說主奇工 ，微風吹動見證主尊榮，
陸地海洋在祂掌管中，於我有何用？
耶穌被釘十架受苦刑，因祂代死我得新生命，
祂將自由賞賜眾罪人，於我有何用？
直到憑信得見主聖顏，領會救主奇妙大恩典，
我才深知主愛廣無邊，祂時刻關懷我，並隨時賜福加添。
每日與我同行肩並肩，常常看顧我免遭危險，
行走窄路祂在我左右，祂就是我所有。
直到憑信得見主聖顏，領會救主奇妙大恩典，
我才深知主愛廣無邊，祂時刻關懷我，並隨時賜福加添。
每日與我同行肩並肩，常常看顧我免遭危險，
行走窄路祂在我左右，祂就是我所有。

english_page_header: Hymn 524 - Reach Out to Jesus
english_full_lyrics:
Is your burden heavy as you bear it all alone?
Does the road you travel harbor danger yet unknown?
Are you growing weary in the struggle of it all?
Jesus will help you when on His name you call.

Is the life you’re living filled with sorrow and despair?
Does the future press you with its worry and its care?
Are you tired and friendless, have you almost lost your way?
Jesus will help you, just come to Him today.

REFRAIN
He is always there, hearing ev'ry prayer, faithful and true;
Walking by our side, in His love we hide all the day through.
When you get discouraged just remember what to do-
Reach out to Jesus, He’s reaching out to you.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 524 首 - 求告耶穌
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
是否你靠自己，背負重擔與憂愁？
是否人生道路隱藏危險難行走？
是否內心掙扎，疲倦痛苦而無救？
求告主耶穌，祂必拯救幫助。

是否人生灰暗，充滿悲傷與失望？
是否為著前途，滿心掛慮與惆悵？
是否心靈孤單幾乎迷失了方向？
求告主耶穌，祂必拯救幫助。

副歌
主與你同在，垂聽你祈求，信實不改；
主與你同行，一直到永遠享受主愛。
切莫灰心失意，祂必永遠不離開。
求告主耶穌，祂必拯救幫助。

english_page_header: Hymn 525 - The Lord's Prayer
english_full_lyrics:
Our Father, which art in heaven,
Hallowed be Thy name.
Thy kingdom come,
Thy will be done on earth, as it is in heaven.
Give us this day our daily bread. And
forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.
And lead us not into temptation,
but deliver us from evil:
For Thine is the Kingdom,
and the Power, and the Glory,
forever. Amen.
chinese_trad_title--header: 第 525 首 - 主禱文
chinese_trad_lyrics--whole:
我們在天上的父神，願尊祢名為聖。
祢國降臨，旨意行在地上，如同行在天上。
求主賜我日用飲食，求主赦免我罪，
如同我赦免人罪。求主領我不遇見試探，並救我脫離諸兇惡，
因為國度、權柄、一切榮耀，全是祢的，到永遠。阿們。
